h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0001^ea^ ^a^M2.0001^ea^ ^a^P1.0339^ea^ ^a^V2.0001^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa campaaya.m viharati gaggaraaya pokkhara.niyaa tiire mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m. atha kho pesso {peyo (ka0)} ca hatthaarohaputto kandarako ca paribbaajako yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa pesso hatthaarohaputto bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. kandarako pana paribbaajako bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m {saaraa.niiya.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m pii0)} viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho kandarako paribbaajako tu.nhiibhuuta.m tu.nhiibhuuta.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m anuviloketvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``acchariya.m ^a^V2.0002^ea^, bho gotama, abbhuta.m, bho gotama, yaava~ncida.m bhotaa gotamena ^a^T2.0002^ea^ sammaa bhikkhusa"ngho pa.tipaadito! yepi te, bho gotama, ahesu.m atiitamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa tepi bhagavanto etaparama.myeva sammaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.tipaadesu.m -- seyyathaapi etarahi bhotaa gotamena sammaa bhikkhusa"ngho pa.tipaadito. yepi te, bho gotama, bhavissanti anaagatamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa tepi bhagavanto etaparama.myeva sammaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.tipaadessanti -- seyyathaapi etarahi bhotaa gotamena sammaa bhikkhusa"ngho pa.tipaadito''ti.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``evameta.m ^a^M2.0002^ea^, kandaraka, evameta.m, kandaraka. yepi te, kandaraka, ahesu.m atiitamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa tepi bhagavanto etaparama.myeva sammaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.tipaadesu.m -- seyyathaapi etarahi mayaa sammaa bhikkhusa"ngho pa.tipaadito. yepi te, kandaraka, bhavissanti anaagatamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa tepi bhagavanto etaparama.myeva sammaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.tipaadessanti -- seyyathaapi etarahi mayaa sammaa bhikkhusa"ngho pa.tipaadito.

[03] ``santi hi, kandaraka, bhikkhuu imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe arahanto khii.naasavaa vusitavanto katakara.niiyaa ohitabhaaraa anuppattasadatthaa parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojanaa sammada~n~naa vimuttaa. santi hi, kandaraka, bhikkhuu imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe sekkhaa santatasiilaa santatavuttino nipakaa nipakavuttino; te catuusu {nipakavuttino catuusu (sii0)} satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacittaa {supa.t.thitacittaa (sii0 pii0 ka0)} viharanti. katamesu catuusu? idha, kandaraka, bhikkhu ^a^P1.0340^ea^ kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke ^a^T2.0003^ea^ abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu vedanaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; citte cittaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa''nti.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, pesso hatthaarohaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yaava supa~n~nattaa cime, bhante, bhagavataa cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa sattaana.m visuddhiyaa sokaparidevaana.m {sokapariddavaana.m (sii0 pii0)} samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaaya ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya. mayampi hi, bhante, gihii odaatavasanaa kaalena kaala.m imesu catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu ^a^V2.0003^ea^ suppati.t.thitacittaa viharaama. idha maya.m, bhante, kaaye kaayaanupassino viharaama aataapino sampajaanaa satimanto, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu vedanaanupassino viharaama aataapino sampajaanaa satimanto, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; citte ^a^M2.0003^ea^ cittaanupassino viharaama aataapino sampajaanaa satimanto, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; dhammesu dhammaanupassino viharaama aataapino sampajaanaa satimanto, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yaava~ncida.m, bhante, bhagavaa eva.m manussagahane eva.m manussakasa.te eva.m manussasaa.theyye ^a^T2.0004^ea^ vattamaane sattaana.m hitaahita.m jaanaati. gahana~nheta.m, bhante, yadida.m manussaa; uttaanaka~nheta.m, bhante, yadida.m pasavo. aha~nhi, bhante, pahomi hatthidamma.m saaretu.m. yaavatakena antarena campa.m gataagata.m karissati sabbaani taani saa.theyyaani kuu.teyyaani va"nkeyyaani jimheyyaani paatukarissati. amhaaka.m pana, bhante, daasaati vaa pessaati vaa kammakaraati vaa a~n~nathaava kaayena samudaacaranti a~n~nathaava vaacaaya a~n~nathaava nesa.m citta.m hoti. acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yaava~ncida.m, bhante, bhagavaa eva.m manussagahane eva.m manussakasa.te eva.m manussasaa.theyye vattamaane sattaana.m hitaahita.m jaanaati. gahana~nheta.m, bhante, yadida.m manussaa; uttaanaka~nheta.m, bhante, yadida.m pasavo''ti.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``evameta.m, pessa, evameta.m, pessa. gahana~nheta.m ^a^P1.0341^ea^, pessa, yadida.m manussaa; uttaanaka~nheta.m, pessa, yadida.m pasavo. cattaarome, pessa, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? idha, pessa, ekacco puggalo attantapo hoti attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto; idha pana, pessa, ekacco puggalo parantapo hoti paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto; idha pana, pessa, ekacco puggalo attantapo ca hoti attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto, parantapo ca paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto ^a^T2.0005^ea^; idha pana, pessa, ekacco puggalo nevattantapo hoti naattaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto na parantapo na paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto. so anattantapo aparantapo di.t.theva dhamme nicchaato nibbuto siitiibhuuto {siitibhuuto (sii0 pii0 ka0)} sukhappa.tisa.mvedii brahmabhuutena attanaa viharati. imesa.m, pessa, catunna.m puggalaana.m katamo te puggalo citta.m aaraadhetii''ti?

[03] ``yvaaya.m, bhante, puggalo attantapo attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto, aya.m me puggalo citta.m ^a^V2.0004^ea^ naaraadheti. yopaaya.m, bhante, puggalo parantapo paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto ^a^M2.0004^ea^, ayampi me puggalo citta.m naaraadheti. yopaaya.m, bhante, puggalo attantapo ca attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto parantapo ca paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto, ayampi me puggalo citta.m naaraadheti. yo ca kho aya.m, bhante, puggalo nevattantapo naattaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto na parantapo na paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto, so anattantapo aparantapo di.t.theva dhamme nicchaato nibbuto siitiibhuuto sukhappa.tisa.mvedii brahmabhuutena attanaa viharati -- ayameva {aya.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} me puggalo citta.m aaraadhetii''ti.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ``kasmaa pana te, pessa, ime tayo puggalaa citta.m naaraadhentii''ti? ``yvaaya.m, bhante, puggalo attantapo attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto so attaana.m sukhakaama.m dukkhapa.tikkuula.m aataapeti paritaapeti -- iminaa me aya.m puggalo ^a^T2.0006^ea^ citta.m naaraadheti. yopaaya.m, bhante, puggalo parantapo paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto so para.m sukhakaama.m dukkhapa.tikkuula.m aataapeti paritaapeti -- iminaa me aya.m puggalo citta.m naaraadheti. yopaaya.m, bhante, puggalo attantapo ca attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto parantapo ca paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto so attaana~nca para~nca sukhakaama.m dukkhapa.tikkuula.m {sukhakaame dukkhapa.tikkuule (sii0 pii0)} aataapeti paritaapeti -- iminaa me aya.m puggalo citta.m naaraadheti. yo ca ^a^P1.0342^ea^ kho aya.m, bhante, puggalo nevattantapo naattaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto na parantapo na paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto so anattantapo aparantapo di.t.theva dhamme nicchaato nibbuto siitiibhuuto sukhappa.tisa.mvedii brahmabhuutena attanaa {viharati. iminaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} viharati; so attaana~nca para~nca sukhakaama.m dukkhapa.tikkuula.m neva aataapeti na paritaapeti -- iminaa {viharati. iminaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} me aya.m puggalo citta.m aaraadheti. handa, ca daani maya.m, bhante, gacchaama; bahukiccaa maya.m bahukara.niiyaa''ti. ``yassadaani tva.m, pessa, kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti. atha kho pesso hatthaarohaputto bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M2.0005^ea^ kho bhagavaa acirapakkante pesse hatthaarohaputte bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``pa.n.dito, bhikkhave, pesso hatthaarohaputto; mahaapa~n~no, bhikkhave, pesso hatthaarohaputto. sace, bhikkhave, pesso hatthaarohaputto muhutta.m nisiideyya yaavassaaha.m ime cattaaro puggale vitthaarena vibhajissaami {vibhajaami (sii0 pii0)}, mahataa atthena sa.myutto abhavissa. api ca, bhikkhave, ettaavataapi ^a^V2.0005^ea^ pesso hatthaarohaputto mahataa atthena sa.myutto''ti. ``etassa, bhagavaa, kaalo, etassa, sugata, kaalo, ya.m ^a^T2.0007^ea^ bhagavaa ime cattaaro puggale vitthaarena vibhajeyya. bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti. ``tena hi, bhikkhave, su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo attantapo attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo acelako hoti muttaacaaro hatthaapalekhano {hatthaavalekhano (syaa0 ka.m0)} naehibhaddantiko nati.t.thabhaddantiko {naehibhadantiko, nati.t.thabhadantiko (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}; naabhiha.ta.m na uddissakata.m na nimantana.m saadiyati; so na kumbhimukhaa pa.tigga.nhaati na ka.lopimukhaa {kha.lopimukho (sii0)} pa.tigga.nhaati na e.lakamantara.m na da.n.damantara.m na musalamantara.m na dvinna.m bhu~njamaanaana.m na gabbhiniyaa na paayamaanaaya na purisantaragataaya na sa"nkittiisu na yattha saa upa.t.thito hoti na yattha makkhikaa sa.n.dasa.n.dacaarinii; na maccha.m na ma.msa.m na sura.m na meraya.m na thusodaka.m pivati. so ekaagaariko vaa hoti ekaalopiko, dvaagaariko vaa hoti dvaalopiko...pe0... sattaagaariko vaa hoti sattaalopiko; ekissaapi dattiyaa yaapeti, dviihipi dattiihi yaapeti...pe0... sattahipi dattiihi yaapeti; ekaahikampi aahaara.m aahaareti, dviihikampi ^a^P1.0343^ea^ aahaara.m aahaareti...pe0... sattaahikampi aahaara.m aahaareti -- iti evaruupa.m a.d.dhamaasika.m pariyaayabhattabhojanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati. so ^a^T2.0008^ea^ saakabhakkho vaa hoti, saamaakabhakkho vaa hoti, niivaarabhakkho vaa hoti, daddulabhakkho vaa hoti, ha.tabhakkho vaa hoti, ka.nabhakkho vaa hoti, aacaamabhakkho vaa hoti, pi~n~naakabhakkho vaa hoti, ti.nabhakkho vaa hoti, gomayabhakkho vaa ^a^M2.0006^ea^ hoti; vanamuulaphalaahaaro yaapeti pavattaphalabhojii. so saa.naanipi dhaareti, masaa.naanipi dhaareti, chavadussaanipi dhaareti, pa.msukuulaanipi dhaareti, tirii.taanipi dhaareti, ajinampi dhaareti, ajinakkhipampi dhaareti, kusaciirampi dhaareti, vaakaciirampi dhaareti, phalakaciirampi dhaareti, kesakambalampi dhaareti, vaa.lakambalampi dhaareti, uluukapakkhampi dhaareti; kesamassulocakopi hoti, kesamassulocanaanuyogamanuyutto, ubbha.t.thakopi hoti aasanapa.tikkhitto, ukku.tikopi hoti ukku.tikappadhaanamanuyutto, ka.n.takaapassayikopi hoti ka.n.takaapassaye seyya.m kappeti {passa ma0 ni0 1.155 mahaasiihanaadasutte}; saayatatiyakampi udakorohanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati -- iti ^a^V2.0006^ea^ evaruupa.m anekavihita.m kaayassa aataapanaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo attantapo attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo parantapo paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo orabbhiko hoti suukariko saaku.niko maagaviko luddo macchaghaatako coro coraghaatako goghaatako bandhanaagaariko ye vaa pana~n~nepi keci kuruurakammantaa. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo parantapo paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``katamo ^a^T2.0009^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, puggalo attantapo ca attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto parantapo ca paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo raajaa vaa hoti khattiyo muddhaavasitto braahma.no vaa mahaasaalo. so puratthimena nagarassa nava.m santhaagaara.m {sandhaagaara.m (.tiikaa)} kaaraapetvaa kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kharaajina.m nivaasetvaa sappitelena kaaya.m abbha~njitvaa magavisaa.nena pi.t.thi.m ka.n.duvamaano nava.m santhaagaara.m pavisati saddhi.m mahesiyaa braahma.nena ca purohitena. so tattha anantarahitaaya bhuumiyaa haritupalittaaya seyya.m kappeti. ekissaaya gaaviyaa saruupavacchaaya ya.m ekasmi.m thane khiira.m hoti ^a^P1.0344^ea^ tena raajaa yaapeti, ya.m dutiyasmi.m thane khiira.m hoti tena mahesii yaapeti, ya.m tatiyasmi.m thane khiira.m hoti tena braahma.no purohito yaapeti ^a^M2.0007^ea^, ya.m catutthasmi.m thane khiira.m hoti tena aggi.m juhati, avasesena vacchako yaapeti. so evamaaha -- `ettakaa usabhaa ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaaya, ettakaa vacchataraa ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaaya, ettakaa vacchatariyo ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaaya, ettakaa ajaa ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaaya, ettakaa urabbhaa ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaaya, (ettakaa assaa ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaaya) {( ) natthi sii0 pii0 potthakesu}, ettakaa rukkhaa chijjantu yuupatthaaya, ettakaa dabbhaa luuyantu barihisatthaayaa'ti {parihi.m satthaaya (ka0)}. yepissa te honti daasaati vaa pessaati vaa kammakaraati vaa tepi da.n.datajjitaa ^a^T2.0010^ea^ bhayatajjitaa assumukhaa rudamaanaa parikammaani karonti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo attantapo ca attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto parantapo ca paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo nevattantapo naattaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto na parantapo na paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto, so anattantapo aparantapo di.t.theva dhamme nicchaato nibbuto ^a^V2.0007^ea^ siitiibhuuto sukhappa.tisa.mvedii brahmabhuutena attanaa viharati? idha, bhikkhave, tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. ta.m dhamma.m su.naati gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa a~n~natarasmi.m vaa kule paccaajaato. so ta.m dhamma.m sutvaa tathaagate saddha.m pa.tilabhati. so tena saddhaapa.tilaabhena samannaagato iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `sambaadho gharaavaaso rajaapatho, abbhokaaso pabbajjaa. nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajeyya'nti ^a^T2.0011^ea^. so aparena samayena appa.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m pahaaya, mahanta.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m pahaaya, appa.m ^a^P1.0345^ea^ vaa ~naatipariva.t.ta.m pahaaya ^a^M2.0008^ea^, mahanta.m vaa ~naatipariva.t.ta.m pahaaya, kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa, kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m pabbajito samaano bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaasaajiivasamaapanno paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti nihitada.n.do nihitasattho, lajjii dayaapanno sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii viharati. adinnaadaana.m pahaaya adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti dinnaadaayii dinnapaa.tika"nkhii, athenena sucibhuutena attanaa viharati. abrahmacariya.m pahaaya brahmacaarii hoti aaraacaarii virato methunaa gaamadhammaa. musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti saccavaadii saccasandho theto paccayiko avisa.mvaadako lokassa. pisu.na.m vaaca.m pahaaya pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, ito sutvaa na amutra akkhaataa imesa.m bhedaaya, amutra vaa sutvaa na imesa.m akkhaataa amuusa.m bhedaaya -- iti bhinnaana.m vaa sandhaataa sahitaana.m vaa anuppadaataa samaggaaraamo samaggarato samagganandii samaggakara.ni.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti. pharusa.m vaaca.m pahaaya pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, yaa saa vaacaa nelaa ka.n.nasukhaa pemaniiyaa hadaya"ngamaa porii bahujanakantaa bahujanamanaapaa tathaaruupi.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti. samphappalaapa.m pahaaya samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti kaalavaadii bhuutavaadii atthavaadii dhammavaadii ^a^T2.0012^ea^ vinayavaadii, nidhaanavati.m ^a^V2.0008^ea^ vaaca.m bhaasitaa kaalena saapadesa.m pariyantavati.m atthasa.mhita.m. so biijagaamabhuutagaamasamaarambhaa pa.tivirato hoti, ekabhattiko hoti rattuuparato virato vikaalabhojanaa; naccagiitavaaditavisuukadassanaa pa.tivirato hoti; maalaagandhavilepanadhaara.nama.n.danavibhuusana.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato hoti; uccaasayanamahaasayanaa pa.tivirato hoti; jaataruuparajatapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti; aamakadha~n~napa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti; aamakama.msapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti; itthikumaarikapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti; daasidaasapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti; aje.lakapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti; kukku.tasuukarapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti; hatthigavassava.lavapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti; khettavatthupa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti; duuteyyapahi.nagamanaanuyogaa pa.tivirato hoti; kayavikkayaa pa.tivirato ^a^M2.0009^ea^ hoti; tulaakuu.taka.msakuu.tamaanakuu.taa pa.tivirato ^a^P1.0346^ea^ hoti; ukko.tanava~ncananikatisaaciyogaa {saaviyogaa (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0) saaci ku.tilapariyaayo} pa.tivirato hoti; chedanavadhabandhanaviparaamosaaalopasahasaakaaraa pa.tivirato hoti {passa ma0 ni0 1.293 cuu.lahatthipadopame}.

[03] ``so santu.t.tho hoti kaayaparihaarikena ciivarena kucchiparihaarikena pi.n.dapaatena. so yena yeneva pakkamati, samaadaayeva pakkamati. seyyathaapi naama pakkhii saku.no yena yeneva .deti, sapattabhaarova .deti; evameva bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti kaayaparihaarikena ciivarena kucchiparihaarikena pi.n.dapaatena. so yena yeneva pakkamati, samaadaayeva pakkamati ^a^T2.0013^ea^. so iminaa ariyena siilakkhandhena samannaagato ajjhatta.m anavajjasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedeti.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ ``so cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriya.m, cakkhundriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa...pe0... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa...pe0... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati manindriya.m, manindriye ^a^V2.0009^ea^ sa.mvara.m aapajjati. so iminaa ariyena indriyasa.mvarena samannaagato ajjhatta.m abyaasekasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedeti.

[03] ``so abhikkante pa.tikkante sampajaanakaarii hoti, aalokite vilokite sampajaanakaarii hoti, sami~njite pasaarite sampajaanakaarii hoti, sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.ne sampajaanakaarii hoti, asite piite khaayite saayite sampajaanakaarii hoti, uccaarapassaavakamme sampajaanakaarii hoti, gate .thite nisinne sutte jaagarite bhaasite tu.nhiibhaave sampajaanakaarii hoti.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ ``so ^a^M2.0010^ea^ iminaa ca ariyena siilakkhandhena samannaagato, (imaaya ca ariyaaya santu.t.thiyaa samannaagato,) {passa ma0 ni0 1.296 cuu.lahatthipadopame} iminaa ca ariyena indriyasa.mvarena samannaagato, iminaa ca ariyena satisampaja~n~nena ^a^T2.0014^ea^ samannaagato vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja.m. so pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so ^a^P1.0347^ea^ abhijjha.m loke pahaaya vigataabhijjhena cetasaa viharati, abhijjhaaya citta.m parisodheti, byaapaadapadosa.m pahaaya abyaapannacitto viharati sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii, byaapaadapadosaa citta.m parisodheti; thiinamiddha.m pahaaya vigatathiinamiddho viharati aalokasa~n~nii sato sampajaano, thiinamiddhaa citta.m parisodheti; uddhaccakukkucca.m pahaaya anuddhato viharati ajjhatta.m vuupasantacitto, uddhaccakukkuccaa citta.m parisodheti; vicikiccha.m pahaaya ti.n.navicikiccho viharati akatha.mkathii kusalesu dhammesu, vicikicchaaya citta.m parisodheti.

[03] ``so ime pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne, vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati; vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati; piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati ^a^V2.0010^ea^; sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ^a^T2.0015^ea^ ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo viisampi ^a^M2.0011^ea^ jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaaliisampi jaatiyo pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi jaatisahassampi jaatisatasahassampi anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe -- `amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapaadi.m; tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, ^a^P1.0348^ea^ so tato cuto idhuupapanno'ti. iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte sattaana.m cutuupapaata~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane ^a^T2.0016^ea^ hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati -- `ime vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa vaciiduccaritena samannaagataa manoduccaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m upavaadakaa micchaadi.t.thikaa micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa; ime vaa pana bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa vaciisucaritena samannaagataa manosucaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa sammaadi.t.thikaa sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaa'ti. iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye ^a^V2.0011^ea^ .thite aane~njappatte aasavaana.m khaya~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. `ime aasavaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. `aya.m aasavasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. `aya.m aasavanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati ^a^M2.0012^ea^. `aya.m aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tassa ^a^T2.0017^ea^ eva.m jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, avijjaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo nevattantapo naattaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto, na parantapo na paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto ^a^P1.0349^ea^. so attantapo aparantapo di.t.theva dhamme nicchaato nibbuto siitiibhuuto sukhappa.tisa.mvedii brahmabhuutena attanaa viharatii''ti.
[01] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] kandarakasutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0018^ea^ ^a^V2.0012^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa aanando vesaaliya.m viharati beluvagaamake {ve.luvagaamake (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}. tena kho pana samayena dasamo gahapati a.t.thakanaagaro paa.taliputta.m anuppatto hoti kenacideva kara.niiyena. atha kho dasamo gahapati a.t.thakanaagaro yena kukku.taaraamo yena a~n~nataro bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho dasamo gahapati a.t.thakanaagaro ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``kaha.m nu kho, bhante, aayasmaa aanando etarahi viharati? dassanakaamaa hi maya.m ta.m aayasmanta.m aananda''nti. ``eso, gahapati, aayasmaa aanando vesaaliya.m viharati beluvagaamake''ti. atha kho dasamo gahapati a.t.thakanaagaro paa.taliputte ta.m kara.niiya.m tiiretvaa yena vesaalii yena beluvagaamako yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ ekamanta.m nisinno kho dasamo gahapati a.t.thakanaagaro aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``atthi nu kho, bhante aananda, tena bhagavataa ^a^M2.0013^ea^ jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena ekadhammo akkhaato yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato avimutta~nceva citta.m vimuccati, aparikkhii.naa ca aasavaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti ^a^T2.0019^ea^, ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naatii''ti?

[03] ``atthi kho, gahapati, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena ekadhammo akkhaato yattha ^a^P1.0350^ea^ bhikkhuno appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato avimutta~nceva citta.m vimuccati, aparikkhii.naa ca aasavaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naatii''ti.

[03] ``katamo pana, bhante aananda, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena ekadhammo ^a^V2.0013^ea^ akkhaato yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato avimutta~nceva citta.m vimuccati, aparikkhii.naa ca aasavaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naatii''ti?

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ ``idha, gahapati, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `idampi pa.thama.m jhaana.m abhisa"nkhata.m abhisa~ncetayita.m. ya.m kho pana ki~nci abhisa"nkhata.m abhisa~ncetayita.m tadanicca.m nirodhadhamma'nti pajaanaati. so tattha .thito aasavaana.m khaya.m paapu.naati. no ce aasavaana.m khaya.m paapu.naati, teneva dhammaraagena taaya dhammanandiyaa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatiko hoti tattha parinibbaayii anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa. ayampi kho, gahapati, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena ekadhammo akkhaato yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa ^a^T2.0020^ea^ viharato avimutta~nceva citta.m vimuccati, aparikkhii.naa ca aasavaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naati.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, gahapati, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `idampi kho dutiya.m jhaana.m abhisa"nkhata.m abhisa~ncetayita.m... ^a^P1.0351^ea^ anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naati.

[03] ``puna ^a^T2.0021^ea^ ^a^M2.0014^ea^ capara.m, gahapati, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa...pe0... ^a^V2.0014^ea^ tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `idampi kho tatiya.m jhaana.m abhisa"nkhata.m abhisa~ncetayita.m...pe0... anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapati, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa ^a^T2.0022^ea^ ...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `idampi kho catuttha.m jhaana.m abhisa"nkhata.m abhisa~ncetayita.m... anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapati, bhikkhu mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m {catutthi.m (sii0 pii0)}. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena {abyaapajjhena (sii0 syaa0 pii0), abyaapajjena (ka0) a"nguttaratikanipaata.tiikaa oloketabbaa} pharitvaa viharati. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `ayampi kho mettaacetovimutti abhisa"nkhataa abhisa~ncetayitaa. ya.m kho pana ki~nci abhisa"nkhata.m abhisa~ncetayita.m tadanicca.m nirodhadhamma'nti pajaanaati. so tattha .thito...pe0... ^a^V2.0015^ea^ anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapati, bhikkhu karu.naasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... muditaasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa viharati. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `ayampi kho upekkhaacetovimutti abhisa"nkhataa abhisa~ncetayitaa. ya.m kho pana ki~nci abhisa"nkhata.m abhisa~ncetayita.m tadanicca.m nirodhadhamma'ntntti ^a^P1.0352^ea^ pajaanaati. so tattha .thito... anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapati, bhikkhu sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `ayampi kho aakaasaana~ncaayatanasamaapatti abhisa"nkhataa abhisa~ncetayitaa. ya.m kho pana ki~nci abhisa"nkhata.m abhisa~ncetayita.m tadanicca.m ^a^M2.0015^ea^ nirodhadhamma'nti pajaanaati. so tattha .thito...pe0... anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapati, bhikkhu sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `ayampi kho vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasamaapatti abhisa"nkhataa abhisa~ncetayitaa. ya.m kho pana ki~nci abhisa"nkhata.m abhisa~ncetayita.m tadanicca.m nirodhadhamma'nti pajaanaati. so tattha .thito...pe0... anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapati, bhikkhu sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `ayampi kho aaki~nca~n~naayatanasamaapatti abhisa"nkhataa abhisa~ncetayitaa. ya.m kho pana ki~nci abhisa"nkhata.m abhisa~ncetayita.m tadanicca.m nirodhadhamma'nti pajaanaati. so tattha .thito aasavaana.m khaya.m paapu.naati. no ce aasavaana.m khaya.m paapu.naati, teneva dhammaraagena taaya dhammanandiyaa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatiko hoti tattha parinibbaayii anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa. ayampi kho, gahapati, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena ekadhammo akkhaato yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato avimutta~nceva ^a^V2.0016^ea^ citta.m vimuccati, aparikkhii.naa ca aasavaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naatii''ti.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, dasamo gahapati a.t.thakanaagaro aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``seyyathaapi, bhante aananda, puriso eka.mva nidhimukha.m gavesanto sakideva ekaadasa nidhimukhaani ^a^V2.0017^ea^ ^a^P1.0353^ea^ adhigaccheyya; evameva kho aha.m, bhante, eka.m amatadvaara.m gavesanto sakideva {saki.m deva (ka0)} ekaadasa amatadvaaraani alattha.m bhaavanaaya. seyyathaapi, bhante, purisassa agaara.m ekaadasadvaara.m, so tasmi.m agaare aaditte ekamekenapi dvaarena sakku.neyya ^a^T2.0023^ea^ attaana.m sotthi.m kaatu.m; evameva kho aha.m, bhante, imesa.m ekaadasanna.m amatadvaaraana.m ekamekenapi amatadvaarena sakku.nissaami attaana.m sotthi.m kaatu.m. imehi naama, bhante, a~n~natitthiyaa aacariyassa aacariyadhana.m pariyesissanti, kima"nga.m {ki.m (sii0 pii0)} panaaha.m aayasmato aanandassa puuja.m na karissaamii''ti ^a^M2.0016^ea^! atha kho dasamo gahapati a.t.thakanaagaro paa.taliputtaka~nca vesaalika~nca bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaatetvaa pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappesi sampavaaresi, ekameka~nca bhikkhu.m pacceka.m dussayugena acchaadesi, aayasmanta~nca aananda.m ticiivarena acchaadesi, aayasmato ca aanandassa pa~ncasatavihaara.m kaaraapesiiti.
[06] a.t.thakanaagarasutta.m ni.t.thita.m dutiya.m.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0024^ea^ ^a^V2.0018^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmi.m nigrodhaaraame. tena kho pana samayena kaapilavatthavaana.m {kapilavatthuvaasiina.m (ka0)} sakyaana.m nava.m santhaagaara.m acirakaarita.m hoti anajjhaavu.t.tha.m {anajjhaavuttha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa kenaci vaa manussabhuutena. atha kho kaapilavatthavaa sakyaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho kaapilavatthavaa sakyaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``idha, bhante, kaapilavatthavaana.m sakyaana.m nava.m santhaagaara.m acirakaarita.m {acirakaarita.m hoti (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} anajjhaavu.t.tha.m sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa kenaci vaa manussabhuutena. ta.m, bhante, bhagavaa pa.thama.m paribhu~njatu. bhagavataa pa.thama.m paribhutta.m pacchaa kaapilavatthavaa sakyaa paribhu~njissanti. tadassa kaapilavatthavaana.m sakyaana.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti ^a^P1.0354^ea^. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho kaapilavatthavaa sakyaa bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yena nava.m santhaagaara.m tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa sabbasanthari.m santhaagaara.m {sabbasanthari.m santhata.m (ka0)} santharitvaa aasanaani pa~n~napetvaa udakama.nika.m upa.t.thapetvaa telappadiipa.m aaropetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m ^a^T2.0025^ea^ abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho kaapilavatthavaa sakyaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``sabbasanthari.m santhata.m, bhante, santhaagaara.m, aasanaani pa~n~nattaani, udakama.niko upa.t.thaapito, telappadiipo aaropito. yassadaani, bhante ^a^M2.0017^ea^, bhagavaa kaala.m ma~n~natii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena yena santhaagaara.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa paade pakkhaaletvaa santhaagaara.m pavisitvaa majjhima.m thambha.m nissaaya puratthaabhimukho nisiidi. bhikkhusa"nghopi kho paade pakkhaaletvaa santhaagaara.m pavisitvaa pacchima.m bhitti.m nissaaya puratthaabhimukho nisiidi, bhagavanta.myeva purakkhatvaa. kaapilavatthavaapi kho sakyaa paade pakkhaaletvaa santhaagaara.m pavisitvaa puratthima.m bhitti.m nissaaya pacchimaabhimukhaa nisiidi.msu, bhagavanta.myeva purakkhatvaa. atha kho bhagavaa kaapilavatthave sakye bahudeva ratti.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``pa.tibhaatu ta.m, aananda, kaapilavatthavaana.m sakyaana.m sekho paa.tipado {pa.tipado (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}. pi.t.thi ^a^V2.0019^ea^ me aagilaayati; tamaha.m aayamissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato paccassosi. atha kho bhagavaa catuggu.na.m sa"nghaa.ti.m pa~n~naapetvaa dakkhi.nena passena siihaseyya.m kappesi, paade paada.m accaadhaaya, sato sampajaano, u.t.thaanasa~n~na.m manasi karitvaa.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa aanando mahaanaama.m sakka.m aamantesi -- ``idha ^a^T2.0026^ea^, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako siilasampanno hoti, indriyesu guttadvaaro hoti, bhojane matta~n~nuu hoti, jaagariya.m anuyutto hoti, sattahi saddhammehi samannaagato hoti, catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, mahaanaama ^a^P1.0355^ea^, ariyasaavako siilasampanno hoti? idha, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako siilavaa hoti, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu. eva.m kho, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako siilasampanno hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako indriyesu guttadvaaro hoti? idha, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa ^a^M2.0018^ea^ paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriya.m, cakkhundriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa...pe0... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa...pe0... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati manindriya.m, manindriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati ^a^T2.0027^ea^. eva.m kho, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako indriyesu guttadvaaro hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako bhojane matta~n~nuu hoti? idha, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso aahaara.m aahaareti -- `neva davaaya na madaaya na ma.n.danaaya na vibhuusanaaya; yaavadeva imassa kaayassa .thitiyaa yaapanaaya vihi.msuuparatiyaa brahmacariyaanuggahaaya ^a^V2.0020^ea^. iti puraa.na~nca vedana.m pa.tiha"nkhaami, nava~nca vedana.m na uppaadessaami, yaatraa ca me bhavissati anavajjataa ca phaasuvihaaro caa'ti. eva.m kho, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako bhojane matta~n~nuu hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako jaagariya.m anuyutto hoti? idha, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako divasa.m ca"nkamena nisajjaaya aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodheti, rattiyaa pa.thama.m yaama.m ca"nkamena nisajjaaya aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodheti, rattiyaa majjhima.m yaama.m dakkhi.nena passena siihaseyya.m kappeti, paade paada.m accaadhaaya, sato sampajaano, u.t.thaanasa~n~na.m manasi karitvaa, rattiyaa pacchima.m yaama.m paccu.t.thaaya ca"nkamena nisajjaaya aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodheti. eva.m kho, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako jaagariya.m anuyutto hoti.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako ^a^P1.0356^ea^ sattahi saddhammehi samannaagato hoti? idha, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako saddho hoti, saddahati tathaagatassa bodhi.m -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno ^a^T2.0028^ea^ sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. hirimaa hoti, hiriiyati kaayaduccaritena vaciiduccaritena manoduccaritena, hiriiyati paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa. ottappii hoti, ottappati kaayaduccaritena ^a^M2.0019^ea^ vaciiduccaritena manoduccaritena, ottappati paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa. bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo. ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saatthaa sabya~njanaa kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa {bahuu sutaa (?)} honti dhaataa {dhataa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa. aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu. satimaa hoti, paramena satinepakkena samannaagato, cirakatampi cirabhaasitampi saritaa anussaritaa. pa~n~navaa hoti, udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato, ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa. eva.m kho, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako sattahi saddhammehi samannaagato hoti.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca ^a^V2.0021^ea^, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii? idha, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi, savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja ^a^T2.0029^ea^ viharati; vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati; piitiyaa ca viraagaa...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati; sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. eva.m kho, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ ``yato kho, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako eva.m siilasampanno hoti, eva.m indriyesu guttadvaaro hoti, eva.m bhojane matta~n~nuu hoti, eva.m jaagariya.m anuyutto hoti, eva.m sattahi saddhammehi samannaagato ^a^P1.0357^ea^ hoti, eva.m catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, aya.m vuccati, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako sekho paa.tipado apucca.n.dataaya ^a^M2.0020^ea^ samaapanno, bhabbo abhinibbhidaaya, bhabbo sambodhaaya, bhabbo anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaaya. seyyathaapi, mahaanaama, kukku.tiyaa a.n.daani a.t.tha vaa dasa vaa dvaadasa vaa taanaassu kukku.tiyaa sammaa adhisayitaani sammaa pariseditaani sammaa paribhaavitaani, ki~ncaapi tassaa kukku.tiyaa na ^a^T2.0030^ea^ eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vatime kukku.tapotakaa paadanakhasikhaaya vaa mukhatu.n.dakena vaa a.n.dakosa.m padaaletvaa sotthinaa abhinibbhijjeyyu'nti, atha kho bhabbaava te kukku.tapotakaa paadanakhasikhaaya vaa mukhatu.n.dakena vaa a.n.dakosa.m padaaletvaa sotthinaa abhinibbhijjitu.m. evameva kho, mahaanaama, yato ariyasaavako eva.m siilasampanno hoti, eva.m indriyesu guttadvaaro hoti, eva.m bhojane matta~n~nuu hoti, eva.m jaagariya.m anuyutto hoti, eva.m sattahi saddhammehi samannaagato hoti, eva.m catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, aya.m vuccati, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako sekho paa.tipado apucca.n.dataaya samaapanno ^a^V2.0022^ea^, bhabbo abhinibbhidaaya, bhabbo sambodhaaya, bhabbo anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaaya.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ ``sa kho so, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako ima.myeva anuttara.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m aagamma anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, ayamassa pa.thamaabhinibbhidaa hoti kukku.tacchaapakasseva a.n.dakosamhaa.

[03] ``sa kho so, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako ima.mye anuttara.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m aagamma dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati, ayamassa dutiyaabhinibbhidaa hoti kukku.tacchaapakasseva a.n.dakosamhaa.

[01] ``sa kho so, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako ima.myeva anuttara.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m aagamma aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m ^a^T2.0031^ea^ di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja ^a^P1.0358^ea^ viharati, ayamassa tatiyaabhinibbhidaa hoti kukku.tacchaapakasseva a.n.dakosamhaa.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ ``yampi ^a^M2.0021^ea^ {yampi kho (ka0)}, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako siilasampanno hoti, idampissa hoti cara.nasmi.m; yampi, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako indriyesu guttadvaaro hoti, idampissa hoti cara.nasmi.m; yampi, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako bhojane matta~n~nuu hoti, idampissa hoti cara.nasmi.m; yampi, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako jaagariya.m anuyutto hoti, idampissa hoti cara.nasmi.m; yampi, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako sattahi saddhammehi samannaagato hoti, idampissa hoti cara.nasmi.m; yampi, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, idampissa hoti cara.nasmi.m.

[03] ``ya~nca kho, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m ^a^V2.0023^ea^ -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, idampissa hoti vijjaaya; yampi, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati, idampissa hoti vijjaaya. yampi, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati, idampissa hoti vijjaaya.
[03] ``aya.m ^a^T2.0032^ea^ vuccati, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako vijjaasampanno itipi cara.nasampanno itipi vijjaacara.nasampanno itipi.
[03] 30^b^.^eb^ ``brahmunaapesaa, mahaanaama, sana"nkumaarena gaathaa bhaasitaa --
[21] `khattiyo se.t.tho janetasmi.m, ye gottapa.tisaarino.
[22] vijjaacara.nasampanno, so se.t.tho devamaanuse'ti..
[03] ``saa kho panesaa, mahaanaama, brahmunaa sana"nkumaarena gaathaa sugiitaa no duggiitaa, subhaasitaa no dubbhaasitaa, atthasa.mhitaa no anatthasa.mhitaa, anumataa bhagavataa''ti.

[03] atha ^a^M2.0022^ea^ kho bhagavaa u.t.thahitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``saadhu saadhu, aananda, saadhu kho tva.m, aananda, kaapilavatthavaana.m sakyaana.m sekha.m paa.tipada.m abhaasii''ti.
[03] idamavocaayasmaa ^a^P1.0359^ea^ aanando. samanu~n~no satthaa ahosi. attamanaa kaapilavatthavaa sakyaa aayasmato aanandassa bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] sekhasutta.m ni.t.thita.m tatiya.m.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0033^ea^ ^a^V2.0024^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa a"nguttaraapesu viharati aapa.na.m naama a"nguttaraapaana.m nigamo. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya aapa.na.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. aapa.ne pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena~n~nataro vanasa.n.do tenupasa"nkami divaavihaaraaya. ta.m vanasa.n.da.m ajjhogaahetvaa {ajjhogahetvaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0), ajjhogaahitvaa (pii0 ka0)} a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisiidi. potaliyopi kho gahapati sampannanivaasanapaavura.no {paapura.no (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} chattupaahanaahi {chattupaahano (ka0)} ja"nghaavihaara.m anuca"nkamamaano anuvicaramaano yena so vanasa.n.do tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m vanasa.n.da.m ajjhogaahetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thita.m kho potaliya.m gahapati.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sa.mvijjanti kho, gahapati, aasanaani; sace aaka"nkhasi nisiidaa''ti. eva.m vutte, potaliyo gahapati ``gahapativaadena ma.m sama.no gotamo samudaacaratii''ti kupito anattamano tu.nhii ahosi. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa...pe0... ^a^T2.0034^ea^ tatiyampi kho bhagavaa potaliya.m gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``sa.mvijjanti kho, gahapati, aasanaani; sace aaka"nkhasi nisiidaa''ti. ``eva.m vutte, potaliyo gahapati gahapativaadena ma.m sama.no gotamo samudaacaratii''ti kupito anattamano bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``tayida.m, bho ^a^P1.0360^ea^ gotama, nacchanna.m, tayida.m nappatiruupa.m, ya.m ma.m tva.m gahapativaadena samudaacarasii''ti. ``te hi te, gahapati, aakaaraa, te li"ngaa ^a^M2.0023^ea^, te nimittaa yathaa ta.m gahapatissaa''ti. ``tathaa hi pana me, bho gotama, sabbe kammantaa pa.tikkhittaa, sabbe vohaaraa samucchinnaa''ti. ``yathaa katha.m pana te, gahapati, sabbe kammantaa pa.tikkhittaa, sabbe vohaaraa samucchinnaa''ti? ``idha me, bho gotama, ya.m ahosi dhana.m vaa dha~n~na.m vaa rajata.m vaa jaataruupa.m vaa sabba.m ta.m puttaana.m daayajja.m niyyaata.m, tatthaaha.m anovaadii anupavaadii ghaasacchaadanaparamo viharaami. eva.m kho me {eva~nca me (syaa0), eva.m me (ka0)}, bho gotama, sabbe kammantaa pa.tikkhittaa, sabbe vohaaraa samucchinnaa''ti. ``a~n~nathaa kho tva.m, gahapati, vohaarasamuccheda.m vadasi, a~n~nathaa ca pana ariyassa vinaye vohaarasamucchedo hotii''ti. ``yathaa katha.m pana, bhante, ariyassa vinaye vohaarasamucchedo hoti? saadhu me, bhante ^a^V2.0025^ea^, bhagavaa tathaa dhamma.m desetu yathaa ariyassa vinaye vohaarasamucchedo ^a^T2.0035^ea^ hotii''ti. ``tena hi, gahapati, su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho potaliyo gahapati bhagavato paccassosi.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``a.t.tha kho ime, gahapati, dhammaa ariyassa vinaye vohaarasamucchedaaya sa.mvattanti. katame a.t.tha? apaa.naatipaata.m nissaaya paa.naatipaato pahaatabbo; dinnaadaana.m nissaaya adinnaadaana.m pahaatabba.m; saccavaaca.m {sacca.m vaaca.m (syaa0)} nissaaya musaavaado pahaatabbo; apisu.na.m vaaca.m nissaaya pisu.naa vaacaa pahaatabbaa; agiddhilobha.m nissaaya giddhilobho pahaatabbo; anindaarosa.m nissaaya nindaaroso pahaatabbo; akkodhuupaayaasa.m nissaaya kodhuupaayaaso pahaatabbo; anatimaana.m nissaaya atimaano pahaatabbo. ime kho, gahapati, a.t.tha dhammaa sa.mkhittena vuttaa, vitthaarena avibhattaa, ariyassa vinaye vohaarasamucchedaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. ``ye me {ye me pana (syaa0 ka0)}, bhante, bhagavataa a.t.tha dhammaa sa.mkhittena vuttaa, vitthaarena avibhattaa, ariyassa vinaye vohaarasamucchedaaya sa.mvattanti, saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa ime a.t.tha dhamme vitthaarena {vitthaaretvaa (ka0)} vibhajatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti. ``tena hi, gahapati, su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho potaliyo gahapati bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ ```apaa.naatipaata.m ^a^M2.0024^ea^ ^a^P1.0361^ea^ nissaaya paa.naatipaato pahaatabbo'ti iti kho paneta.m vutta.m ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m ^a^T2.0036^ea^? idha, gahapati, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yesa.m kho aha.m sa.myojanaana.m hetu paa.naatipaatii assa.m, tesaaha.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya samucchedaaya pa.tipanno. aha~nceva {aha~nce (?)} kho pana paa.naatipaatii assa.m, attaapi ma.m upavadeyya paa.naatipaatapaccayaa, anuviccaapi ma.m vi~n~nuu {anuvicca vi~n~nuu (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} garaheyyu.m paa.naatipaatapaccayaa, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa duggati paa.tika"nkhaa paa.naatipaatapaccayaa. etadeva kho pana sa.myojana.m eta.m niivara.na.m yadida.m paa.naatipaato. ye ca paa.naatipaatapaccayaa uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, paa.naatipaataa pa.tiviratassa eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na honti'. `apaa.naatipaata.m nissaaya paa.naatipaato pahaatabbo'ti -- iti yanta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ ```dinnaadaana.m ^a^V2.0026^ea^ nissaaya adinnaadaana.m pahaatabba'nti iti kho paneta.m vutta.m, ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? idha, gahapati, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yesa.m kho aha.m sa.myojanaana.m hetu adinnaadaayii assa.m, tesaaha.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya samucchedaaya pa.tipanno. aha~nceva kho pana adinnaadaayii assa.m, attaapi ma.m upavadeyya adinnaadaanapaccayaa, anuviccaapi ma.m vi~n~nuu garaheyyu.m adinnaadaanapaccayaa, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa duggati paa.tika"nkhaa adinnaadaanapaccayaa. etadeva kho pana sa.myojana.m eta.m niivara.na.m yadida.m adinnaadaana.m. ye ca adinnaadaanapaccayaa uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa adinnaadaanaa ^a^T2.0037^ea^ pa.tiviratassa eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na honti'. `dinnaadaana.m nissaaya adinnaadaana.m pahaatabba'nti -- iti yanta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ ```saccavaaca.m nissaaya musaavaado pahaatabbo'ti iti kho paneta.m vutta.m ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? idha, gahapati, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yesa.m kho aha.m sa.myojanaana.m hetu musaavaadii assa.m, tesaaha.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya samucchedaaya pa.tipanno. aha~nceva kho pana musaavaadii assa.m, attaapi ma.m upavadeyya musaavaadapaccayaa, anuviccaapi ma.m vi~n~nuu garaheyyu.m musaavaadapaccayaa, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa duggati paa.tika"nkhaa musaavaadapaccayaa. etadeva kho pana sa.myojana.m eta.m niivara.na.m yadida.m ^a^M2.0025^ea^ musaavaado ^a^P1.0362^ea^. ye ca musaavaadapaccayaa uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, musaavaadaa pa.tiviratassa eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na honti'. `saccavaaca.m nissaaya musaavaado pahaatabbo'ti -- iti yanta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ ```apisu.na.m vaaca.m nissaaya pisu.naa vaacaa pahaatabbaa'ti iti kho paneta.m vutta.m ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? idha, gahapati, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yesa.m kho aha.m sa.myojanaana.m hetu pisu.navaaco assa.m, tesaaha.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya samucchedaaya pa.tipanno. aha~nceva kho pana pisu.navaaco assa.m, attaapi ma.m upavadeyya pisu.navaacaapaccayaa ^a^T2.0038^ea^, anuviccaapi ma.m vi~n~nuu garaheyyu.m pisu.navaacaapaccayaa, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa duggati paa.tika"nkhaa pisu.navaacaapaccayaa. etadeva kho pana sa.myojana.m eta.m niivara.na.m yadida.m pisu.naa vaacaa. ye ca pisu.navaacaapaccayaa uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, pisu.naaya ^a^V2.0027^ea^ vaacaaya pa.tiviratassa eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na honti'. `apisu.na.m vaaca.m nissaaya pisu.naa vaacaa pahaatabbaa'ti -- iti yanta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ ```agiddhilobha.m nissaaya giddhilobho pahaatabbo'ti iti kho paneta.m vutta.m, ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? idha, gahapati, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yesa.m kho aha.m sa.myojanaana.m hetu giddhilobhii assa.m, tesaaha.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya samucchedaaya pa.tipanno. aha~nceva kho pana giddhilobhii assa.m, attaapi ma.m upavadeyya giddhilobhapaccayaa, anuviccaapi ma.m vi~n~nuu garaheyyu.m giddhilobhapaccayaa, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa duggati paa.tika"nkhaa giddhilobhapaccayaa. etadeva kho pana sa.myojana.m eta.m niivara.na.m yadida.m giddhilobho. ye ca giddhilobhapaccayaa uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, giddhilobhaa pa.tiviratassa eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na honti'. `agiddhilobha.m nissaaya giddhilobho pahaatabbo'ti -- iti yanta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ ```anindaarosa.m nissaaya nindaaroso pahaatabbo'ti iti kho ^a^T2.0039^ea^ paneta.m vutta.m, ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? idha, gahapati, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yesa.m kho aha.m sa.myojanaana.m hetu nindaarosii assa.m, tesaaha.m ^a^M2.0026^ea^ sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya ^a^P1.0363^ea^ samucchedaaya pa.tipanno. aha~nceva kho pana nindaarosii assa.m, attaapi ma.m upavadeyya nindaarosapaccayaa, anuviccaapi ma.m vi~n~nuu garaheyyu.m nindaarosapaccayaa, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa duggati paa.tika"nkhaa nindaarosapaccayaa. etadeva kho pana sa.myojana.m eta.m niivara.na.m yadida.m nindaaroso. ye ca nindaarosapaccayaa uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, anindaarosissa eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na honti'. `anindaarosa.m nissaaya nindaaroso pahaatabbo'ti -- iti yanta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ ```akkodhuupaayaasa.m nissaaya kodhuupaayaaso pahaatabbo'ti iti kho paneta.m vutta.m, ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? idha, gahapati, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yesa.m kho aha.m sa.myojanaana.m hetu kodhuupaayaasii assa.m, tesaaha.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya samucchedaaya pa.tipanno. aha~nceva kho pana kodhuupaayaasii assa.m, attaapi ma.m upavadeyya kodhuupaayaasapaccayaa ^a^V2.0028^ea^, anuviccaapi ma.m vi~n~nuu garaheyyu.m kodhuupaayaasapaccayaa, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa duggati paa.tika"nkhaa kodhuupaayaasapaccayaa. etadeva kho pana sa.myojana.m eta.m niivara.na.m yadida.m kodhuupaayaaso. ye ca kodhuupaayaasapaccayaa uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, akkodhuupaayaasissa ^a^T2.0040^ea^ eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na honti'. `akkodhuupaayaasa.m nissaaya kodhuupaayaaso pahaatabbo'ti -- iti yanta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ ```anatimaana.m nissaaya atimaano pahaatabbo'ti iti kho paneta.m vutta.m, ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? idha, gahapati, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yesa.m kho aha.m sa.myojanaana.m hetu atimaanii assa.m, tesaaha.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya samucchedaaya pa.tipanno. aha~nceva kho pana atimaanii assa.m, attaapi ma.m upavadeyya atimaanapaccayaa, anuviccaapi ma.m vi~n~nuu garaheyyu.m atimaanapaccayaa, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa duggati paa.tika"nkhaa atimaanapaccayaa. etadeva kho pana sa.myojana.m eta.m niivara.na.m yadida.m atimaano. ye ca atimaanapaccayaa uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, anatimaanissa eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na honti'. `anatimaana.m nissaaya atimaano pahaatabbo'ti -- iti yanta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ ``ime ^a^M2.0027^ea^ ^a^P1.0364^ea^ kho, gahapati, a.t.tha dhammaa sa.mkhittena vuttaa, vitthaarena vibhattaa {avibhattaa (syaa0 ka0)}, ye ariyassa vinaye vohaarasamucchedaaya sa.mvattanti; na tveva taava ariyassa vinaye sabbena sabba.m sabbathaa sabba.m vohaarasamucchedo hotii''ti.

[03] ``yathaa katha.m pana, bhante, ariyassa vinaye sabbena sabba.m sabbathaa sabba.m vohaarasamucchedo hoti? saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa tathaa dhamma.m desetu yathaa ariyassa ^a^T2.0041^ea^ vinaye sabbena sabba.m sabbathaa sabba.m vohaarasamucchedo hotii''ti. ``tena hi, gahapati, su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho potaliyo gahapati bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^V2.0029^ea^, gahapati, kukkuro jighacchaadubbalyapareto goghaatakasuuna.m paccupa.t.thito assa. tamena.m dakkho goghaatako vaa goghaatakantevaasii vaa a.t.thika"nkala.m sunikkanta.m nikkanta.m nimma.msa.m lohitamakkhita.m upasumbheyya {upacchubheyya (sii0 pii0), upacchuubheyya (syaa0 ka.m0), upaccumbheyya (ka0)}. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gahapati, api nu kho so kukkuro amu.m a.t.thika"nkala.m sunikkanta.m nikkanta.m nimma.msa.m lohitamakkhita.m palehanto jighacchaadubbalya.m pa.tivineyyaa''ti?
[03] ``no heta.m, bhante''.
[03] ``ta.m kissa hetu''?

[01] ``adu~nhi, bhante, a.t.thika"nkala.m sunikkanta.m nikkanta.m nimma.msa.m lohitamakkhita.m. yaavadeva pana so kukkuro kilamathassa vighaatassa bhaagii assaati. evameva kho, gahapati, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `a.t.thika"nkaluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa {bahuupaayaasaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo'ti. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa yaaya.m upekkhaa naanattaa naanattasitaa ta.m abhinivajjetvaa, yaaya.m upekkhaa ekattaa ekattasitaa yattha sabbaso lokaamisuupaadaanaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti tamevuupekkha.m bhaaveti.

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, gahapati, gijjho vaa ka"nko vaa kulalo vaa ma.msapesi.m ^a^T2.0042^ea^ aadaaya u.d.diiyeyya {u.d.dayeyya (syaa0 pii0)}. tamena.m gijjhaapi ka"nkaapi kulalaapi anupatitvaa ^a^M2.0028^ea^ anupatitvaa vitaccheyyu.m vissajjeyyu.m {viraajeyyu.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gahapati, sace so gijjho vaa ka"nko vaa kulalo vaa ta.m ma.msapesi.m na khippameva pa.tinissajjeyya, so tatonidaana.m mara.na.m vaa nigaccheyya mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha''nti?
[03] ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] ``evameva ^a^V2.0030^ea^ kho, gahapati, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `ma.msapesuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo'ti. evameta.m ^a^P1.0365^ea^ yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa yaaya.m upekkhaa naanattaa naanattasitaa ta.m abhinivajjetvaa yaaya.m upekkhaa ekattaa ekattasitaa yattha sabbaso lokaamisuupaadaanaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti tamevuupekkha.m bhaaveti.

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, gahapati, puriso aaditta.m ti.nukka.m aadaaya pa.tivaata.m gaccheyya. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gahapati, sace so puriso ta.m aaditta.m ti.nukka.m na khippameva pa.tinissajjeyya tassa saa aadittaa ti.nukkaa hattha.m vaa daheyya baahu.m vaa daheyya a~n~natara.m vaa a~n~natara.m vaa a"ngapacca"nga.m {daheyya. a~n~natara.m vaa a"ngapacca"nga (sii0 pii0)} daheyya, so tatonidaana.m mara.na.m vaa nigaccheyya mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha''nti?
[03] ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] ``evameva kho, gahapati, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `ti.nukkuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo'ti. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa...pe0... tamevuupekkha.m bhaaveti.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^T2.0043^ea^, gahapati, a"ngaarakaasu saadhikaporisaa, puuraa a"ngaaraana.m viitaccikaana.m viitadhuumaana.m. atha puriso aagaccheyya jiivitukaamo amaritukaamo sukhakaamo dukkhappa.tikkuulo. tamena.m dve balavanto purisaa naanaabaahaasu gahetvaa a"ngaarakaasu.m upaka.d.dheyyu.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gahapati, api nu so puriso iticiticeva kaaya.m sannaameyyaa''ti?
[03] ``eva.m, bhante''.
[03] ``ta.m kissa hetu''?

[03] ``vidita~nhi ^a^V2.0031^ea^, bhante, tassa purisassa ima~ncaaha.m a"ngaarakaasu.m papatissaami, tatonidaana.m mara.na.m vaa nigacchissaami mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha''nti. ``evameva kho, gahapati, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `a"ngaarakaasuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo'ti. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa...pe0... tamevuupekkha.m bhaaveti.

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^M2.0029^ea^, gahapati, puriso supinaka.m passeyya aaraamaraama.neyyaka.m vanaraama.neyyaka.m bhuumiraama.neyyaka.m pokkhara.niraama.neyyaka.m. so pa.tibuddho na ki~nci pa.tipasseyya {passeyya (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. evameva kho, gahapati, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `supinakuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo'ti...pe0... tamevuupekkha.m bhaaveti.

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, gahapati, puriso yaacitaka.m bhoga.m yaacitvaa yaana.m ^a^P1.0366^ea^ vaa {yaana.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} poriseyya.m {poroseyya.m (sii0 pii0 ka0), oropeyya (syaa0 ka.m0)} pavarama.niku.n.dala.m. so tehi yaacitakehi bhogehi purakkhato parivuto ^a^T2.0044^ea^ antaraapa.na.m pa.tipajjeyya. tamena.m jano disvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `bhogii vata, bho, puriso, eva.m kira bhogino bhogaani bhu~njantii'ti. tamena.m saamikaa yattha yattheva passeyyu.m tattha tattheva saani hareyyu.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gahapati, ala.m nu kho tassa purisassa a~n~nathattaayaa''ti?
[03] ``eva.m, bhante''.
[03] ``ta.m kissa hetu''?

[01] ``saamino hi, bhante, saani harantii''ti. ``evameva kho, gahapati, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yaacitakuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo'ti...pe0... ^a^V2.0032^ea^ tamevuupekkha.m bhaaveti.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, gahapati, gaamassa vaa nigamassa vaa aviduure tibbo vanasa.n.do. tatrassa rukkho sampannaphalo ca upapannaphalo {uppannaphalo (syaa0)} ca, na cassu kaanici phalaani bhuumiya.m patitaani. atha puriso aagaccheyya phalatthiko phalagavesii phalapariyesana.m caramaano. so ta.m vanasa.n.da.m ajjhogaahetvaa ta.m rukkha.m passeyya sampannaphala~nca upapannaphala~nca. tassa evamassa -- `aya.m kho rukkho sampannaphalo ca upapannaphalo ca, natthi ca kaanici phalaani bhuumiya.m patitaani. jaanaami kho panaaha.m rukkha.m aarohitu.m {aaruhitu.m (sii0)}. ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m rukkha.m aarohitvaa yaavadattha~nca khaadeyya.m uccha"nga~nca puureyya'nti. so ta.m rukkha.m aarohitvaa yaavadattha~nca khaadeyya uccha"nga~nca puureyya. atha ^a^T2.0045^ea^ dutiyo puriso aagaccheyya phalatthiko phalagavesii phalapariyesana.m caramaano ti.nha.m ku.thaari.m {kudhaari.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} aadaaya. so ta.m vanasa.n.da.m ajjhogaahetvaa ^a^M2.0030^ea^ ta.m rukkha.m passeyya sampannaphala~nca upapannaphala~nca. tassa evamassa -- `aya.m kho rukkho sampannaphalo ca upapannaphalo ca, natthi ca kaanici phalaani bhuumiya.m patitaani. na kho panaaha.m jaanaami rukkha.m aarohitu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m rukkha.m muulato chetvaa yaavadattha~nca khaadeyya.m uccha"nga~nca puureyya'nti. so ta.m rukkha.m muulatova chindeyya. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gahapati, amuko {asu (sii0 pii0)} yo so puriso pa.thama.m rukkha.m aaruu.lho sace so na khippameva oroheyya tassa so rukkho papatanto hattha.m vaa bha~njeyya paada.m vaa bha~njeyya a~n~natara.m vaa a~n~natara.m vaa a"ngapacca"nga.m bha~njeyya, so tatonidaana.m ^a^P1.0367^ea^ mara.na.m vaa nigaccheyya mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha''nti?
[03] ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] ``evameva kho, gahapati, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `rukkhaphaluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo'ti. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa yaaya.m upekkhaa naanattaa naanattasitaa ta.m abhinivajjetvaa yaaya.m upekkhaa ekattaa ekattasitaa yattha sabbaso lokaamisuupaadaanaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti tamevuupekkha.m bhaaveti.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ ``sa ^a^V2.0033^ea^ kho so, gahapati, ariyasaavako ima.myeva anuttara.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m aagamma anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m ^a^T2.0046^ea^ -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati.

[03] ``sa kho so, gahapati, ariyasaavako ima.myeva anuttara.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m aagamm dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati.

[03] ``sa kho so, gahapati, ariyasaavako ima.myeva anuttara.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m aagamma aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. ettaavataa kho, gahapati, ariyassa vinaye sabbena sabba.m sabbathaa sabba.m vohaarasamucchedo hoti.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ^a^M2.0031^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, gahapati, yathaa ariyassa vinaye sabbena sabba.m sabbathaa sabba.m vohaarasamucchedo hoti, api nu tva.m evaruupa.m vohaarasamuccheda.m attani samanupassasii''ti? ``ko caaha.m, bhante, ko ca ariyassa vinaye sabbena sabba.m sabbathaa sabba.m vohaarasamucchedo! aarakaa aha.m, bhante, ariyassa vinaye sabbena sabba.m sabbathaa sabba.m vohaarasamucchedaa. maya~nhi, bhante, pubbe a~n~natitthiye paribbaajake anaajaaniiyeva samaane aajaaniiyaati ama~n~nimha, anaajaaniiyeva samaane aajaaniiyabhojana.m bhojimha, anaajaaniiyeva samaane aajaaniiya.thaane .thapimha; bhikkhuu pana maya.m, bhante, aajaaniiyeva samaane anaajaaniiyaati ama~n~nimha, aajaaniiyeva ^a^T2.0047^ea^ samaane anaajaaniiyabhojana.m bhojimha, aajaaniiyeva samaane anaajaaniiya.thaane .thapimha; idaani pana maya.m, bhante, a~n~natitthiye ^a^P1.0368^ea^ paribbaajake anaajaaniiyeva samaane anaajaaniiyaati jaanissaama, anaajaaniiyeva samaane anaajaaniiyabhojana.m bhojessaama, anaajaaniiyeva samaane anaajaaniiya.thaane .thapessaama. bhikkhuu pana maya.m, bhante, aajaaniiyeva samaane aajaaniiyaati jaanissaama aajaaniiyeva samaane aajaaniiyabhojana.m bhojessaama, aajaaniiyeva samaane aajaaniiya.thaane .thapessaama. ajanesi vata me, bhante, bhagavaa sama.nesu sama.nappema.m, sama.nesu sama.nappasaada.m, sama.nesu sama.nagaarava.m. abhikkanta.m, bhante, abhikkanta.m, bhante ^a^V2.0034^ea^! seyyathaapi, bhante, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya, cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti; evameva.m kho, bhante, bhagavataa anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.
[06] potaliyasutta.m ni.t.thita.m catuttha.m.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0048^ea^ ^a^V2.0035^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati jiivakassa komaarabhaccassa ambavane. atha kho jiivako komaarabhacco yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi ^a^M2.0032^ea^. ekamanta.m nisinno kho jiivako komaarabhacco bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``suta.m meta.m, bhante -- `sama.na.m gotama.m uddissa paa.na.m aarabhanti {aarambhanti (ka0)}, ta.m sama.no gotamo jaana.m uddissakata.m {uddissaka.ta.m (sii0 pii0)} ma.msa.m paribhu~njati pa.ticcakamma'nti. ye te, bhante, evamaaha.msu -- `sama.na.m gotama.m uddissa paa.na.m aarabhanti, ta.m sama.no gotamo jaana.m uddissakata.m ma.msa.m paribhu~njati pa.ticcakamma'nti, kacci te, bhante, bhagavato vuttavaadino, na ca bhagavanta.m abhuutena abbhaacikkhanti, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakaronti, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagacchatii''ti?

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ ``ye ^a^P1.0369^ea^ te, jiivaka, evamaaha.msu -- `sama.na.m gotama.m uddissa paa.na.m aarabhanti, ta.m sama.no gotamo jaana.m uddissakata.m ma.msa.m paribhu~njati pa.ticcakamma'nti na me te vuttavaadino, abbhaacikkhanti ca ma.m te asataa abhuutena. tiihi kho aha.m, jiivaka, .thaanehi ma.msa.m aparibhoganti vadaami. di.t.tha.m, suta.m, parisa"nkita.m -- imehi kho aha.m, jiivaka ^a^T2.0049^ea^, tiihi .thaanehi ma.msa.m aparibhoganti vadaami. tiihi kho aha.m, jiivaka, .thaanehi ma.msa.m paribhoganti vadaami. adi.t.tha.m, asuta.m, aparisa"nkita.m -- imehi kho aha.m, jiivaka, tiihi .thaanehi ma.msa.m paribhoganti vadaami.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ ``idha, jiivaka, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa upanissaaya viharati. so mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa viharati. tamena.m gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa upasa"nkamitvaa svaatanaaya bhattena nimanteti. aaka"nkhamaanova {aaka"nkhamaano (syaa0 ka.m0)}, jiivaka, bhikkhu adhivaaseti ^a^V2.0036^ea^. so tassaa rattiyaa accayena pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena tassa gahapatissa vaa gahapatiputtassa vaa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkamati; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidati. tamena.m so gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa pa.niitena pi.n.dapaatena parivisati. tassa na eva.m hoti -- `saadhu vata maaya.m {ma.m + aya.m = maaya.m} gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa pa.niitena pi.n.dapaatena ^a^M2.0033^ea^ pariviseyyaati! aho vata maaya.m gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa aayatimpi evaruupena pa.niitena pi.n.dapaatena pariviseyyaa'ti -- evampissa na hoti. so ta.m pi.n.dapaata.m agathito {agadhito (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} amucchito anajjhopanno {anajjhaapanno (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} aadiinavadassaavii nissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njati. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, jiivaka ^a^T2.0050^ea^, api nu so bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye attabyaabaadhaaya vaa ceteti, parabyaabaadhaaya vaa ceteti, ubhayabyaabaadhaaya vaa cetetii''ti?
[03] ``no heta.m, bhante''.
[03] ``nanu so, jiivaka, bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye anavajja.myeva aahaara.m aahaaretii''ti?

[03] ``eva.m, bhante. suta.m meta.m, bhante -- `brahmaa mettaavihaarii'ti. ta.m me ida.m, bhante, bhagavaa sakkhidi.t.tho; bhagavaa hi, bhante, mettaavihaarii''ti. ``yena kho, jiivaka, raagena yena dosena ^a^P1.0370^ea^ yena mohena byaapaadavaa assa so raago so doso so moho tathaagatassa pahiino ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato {anabhaavakato (sii0 pii0), anabhaava.mgato (syaa0 ka.m0)} aayati.m anuppaadadhammo. sace kho te, jiivaka, ida.m sandhaaya bhaasita.m anujaanaami te eta''nti. ``etadeva kho pana me, bhante, sandhaaya bhaasita.m'' {bhaasitanti (syaa0)}.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ ``idha, jiivaka, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa upanissaaya viharati. so karu.naasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... muditaasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa viharati. tamena.m gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa upasa"nkamitvaa svaatanaaya bhattena nimanteti. aaka"nkhamaanova, jiivaka, bhikkhu adhivaaseti. so ^a^V2.0037^ea^ tassaa rattiyaa accayena pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya ^a^T2.0051^ea^ yena gahapatissa vaa gahapatiputtassa vaa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkamati; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidati. tamena.m so gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa pa.niitena pi.n.dapaatena parivisati. tassa na eva.m hoti -- `saadhu vata maaya.m gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa pa.niitena pi.n.dapaatena pariviseyyaati! aho vata maaya.m gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa aayatimpi ^a^M2.0034^ea^ evaruupena pa.niitena pi.n.dapaatena pariviseyyaa'ti -- evampissa na hoti. so ta.m pi.n.dapaata.m agathito amucchito anajjhopanno aadiinavadassaavii nissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njati. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, jiivaka, api nu so bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye attabyaabaadhaaya vaa ceteti, parabyaabaadhaaya vaa ceteti, ubhayabyaabaadhaaya vaa cetetii''ti?
[03] ``no heta.m, bhante''.
[03] ``nanu so, jiivaka, bhikkhu tasmi.m samaye anavajja.myeva aahaara.m aahaaretii''ti?

[03] ``eva.m, bhante. suta.m meta.m, bhante -- `brahmaa upekkhaavihaarii'ti. ta.m me ida.m, bhante, bhagavaa sakkhidi.t.tho; bhagavaa hi, bhante, upekkhaavihaarii''ti. ``yena kho, jiivaka, raagena yena dosena yena mohena vihesavaa assa arativaa assa pa.tighavaa assa so raago so doso so moho tathaagatassa pahiino ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo. sace kho te, jiivaka, ida.m sandhaaya bhaasita.m, anujaanaami te ^a^P1.0371^ea^ eta''nti. ``etadeva kho pana me, bhante, sandhaaya bhaasita.m''.

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ ``yo ^a^T2.0052^ea^ kho, jiivaka, tathaagata.m vaa tathaagatasaavaka.m vaa uddissa paa.na.m aarabhati so pa~ncahi .thaanehi bahu.m apu~n~na.m pasavati. yampi so, gahapati, evamaaha -- `gacchatha, amuka.m naama paa.na.m aanethaa'ti, iminaa pa.thamena .thaanena bahu.m apu~n~na.m pasavati. yampi so paa.no galappave.thakena {galappavedhakena (bahuusu)} aaniiyamaano dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti, iminaa dutiyena .thaanena bahu.m apu~n~na.m pasavati. yampi so evamaaha -- `gacchatha ima.m paa.na.m aarabhathaa'ti, iminaa tatiyena .thaanena bahu.m apu~n~na.m pasavati. yampi so paa.no aarabhiyamaano dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti ^a^V2.0038^ea^, iminaa catutthena .thaanena bahu.m apu~n~na.m pasavati. yampi so tathaagata.m vaa tathaagatasaavaka.m vaa akappiyena aasaadeti, iminaa pa~ncamena .thaanena bahu.m apu~n~na.m pasavati. yo kho, jiivaka, tathaagata.m vaa tathaagatasaavaka.m vaa uddissa paa.na.m aarabhati so imehi pa~ncahi .thaanehi bahu.m apu~n~na.m pasavatii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, jiivako komaarabhacco bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! kappiya.m vata, bhante, bhikkhuu aahaara.m aahaarenti ^a^M2.0035^ea^; anavajja.m vata, bhante, bhikkhuu aahaara.m aahaarenti. abhikkanta.m, bhante, abhikkanta.m, bhante...pe0... ^a^T2.0053^ea^ upaasaka.m ma.m bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.
[06] jiivakasutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa~ncama.m.

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V2.0039^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa naa.landaaya.m viharati paavaarikambavane. tena kho pana samayena niga.n.tho naa.taputto {naathaputto (sii0), naataputto (pii0)} naa.landaaya.m pa.tivasati mahatiyaa niga.n.thaparisaaya saddhi.m. atha kho diighatapassii niga.n.tho naa.landaaya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena paavaarikambavana.m yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^P1.0372^ea^ bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thita.m kho diighatapassi.m niga.n.tha.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sa.mvijjanti kho, tapassi {diighatapassi (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}, aasanaani; sace aaka"nkhasi nisiidaa''ti. eva.m vutte, diighatapassii niga.n.tho a~n~natara.m niica.m aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho diighatapassi.m niga.n.tha.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``kati pana, tapassi, niga.n.tho naa.taputto kammaani pa~n~napeti paapassa kammassa kiriyaaya paapassa kammassa pavattiyaa''ti?

[03] ``na kho, aavuso gotama, aaci.n.na.m niga.n.thassa naa.taputtassa `kamma.m, kamma'nti pa~n~napetu.m; `da.n.da.m, da.n.da'nti kho, aavuso gotama, aaci.n.na.m niga.n.thassa naa.taputtassa pa~n~napetu''nti.
[03] ``kati pana, tapassi, niga.n.tho naa.taputto da.n.daani pa~n~napeti paapassa kammassa kiriyaaya paapassa kammassa pavattiyaa''ti?

[03] ``tii.ni kho, aavuso gotama, niga.n.tho ^a^T2.0055^ea^ naa.taputto da.n.daani pa~n~napeti paapassa kammassa kiriyaaya paapassa kammassa pavattiyaati, seyyathida.m -- kaayada.n.da.m, vaciida.n.da.m, manoda.n.da''nti.
[03] ``ki.m pana, tapassi, a~n~nadeva kaayada.n.da.m, a~n~na.m vaciida.n.da.m, a~n~na.m manoda.n.da''nti?
[03] ``a~n~nadeva ^a^V2.0040^ea^, aavuso gotama, kaayada.n.da.m, a~n~na.m vaciida.n.da.m, a~n~na.m manoda.n.da''nti.

[03] ``imesa.m pana, tapassi, ti.n.na.m da.n.daana.m eva.m pa.tivibhattaana.m eva.m pa.tivisi.t.thaana.m katama.m da.n.da.m niga.n.tho naa.taputto mahaasaavajjatara.m pa~n~napeti paapassa kammassa kiriyaaya paapassa kammassa pavattiyaa ^a^M2.0036^ea^, yadi vaa kaayada.n.da.m, yadi vaa vaciida.n.da.m, yadi vaa manoda.n.da''nti?

[03] ``imesa.m kho, aavuso gotama, ti.n.na.m da.n.daana.m eva.m pa.tivibhattaana.m eva.m pa.tivisi.t.thaana.m kaayada.n.da.m niga.n.tho naa.taputto mahaasaavajjatara.m pa~n~napeti paapassa kammassa kiriyaaya paapassa kammassa pavattiyaa, no tathaa vaciida.n.da.m, no tathaa manoda.n.da''nti.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^P1.0373^ea^ vutte, diighatapassii niga.n.tho bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``tva.m panaavuso gotama, kati da.n.daani pa~n~napesi paapassa kammassa kiriyaaya ^a^T2.0056^ea^ paapassa kammassa pavattiyaa''ti?
[03] ``na ^a^V2.0041^ea^ kho, tapassi, aaci.n.na.m tathaagatassa `da.n.da.m, da.n.da'nti pa~n~napetu.m; `kamma.m, kamma'nti kho, tapassi, aaci.n.na.m tathaagatassa pa~n~napetu''nti?
