[03] 100^b^.^eb^ ``santi ^a^M2.0070^ea^, gahapatayo, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `natthi hetu, natthi paccayo sattaana.m sa.mkilesaaya; ahetuu appaccayaa sattaa sa.mkilissanti. natthi hetu, natthi paccayo sattaana.m visuddhiyaa; ahetuu appaccayaa sattaa visujjhanti. natthi bala.m, natthi viiriya.m {viriya.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, natthi purisathaamo, natthi purisaparakkamo; sabbe sattaa sabbe paa.naa sabbe bhuutaa sabbe jiivaa avasaa abalaa aviiriyaa niyatisa.mgatibhaavapari.nataa chasvevaabhijaatiisu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedentii'ti. tesa.myeva kho, gahapatayo, sama.nabraahma.naana.m eke sama.nabraahma.naa ujuvipaccaniikavaadaa. te evamaaha.msu -- `atthi hetu, atthi paccayo sattaana.m sa.mkilesaaya; sahetuu sappaccayaa sattaa sa.mkilissanti. atthi hetu, atthi paccayo sattaana.m visuddhiyaa; sahetuu sappaccayaa sattaa visujjhanti. atthi bala.m, atthi viiriya.m, atthi ^a^T2.0112^ea^ purisathaamo, atthi purisaparakkamo; na sabbe sattaa sabbe paa.naa sabbe bhuutaa sabbe jiivaa avasaa abalaa aviiriyaa {atthi purisaparakkamo, sabbe sattaa... savasaa sabalaa saviiriyaa (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} niyatisa.mgatibhaavapari.nataa chasvevaabhijaatiisu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedentii'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, gahapatayo, nanume ^a^P1.0408^ea^ sama.nabraahma.naa a~n~nama~n~nassa ujuvipaccaniikavaadaa'ti? `eva.m, bhante'.

[03] 101^b^.^eb^ ``tatra ^a^V2.0078^ea^, gahapatayo, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `natthi hetu, natthi paccayo sattaana.m sa.mkilesaaya; ahetuu appaccayaa sattaa sa.mkilissanti. natthi hetu, natthi paccayo sattaana.m visuddhiyaa; ahetuu appaccayaa sattaa visujjhanti. natthi bala.m, natthi viiriya.m, natthi purisathaamo, natthi purisaparakkamo; sabbe sattaa sabbe paa.naa sabbe bhuutaa sabbe jiivaa avasaa abalaa aviiriyaa niyatisa.mgatibhaavapari.nataa chasvevaabhijaatiisu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedentii'ti tesameta.m paa.tika"nkha.m: yamida.m kaayasucarita.m, vaciisucarita.m, manosucarita.m -- ime tayo kusale dhamme abhinivajjetvaa yamida.m kaayaduccarita.m, vaciiduccarita.m, manoduccarita.m -- ime tayo akusale dhamme samaadaaya vattissanti. ta.m kissa hetu? na hi te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa passanti akusalaana.m dhammaana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m vodaanapakkha.m. santa.myeva kho pana hetu.m `natthi ^a^M2.0071^ea^ hetuu' tissa di.t.thi hoti; saassa hoti micchaadi.t.thi. santa.myeva kho pana hetu.m `natthi hetuu'ti sa"nkappeti ^a^T2.0113^ea^; svaassa hoti micchaasa"nkappo. santa.myeva kho pana hetu.m `natthi hetuu'ti vaaca.m bhaasati; saassa hoti micchaavaacaa. santa.myeva kho pana hetu.m `natthi hetuu'ti aaha; ye te arahanto hetuvaadaa tesamaya.m paccaniika.m karoti. santa.myeva kho pana hetu.m `natthi hetuu'ti para.m sa~n~naapeti; saassa hoti asaddhammasa~n~natti. taaya ca pana asaddhammasa~n~nattiyaa attaanukka.mseti, para.m vambheti. iti pubbeva kho panassa susiilya.m pahiina.m hoti, dussiilya.m paccupa.t.thita.m -- aya~nca micchaadi.t.thi micchaasa"nkappo micchaavaacaa ariyaana.m paccaniikataa asaddhammasa~n~natti attaanukka.msanaa paravambhanaa. evamassime aneke paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa sambhavanti micchaadi.t.thipaccayaa.

[03] ``tatra, gahapatayo, vi~n~nuu puriso iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `sace kho natthi hetu, evamaya.m bhava.m purisapuggalo kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sotthimattaana.m karissati; sace kho atthi hetu, evamaya.m bhava.m purisapuggalo kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjissati. kaama.m kho pana maahu hetu, hotu nesa.m bhavata.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m sacca.m vacana.m; atha ca panaaya.m bhava.m purisapuggalo di.t.theva dhamme vi~n~nuuna.m gaarayho -- dussiilo purisapuggalo micchaadi.t.thi ahetukavaado'ti. sace kho attheva hetu, eva.m imassa bhoto purisapuggalassa ubhayattha kaliggaho ^a^P1.0409^ea^ -- ya~nca di.t.theva dhamme vi~n~nuuna.m gaarayho, ya~nca kaayassa bhedaa ^a^V2.0079^ea^ para.m ^a^T2.0114^ea^ mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjissati. evamassaaya.m apa.n.nako dhammo dussamatto samaadinno, eka.msa.m pharitvaa ti.t.thati, ri~ncati kusala.m .thaana.m.

[03] 102^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, gahapatayo, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `atthi hetu, atthi paccayo sattaana.m sa.mkilesaaya; sahetuu sappaccayaa sattaa sa.mkilissanti. atthi hetu, atthi paccayo sattaana.m visuddhiyaa; sahetuu sappaccayaa sattaa visujjhanti. atthi bala.m, atthi viiriya.m, atthi purisathaamo, atthi purisaparakkamo; na sabbe sattaa sabbe paa.naa sabbe bhuutaa sabbe jiivaa avasaa abalaa aviiriyaa niyatisa.mgatibhaavapari.nataa chasvevaabhijaatiisu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedentii'ti tesameta.m paa.tika"nkha.m: yamida.m kaayaduccarita.m, vaciiduccarita.m, manoduccarita.m -- ime tayo ^a^M2.0072^ea^ akusale dhamme abhinivajjetvaa yamida.m kaayasucarita.m, vaciisucarita.m, manosucarita.m -- ime tayo kusale dhamme samaadaaya vattissanti. ta.m kissa hetu? passanti hi te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa akusalaana.m dhammaana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m vodaanapakkha.m. santa.myeva kho pana hetu.m `atthi hetuu' tissa di.t.thi hoti; saassa hoti sammaadi.t.thi. santa.myeva kho pana hetu.m `atthi hetuu'ti sa"nkappeti; svaassa hoti sammaasa"nkappo. santa.myeva kho pana hetu.m `atthi hetuu'ti vaaca.m bhaasati; saassa hoti sammaavaacaa. santa.myeva kho pana hetu.m ^a^T2.0115^ea^ `atthi hetuu'ti aaha, ye te arahanto hetuvaadaa tesamaya.m na paccaniika.m karoti. santa.myeva kho pana hetu.m `atthi hetuu'ti para.m sa~n~naapeti; saassa hoti saddhammasa~n~natti. taaya ca pana saddhammasa~n~nattiyaa nevattaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti. iti pubbeva kho panassa dussiilya.m pahiina.m hoti, susiilya.m paccupa.t.thita.m -- aya~nca sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa ariyaana.m apaccaniikataa saddhammasa~n~natti anattukka.msanaa aparavambhanaa. evamassime aneke kusalaa dhammaa sambhavanti sammaadi.t.thipaccayaa.

[03] ``tatra, gahapatayo, vi~n~nuu puriso iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `sace kho atthi hetu, evamaya.m bhava.m purisapuggalo kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjissati. kaama.m kho pana maahu hetu, hotu nesa.m bhavata.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m sacca.m vacana.m; atha ca panaaya.m bhava.m purisapuggalo di.t.theva dhamme vi~n~nuuna.m paasa.mso -- siilavaa purisapuggalo sammaadi.t.thi hetuvaado'ti. sace kho atthi hetu ^a^P1.0410^ea^, eva.m imassa bhoto purisapuggalassa ubhayattha ka.taggaho ^a^V2.0080^ea^ -- ya~nca di.t.theva dhamme vi~n~nuuna.m paasa.mso, ya~nca kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjissati. evamassaaya.m apa.n.nako dhammo susamatto samaadinno, ubhaya.msa.m pharitvaa ti.t.thati, ri~ncati akusala.m .thaana.m.

[03] 103^b^.^eb^ ``santi, gahapatayo, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino ^a^T2.0116^ea^ -- `natthi sabbaso aaruppaa'ti. tesa.myeva kho, gahapatayo, sama.nabraahma.naana.m eke sama.nabraahma.naa ujuvipaccaniikavaadaa. te evamaaha.msu -- `atthi sabbaso aaruppaa'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, gahapatayo, nanume sama.nabraahma.naa a~n~nama~n~nassa ujuvipaccaniikavaadaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``tatra ^a^M2.0073^ea^, gahapatayo, vi~n~nuu puriso iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- ye kho te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `natthi sabbaso aaruppaa'ti, ida.m me adi.t.tha.m; yepi te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `atthi sabbaso aaruppaa'ti, ida.m me avidita.m. aha~nceva {aha~nce (?)} kho pana ajaananto apassanto eka.msena aadaaya vohareyya.m -- idameva sacca.m, moghama~n~nanti, na meta.m assa patiruupa.m. ye kho te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `natthi sabbaso aaruppaa'ti, sace tesa.m bhavata.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m sacca.m vacana.m, .thaanameta.m vijjati -- ye te devaa ruupino manomayaa, apa.n.naka.m me tatruupapatti bhavissati. ye pana te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `atthi sabbaso aaruppaa'ti, sace tesa.m bhavata.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m sacca.m vacana.m, .thaanameta.m vijjati -- ye te devaa aruupino sa~n~naamayaa, apa.n.naka.m me tatruupapatti bhavissati. dissanti kho pana ruupaadhikara.na.m {ruupakaara.naa (ka0)} da.n.daadaana-satthaadaana-kalaha-viggaha-vivaada-tuva.mtuva.m-pesu~n~na-musaavaadaa. `natthi kho paneta.m sabbaso aruupe'''ti. so iti ^a^T2.0117^ea^ pa.tisa"nkhaaya ruupaana.myeva nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti.

[03] 104^b^.^eb^ ``santi, gahapatayo, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `natthi sabbaso bhavanirodho'ti. tesa.myeva kho, gahapatayo, sama.nabraahma.naana.m eke sama.nabraahma.naa ujuvipaccaniikavaadaa. te evamaaha.msu -- `atthi sabbaso ^a^P1.0411^ea^ bhavanirodho'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, gahapatayo, nanume sama.nabraahma.naa a~n~nama~n~nassa ujuvipaccaniikavaadaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``tatra, gahapatayo, vi~n~nuu puriso iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- ye kho te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `natthi sabbaso bhavanirodho'ti, ida.m me adi.t.tha.m; yepi te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa ^a^V2.0081^ea^ eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `atthi sabbaso bhavanirodho'ti, ida.m me avidita.m. aha~nceva kho pana ajaananto apassanto eka.msena aadaaya vohareyya.m -- idameva sacca.m, moghama~n~nanti, na meta.m assa patiruupa.m. ye kho te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `natthi sabbaso bhavanirodho'ti, sace tesa.m bhavata.m ^a^M2.0074^ea^ sama.nabraahma.naana.m sacca.m vacana.m, .thaanameta.m vijjati -- ye te devaa aruupino sa~n~naamayaa apa.n.naka.m me tatruupapatti bhavissati. ye pana te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `atthi sabbaso bhavanirodho'ti, sace tesa.m bhavata.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m sacca.m vacana.m, .thaanameta.m vijjati -- ya.m di.t.theva dhamme parinibbaayissaami ^a^T2.0118^ea^. ye kho te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `natthi sabbaso bhavanirodho'ti, tesamaya.m di.t.thi saaraagaaya {saraagaaya (syaa0 ka.m0)} santike, sa.myogaaya santike, abhinandanaaya santike, ajjhosaanaaya santike, upaadaanaaya santike. ye pana te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `atthi sabbaso bhavanirodho'ti, tesamaya.m di.t.thi asaaraagaaya santike, asa.myogaaya santike, anabhinandanaaya santike, anajjhosaanaaya santike, anupaadaanaaya santike'''ti. so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya bhavaana.myeva nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti.

[03] 105^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, gahapatayo, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? idha, gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo attantapo hoti attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto. idha, gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo parantapo hoti paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto. idha, gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo attantapo ca hoti attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto parantapo ca paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto. idha, gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo nevattantapo hoti naattaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto na parantapo na paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto; so anattantapo ^a^P1.0412^ea^ aparantapo di.t.theva dhamme nicchaato nibbuto siitiibhuuto sukhappa.tisa.mvedii brahmabhuutena attanaa viharati.

[03] 106^b^.^eb^ ``katamo ca, gahapatayo, puggalo attantapo attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto ^a^T2.0119^ea^? idha, gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo acelako hoti muttaacaaro hatthaapalekhano...pe0... {vitthaaro ma0 ni0 2.6-7 kandarakasutte} iti evaruupa.m anekavihita.m kaayassa aataapanaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati. aya.m vuccati, gahapatayo, puggalo attantapo attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto.

[03] ``katamo ^a^M2.0075^ea^ ^a^V2.0082^ea^ ca, gahapatayo, puggalo parantapo paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto? idha, gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo orabbhiko hoti suukariko...pe0... ye vaa pana~n~nepi keci kuruurakammantaa. aya.m vuccati, gahapatayo, puggalo parantapo paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto.

[03] ``katamo ca, gahapatayo, puggalo attantapo ca attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto parantapo ca paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto? idha, gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo raajaa vaa hoti khattiyo muddhaavasitto...pe0... tepi da.n.datajjitaa bhayatajjitaa assumukhaa rudamaanaa parikammaani karonti. aya.m vuccati, gahapatayo, puggalo attantapo ca attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto parantapo ca paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto.

[01] ``katamo ca, gahapatayo, puggalo nevattantapo naattaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto na parantapo na paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto; so anattantapo aparantapo di.t.theva dhamme nicchaato nibbuto siitiibhuuto sukhappa.tisa.mvedii brahmabhuutena attanaa viharati? idha, gahapatayo, tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m sammaasambuddho...pe0... so ime pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso ^a^T2.0120^ea^ upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati.

[03] ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe ^a^P1.0413^ea^ pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte sattaana.m ^a^V2.0083^ea^ cutuupapaata~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati. so eva.m samaahite ^a^M2.0076^ea^ citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte aasavaana.m khaya~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati...pe0... `aya.m aasavanirodhagaaminii ^a^T2.0121^ea^ pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tassa eva.m jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, avijjaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati. aya.m vuccati, gahapatayo, puggalo nevattantapo naattaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto na parantapo na paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto; so anattantapo aparantapo di.t.theva dhamme nicchaato nibbuto siitiibhuuto sukhappa.tisa.mvedii brahmabhuutena attanaa viharatii''ti.

[01] eva.m vutte, saaleyyakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama! seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya `cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii'ti; evameva.m bhotaa gotamena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. ete maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaama dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasake no bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gate''ti.
