[21] kandaranaagarasekhavato ^a^T2.0122^ea^ ca, potaliyo puna jiivakabhacco.
[22] upaalidamatho kukkuraabhayo, bahuvedaniiyaapa.n.nakato dasamo..

[03] 107^b^.^eb^ ^a^M2.0077^ea^ ^a^V2.0084^ea^ eva.m ^a^T2.0123^ea^ ^a^P1.0414^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa raahulo ambala.t.thikaaya.m viharati. atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena ambala.t.thikaa yenaayasmaa raahulo tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho aayasmaa raahulo bhagavanta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana aasana.m pa~n~naapesi, udaka~nca paadaana.m. nisiidi bhagavaa pa~n~natte aasane. nisajja paade pakkhaalesi. aayasmaapi kho raahulo bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.

[03] 108^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa paritta.m udakaavasesa.m udakaadhaane .thapetvaa aayasmanta.m raahula.m aamantesi -- ``passasi no tva.m, raahula, ima.m paritta.m udakaavasesa.m udakaadhaane .thapita''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``eva.m parittaka.m kho, raahula, tesa.m saama~n~na.m yesa.m natthi sampajaanamusaavaade lajjaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa paritta.m udakaavasesa.m cha.d.detvaa aayasmanta.m raahula.m aamantesi -- ``passasi no tva.m, raahula, paritta.m udakaavasesa.m cha.d.dita''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``eva.m cha.d.dita.m kho, raahula, tesa.m saama~n~na.m yesa.m natthi sampajaanamusaavaade lajjaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa ^a^T2.0124^ea^ ta.m udakaadhaana.m nikkujjitvaa aayasmanta.m raahula.m aamantesi -- ``passasi no tva.m, raahula, ima.m udakaadhaana.m nikkujjita''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``eva.m nikkujjita.m kho, raahula, tesa.m saama~n~na.m yesa.m natthi sampajaanamusaavaade lajjaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa ta.m udakaadhaana.m ukkujjitvaa aayasmanta.m raahula.m aamantesi -- ``passasi no tva.m, raahula, ima.m udakaadhaana.m ritta.m tuccha''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``eva.m ritta.m tuccha.m kho, raahula, tesa.m saama~n~na.m yesa.m natthi ^a^V2.0085^ea^ sampajaanamusaavaade lajjaati. seyyathaapi, raahula, ra~n~no naago iisaadanto uruu.lhavaa {ubbuu.lhavaa (sii0 pii0)} abhijaato sa"ngaamaavacaro sa"ngaamagato purimehipi paadehi kamma.m karoti, pacchimehipi paadehi kamma.m karoti, purimenapi kaayena kamma.m karoti, pacchimenapi kaayena kamma.m karoti, siisenapi kamma.m karoti, ka.n.nehipi ^a^M2.0078^ea^ kamma.m karoti, dantehipi kamma.m karoti, na"ngu.t.thenapi kamma.m ^a^P1.0415^ea^ karoti; rakkhateva so.n.da.m. tattha hatthaarohassa eva.m hoti -- `aya.m kho ra~n~no naago iisaadanto uruu.lhavaa abhijaato sa"ngaamaavacaro sa"ngaamagato purimehipi paadehi kamma.m karoti, pacchimehipi paadehi kamma.m karoti...pe0... na"ngu.t.thenapi kamma.m karoti; rakkhateva so.n.da.m ^a^T2.0125^ea^. apariccatta.m kho ra~n~no naagassa jiivita'nti. yato kho, raahula, ra~n~no naago iisaadanto uruu.lhavaa abhijaato sa"ngaamaavacaro sa"ngaamagato purimehipi paadehi kamma.m karoti, pacchimehipi paadehi kamma.m karoti...pe0... na"ngu.t.thenapi kamma.m karoti, so.n.daayapi kamma.m karoti, tattha hatthaarohassa eva.m hoti -- `aya.m kho ra~n~no naago iisaadanto uruu.lhavaa abhijaato sa"ngaamaavacaro sa"ngaamagato purimehipi paadehi kamma.m karoti, pacchimehipi paadehi kamma.m karoti, purimenapi kaayena kamma.m karoti, pacchimenapi kaayena kamma.m karoti, siisenapi kamma.m karoti, ka.n.nehipi kamma.m karoti, dantehipi kamma.m karoti, na"ngu.t.thenapi kamma.m karoti, so.n.daayapi kamma.m karoti. pariccatta.m kho ra~n~no naagassa jiivita.m. natthi daani ki~nci ra~n~no naagassa akara.niiya'nti. evameva kho, raahula, yassa kassaci sampajaanamusaavaade natthi lajjaa, naaha.m tassa ki~nci paapa.m akara.niiyanti vadaami. tasmaatiha te, raahula, `hassaapi na musaa bha.nissaamii'ti -- eva~nhi te, raahula, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] 109^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, raahula, kimatthiyo aadaaso''ti? ``paccavekkha.nattho, bhante''ti. ``evameva kho, raahula, paccavekkhitvaa paccavekkhitvaa kaayena kamma.m kattabba.m, paccavekkhitvaa paccavekkhitvaa vaacaaya kamma.m kattabba.m, paccavekkhitvaa paccavekkhitvaa manasaa kamma.m kattabba.m. yadeva ^a^T2.0126^ea^ tva.m, raahula, kaayena kamma.m kattukaamo ahosi, tadeva te kaayakamma.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m nu kho aha.m ida.m kaayena kamma.m kattukaamo ida.m me kaayakamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya -- akusala.m ida.m kaayakamma.m dukkhudraya.m {dukkhundraya.m, dukkhudaya.m (ka0)} dukkhavipaaka'nti? sace tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m kaayena kamma.m kattukaamo ida.m me kaayakamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi ^a^V2.0086^ea^ sa.mvatteyya, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi ^a^M2.0079^ea^ sa.mvatteyya -- akusala.m ida.m kaayakamma.m dukkhudraya.m dukkhavipaaka'nti, evaruupa.m te, raahula, kaayena kamma.m sasakka.m na kara.niiya.m {sa.msakka.m na ca kara.niiya.m (ka0)}. sace ^a^P1.0416^ea^ pana tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m kaayena kamma.m kattukaamo ida.m me kaayakamma.m nevattabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya, na parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya, na ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya -- kusala.m ida.m kaayakamma.m sukhudraya.m sukhavipaaka'nti, evaruupa.m te, raahula, kaayena kamma.m kara.niiya.m.

[03] ``karontenapi te, raahula, kaayena kamma.m tadeva te kaayakamma.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m nu kho aha.m ida.m kaayena kamma.m karomi ida.m me kaayakamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi ^a^T2.0127^ea^ sa.mvattati, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- akusala.m ida.m kaayakamma.m dukkhudraya.m dukkhavipaaka'nti? sace pana tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m kaayena kamma.m karomi ida.m me kaayakamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- akusala.m ida.m kaayakamma.m dukkhudraya.m dukkhavipaaka'nti, pa.tisa.mhareyyaasi tva.m, raahula, evaruupa.m kaayakamma.m. sace pana tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m kaayena kamma.m karomi ida.m me kaayakamma.m nevattabyaabaadhaayapi ^a^T2.0128^ea^ sa.mvattati, na parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, na ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- kusala.m ida.m kaayakamma.m sukhudraya.m sukhavipaaka'nti, anupadajjeyyaasi tva.m, raahula, evaruupa.m kaayakamma.m.

[03] ``katvaapi te, raahula, kaayena kamma.m tadeva te kaayakamma.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m nu kho aha.m ida.m kaayena kamma.m akaasi.m ida.m me kaayakamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati {sa.mvatti (pii0)}, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- akusala.m ida.m kaayakamma.m dukkhudraya.m dukkhavipaaka'nti? sace kho tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m kaayena kamma.m akaasi.m, ida.m me kaayakamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- akusala.m ida.m kaayakamma.m dukkhudraya.m dukkhavipaaka'nti, evaruupa.m te, raahula, kaayakamma.m satthari vaa vi~n~nuusu vaa sabrahmacaariisu ^a^M2.0080^ea^ desetabba.m, vivaritabba.m, uttaaniikaatabba.m; desetvaa vivaritvaa uttaaniikatvaa aayati.m sa.mvara.m ^a^P1.0417^ea^ aapajjitabba.m ^a^V2.0087^ea^. sace pana tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m kaayena kamma.m akaasi.m ida.m me kaayakamma.m nevattabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, na parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, na ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- kusala.m ida.m kaayakamma.m sukhudraya.m sukhavipaaka'nti, teneva tva.m, raahula, piitipaamojjena vihareyyaasi ahorattaanusikkhii kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] 110^b^.^eb^ ``yadeva tva.m, raahula, vaacaaya kamma.m kattukaamo ahosi, tadeva te vaciikamma.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m nu kho aha.m ida.m vaacaaya kamma.m kattukaamo ida.m me vaciikamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya -- akusala.m ida.m vaciikamma.m dukkhudraya.m dukkhavipaaka'nti? sace tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m vaacaaya kamma.m kattukaamo ida.m me vaciikamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya -- akusala.m ida.m vaciikamma.m dukkhudraya.m dukkhavipaaka'nti, evaruupa.m te, raahula, vaacaaya kamma.m sasakka.m na kara.niiya.m. sace pana tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m vaacaaya kamma.m kattukaamo ida.m me vaciikamma.m nevattabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya, na parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya -- kusala.m ida.m vaciikamma.m sukhudraya.m sukhavipaaka'nti, evaruupa.m te, raahula, vaacaaya kamma.m kara.niiya.m.

[03] ``karontenapi, raahula, vaacaaya kamma.m tadeva te vaciikamma.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m nu kho aha.m ida.m vaacaaya kamma.m karomi ida.m me vaciikamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, parabyaabaadhaayapi ^a^T2.0129^ea^ sa.mvattati, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- akusala.m ida.m vaciikamma.m dukkhudraya.m dukkhavipaaka'nti? sace pana tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m vaacaaya kamma.m karomi ida.m me vaciikamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- akusala.m ida.m vaciikamma.m dukkhudraya.m dukkhavipaaka'nti, pa.tisa.mhareyyaasi tva.m, raahula, evaruupa.m vaciikamma.m. sace pana tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m vaacaaya kamma.m karomi ida.m me vaciikamma.m ^a^M2.0081^ea^ nevattabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, na parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, na ^a^P1.0418^ea^ ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati ^a^V2.0088^ea^ -- kusala.m ida.m vaciikamma.m sukhudraya.m sukhavipaaka'nti, anupadajjeyyaasi, tva.m raahula, evaruupa.m vaciikamma.m.

[03] ``katvaapi te, raahula, vaacaaya kamma.m tadeva te vaciikamma.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m nu kho aha.m ida.m vaacaaya kamma.m akaasi.m ida.m me vaciikamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati {sa.mvatti (sii0 pii0)}, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- akusala.m ida.m vaciikamma.m dukkhudraya.m dukkhavipaaka'nti? sace kho tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m vaacaaya kamma.m akaasi.m ida.m me vaciikamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- akusala.m ida.m vaciikamma.m dukkhudraya.m dukkhavipaaka'nti, evaruupa.m te, raahula, vaciikamma.m satthari vaa vi~n~nuusu vaa sabrahmacaariisu desetabba.m, vivaritabba.m, uttaaniikattabba.m ^a^T2.0130^ea^; desetvaa vivaritvaa uttaaniikatvaa aayati.m sa.mvara.m aapajjitabba.m. sace pana tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m vaacaaya kamma.m akaasi.m ida.m me vaciikamma.m nevattabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, na parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, na ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- kusala.m ida.m vaciikamma.m sukhudraya.m sukhavipaaka'nti, teneva tva.m, raahula, piitipaamojjena vihareyyaasi ahorattaanusikkhii kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] 111^b^.^eb^ ``yadeva tva.m, raahula, manasaa kamma.m kattukaamo ahosi, tadeva te manokamma.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m nu kho aha.m ida.m manasaa kamma.m kattukaamo ida.m me manokamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya -- akusala.m ida.m manokamma.m dukkhudraya.m dukkhavipaaka'nti? sace tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m manasaa kamma.m kattukaamo ida.m me manokamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya -- akusala.m ida.m manokamma.m dukkhudraya.m dukkhavipaaka'nti, evaruupa.m te, raahula, manasaa kamma.m sasakka.m na kara.niiya.m. sace pana tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ^a^M2.0082^ea^ ida.m manasaa kamma.m kattukaamo ida.m me manokamma.m nevattabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya, na parabyaabaadhaayapi ^a^V2.0089^ea^ sa.mvatteyya, na ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya -- kusala.m ida.m manokamma.m ^a^T2.0131^ea^ sukhudraya.m ^a^P1.0419^ea^ sukhavipaaka'nti, evaruupa.m te, raahula, manasaa kamma.m kara.niiya.m.

[03] ``karontenapi te, raahula, manasaa kamma.m tadeva te manokamma.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m nu kho aha.m ida.m manasaa kamma.m karomi ida.m me manokamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- akusala.m ida.m manokamma.m dukkhudraya.m dukkhavipaaka'nti? sace pana tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m manasaa kamma.m karomi ida.m me manokamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- akusala.m ida.m manokamma.m dukkhudraya.m dukkhavipaaka'nti, pa.tisa.mhareyyaasi tva.m, raahula, evaruupa.m manokamma.m. sace pana tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m manasaa kamma.m karomi ida.m me manokamma.m nevattabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, na parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, na ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- kusala.m ida.m manokamma.m sukhudraya.m sukhavipaaka'nti, anupadajjeyyaasi tva.m, raahula, evaruupa.m manokamma.m.

[03] ``katvaapi te, raahula, manasaa kamma.m tadeva te manokamma.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m nu kho aha.m ida.m manasaa kamma.m akaasi.m ida.m me manokamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati {sa.mvatti (sii0 pii0)}, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- akusala.m ida.m manokamma.m dukkhudraya.m dukkhavipaaka'nti? sace kho tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m ^a^T2.0132^ea^ kho aha.m ida.m manasaa kamma.m akaasi.m ida.m me manokamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- akusala.m ida.m manokamma.m dukkhudraya.m dukkhavipaaka'nti, evaruupa.m pana {evaruupe (sii0 pii0), evaruupe pana (syaa0 ka.m0)} te, raahula, manokamma.m {manokamme (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} a.t.tiiyitabba.m haraayitabba.m jigucchitabba.m; a.t.tiiyitvaa haraayitvaa jigucchitvaa aayati.m sa.mvara.m aapajjitabba.m. sace pana tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m manasaa kamma.m akaasi.m ^a^M2.0083^ea^ ida.m me manokamma.m nevattabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, na parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, na ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- kusala.m ida.m manokamma.m sukhudraya.m sukhavipaaka'nti, teneva tva.m, raahula, piitipaamojjena vihareyyaasi ahorattaanusikkhii kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] 112^b^.^eb^ ``ye ^a^V2.0090^ea^ ^a^P1.0420^ea^ hi keci, raahula, atiitamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa kaayakamma.m parisodhesu.m, vaciikamma.m parisodhesu.m, manokamma.m parisodhesu.m, sabbe te evameva.m paccavekkhitvaa paccavekkhitvaa kaayakamma.m parisodhesu.m, paccavekkhitvaa paccavekkhitvaa vaciikamma.m parisodhesu.m, paccavekkhitvaa paccavekkhitvaa manokamma.m parisodhesu.m. yepi hi keci, raahula, anaagatamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa kaayakamma.m parisodhessanti, vaciikamma.m parisodhessanti, manokamma.m parisodhessanti, sabbe te evameva.m paccavekkhitvaa paccavekkhitvaa kaayakamma.m parisodhessanti, paccavekkhitvaa paccavekkhitvaa vaciikamma.m parisodhessanti ^a^T2.0133^ea^, paccavekkhitvaa paccavekkhitvaa manokamma.m parisodhessanti. yepi hi keci, raahula, etarahi sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa kaayakamma.m parisodhenti, vaciikamma.m parisodhenti, manokamma.m parisodhenti, sabbe te evameva.m paccavekkhitvaa paccavekkhitvaa kaayakamma.m parisodhenti, paccavekkhitvaa paccavekkhitvaa vaciikamma.m parisodhenti, paccavekkhitvaa paccavekkhitvaa manokamma.m parisodhenti. tasmaatiha, raahula, `paccavekkhitvaa paccavekkhitvaa kaayakamma.m parisodhessaami, paccavekkhitvaa paccavekkhitvaa vaciikamma.m parisodhessaami, paccavekkhitvaa paccavekkhitvaa manokamma.m parisodhessaamii'ti -- eva~nhi te, raahula, sikkhitabba''nti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa raahulo bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] ambala.t.thikaraahulovaadasutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 113^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0134^ea^ ^a^V2.0091^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. aayasmaapi kho ^a^M2.0084^ea^ raahulo pubba.nhasamaya.m ^a^P1.0421^ea^ nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya bhagavanta.m pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandhi. atha kho bhagavaa apaloketvaa aayasmanta.m raahula.m aamantesi -- ``ya.m ki~nci, raahula, ruupa.m -- atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa -- sabba.m ruupa.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba''nti. ``ruupameva nu kho, bhagavaa, ruupameva nu kho, sugataa''ti? ``ruupampi, raahula, vedanaapi, raahula, sa~n~naapi, raahula, sa"nkhaaraapi, raahula, vi~n~naa.nampi, raahulaa''ti. atha kho aayasmaa raahulo ``ko najja {ko nujja (syaa0 ka.m0)} bhagavataa sammukhaa ovaadena ovadito gaama.m pi.n.daaya pavisissatii''ti tato pa.tinivattitvaa a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisiidi palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. addasaa kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m raahula.m a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisinna.m palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa ^a^T2.0135^ea^. disvaana aayasmanta.m raahula.m aamantesi -- ``aanaapaanassati.m, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavehi. aanaapaanassati, raahula, bhaavanaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa''ti.

[03] 114^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa raahulo saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa raahulo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``katha.m bhaavitaa nu kho, bhante, aanaapaanassati, katha.m bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa''ti? ``ya.m ki~nci, raahula, ajjhatta.m paccatta.m kakkha.la.m kharigata.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m -- kesaa lomaa nakhaa dantaa taco ma.msa.m nhaaru {nahaaru (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} a.t.thi a.t.thimi~nja.m vakka.m hadaya.m yakana.m kilomaka.m pihaka.m papphaasa.m anta.m antagu.na.m udariya.m kariisa.m, ya.m ^a^V2.0092^ea^ vaa pana~n~nampi ki~nci ajjhatta.m paccatta.m kakkha.la.m kharigata.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati, raahula, ajjhattikaa pathaviidhaatu {pa.thaviidhaatu (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. yaa ceva kho pana ajjhattikaa pathaviidhaatu yaa ca baahiraa pathaviidhaatu, pathaviidhaaturevesaa. ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m ^a^P1.0422^ea^ yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa pathaviidhaatuyaa nibbindati, pathaviidhaatuyaa citta.m viraajeti''.

[03] 115^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa ^a^M2.0085^ea^ ca, raahula, aapodhaatu? aapodhaatu siyaa ajjhattikaa, siyaa baahiraa. katamaa ca, raahula, ajjhattikaa aapodhaatu ^a^T2.0136^ea^? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m aapo aapogata.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m -- pitta.m semha.m pubbo lohita.m sedo medo assu vasaa khe.lo si"nghaa.nikaa lasikaa mutta.m, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi ki~nci ajjhatta.m paccatta.m aapo aapogata.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati, raahula, ajjhattikaa aapodhaatu. yaa ceva kho pana ajjhattikaa aapodhaatu yaa ca baahiraa aapodhaatu aapodhaaturevesaa. ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa aapodhaatuyaa nibbindati, aapodhaatuyaa citta.m viraajeti.

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa ca, raahula, tejodhaatu? tejodhaatu siyaa ajjhattikaa, siyaa baahiraa. katamaa ca, raahula, ajjhattikaa tejodhaatu? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m tejo tejogata.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m -- yena ca santappati yena ca jiiriiyati yena ca pari.dayhati yena ca asitapiitakhaayitasaayita.m sammaa pari.naama.m gacchati, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi ki~nci ajjhatta.m paccatta.m tejo tejogata.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati, raahula, ajjhattikaa tejodhaatu. yaa ceva kho pana ajjhattikaa tejodhaatu yaa ca baahiraa tejodhaatu tejodhaaturevesaa. ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa tejodhaatuyaa nibbindati, tejodhaatuyaa citta.m viraajeti.

[03] 117^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa ^a^T2.0137^ea^ ca, raahula, vaayodhaatu? vaayodhaatu siyaa ajjhattikaa, siyaa baahiraa. katamaa ca, raahula, ajjhattikaa vaayodhaatu? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m vaayo vaayogata.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m -- uddha"ngamaa vaataa, adhogamaa vaataa, kucchisayaa vaataa, ko.t.thaasayaa {ko.t.thasayaa (sii0 pii0)} vaataa ^a^V2.0093^ea^, a"ngama"ngaanusaarino vaataa, assaaso passaaso, iti ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi ki~nci ajjhatta.m paccatta.m vaayo vaayogata.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati, raahula, ajjhattikaa vaayodhaatu. yaa ceva kho pana ajjhattikaa vaayodhaatu yaa ca baahiraa vaayodhaatu vaayodhaaturevesaa. ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi ^a^M2.0086^ea^, na meso attaa'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya ^a^P1.0423^ea^ da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa vaayodhaatuyaa nibbindati, vaayodhaatuyaa citta.m viraajeti.

[03] 118^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa ca, raahula, aakaasadhaatu? aakaasadhaatu siyaa ajjhattikaa, siyaa baahiraa. katamaa ca, raahula, ajjhattikaa aakaasadhaatu? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m aakaasa.m aakaasagata.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m -- ka.n.nacchidda.m naasacchidda.m mukhadvaara.m, yena ca asitapiitakhaayitasaayita.m ajjhoharati, yattha ca asitapiitakhaayitasaayita.m santi.t.thati, yena ca asitapiitakhaayitasaayita.m adhobhaaga.m {adhobhaagaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} nikkhamati, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi ki~nci ajjhatta.m paccatta.m aakaasa.m aakaasagata.m, agha.m aghagata.m, vivara.m vivaragata.m, asamphu.t.tha.m, ma.msalohitehi upaadinna.m ^a^T2.0138^ea^ {aakaasagata.m upaadinna.m (sii0 pii0)} -- aya.m vuccati, raahula, ajjhattikaa aakaasadhaatu. yaa ceva kho pana ajjhattikaa aakaasadhaatu yaa ca baahiraa aakaasadhaatu aakaasadhaaturevesaa. ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa aakaasadhaatuyaa citta.m nibbindati, aakaasadhaatuyaa citta.m viraajeti.

[03] 119^b^.^eb^ ``pathaviisama.m, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavehi. pathaviisama~nhi te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato uppannaa manaapaamanaapaa phassaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya .thassanti. seyyathaapi, raahula, pathaviyaa sucimpi nikkhipanti, asucimpi nikkhipanti, guuthagatampi nikkhipanti, muttagatampi nikkhipanti, khe.lagatampi nikkhipanti, pubbagatampi nikkhipanti, lohitagatampi nikkhipanti, na ca tena pathavii a.t.tiiyati vaa haraayati vaa jigucchati vaa; evameva kho tva.m, raahula, pathaviisama.m bhaavana.m bhaavehi. pathaviisama~nhi te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato uppannaa manaapaamanaapaa phassaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya .thassanti.

[03] ``aaposama.m, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavehi. aaposama~nhi te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato uppannaa manaapaamanaapaa phassaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya .thassanti. seyyathaapi, raahula, aapasmi.m sucimpi ^a^V2.0094^ea^ dhovanti, asucimpi dhovanti, guuthagatampi dhovanti, muttagatampi dhovanti, khe.lagatampi dhovanti, pubbagatampi dhovanti, lohitagatampi dhovanti, na ca ^a^T2.0139^ea^ tena aapo a.t.tiiyati ^a^M2.0087^ea^ vaa haraayati vaa jigucchati vaa; evameva kho ^a^P1.0424^ea^ tva.m, raahula, aaposama.m bhaavana.m bhaavehi. aaposama~nhi te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato uppannaa manaapaamanaapaa phassaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya .thassanti.

[03] ``tejosama.m, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavehi. tejosama~nhi te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato uppannaa manaapaamanaapaa phassaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya .thassanti. seyyathaapi, raahula, tejo sucimpi dahati, asucimpi dahati, guuthagatampi dahati, muttagatampi dahati, khe.lagatampi dahati, pubbagatampi dahati, lohitagatampi dahati, na ca tena tejo a.t.tiiyati vaa haraayati vaa jigucchati vaa; evameva kho tva.m, raahula, tejosama.m bhaavana.m bhaavehi. tejosama~nhi te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato uppannaa manaapaamanaapaa phassaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya .thassanti.

[03] ``vaayosama.m, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavehi. vaayosama~nhi te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato uppannaa manaapaamanaapaa phassaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya .thassanti. seyyathaapi, raahula, vaayo sucimpi upavaayati, asucimpi upavaayati, guuthagatampi upavaayati, muttagatampi upavaayati, khe.lagatampi upavaayati, pubbagatampi upavaayati, lohitagatampi upavaayati, na ca tena vaayo a.t.tiiyati vaa haraayati vaa jigucchati vaa; evameva kho tva.m, raahula, vaayosama.m bhaavana.m bhaavehi. vaayosama~nhi te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato uppannaa manaapaamanaapaa phassaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya ^a^T2.0140^ea^ .thassanti.

[03] ``aakaasasama.m, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavehi. aakaasasama~nhi te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato uppannaa manaapaamanaapaa phassaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya .thassanti. seyyathaapi, raahula, aakaaso na katthaci pati.t.thito; evameva kho tva.m, raahula, aakaasasama.m bhaavana.m bhaavehi. aakaasasama~nhi te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato uppannaa manaapaamanaapaa phassaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya .thassanti.

[03] 120^b^.^eb^ ``metta.m, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavehi. metta~nhi te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato yo byaapaado ^a^V2.0095^ea^ so pahiiyissati. karu.na.m, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavehi. karu.na~nhi te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato yaa vihesaa saa pahiiyissati. mudita.m, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavehi. mudita~nhi te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato yaa arati saa pahiiyissati. upekkha.m ^a^M2.0088^ea^, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavehi. upekkha~nhi te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato yo pa.tigho so pahiiyissati. asubha.m, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavehi. asubha~nhi te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato yo raago so pahiiyissati. aniccasa~n~na.m, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavehi. aniccasa~n~na~nhi ^a^P1.0425^ea^ te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato yo asmimaano so pahiiyissati.

[03] 121^b^.^eb^ ``aanaapaanassati.m, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavehi. aanaapaanassati hi te, raahula, bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa. katha.m bhaavitaa ca, raahula, aanaapaanassati, katha.m bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa ^a^T2.0141^ea^? idha, raahula, bhikkhu ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so satova assasati satova {sato (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} passasati.

[03] ``diigha.m vaa assasanto `diigha.m assasaamii'ti pajaanaati, diigha.m vaa passasanto `diigha.m passasaamii'ti pajaanaati; rassa.m vaa assasanto `rassa.m assasaamii'ti pajaanaati, rassa.m vaa passasanto `rassa.m passasaamii'ti pajaanaati. `sabbakaayappa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `sabbakaayappa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `passambhaya.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `passambhaya.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati.

[03] ```piitippa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `piitippa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `sukhappa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `sukhappa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `cittasa"nkhaarappa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `cittasa"nkhaarappa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `passambhaya.m cittasa"nkhaara.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `passambhaya.m cittasa"nkhaara.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati.

[03] ```cittappa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `cittappa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati ^a^V2.0096^ea^; `abhippamodaya.m citta.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `abhippamodaya.m citta.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `samaadaha.m citta.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `samaadaha.m citta.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `vimocaya.m citta.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `vimocaya.m citta.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati.

[03] ```aniccaanupassii ^a^M2.0089^ea^ assasissaamii'ti ^a^T2.0142^ea^ sikkhati; `aniccaanupassii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `viraagaanupassii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `viraagaanupassii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `nirodhaanupassii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `nirodhaanupassii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `pa.tinissaggaanupassii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati; `pa.tinissaggaanupassii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati.

[03] ``eva.m bhaavitaa kho, raahula, aanaapaanassati, eva.m bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa. eva.m bhaavitaaya, raahula, aanaapaanassatiyaa, eva.m ^a^P1.0426^ea^ bahuliikataaya yepi te carimakaa assaasaa tepi viditaava nirujjhanti no aviditaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa raahulo bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] mahaaraahulovaadasutta.m ni.t.thita.m dutiya.m.

[03] 122^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0143^ea^ ^a^V2.0097^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho aayasmato maalukyaputtassa {maalu"nkyaputtassa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``yaanimaani di.t.thigataani bhagavataa abyaakataani .thapitaani pa.tikkhittaani -- `sassato loko'tipi, `asassato loko'tipi, `antavaa loko'tipi, `anantavaa loko'tipi, `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'ntipi, `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'ntipi, `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi, `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi, `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi, `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi -- taani me bhagavaa na byaakaroti. yaani me bhagavaa na byaakaroti ta.m me na ruccati, ta.m me nakkhamati. soha.m bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m pucchissaami. sace me bhagavaa byaakarissati -- `sassato loko'ti vaa `asassato loko'ti vaa...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa -- evaaha.m bhagavati brahmacariya.m ^a^M2.0090^ea^ carissaami; no ce me bhagavaa byaakarissati -- `sassato loko'ti vaa `asassato loko'ti vaa...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato ^a^T2.0144^ea^ para.m mara.naa'ti vaa -- evaaha.m sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattissaamii''ti.

[03] 123^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P1.0427^ea^ kho aayasmaa maalukyaputto saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa maalukyaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] 124^b^.^eb^ ``idha mayha.m, bhante, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- yaanimaani di.t.thigataani bhagavataa abyaakataani .thapitaani pa.tikkhittaani -- `sassato loko'tipi, `asassato loko'tipi...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi -- taani me bhagavaa na byaakaroti. yaani me bhagavaa na byaakaroti ta.m me ^a^V2.0098^ea^ na ruccati, ta.m me nakkhamati. soha.m bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m pucchissaami. sace me bhagavaa byaakarissati -- `sassato loko'ti vaa, `asassato loko'ti vaa...pe0... ^a^T2.0145^ea^ `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa -- evaaha.m bhagavati, brahmacariya.m carissaami. no ce me bhagavaa byaakarissati -- `sassato loko'ti vaa, `asassato loko'ti vaa...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa -- evaaha.m sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattissaamiiti. sace bhagavaa jaanaati -- `sassato loko'ti, `sassato loko'ti me bhagavaa byaakarotu; sace bhagavaa jaanaati -- `asassato loko'ti, `asassato loko'ti me bhagavaa byaakarotu. no ce bhagavaa jaanaati -- `sassato loko'ti vaa, `asassato loko'ti vaa, ajaanato kho pana apassato etadeva ujuka.m hoti yadida.m -- `na jaanaami, na passaamii'ti. sace bhagavaa jaanaati -- `antavaa loko'ti, `anantavaa loko'ti me bhagavaa byaakarotu; sace bhagavaa jaanaati -- `anantavaa loko'ti, `anantavaa loko'ti me bhagavaa byaakarotu. no ce bhagavaa jaanaati -- `antavaa loko'ti vaa, `anantavaa loko'ti vaa, ajaanato kho pana apassato etadeva ^a^M2.0091^ea^ ujuka.m hoti yadida.m -- `na jaanaami, na passaamii'ti. sace bhagavaa jaanaati -- `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti, `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti me bhagavaa byaakarotu; sace bhagavaa jaanaati -- `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti, `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti me bhagavaa byaakarotu. no ce bhagavaa jaanaati -- `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti vaa, `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti vaa, ajaanato kho pana apassato etadeva ujuka.m hoti yadida.m -- `na ^a^T2.0146^ea^ jaanaami, na passaamii'ti. sace bhagavaa jaanaati -- `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti, `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti me bhagavaa ^a^P1.0428^ea^ byaakarotu; sace bhagavaa jaanaati -- `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti, `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti me bhagavaa byaakarotu. no ce bhagavaa jaanaati -- `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, ajaanato kho pana apassato etadeva ujuka.m hoti yadida.m -- `na jaanaami na passaamii'ti. sace bhagavaa jaanaati -- `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti, `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti me bhagavaa byaakarotu; sace bhagavaa jaanaati -- `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti, `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti me bhagavaa byaakarotu. no ce bhagavaa jaanaati -- `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `neva hoti na ^a^V2.0099^ea^ na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, ajaanato kho pana apassato etadeva ujuka.m hoti yadida.m -- `na jaanaami, na passaamii'''ti.

[03] 125^b^.^eb^ ``ki.m nu {ki.m nu kho (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} taaha.m, maalukyaputta, eva.m avaca.m -- `ehi tva.m, maalukyaputta, mayi brahmacariya.m cara, aha.m te byaakarissaami -- `sassato loko'ti vaa, `asassato loko'ti vaa, `antavaa loko'ti vaa, `anantavaa loko'ti vaa, `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti vaa, `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti vaa, `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `na hoti ^a^T2.0147^ea^ tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``tva.m vaa pana ma.m eva.m avaca -- aha.m, bhante, bhagavati brahmacariya.m carissaami ^a^M2.0092^ea^, bhagavaa me byaakarissati -- `sassato loko'ti vaa, `asassato loko'ti vaa, `antavaa loko'ti vaa, `anantavaa loko'ti vaa, `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti vaa, `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti vaa, `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``iti kira, maalukyaputta, nevaaha.m ta.m vadaami -- ehi tva.m, maalukyaputta, mayi brahmacariya.m cara, aha.m te byaakarissaami -- `sassato loko'ti vaa, `asassato loko'ti vaa...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa'ti; napi kira ma.m tva.m vadesi -- aha.m, bhante, bhagavati brahmacariya.m carissaami, bhagavaa me byaakarissati -- `sassato loko'ti vaa `asassato loko'ti vaa...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa''ti. eva.m sante, moghapurisa, ko santo ka.m paccaacikkhasi?

[03] 126^b^.^eb^ ``yo kho, maalukyaputta, eva.m vadeyya -- `na taavaaha.m bhagavati brahmacariya.m carissaami yaava me bhagavaa na byaakarissati -- ``sassato loko''ti vaa, ``asassato loko''ti vaa...pe0... ^a^T2.0148^ea^ ``neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti vaati, abyaakatameva ^a^P1.0429^ea^ ta.m, maalukyaputta, tathaagatena assa, atha so puggalo kaala.m kareyya. seyyathaapi, maalukyaputta, puriso sallena viddho assa savisena gaa.lhapalepanena. tassa mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa bhisakka.m sallakatta.m upa.t.thapeyyu.m. so eva.m vadeyya -- `na taavaaha.m ima.m ^a^V2.0100^ea^ salla.m aaharissaami yaava na ta.m purisa.m jaanaami yenamhi viddho, khattiyo vaa braahma.no vaa vesso vaa suddo vaa'ti; so eva.m vadeyya -- `na taavaaha.m ima.m salla.m aaharissaami yaava na ta.m purisa.m jaanaami yenamhi viddho, eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto iti vaa'ti; so eva.m vadeyya -- `na taavaaha.m ima.m salla.m aaharissaami yaava na ta.m purisa.m jaanaami yenamhi viddho, diigho vaa rasso vaa majjhimo vaa'ti; so eva.m vadeyya -- `na taavaaha.m ima.m salla.m aaharissaami yaava na ta.m purisa.m jaanaami yenamhi viddho, kaa.lo vaa saamo vaa ma"nguracchavii vaa'ti; so eva.m vadeyya -- `na taavaaha.m ima.m salla.m aaharissaami yaava na ta.m purisa.m jaanaami yenamhi viddho, amukasmi.m gaame ^a^M2.0093^ea^ vaa nigame vaa nagare vaa'ti; so eva.m vadeyya -- `na taavaaha.m ima.m salla.m aaharissaami yaava na ta.m dhanu.m jaanaami yenamhi viddho, yadi vaa caapo yadi vaa koda.n.do'ti; so eva.m vadeyya -- `na taavaaha.m ima.m salla.m aaharissaami yaava na ta.m jiya.m jaanaami yaayamhi viddho ^a^T2.0149^ea^, yadi vaa akkassa yadi vaa sa.nhassa {sa.n.thassa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} yadi vaa nhaarussa yadi vaa maruvaaya yadi vaa khiirapa.n.nino'ti; so eva.m vadeyya -- `na taavaaha.m ima.m salla.m aaharissaami yaava na ta.m ka.n.da.m jaanaami yenamhi viddho, yadi vaa gaccha.m yadi vaa ropima'nti; so eva.m vadeyya -- `na taavaaha.m ima.m salla.m aaharissaami yaava na ta.m ka.n.da.m jaanaami yenamhi viddho, yassa pattehi vaajita.m {vaakhitta.m (ka0)} yadi vaa gijjhassa yadi vaa ka"nkassa yadi vaa kulalassa yadi vaa morassa yadi vaa sithilahanuno'ti; so eva.m vadeyya -- `na taavaaha.m ima.m salla.m aaharissaami yaava na ta.m ka.n.da.m jaanaami yenamhi viddho, yassa nhaarunaa parikkhitta.m yadi vaa gavassa yadi vaa mahi.msassa yadi vaa bheravassa {roruvassa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} yadi vaa semhaarassaa'ti; so eva.m vadeyya -- `na taavaaha.m ima.m salla.m aaharissaami yaava na ta.m salla.m jaanaami yenamhi viddho, yadi vaa salla.m yadi vaa khurappa.m yadi vaa veka.n.da.m yadi vaa naaraaca.m yadi vaa vacchadanta.m yadi vaa karaviirapatta'nti ^a^P1.0430^ea^ -- a~n~naatameva ta.m, maalukyaputta, tena purisena assa, atha so puriso kaala.m kareyya. evameva kho, maalukyaputta, yo eva.m vadeyya -- `na taavaaha.m bhagavati brahmacariya.m carissaami yaava me bhagavaa na byaakarissati -- ``sassato loko''ti vaa ``asassato loko''ti ^a^T2.0150^ea^ vaa...pe0... ``neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti vaati -- abyaakatameva ta.m, maalukyaputta, tathaagatena assa, atha so puggalo kaala"nkareyya.

[03] 127^b^.^eb^ ```sassato loko'ti, maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati brahmacariyavaaso abhavissaati ^a^V2.0101^ea^, eva.m `no asassato loko'ti, maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati brahmacariyavaaso abhavissaati, evampi `no sassato loko'ti vaa, maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati, `asassato loko'ti vaa di.t.thiyaa sati attheva jaati, atthi jaraa, atthi mara.na.m, santi sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa; yesaaha.m di.t.theva dhamme nighaata.m pa~n~napemi ^a^M2.0094^ea^. `antavaa loko'ti, maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati brahmacariyavaaso abhavissaati, eva.m `no anantavaa loko'ti, maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati brahmacariyavaaso abhavissaati, evampi `no antavaa loko'ti vaa, maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati, `anantavaa loko'ti vaa di.t.thiyaa sati attheva jaati, atthi jaraa, atthi mara.na.m, santi sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa; yesaaha.m di.t.theva dhamme nighaata.m pa~n~napemi. `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti, maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati brahmacariyavaaso ^a^T2.0151^ea^ abhavissaati, eva.m `no a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti, maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati brahmacariyavaaso abhavissaati, evampi `no ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti vaa, maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati, `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti vaa di.t.thiyaa sati attheva jaati...pe0... nighaata.m pa~n~napemi. `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti, maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati brahmacariyavaaso abhavissaati, eva.m `no na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti, maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati brahmacariyavaaso abhavissaati, evampi `no hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati, `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa di.t.thiyaa sati attheva jaati...pe0... ^a^P1.0431^ea^ yesaaha.m di.t.theva dhamme nighaata.m pa~n~napemi. `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti, maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati brahmacariyavaaso abhavissaati, eva.m `no neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti, maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati brahmacariyavaaso abhavissaati, evampi `no hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti, maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati, `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa di.t.thiyaa sati attheva jaati...pe0... yesaaha.m di.t.theva dhamme nighaata.m pa~n~napemi.

[03] 128^b^.^eb^ ``tasmaatiha, maalukyaputta, abyaakata~nca me abyaakatato ^a^T2.0152^ea^ dhaaretha; byaakata~nca me byaakatato dhaaretha. ki~nca, maalukyaputta, mayaa abyaakata.m? `sassato loko'ti maalukyaputta, mayaa abyaakata.m; `asassato loko'ti -- mayaa abyaakata.m; `antavaa loko'ti -- mayaa abyaakata.m; `anantavaa loko'ti -- mayaa abyaakata.m; `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti ^a^V2.0102^ea^ -- mayaa abyaakata.m; `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti -- mayaa abyaakata.m; `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti -- mayaa abyaakata.m; `na hoti tathaagato para.m ^a^M2.0095^ea^ mara.naa'ti -- mayaa abyaakata.m; `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti -- mayaa abyaakata.m; `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti -- mayaa abyaakata.m. kasmaa ceta.m, maalukyaputta, mayaa abyaakata.m? na heta.m, maalukyaputta, atthasa.mhita.m na aadibrahmacariyaka.m na {neta.m (sii0)} nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. tasmaa ta.m mayaa abyaakata.m. ki~nca, maalukyaputta, mayaa byaakata.m? `ida.m dukkha'nti, maalukyaputta, mayaa byaakata.m; `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti -- mayaa byaakata.m; `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti -- mayaa byaakata.m; `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti -- mayaa byaakata.m. kasmaa ceta.m, maalukyaputta, mayaa byaakata.m? eta~nhi, maalukyaputta, atthasa.mhita.m eta.m aadibrahmacariyaka.m nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. tasmaa ta.m mayaa byaakata.m. tasmaatiha, maalukyaputta ^a^P1.0432^ea^, abyaakata~nca me ^a^T2.0153^ea^ abyaakatato dhaaretha; byaakata~nca me byaakatato dhaarethaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa maalukyaputto bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] cuu.lamaalukyasutta.m ni.t.thita.m tatiya.m.

[03] 129^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0154^ea^ ^a^V2.0103^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``dhaaretha no tumhe, bhikkhave, mayaa desitaani pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaanii''ti?

[03] eva.m vutte, aayasmaa maalukyaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aha.m kho, bhante, dhaaremi bhagavataa desitaani pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaanii''ti. ``yathaa katha.m pana tva.m, maalukyaputta, dhaaresi mayaa desitaani pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaanii''ti? ``sakkaayadi.t.thi.m kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa orambhaagiya.m ^a^M2.0096^ea^ sa.myojana.m desita.m dhaaremi; vicikiccha.m kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa orambhaagiya.m sa.myojana.m desita.m dhaaremi; siilabbataparaamaasa.m kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa orambhaagiya.m sa.myojana.m desita.m dhaaremi; kaamacchanda.m kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa orambhaagiya.m sa.myojana.m desita.m dhaaremi; byaapaada.m kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa orambhaagiya.m sa.myojana.m desita.m dhaaremi. eva.m kho aha.m, bhante, dhaaremi bhagavataa desitaani pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaanii''ti.

[03] ``kassa kho naama tva.m, maalukyaputta, imaani eva.m pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani desitaani dhaaresi? nanu, maalukyaputta ^a^T2.0155^ea^, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa iminaa taru.nuupamena upaarambhena upaarambhissanti? daharassa hi, maalukyaputta, kumaarassa mandassa uttaanaseyyakassa sakkaayotipi na hoti, kuto ^a^P1.0433^ea^ panassa uppajjissati sakkaayadi.t.thi? anusetvevassa {anuseti tvevassa (sii0 pii0)} sakkaayadi.t.thaanusayo. daharassa hi, maalukyaputta, kumaarassa mandassa uttaanaseyyakassa dhammaatipi na hoti, kuto panassa uppajjissati dhammesu vicikicchaa? anusetvevassa vicikicchaanusayo. daharassa hi, maalukyaputta, kumaarassa mandassa uttaanaseyyakassa siilaatipi na hoti, kuto panassa uppajjissati siilesu siilabbataparaamaaso? anusetvevassa siilabbataparaamaasaanusayo ^a^V2.0104^ea^. daharassa hi, maalukyaputta, kumaarassa mandassa uttaanaseyyakassa kaamaatipi na hoti, kuto panassa uppajjissati kaamesu kaamacchando? anusetvevassa kaamaraagaanusayo. daharassa hi, maalukyaputta, kumaarassa mandassa uttaanaseyyakassa sattaatipi na hoti, kuto panassa uppajjissati sattesu byaapaado? anusetvevassa byaapaadaanusayo. nanu, maalukyaputta, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa iminaa taru.nuupamena upaarambhena upaarambhissantii''ti? eva.m vutte, aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``etassa, bhagavaa, kaalo, etassa, sugata, kaalo ya.m bhagavaa pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani deseyya. bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti. ``tena haananda, su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa ^a^T2.0156^ea^ aanando bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 130^b^.^eb^ ``idhaananda ^a^M2.0097^ea^, assutavaa puthujjano ariyaana.m adassaavii ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme aviniito, sappurisaana.m adassaavii sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme aviniito sakkaayadi.t.thipariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati sakkaayadi.t.thiparetena; uppannaaya ca sakkaayadi.t.thiyaa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. tassa saa sakkaayadi.t.thi thaamagataa appa.tiviniitaa orambhaagiya.m sa.myojana.m. vicikicchaapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati vicikicchaaparetena; uppannaaya ca vicikicchaaya nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. tassa saa vicikicchaa thaamagataa appa.tiviniitaa orambhaagiya.m sa.myojana.m. siilabbataparaamaasapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati siilabbataparaamaasaparetena; uppannassa ca siilabbataparaamaasassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. tassa so siilabbataparaamaaso thaamagato appa.tiviniito orambhaagiya.m sa.myojana.m. kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati kaamaraagaparetena ^a^P1.0434^ea^; uppannassa ca kaamaraagassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. tassa so kaamaraago thaamagato appa.tiviniito orambhaagiya.m sa.myojana.m. byaapaadapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati byaapaadaparetena; uppannassa ca byaapaadassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. tassa so byaapaado thaamagato appa.tiviniito orambhaagiya.m sa.myojana.m.

[03] 131^b^.^eb^ ``sutavaa ca kho, aananda, ariyasaavako ^a^T2.0157^ea^ ariyaana.m dassaavii ariyadhammassa kovido ^a^V2.0105^ea^ ariyadhamme suviniito, sappurisaana.m dassaavii sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suviniito na sakkaayadi.t.thipariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati na sakkaayadi.t.thiparetena; uppannaaya ca sakkaayadi.t.thiyaa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tassa saa sakkaayadi.t.thi saanusayaa pahiiyati. na vicikicchaapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati na vicikicchaaparetena; uppannaaya ca vicikicchaaya nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tassa saa vicikicchaa saanusayaa pahiiyati. na siilabbataparaamaasapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati na siilabbataparaamaasaparetena; uppannassa ca siilabbataparaamaasassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tassa so siilabbataparaamaaso saanusayo pahiiyati. na kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati na kaamaraagaparetena; uppannassa ca kaamaraagassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tassa so kaamaraago saanusayo pahiiyati ^a^M2.0098^ea^. na byaapaadapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati na byaapaadaparetena; uppannassa ca byaapaadassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tassa so byaapaado saanusayo pahiiyati.

[03] 132^b^.^eb^ ``yo, aananda, maggo yaa pa.tipadaa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya ta.m magga.m ta.m pa.tipada.m anaagamma pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani ~nassati vaa dakkhati vaa pajahissati vaati -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. seyyathaapi, aananda, mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato ^a^T2.0158^ea^ saaravato taca.m acchetvaa pheggu.m acchetvaa saaracchedo bhavissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati; evameva kho, aananda, yo maggo yaa pa.tipadaa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya ta.m magga.m ta.m pa.tipada.m anaagamma pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani ~nassati vaa dakkhati vaa pajahissati vaati -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ``yo ca kho, aananda, maggo yaa pa.tipadaa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya ta.m ^a^P1.0435^ea^ magga.m ta.m pa.tipada.m aagamma pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani ~nassati vaa dakkhati vaa pajahissati vaati -- .thaanameta.m vijjati. seyyathaapi, aananda, mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato taca.m chetvaa pheggu.m chetvaa saaracchedo bhavissatiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati; evameva kho, aananda, yo maggo yaa pa.tipadaa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya ta.m magga.m ta.m pa.tipada.m aagamma pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani ~nassati vaa dakkhati vaa pajahissati vaati -- .thaanameta.m vijjati. seyyathaapi, aananda, ga"ngaa nadii puuraa udakassa samatittikaa ^a^V2.0106^ea^ kaakapeyyaa. atha dubbalako puriso aagaccheyya -- `aha.m imissaa ga"ngaaya nadiyaa tiriya.m baahaaya sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m gacchissaamii'ti {gacchaamiiti (sii0 pii0)}; so na sakku.neyya ga"ngaaya nadiyaa tiriya.m baahaaya sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m gantu.m. evameva kho, aananda, yesa.m kesa~nci {yassa kassaci (sabbattha)} sakkaayanirodhaaya dhamme desiyamaane citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati; seyyathaapi ^a^T2.0159^ea^ so dubbalako puriso evamete da.t.thabbaa. seyyathaapi, aananda, ga"ngaa nadii puuraa udakassa samatittikaa kaakapeyyaa. atha balavaa puriso aagaccheyya -- `aha.m imissaa ga"ngaaya nadiyaa tiriya.m baahaaya ^a^M2.0099^ea^ sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m gacchissaamii'ti; so sakku.neyya ga"ngaaya nadiyaa tiriya.m baahaaya sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m gantu.m. evameva kho, aananda, yesa.m kesa~nci sakkaayanirodhaaya dhamme desiyamaane citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati; seyyathaapi so balavaa puriso evamete da.t.thabbaa.

[03] 133^b^.^eb^ ``katamo caananda, maggo, katamaa pa.tipadaa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya? idhaananda, bhikkhu upadhivivekaa akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaa sabbaso kaayadu.t.thullaana.m pa.tippassaddhiyaa vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so yadeva tattha hoti ruupagata.m vedanaagata.m sa~n~naagata.m sa"nkhaaragata.m vi~n~naa.nagata.m te dhamme aniccato dukkhato rogato ga.n.dato sallato aghato aabaadhato parato palokato su~n~nato anattato samanupassati. so tehi dhammehi citta.m pa.tivaapeti {pa.tipaapeti (syaa0), pati.t.thaapeti (ka0)}. so tehi dhammehi citta.m pa.tivaapetvaa amataaya dhaatuyaa ^a^P1.0436^ea^ citta.m upasa.mharati -- `eta.m santa.m eta.m pa.niita.m yadida.m sabbasa"nkhaarasamatho sabbuupadhipa.tinissaggo ^a^T2.0160^ea^ ta.nhaakkhayo viraago nirodho nibbaana'nti. so tattha .thito aasavaana.m khaya.m paapu.naati; no ce aasavaana.m khaya.m paapu.naati teneva dhammaraagena taaya dhammanandiyaa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatiko hoti, tattha parinibbaayii, anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa. ayampi kho, aananda, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... ^a^T2.0161^ea^ dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati... ^a^V2.0107^ea^ tatiya.m jhaana.m... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so yadeva tattha hoti ruupagata.m vedanaagata.m sa~n~naagata.m sa"nkhaaragata.m vi~n~naa.nagata.m... anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa. ayampi kho, aananda, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, bhikkhu sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. so yadeva tattha hoti vedanaagata.m ^a^M2.0100^ea^ sa~n~naagata.m sa"nkhaaragata.m vi~n~naa.nagata.m...pe0... ^a^T2.0162^ea^ anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa. ayampi kho, aananda, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, bhikkhu sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. so yadeva tattha hoti vedanaagata.m sa~n~naagata.m sa"nkhaaragata.m vi~n~naa.nagata.m...pe0... ^a^V2.0108^ea^ anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa. ayampi kho, aananda, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, bhikkhu sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. so yadeva tattha hoti vedanaagata.m sa~n~naagata.m sa"nkhaaragata.m vi~n~naa.nagata.m...pe0... ^a^P1.0437^ea^ anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa. ayampi kho, aananda, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaayaa''ti.

[03] ``eso ce, bhante, maggo esaa pa.tipadaa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya, atha ki~ncarahi idhekacce bhikkhuu cetovimuttino ekacce bhikkhuu pa~n~naavimuttino''ti? ``ettha kho panesaaha.m {ettha kho tesaaha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, aananda, indriyavemattata.m vadaamii''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa aanando bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] mahaamaalukyasutta.m ni.t.thita.m catuttha.m.

[03] 134^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0163^ea^ ^a^V2.0109^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``aha.m kho, bhikkhave, ekaasanabhojana.m bhu~njaami; ekaasanabhojana.m kho, aha.m, bhikkhave, bhu~njamaano appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaanaami ^a^M2.0101^ea^ appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca phaasuvihaara~nca. etha, tumhepi, bhikkhave, ekaasanabhojana.m bhu~njatha; ekaasanabhojana.m kho, bhikkhave, tumhepi bhu~njamaanaa appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaanissatha appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca phaasuvihaara~ncaa''ti. eva.m vutte, aayasmaa bhaddaali bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aha.m kho, bhante, na ussahaami ekaasanabhojana.m bhu~njitu.m; ekaasanabhojana~nhi me, bhante, bhu~njato siyaa kukkucca.m, siyaa vippa.tisaaro''ti. ``tena hi tva.m, bhaddaali, yattha nimantito assasi tattha ekadesa.m bhu~njitvaa ekadesa.m niiharitvaapi bhu~njeyyaasi. evampi kho ^a^P1.0438^ea^ tva.m, bhaddaali, bhu~njamaano ekaasano yaapessasii''ti {bhu~njamaano yaapessasiiti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. ``evampi kho aha.m, bhante, na ussahaami bhu~njitu.m; evampi hi me, bhante, bhu~njato siyaa kukkucca.m, siyaa vippa.tisaaro''ti. atha kho aayasmaa bhaddaali bhagavataa sikkhaapade pa~n~naapiyamaane bhikkhusa"nghe sikkha.m samaadiyamaane anussaaha.m pavedesi. atha ^a^T2.0164^ea^ kho aayasmaa bhaddaali sabba.m ta.m temaasa.m na bhagavato sammukhiibhaava.m adaasi, yathaa ta.m satthusaasane sikkhaaya aparipuurakaarii.

[03] 135^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu bhagavato ciivarakamma.m karonti -- ni.t.thitaciivaro bhagavaa temaasaccayena caarika.m pakkamissatiiti. atha kho aayasmaa bhaddaali yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa tehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m bhaddaali.m te bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``ida.m kho, aavuso bhaddaali, bhagavato ciivarakamma.m kariiyati {kara.niiya.m (ka0)}. ni.t.thitaciivaro bhagavaa temaasaccayena caarika.m pakkamissati. i"nghaavuso bhaddaali, eta.m dosaka.m saadhuka.m manasi karohi, maa te pacchaa dukkaratara.m ahosii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa ^a^V2.0110^ea^ bhaddaali tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa bhaddaali bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``accayo ma.m, bhante, accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m, yoha.m bhagavataa sikkhaapade pa~n~naapiyamaane bhikkhusa"nghe sikkha.m samaadiyamaane anussaaha.m pavedesi.m. tassa me, bhante, bhagavaa accaya.m accayato pa.tigga.nhaatu aayati.m sa.mvaraayaa''ti.

[03] ``taggha ^a^M2.0102^ea^ tva.m, bhaddaali, accayo accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m ^a^T2.0165^ea^ yathaaakusala.m, ya.m tva.m mayaa sikkhaapade pa~n~naapiyamaane bhikkhusa"nghe sikkha.m samaadiyamaane anussaaha.m pavedesi. samayopi kho te, bhaddaali, appa.tividdho ahosi -- `bhagavaa kho saavatthiya.m viharati, bhagavaapi ma.m jaanissati -- bhaddaali naama bhikkhu satthusaasane sikkhaaya aparipuurakaarii'ti. ayampi kho te, bhaddaali, samayo appa.tividdho ahosi. samayopi kho te, bhaddaali, appa.tividdho ahosi -- `sambahulaa kho ^a^P1.0439^ea^ bhikkhu saavatthiya.m vassa.m upagataa, tepi ma.m jaanissanti -- bhaddaali naama bhikkhu satthusaasane sikkhaaya aparipuurakaarii'ti. ayampi kho te, bhaddaali, samayo appa.tividdho ahosi. samayopi kho te, bhaddaali, appa.tividdho ahosi -- `sambahulaa kho bhikkhuniyo saavatthiya.m vassa.m upagataa, taapi ma.m jaanissanti -- bhaddaali naama bhikkhu satthusaasane sikkhaaya aparipuurakaarii'ti. ayampi kho te, bhaddaali, samayo appa.tividdho ahosi. samayopi kho te, bhaddaali, appa.tividdho ahosi -- `sambahulaa kho upaasakaa saavatthiya.m pa.tivasanti, tepi ma.m jaanissanti -- bhaddaali naama bhikkhu satthusaasane sikkhaaya aparipuurakaarii'ti. ayampi kho te, bhaddaali, samayo appa.tividdho ahosi. samayopi kho te, bhaddaali, appa.tividdho ahosi -- `sambahulaa kho upaasikaa saavatthiya.m pa.tivasanti, taapi ma.m jaanissanti -- bhaddaali naama bhikkhu satthusaasane sikkhaaya aparipuurakaarii'ti. ayampi kho te, bhaddaali ^a^T2.0166^ea^, samayo appa.tividdho ahosi. samayopi kho te, bhaddaali, appa.tividdho ahosi -- `sambahulaa kho naanaatitthiyaa sama.nabraahma.naa saavatthiya.m vassa.m upagataa, tepi ma.m jaanissanti -- bhaddaali naama bhikkhu sama.nassa gotamassa saavako thera~n~nataro bhikkhu saasane sikkhaaya aparipuurakaarii'ti. ayampi kho te, bhaddaali, samayo appa.tividdho ahosii''ti.

[03] ``accayo ^a^V2.0111^ea^ ma.m, bhante, accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m, yoha.m bhagavataa sikkhaapade pa~n~naapiyamaane bhikkhusa"nghe sikkha.m samaadiyamaane anussaaha.m pavedesi.m. tassa me, bhante, bhagavaa accaya.m accayato pa.tigga.nhaatu aayati.m sa.mvaraayaa''ti. ``taggha tva.m, bhaddaali, accayo accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m, ya.m tva.m mayaa sikkhaapade ^a^M2.0103^ea^ pa~n~naapiyamaane bhikkhusa"nghe sikkha.m samaadiyamaane anussaaha.m pavedesi''.

[03] 136^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, bhaddaali, idhassa bhikkhu ubhatobhaagavimutto, tamaha.m eva.m vadeyya.m -- `ehi me tva.m, bhikkhu, pa"nke sa"nkamo hohii'ti, api nu kho so sa"nkameyya vaa a~n~nena vaa kaaya.m sannaameyya, `no'ti vaa vadeyyaa''ti?
[03] ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, bhaddaali, idhassa bhikkhu pa~n~naavimutto... kaayasakkhi... di.t.thippatto... saddhaavimutto... dhammaanusaarii... saddhaanusaarii, tamaha.m eva.m vadeyya.m -- `ehi me tva.m, bhikkhu, pa"nke sa"nkamo hohii'ti, api nu kho so sa"nkameyya vaa a~n~nena vaa kaaya.m sannaameyya, `no'ti vaa vadeyyaa''ti?
[03] ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ^a^T2.0167^ea^ ma~n~nasi, bhaddaali, api nu tva.m, bhaddaali, tasmi.m samaye ubhatobhaagavimutto vaa hosi pa~n~naavimutto ^a^P1.0440^ea^ vaa kaayasakkhi vaa di.t.thippatto vaa saddhaavimutto vaa dhammaanusaarii vaa saddhaanusaarii vaa''ti?
[03] ``no heta.m, bhante''.
[03] ``nanu tva.m, bhaddaali, tasmi.m samaye ritto tuccho aparaddho''ti?

[03] ``eva.m ^a^V2.0112^ea^, bhante. accayo ma.m, bhante, accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m, yoha.m bhagavataa sikkhaapade pa~n~naapiyamaane bhikkhusa"nghe sikkha.m samaadiyamaane anussaaha.m pavedesi.m. tassa me, bhante, bhagavaa accaya.m accayato pa.tigga.nhaatu aayati.m sa.mvaraayaa''ti. ``taggha tva.m, bhaddaali, accayo accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m, ya.m tva.m mayaa sikkhaapade pa~n~naapiyamaane bhikkhusa"nghe sikkha.m samaadiyamaane anussaaha.m pavedesi. yato ca kho tva.m, bhaddaali, accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m pa.tikarosi, ta.m te maya.m pa.tigga.nhaama. vuddhihesaa, bhaddaali, ariyassa vinaye yo accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m pa.tikaroti, aayati.m sa.mvara.m aapajjati''.

[03] 137^b^.^eb^ ``idha, bhaddaali, ekacco bhikkhu satthusaasane sikkhaaya aparipuurakaarii hoti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajeyya.m ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m ^a^T2.0168^ea^ palaalapu~nja.m. appeva naamaaha.m uttari {uttari.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m sacchikareyya'nti. so vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m ^a^M2.0104^ea^ kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja.m. tassa tathaavuupaka.t.thassa viharato satthaapi upavadati, anuviccapi vi~n~nuu sabrahmacaarii upavadanti, devataapi upavadanti, attaapi attaana.m upavadati. so satthaaraapi upavadito, anuviccapi vi~n~nuuhi sabrahmacaariihi upavadito, devataahipi upavadito, attanaapi attaana.m upavadito na uttari manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m sacchikaroti. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nhi ta.m, bhaddaali, hoti yathaa ta.m satthusaasane sikkhaaya aparipuurakaarissa.

[03] 138^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, bhaddaali, ekacco bhikkhu satthusaasane sikkhaaya paripuurakaarii hoti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajeyya.m ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m ^a^P1.0441^ea^ palaalapu~nja.m. appeva naamaaha.m uttari manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m sacchikareyya'nti. so vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja.m. tassa tathaavuupaka.t.thassa viharato satthaapi na upavadati, anuviccapi vi~n~nuu sabrahmacaarii na upavadanti, devataapi na upavadanti, attaapi attaana.m na upavadati. so satthaaraapi anupavadito ^a^V2.0113^ea^, anuviccapi vi~n~nuuhi sabrahmacaariihi anupavadito, devataahipi anupavadito, attanaapi attaana.m anupavadito uttari manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m sacchikaroti. so vivicceva kaamehi vivicca ^a^T2.0169^ea^ akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nhi ta.m, bhaddaali, hoti yathaa ta.m satthusaasane sikkhaaya paripuurakaarissa.

[03] 139^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhaddaali, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nhi ta.m, bhaddaali, hoti yathaa ta.m satthusaasane sikkhaaya paripuurakaarissa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhaddaali, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati, sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m ^a^M2.0105^ea^ upasampajja viharati. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nhi ta.m, bhaddaali, hoti yathaa ta.m satthusaasane sikkhaaya paripuurakaarissa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhaddaali, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nhi ta.m, bhaddaali, hoti yathaa ta.m satthusaasane sikkhaaya paripuurakaarissa.

[03] ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nhi ^a^P1.0442^ea^ ta.m, bhaddaali, hoti yathaa ta.m satthusaasane sikkhaaya paripuurakaarissa.

[03] ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne ^a^T2.0170^ea^ vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte sattaana.m cutuupapaata~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati -- `ime vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa...pe0... vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa; ime vaa pana bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa...pe0... sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaa'ti iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nhi ta.m, bhaddaali, hoti yathaa ta.m satthusaasane sikkhaaya paripuurakaarissa.

[03] ``so ^a^V2.0114^ea^ eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte aasavaana.m khaya~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; `ime aasavaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m ^a^M2.0106^ea^ aasavasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tassa eva.m jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, avijjaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m ^a^T2.0171^ea^ brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nhi ta.m, bhaddaali, hoti yathaa ta.m satthusaasane sikkhaaya paripuurakaarissaa''ti.

[03] 140^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, aayasmaa bhaddaali bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacca.m bhikkhu.m pasayha pasayha {pavayha pavayha (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} kaara.na.m karonti? ko pana, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacca.m bhikkhu.m no tathaa pasayha pasayha kaara.na.m karontii''ti? ``idha, bhaddaali, ekacco bhikkhu abhi.nhaapattiko hoti aapattibahulo. so bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati, bahiddhaa katha.m apanaameti, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti, na sammaa vattati, na loma.m paateti, na netthaara.m vattati, `yena sa"ngho attamano hoti ta.m karomii'ti naaha. tatra, bhaddaali, bhikkhuuna.m eva.m hoti -- aya.m kho, aavuso, bhikkhu ^a^V2.0115^ea^ abhi.nhaapattiko aapattibahulo. so bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati, bahiddhaa katha.m apanaameti, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti, na sammaa vattati, na loma.m paateti, na netthaara.m vattati, `yena sa"ngho attamano hoti ^a^P1.0443^ea^ ta.m karomii'ti naaha. saadhu vataayasmanto imassa bhikkhuno tathaa tathaa upaparikkhatha yathaassida.m {yathayida.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} adhikara.na.m na khippameva vuupasameyyaati. tassa kho eva.m, bhaddaali, bhikkhuno bhikkhuu ^a^T2.0172^ea^ tathaa tathaa upaparikkhanti yathaassida.m adhikara.na.m na khippameva vuupasammati.

[03] 141^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, bhaddaali, ekacco bhikkhu abhi.nhaapattiko hoti aapattibahulo. so bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano naa~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati, bahiddhaa katha.m na apanaameti, na kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti, sammaa vattati, loma.m paateti, netthaara.m vattati, `yena sa"ngho attamano ^a^M2.0107^ea^ hoti ta.m karomii'ti aaha. tatra, bhaddaali, bhikkhuuna.m eva.m hoti -- aya.m kho, aavuso, bhikkhu abhi.nhaapattiko aapattibahulo. so bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano naa~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati, bahiddhaa katha.m na apanaameti, na kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti, sammaa vattati, loma.m paateti, netthaara.m vattati, `yena sa"ngho attamano hoti ta.m karomii'ti aaha. saadhu vataayasmanto, imassa bhikkhuno tathaa tathaa upaparikkhatha yathaassida.m adhikara.na.m khippameva vuupasameyyaati. tassa kho eva.m, bhaddaali, bhikkhuno bhikkhuu tathaa tathaa upaparikkhanti yathaassida.m adhikara.na.m khippameva vuupasammati.

[03] 142^b^.^eb^ ``idha, bhaddaali, ekacco bhikkhu adhiccaapattiko hoti anaapattibahulo. so bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati, bahiddhaa katha.m apanaameti, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti, na sammaa vattati, na loma.m paateti, na netthaara.m vattati, `yena sa"ngho attamano hoti ta.m karomii'ti naaha. tatra, bhaddaali, bhikkhuuna.m eva.m hoti -- aya.m kho, aavuso, bhikkhu adhiccaapattiko anaapattibahulo ^a^T2.0173^ea^. so bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati, bahiddhaa katha.m apanaameti, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti, na sammaa vattati, na loma.m paateti, na netthaara.m vattati, `yena sa"ngho attamano hoti ta.m karomii'ti naaha. saadhu vataayasmanto, imassa bhikkhuno tathaa tathaa upaparikkhatha yathaassida.m ^a^V2.0116^ea^ adhikara.na.m na khippameva vuupasameyyaati. tassa kho eva.m, bhaddaali, bhikkhuno bhikkhuu tathaa tathaa upaparikkhanti yathaassida.m adhikara.na.m ^a^P1.0444^ea^ na khippameva vuupasammati.

[03] 143^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, bhaddaali, ekacco bhikkhu adhiccaapattiko hoti anaapattibahulo. so bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano naa~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati, na bahiddhaa katha.m apanaameti, na kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti, sammaa vattati, loma.m paateti, netthaara.m vattati, `yena sa"ngho attamano hoti ta.m karomii'ti aaha. tatra, bhaddaali, bhikkhuuna.m eva.m hoti -- aya.m kho, aavuso, bhikkhu adhiccaapattiko anaapattibahulo. so bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano naa~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati, na bahiddhaa katha.m apanaameti, na kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti, sammaa vattati, loma.m paateti, netthaara.m vattati, `yena sa"ngho ^a^M2.0108^ea^ attamano hoti ta.m karomii'ti aaha. saadhu vataayasmanto, imassa bhikkhuno tathaa tathaa upaparikkhatha yathaassida.m adhikara.na.m khippameva vuupasameyyaati. tassa kho eva.m, bhaddaali, bhikkhuno bhikkhuu tathaa tathaa upaparikkhanti yathaassida.m adhikara.na.m khippameva vuupasammati.

[03] 144^b^.^eb^ ``idha ^a^T2.0174^ea^, bhaddaali, ekacco bhikkhu saddhaamattakena vahati pemamattakena. tatra, bhaddaali, bhikkhuuna.m eva.m hoti -- `aya.m kho, aavuso, bhikkhu saddhaamattakena vahati pemamattakena. sace maya.m ima.m bhikkhu.m pasayha pasayha kaara.na.m karissaama -- maa yampissa ta.m saddhaamattaka.m pemamattaka.m tamhaapi parihaayii'ti. seyyathaapi, bhaddaali, purisassa eka.m cakkhu.m, tassa mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa ta.m eka.m cakkhu.m rakkheyyu.m -- `maa yampissa ta.m eka.m cakkhu.m tamhaapi parihaayii'ti; evameva kho, bhaddaali, idhekacco bhikkhu saddhaamattakena vahati pemamattakena. tatra, bhaddaali, bhikkhuuna.m eva.m hoti -- `aya.m kho, aavuso, bhikkhu saddhaamattakena vahati pemamattakena. sace maya.m ima.m bhikkhu.m pasayha pasayha kaara.na.m karissaama -- maa yampissa ta.m saddhaamattaka.m pemamattaka.m tamhaapi parihaayii'ti. aya.m kho, bhaddaali, hetu aya.m paccayo yena midhekacca.m bhikkhu.m pasayha pasayha kaara.na.m karonti. aya.m pana, bhaddaali, hetu aya.m paccayo, yena midhekacca.m bhikkhu.m no tathaa pasayha pasayha kaara.na.m karontii''ti.

[03] 145^b^.^eb^ ```ko ^a^V2.0117^ea^ nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena pubbe appataraani ^a^P1.0445^ea^ ceva sikkhaapadaani ahesu.m bahutaraa ca bhikkhuu a~n~naaya sa.n.thahi.msu? ko pana, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena etarahi bahutaraani ceva sikkhaapadaani honti appataraa ca bhikkhuu a~n~naaya sa.n.thahantii'ti? ``evameta.m, bhaddaali, hoti sattesu haayamaanesu, saddhamme ^a^T2.0175^ea^ antaradhaayamaane, bahutaraani ceva sikkhaapadaani honti appataraa ca bhikkhuu a~n~naaya sa.n.thahantiiti. na taava, bhaddaali, satthaa saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~naapeti yaava na idhekacce aasava.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa sa"nghe paatubhavanti. yato ca kho, bhaddaali, idhekacce aasava.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa sa"nghe paatubhavanti, atha satthaa saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~naapeti tesa.myeva aasava.t.thaaniiyaana.m dhammaana.m pa.tighaataaya. na taava, bhaddaali, idhekacce aasava.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa sa"nghe paatubhavanti yaava na sa"ngho mahatta.m patto hoti. yato ca kho, bhaddaali, sa"ngho mahatta.m patto hoti, atha idhekacce ^a^M2.0109^ea^ aasava.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa sa"nghe paatubhavanti. atha satthaa saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~naapeti tesa.myeva aasava.t.thaaniiyaana.m dhammaana.m pa.tighaataaya. na taava, bhaddaali, idhekacce aasava.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa sa"nghe paatubhavanti yaava na sa"ngho laabhagga.m patto hoti, yasagga.m patto hoti, baahusacca.m patto hoti, ratta~n~nuta.m patto hoti. yato ca kho, bhaddaali, sa"ngho ratta~n~nuta.m patto hoti, atha idhekacce aasava.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa sa"nghe paatubhavanti, atha satthaa saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~naapeti tesa.myeva aasava.t.thaaniiyaana.m dhammaana.m pa.tighaataaya.

[03] 146^b^.^eb^ ``appakaa kho tumhe, bhaddaali, tena samayena ahuvattha yadaa vo aha.m aajaaniiyasusuupama.m dhammapariyaaya.m desesi.m. ta.m sarasi {sarasi tva.m (sii0 pii0), sarasi ta.m (?)} bhaddaalii''ti ^a^T2.0176^ea^?
[03] ``no heta.m, bhante''.
[03] ``tatra, bhaddaali, ka.m hetu.m paccesii''ti?
[03] ``so hi nuunaaha.m, bhante, diigharatta.m satthusaasane sikkhaaya aparipuurakaarii ahosi''nti.

[03] ``na kho, bhaddaali, eseva hetu, esa paccayo. api ca me tva.m, bhaddaali, diigharatta.m cetasaa ^a^V2.0118^ea^ cetoparicca vidito -- `na caaya.m moghapuriso mayaa dhamme desiyamaane a.t.thi.m katvaa manasi katvaa sabbacetaso {sabba.m cetaso (ka0)} samannaaharitvaa ohitasoto dhamma.m su.naatii'ti. api ca te aha.m, bhaddaali, aajaaniiyasusuupama.m dhammapariyaaya.m desessaami. ta.m su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi ^a^P1.0446^ea^; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa bhaddaali bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 147^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhaddaali, dakkho assadamako bhadra.m assaajaaniiya.m labhitvaa pa.thameneva mukhaadhaane kaara.na.m kaareti. tassa mukhaadhaane kaara.na.m kaariyamaanassa hontiyeva visuukaayitaani visevitaani vipphanditaani kaanici kaanici, yathaa ta.m akaaritapubba.m kaara.na.m kaariyamaanassa. so abhi.nhakaara.naa anupubbakaara.naa tasmi.m .thaane parinibbaayati. yato kho, bhaddaali, bhadro assaajaaniiyo abhi.nhakaara.naa anupubbakaara.naa tasmi.m .thaane parinibbuto hoti, tamena.m assadamako uttari kaara.na.m kaareti yugaadhaane. tassa yugaadhaane kaara.na.m kaariyamaanassa hontiyeva visuukaayitaani visevitaani vipphanditaani kaanici kaanici, yathaa ta.m akaaritapubba.m kaara.na.m kaariyamaanassa. so abhi.nhakaara.naa anupubbakaara.naa tasmi.m ^a^T2.0177^ea^ .thaane parinibbaayati ^a^M2.0110^ea^. yato kho, bhaddaali, bhadro assaajaaniiyo abhi.nhakaara.naa anupubbakaara.naa tasmi.m .thaane parinibbuto hoti, tamena.m assadamako uttari kaara.na.m kaareti anukkame ma.n.dale khurakaase {khurakaaye (sii0 pii0)} dhaave davatte {ravatthe (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} raajagu.ne raajava.mse uttame jave uttame haye uttame saakhalye. tassa uttame jave uttame haye uttame saakhalye kaara.na.m kaariyamaanassa hontiyeva visuukaayitaani visevitaani vipphanditaani kaanici kaanici, yathaa ta.m akaaritapubba.m kaara.na.m kaariyamaanassa. so abhi.nhakaara.naa anupubbakaara.naa tasmi.m .thaane parinibbaayati. yato kho, bhaddaali, bhadro assaajaaniiyo abhi.nhakaara.naa anupubbakaara.naa tasmi.m .thaane parinibbuto hoti, tamena.m assadamako uttari va.n.niya~nca paa.niya~nca {valiya~nca (sii0 pii0), baliya~nca (syaa0 ka.m0)} anuppavecchati. imehi kho, bhaddaali, dasaha"ngehi samannaagato bhadro assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo ra~n~no a"nganteva sa"nkhya.m gacchati.

[03] ``evameva kho, bhaddaali, dasahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. katamehi dasahi? idha, bhaddaali, bhikkhu asekhaaya sammaadi.t.thiyaa samannaagato hoti, asekhena sammaasa"nkappena samannaagato hoti, asekhaaya ^a^V2.0119^ea^ sammaavaacaaya samannaagato hoti, asekhena sammaakammantena samannaagato hoti, asekhena sammaaaajiivena samannaagato hoti, asekhena sammaavaayaamena samannaagato hoti ^a^T2.0178^ea^, asekhaaya sammaasatiyaa ^a^P1.0447^ea^ samannaagato hoti, asekhena sammaasamaadhinaa samannaagato hoti, asekhena sammaa~naa.nena samannaagato hoti, asekhaaya sammaavimuttiyaa samannaagato hoti -- imehi kho, bhaddaali, dasahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa bhaddaali bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] bhaddaalisutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa~ncama.m.

[03] 148^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0179^ea^ ^a^M2.0111^ea^ ^a^V2.0120^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa a"nguttaraapesu viharati aapa.na.m naama a"nguttaraapaana.m nigamo. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya aapa.na.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. aapa.ne pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena~n~nataro vanasa.n.do tenupasa"nkami divaavihaaraaya. ta.m vanasa.n.da.m ajjhogaahetvaa a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisiidi. aayasmaapi kho udaayii pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya aapa.na.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. aapa.ne pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena so vanasa.n.do tenupasa"nkami divaavihaaraaya. ta.m vanasa.n.da.m ajjhogaahetvaa a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisiidi. atha kho aayasmato udaayissa rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``bahuuna.m {bahunna.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0) evamiidise avi~n~naa.nakappakara.ne} vata no bhagavaa dukkhadhammaana.m apahattaa, bahuuna.m vata no bhagavaa sukhadhammaana.m upahattaa; bahuuna.m vata no bhagavaa akusalaana.m dhammaana.m apahattaa, bahuuna.m vata no bhagavaa kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upahattaa''ti. atha kho aayasmaa udaayii saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi ^a^P1.0448^ea^.

[03] 149^b^.^eb^ ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa udaayii bhagavanta.m etadavoca ^a^T2.0180^ea^ -- ``idha mayha.m, bhante, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `bahuuna.m vata no bhagavaa dukkhadhammaana.m apahattaa, bahuuna.m vata no bhagavaa sukhadhammaana.m upahattaa; bahuuna.m vata no bhagavaa akusalaana.m dhammaana.m apahattaa, bahuuna.m vata no bhagavaa kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upahattaa'ti. maya~nhi, bhante, pubbe saaya~nceva bhu~njaama paato ca divaa ca vikaale. ahu kho so, bhante, samayo ya.m bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- `i"ngha tumhe, bhikkhave, eta.m divaavikaalabhojana.m pajahathaa'ti. tassa mayha.m, bhante, ahudeva a~n~nathatta.m, ahudeva {ahu (sii0 pii0)} domanassa.m -- `yampi no saddhaa gahapatikaa divaa vikaale pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m denti tassapi no bhagavaa pahaanamaaha, tassapi no sugato pa.tinissaggamaahaa'ti. te ^a^M2.0112^ea^ maya.m, bhante, bhagavati pema~nca gaarava~nca hiri~nca ottappa~nca sampassamaanaa ^a^V2.0121^ea^ eva.m ta.m divaavikaalabhojana.m pajahimhaa. te maya.m, bhante, saaya~nceva bhu~njaama paato ca. ahu kho so, bhante, samayo ya.m bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- `i"ngha tumhe, bhikkhave, eta.m ratti.mvikaalabhojana.m pajahathaa'ti. tassa mayha.m, bhante, ahudeva a~n~nathatta.m ahudeva domanassa.m -- `yampi no imesa.m dvinna.m bhattaana.m pa.niitasa"nkhaatatara.m tassapi no bhagavaa pahaanamaaha, tassapi no sugato pa.tinissaggamaahaa'ti. bhuutapubba.m, bhante, a~n~nataro puriso divaa suupeyya.m labhitvaa evamaaha -- `handa ca ima.m nikkhipatha, saaya.m sabbeva samaggaa ^a^T2.0181^ea^ bhu~njissaamaa'ti. yaa kaaci, bhante, sa"nkhatiyo sabbaa taa ratti.m, appaa divaa. te maya.m, bhante, bhagavati pema~nca gaarava~nca hiri~nca ottappa~nca sampassamaanaa eva.m ta.m
