[03] 150^b^.^eb^ ``evameva panudaayi, idhekacce moghapurisaa `ida.m pajahathaa'ti mayaa ^a^T2.0182^ea^ vuccamaanaa te evamaaha.msu -- `ki.m panimassa appamattakassa oramattakassa adhisallikhatevaaya.m sama.no'ti. te ta~nceva nappajahanti, mayi ^a^M2.0113^ea^ ca appaccaya.m upa.t.thaapenti. ye ca bhikkhuu sikkhaakaamaa tesa.m ta.m, udaayi, hoti balava.m bandhana.m, da.lha.m bandhana.m, thira.m bandhana.m, apuutika.m bandhana.m, thuulo, kali"ngaro -- seyyathaapi, udaayi, la.tukikaa saku.nikaa puutilataaya bandhanena baddhaa tattheva vadha.m vaa bandha.m vaa mara.na.m vaa aagameti. yo nu kho, udaayi, eva.m vadeyya -- `yena saa la.tukikaa saku.nikaa puutilataaya bandhanena baddhaa tattheva vadha.m vaa bandha.m vaa mara.na.m vaa aagameti, ta~nhi tassaa abala.m bandhana.m ^a^V2.0122^ea^, dubbala.m bandhana.m, puutika.m bandhana.m, asaaraka.m bandhana'nti; sammaa nu kho so, udaayi, vadamaano vadeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante. yena saa, bhante, la.tukikaa saku.nikaa puutilataaya bandhanena baddhaa tattheva vadha.m vaa bandha.m vaa mara.na.m vaa aagameti, ta~nhi tassaa balava.m bandhana.m, da.lha.m bandhana.m, thira.m bandhana.m apuutika.m bandhana.m, thuulo, kali"ngaro''ti. ``evameva kho, udaayi, idhekacce moghapurisaa `ida.m pajahathaa'ti mayaa vuccamaanaa te evamaaha.msu -- `ki.m panimassa appamattakassa oramattakassa adhisallikhatevaaya.m sama.no'ti? te ta~nceva nappajahanti, mayi ca appaccaya.m upa.t.thaapenti. ye ca bhikkhuu sikkhaakaamaa tesa.m ta.m, udaayi, hoti balava.m bandhana.m, da.lha.m bandhana.m, thira.m bandhana.m, apuutika.m bandhana.m, thuulo, kali"ngaro''.

``no heta.m, bhante. yehi so, bhante, ra~n~no naago iisaadanto uruu.lhavaa abhijaato sa"ngaamaavacaro da.lhehi varattehi bandhanehi baddho iisaka.myeva kaaya.m sannaametvaa taani bandhanaani sa.mchinditvaa ^a^T2.0184^ea^ sa.mpadaaletvaa yena kaama.m pakkamati, ta~nhi tassa abala.m bandhana.m...pe0... asaaraka.m bandhana''nti. ``evameva kho, udaayi, idhekacce kulaputtaa `ida.m pajahathaa'ti mayaa vuccamaanaa te evamaaha.msu -- `ki.m panimassa appamattakassa oramattakassa pahaatabbassa yassa no bhagavaa pahaanamaaha, yassa no sugato pa.tinissaggamaahaa'ti? [03] 152^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, udaayi, puriso daliddo assako anaa.lhiyo; tassa'ssa eka.m agaaraka.m oluggavilugga.m kaakaatidaayi.m {kaakaati.daayi.m (?)} naparamaruupa.m, ekaa kha.topikaa {ka.lopikaa (ka0)} oluggaviluggaa naparamaruupaa, ekissaa kumbhiyaa ^a^P1.0451^ea^ dha~n~nasamavaapaka.m naparamaruupa.m, ekaa jaayikaa naparamaruupaa. so aaraamagata.m bhikkhu.m passeyya sudhotahatthapaada.m manu~n~na.m bhojana.m bhuttaavi.m siitaaya chaayaaya nisinna.m adhicitte yutta.m. tassa evamassa -- `sukha.m vata, bho, saama~n~na.m, aarogya.m vata, bho, saama~n~na.m! so vatassa.m {so vatassa (ka0)} yoha.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajeyya'nti. so na sakku.neyya eka.m agaaraka.m oluggavilugga.m kaakaatidaayi.m naparamaruupa.m pahaaya, eka.m kha.topika.m ^a^T2.0185^ea^ oluggavilugga.m naparamaruupa.m pahaaya, ekissaa kumbhiyaa dha~n~nasamavaapaka.m naparamaruupa.m pahaaya, eka.m jaayika.m naparamaruupa.m pahaaya kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitu.m. yo nu kho, udaayi, eva.m vadeyya -- `yehi so puriso bandhanehi baddho na sakkoti eka.m agaaraka.m oluggavilugga.m kaakaatidaayi.m naparamaruupa.m pahaaya, eka.m kha.topika.m oluggavilugga.m naparamaruupa.m pahaaya, ekissaa kumbhiyaa dha~n~nasamavaapaka.m naparamaruupa.m pahaaya, eka.m jaayika.m naparamaruupa.m pahaaya kesamassu.m ^a^M2.0115^ea^ ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitu.m; ta~nhi tassa abala.m bandhana.m, dubbala.m bandhana.m, puutika.m bandhana.m, asaaraka.m bandhana'nti; sammaa nu kho so, udaayi, vadamaano vadeyyaa''ti? [03] 154^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^V2.0125^ea^, udaayi, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame ^a^T2.0188^ea^ cattaaro? idhudaayi, ekacco puggalo upadhipahaanaaya pa.tipanno hoti upadhipa.tinissaggaaya. tamena.m upadhipahaanaaya pa.tipanna.m upadhipa.tinissaggaaya upadhipa.tisa.myuttaa sarasa"nkappaa samudaacaranti. so te adhivaaseti, nappajahati, na vinodeti, na byantiikaroti, na anabhaava.m gameti. ima.m kho aha.m, udaayi, puggala.m `sa.myutto'ti vadaami no `visa.myutto'. ta.m kissa hetu? indriyavemattataa hi me, udaayi, imasmi.m puggale viditaa.

idhudaayi, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, aya.m tassa samatikkamo; idampi kho aha.m, udaayi, `anala'nti vadaami, `pajahathaa'ti vadaami, `samatikkamathaa'ti vadaami. ko ca tassa samatikkamo? idhudaayi, bhikkhu sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati, aya.m tassa samatikkamo; idampi kho aha.m, udaayi, `anala'nti ^a^M2.0119^ea^ vadaami, `pajahathaa'ti vadaami, `samatikkamathaa'ti vadaami. ko ca tassa samatikkamo? idhudaayi, bhikkhu sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati, aya.m tassa samatikkamo ^a^T2.0192^ea^; idampi kho aha.m, udaayi, `anala'nti vadaami, `pajahathaa'ti vadaami, `samatikkamathaa'ti vadaami. ko ca ^a^V2.0128^ea^ tassa samatikkamo? idhudaayi, bhikkhu sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati, aya.m tassa samatikkamo; idampi kho aha.m, udaayi, `anala'nti vadaami, `pajahathaa'ti vadaami, `samatikkamathaa'ti vadaami. ko ca tassa samatikkamo? idhudaayi, bhikkhu sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja ^a^P1.0456^ea^ viharati, aya.m tassa samatikkamo; idampi kho aha.m, udaayi, `anala'nti vadaami, `pajahathaa'ti vadaami, `samatikkamathaa'ti vadaami. ko ca tassa samatikkamo? idhudaayi, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m upasampajja viharati, aya.m tassa samatikkamo; iti kho aha.m, udaayi, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassapi pahaana.m vadaami. passasi no tva.m, udaayi, ta.m sa.myojana.m a.nu.m vaa thuula.m vaa yassaaha.m no pahaana.m vadaamii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa udaayii bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] la.tukikopamasutta.m ni.t.thita.m cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 157^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0193^ea^ ^a^V2.0129^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa caatumaaya.m viharati aamalakiivane. tena kho pana samayena saariputtamoggallaanappamukhaani pa~ncamattaani bhikkhusataani caatuma.m anuppattaani honti bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. te ca aagantukaa bhikkhuu nevaasikehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m pa.tisammodamaanaa senaasanaani pa~n~naapayamaanaa pattaciivaraani pa.tisaamayamaanaa uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa ahesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``ke panete, aananda, uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa, keva.t.taa ma~n~ne macchavilope''ti? ``etaani, bhante, saariputtamoggallaanappamukhaani pa~ncamattaani bhikkhusataani caatuma.m ^a^M2.0120^ea^ anuppattaani bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. te aagantukaa bhikkhuu nevaasikehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m pa.tisammodamaanaa senaasanaani pa~n~naapayamaanaa pattaciivaraani pa.tisaamayamaanaa uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa''ti. ``tenahaananda, mama vacanena te bhikkhuu aamantehi -- `satthaa aayasmante aamantetii'''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``satthaa aayasmante aamantetii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu ^a^P1.0457^ea^ aayasmato aanandassa pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinne kho te ^a^T2.0194^ea^ bhikkhuu bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``ki.m nu tumhe, bhikkhave, uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa, keva.t.taa ma~n~ne macchavilope''ti? ``imaani, bhante, saariputtamoggallaanappamukhaani pa~ncamattaani bhikkhusataani caatuma.m anuppattaani bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. teme aagantukaa bhikkhuu nevaasikehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m pa.tisammodamaanaa senaasanaani pa~n~naapayamaanaa pattaciivaraani pa.tisaamayamaanaa uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa''ti. ``gacchatha, bhikkhave, pa.naamemi vo, na vo mama santike vatthabba''nti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa senaasana.m sa.msaametvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya pakkami.msu.

[03] 158^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena caatumeyyakaa sakyaa santhaagaare {sandhaagaare (ka0)} sannipatitaa honti kenacideva ^a^V2.0130^ea^ kara.niiyena. addasa.msu kho caatumeyyakaa sakyaa te bhikkhuu duuratova aagacchante; disvaana yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``handa, kaha.m pana tumhe aayasmanto gacchathaa''ti? ``bhagavataa kho, aavuso, bhikkhusa"ngho pa.naamito''ti. ``tenahaayasmanto muhutta.m nisiidatha, appeva naama maya.m sakku.neyyaama bhagavanta.m pasaadetu''nti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu caatumeyyakaana.m sakyaana.m paccassosu.m. atha kho caatumeyyakaa sakyaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m ^a^T2.0195^ea^ abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho caatumeyyakaa sakyaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``abhinandatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m; abhivadatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m. seyyathaapi, bhante ^a^M2.0121^ea^, bhagavataa pubbe bhikkhusa"ngho anuggahito, evameva bhagavaa etarahi anugga.nhaatu bhikkhusa"ngha.m. santettha, bhante, bhikkhuu navaa acirapabbajitaa adhunaagataa ima.m dhammavinaya.m. tesa.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya alabhantaana.m siyaa a~n~nathatta.m, siyaa vipari.naamo. seyyathaapi, bhante, biijaana.m taru.naana.m udaka.m alabhantaana.m siyaa a~n~nathatta.m siyaa vipari.naamo; evameva kho, bhante, santettha bhikkhuu ^a^P1.0458^ea^ navaa acirapabbajitaa adhunaagataa ima.m dhammavinaya.m, tesa.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya alabhantaana.m siyaa a~n~nathatta.m, siyaa vipari.naamo. seyyathaapi, bhante, vacchassa taru.nassa maatara.m apassantassa siyaa a~n~nathatta.m, siyaa vipari.naamo; evameva kho, bhante, santettha bhikkhuu navaa acirapabbajitaa adhunaagataa ima.m dhammavinaya.m, tesa.m bhagavanta.m apassantaana.m siyaa a~n~nathatta.m, siyaa vipari.naamo. abhinandatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m; abhivadatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m. seyyathaapi, bhante, bhagavataa pubbe bhikkhusa"ngho anuggahito; evameva bhagavaa etarahi anugga.nhaatu bhikkhusa"ngha''nti.

[03] 159^b^.^eb^ atha kho brahmaa sahampati bhagavato cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m {sammi~njita.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva -- brahmaloke ^a^T2.0196^ea^ antarahito bhagavato purato paaturahosi. atha kho brahmaa sahampati eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhinandatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m; abhivadatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m. seyyathaapi, bhante, bhagavataa pubbe bhikkhusa"ngho anuggahito; evameva bhagavaa etarahi anugga.nhaatu bhikkhusa"ngha.m. santettha, bhante, bhikkhuu navaa acirapabbajitaa adhunaagataa ima.m dhammavinaya.m, tesa.m bhagavanta.m ^a^V2.0131^ea^ dassanaaya alabhantaana.m siyaa a~n~nathatta.m, siyaa vipari.naamo. seyyathaapi, bhante, biijaana.m taru.naana.m udaka.m alabhantaana.m siyaa a~n~nathatta.m, siyaa vipari.naamo; evameva kho, bhante, santettha bhikkhuu navaa acirapabbajitaa adhunaagataa ima.m dhammavinaya.m, tesa.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya alabhantaana.m siyaa a~n~nathatta.m, siyaa vipari.naamo. seyyathaapi bhante, vacchassa taru.nassa maatara.m apassantassa siyaa a~n~nathatta.m, siyaa vipari.naamo; evameva kho, bhante, santettha bhikkhuu navaa ^a^M2.0122^ea^ acirapabbajitaa adhunaagataa ima.m dhammavinaya.m, tesa.m bhagavanta.m apassantaana.m siyaa a~n~nathatta.m, siyaa vipari.naamo. abhinandatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m; abhivadatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m. seyyathaapi, bhante, bhagavataa pubbe bhikkhusa"ngho ^a^P1.0459^ea^ anuggahito; evameva bhagavaa etarahi anugga.nhaatu bhikkhusa"ngha''nti.

[03] 160^b^.^eb^ asakkhi.msu kho caatumeyyakaa ca sakyaa brahmaa ca sahampati bhagavanta.m pasaadetu.m biijuupamena ca taru.nuupamena ca. atha ^a^T2.0197^ea^ kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``u.t.thethaavuso, ga.nhatha pattaciivara.m. pasaadito bhagavaa caatumeyyakehi ca sakyehi brahmunaa ca sahampatinaa biijuupamena ca taru.nuupamena caa''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa pa.tissutvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m saariputta.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``kinti te, saariputta, ahosi mayaa bhikkhusa"nghe pa.naamite''ti? ``eva.m kho me, bhante, ahosi -- `bhagavataa bhikkhusa"ngho pa.naamito. appossukko daani bhagavaa di.t.thadhammasukhavihaara.m anuyutto viharissati, mayampi daani appossukkaa di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaramanuyuttaa viharissaamaa'''ti. ``aagamehi tva.m, saariputta, aagamehi tva.m, saariputta, di.t.thadhammasukhavihaara''nti. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m aamantesi -- ``kinti te, moggallaana, ahosi mayaa bhikkhusa"nghe pa.naamite''ti? ``eva.m kho me, bhante, ahosi -- `bhagavataa bhikkhusa"ngho pa.naamito. appossukko daani bhagavaa di.t.thadhammasukhavihaara.m anuyutto viharissati, aha~nca daani aayasmaa ca saariputto bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharissaamaa'''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, moggallaana! aha.m vaa hi, moggallaana ^a^T2.0198^ea^, bhikkhusa"ngha.m parihareyya.m saariputtamoggallaanaa vaa''ti.

[03] 161^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V2.0132^ea^ kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, bhayaani udakorohante paa.tika"nkhitabbaani. katamaani cattaari? uumibhaya.m {ummiibhaya.m (syaa0 ka.m0)}, kumbhiilabhaya.m, aava.t.tabhaya.m, susukaabhaya.m -- imaani, bhikkhave, cattaari bhayaani udakorohante paa.tika"nkhitabbaani. evameva kho, bhikkhave, cattaarimaani bhayaani ^a^M2.0123^ea^ idhekacce puggale imasmi.m dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajite paa.tika"nkhitabbaani. katamaani ^a^P1.0460^ea^ cattaari? uumibhaya.m, kumbhiilabhaya.m, aava.t.tabhaya.m, susukaabhaya.m.

[03] 162^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, uumibhaya.m? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti -- `oti.n.nomhi jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi dukkhoti.n.no dukkhapareto; appeva naama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaa'ti. tamena.m tathaa pabbajita.m samaana.m sabrahmacaarii ovadanti, anusaasanti -- `eva.m te abhikkamitabba.m, eva.m te pa.tikkamitabba.m, eva.m te aalokitabba.m, eva.m te vilokitabba.m, eva.m te sami~njitabba.m, eva.m te pasaaritabba.m, eva.m te sa"nghaa.tipattaciivara.m dhaaretabba'nti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `maya.m kho pubbe agaariyabhuutaa samaanaa a~n~ne ovadaama, anusaasaama {ovadaamapi anusaasaamapi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. ime panamhaaka.m puttamattaa ma~n~ne, nattamattaa ma~n~ne, amhe {eva.m (ka0)} ovaditabba.m ^a^T2.0199^ea^ anusaasitabba.m ma~n~nantii'ti. so sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, uumibhayassa bhiito sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavatto. `uumibhaya'nti kho, bhikkhave, kodhupaayaasasseta.m adhivacana.m.

[03] 163^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, kumbhiilabhaya.m? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti -- `oti.n.nomhi jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi dukkhoti.n.no dukkhapareto; appeva naama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaa'ti. tamena.m tathaa pabbajita.m samaana.m sabrahmacaarii ovadanti anusaasanti -- `ida.m te khaaditabba.m, ida.m te na khaaditabba.m; ida.m te bhu~njitabba.m, ida.m te na bhu~njitabba.m; ida.m te saayitabba.m, ida.m te na saayitabba.m; ida.m te paatabba.m, ida.m te na paatabba.m; kappiya.m te khaaditabba.m, akappiya.m te na khaaditabba.m; kappiya.m te bhu~njitabba.m, akappiya.m te na bhu~njitabba.m; kappiya.m te saayitabba.m, akappiya.m te na saayitabba.m ^a^V2.0133^ea^; kappiya.m te paatabba.m, akappiya.m te na paatabba.m; kaale te khaaditabba.m, vikaale te na khaaditabba.m; kaale te bhu~njitabba.m, vikaale te ^a^M2.0124^ea^ na bhu~njitabba.m; kaale te saayitabba.m, vikaale te na saayitabba.m; kaale te paatabba.m, vikaale te na paatabba'nti. tassa eva.m ^a^P1.0461^ea^ hoti -- `maya.m kho pubbe agaariyabhuutaa samaanaa ya.m icchaama ta.m khaadaama, ya.m na icchaama na ta.m khaadaama; ya.m icchaama ta.m bhu~njaama, ya.m ^a^T2.0200^ea^ na icchaama na ta.m bhu~njaama; ya.m icchaama ta.m saayaama, ya.m na icchaama na ta.m saayaama; ya.m icchaama ta.m pivaama {pipaama (sii0 pii0)}, ya.m na icchaama na ta.m pivaama; kappiyampi khaadaama, akappiyampi khaadaama; kappiyampi bhu~njaama, akappiyampi bhu~njaama; kappiyampi saayaama, akappiyampi saayaama; kappiyampi pivaama, akappiyampi pivaama; kaalepi khaadaama, vikaalepi khaadaama; kaalepi bhu~njaama vikaalepi bhu~njaama; kaalepi saayaama, vikaalepi saayaama; kaalepi pivaama, vikaalepi pivaama. yampi no saddhaa gahapatikaa divaa vikaale pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m denti tatthapime mukhaavara.na.m ma~n~ne karontii'ti. so sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, kumbhiilabhayassa bhiito sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavatto. `kumbhiilabhaya'nti kho, bhikkhave, odarikattasseta.m adhivacana.m.

[03] 164^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, aava.t.tabhaya.m? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti -- `oti.n.nomhi jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi dukkhoti.n.no dukkhapareto; appeva naama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaa'ti. so eva.m pabbajito samaano pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa pi.n.daaya pavisati. arakkhiteneva kaayena arakkhitaaya ^a^T2.0201^ea^ vaacaaya anupa.t.thitaaya satiyaa asa.mvutehi indriyehi so tattha passati gahapati.m vaa gahapatiputta.m vaa pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappita.m sama"ngiibhuuta.m paricaarayamaana.m {paricaariyamaana.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}. tassa eva.m hoti -- `maya.m kho pubbe agaariyabhuutaa samaanaa pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappitaa sama"ngiibhuutaa paricaarimhaa. sa.mvijjanti kho pana me kule {sa.mvijjanti kho kule (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} bhogaa. sakkaa bhoge ca bhu~njitu.m pu~n~naani ca kaatu'nti. so sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, aava.t.tabhayassa bhiito sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavatto. `aava.t.tabhaya'nti kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanneta.m kaamagu.naana.m adhivacana.m.

[03] 165^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca ^a^M2.0125^ea^ ^a^V2.0134^ea^, bhikkhave, susukaabhaya.m? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco ^a^P1.0462^ea^ kulaputto saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti -- `oti.n.nomhi jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi dukkhoti.n.no dukkhapareto; appeva naama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaa'ti. so eva.m pabbajito samaano pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa pi.n.daaya pavisati. arakkhiteneva kaayena arakkhitaaya vaacaaya anupa.t.thitaaya satiyaa asa.mvutehi indriyehi so tattha passati maatugaama.m dunnivattha.m vaa duppaaruta.m vaa. tassa maatugaama.m disvaa dunnivattha.m vaa duppaaruta.m vaa raago citta.m anuddha.mseti. so raagaanuddha.msena {anuddhastena (sii0 pii0)} cittena sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati ^a^T2.0202^ea^. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, susukaabhayassa bhiito sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavatto. `susukaabhaya'nti kho, bhikkhave, maatugaamasseta.m adhivacana.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari bhayaani, idhekacce puggale imasmi.m dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajite paa.tika"nkhitabbaanii''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] caatumasutta.m ni.t.thita.m sattama.m.

[03] 166^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0203^ea^ ^a^V2.0135^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu viharati na.lakapaane palaasavane. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa kulaputtaa bhagavanta.m uddissa saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa honti -- aayasmaa ca anuruddho, aayasmaa ca bhaddiyo {nandiyo (sii0 pii0) vinaye ca ma0 ni0 1 cuu.lagosi"nge ca}, aayasmaa ca kimilo {kimbilo (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, aayasmaa ca bhagu, aayasmaa ca ko.n.da~n~no {ku.n.dadhaano (sii0 pii0)}, aayasmaa ca revato, aayasmaa ca aanando, a~n~ne ca abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa kulaputtaa. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto ^a^P1.0463^ea^ abbhokaase nisinno hoti. atha kho bhagavaa te kulaputte ^a^M2.0126^ea^ aarabbha bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ye te, bhikkhave, kulaputtaa mama.m uddissa saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, kacci te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu abhirataa brahmacariye''ti? eva.m vutte, te bhikkhuu tu.nhii ahesu.m. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa te kulaputte aarabbha bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ye te, bhikkhave, kulaputtaa mama.m uddissa saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, kacci te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu abhirataa brahmacariye''ti? dutiyampi kho te bhikkhuu tu.nhii ahesu.m. tatiyampi kho bhagavaa te kulaputte aarabbha bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ye te, bhikkhave, kulaputtaa mama.m uddissa saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa ^a^T2.0204^ea^, kacci te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu abhirataa brahmacariye''ti? tatiyampi kho te bhikkhuu tu.nhii ahesu.m.

[03] 167^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``ya.mnuunaaha.m te kulaputte puccheyya''nti! atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m aamantesi -- ``kacci tumhe, anuruddhaa, abhirataa brahmacariye''ti? ``taggha maya.m, bhante, abhirataa brahmacariye''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, anuruddhaa! eta.m kho, anuruddhaa, tumhaaka.m patiruupa.m kulaputtaana.m saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaana.m ya.m tumhe abhirameyyaatha brahmacariye. yena tumhe anuruddhaa, bhadrena yobbanena samannaagataa pa.thamena vayasaa susukaa.lakesaa kaame paribhu~njeyyaatha tena tumhe, anuruddhaa, bhadrenapi yobbanena samannaagataa pa.thamena vayasaa susukaa.lakesaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa. te ca kho pana tumhe, anuruddhaa, neva raajaabhiniitaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, na coraabhiniitaa agaarasmaa ^a^V2.0136^ea^ anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, na i.na.t.taa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, na bhaya.t.taa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, naajiivikaapakataa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa. api ca khomhi oti.n.no jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, dukkhoti.n.no dukkhapareto; appeva naama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaati -- nanu tumhe, anuruddhaa, eva.m saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``eva.m ^a^T2.0205^ea^ pabbajitena ca pana, anuruddhaa, kulaputtena kimassa kara.niiya.m? viveka.m, anuruddhaa, kaamehi viveka.m akusalehi dhammehi piitisukha.m naadhigacchati a~n~na.m vaa {a~n~na.m ca (ka0)} tato santatara.m, tassa abhijjhaapi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, byaapaadopi citta.m ^a^M2.0127^ea^ pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, thiinamiddhampi {thiinamiddhampi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati uddhaccakukkuccampi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, vicikicchaapi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, aratiipi ^a^P1.0464^ea^ citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, tandiipi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati. viveka.m, anuruddhaa, kaamehi viveka.m akusalehi dhammehi piitisukha.m naadhigacchati a~n~na.m vaa tato santatara.m''.

[03] ``viveka.m, anuruddhaa, kaamehi viveka.m akusalehi dhammehi piitisukha.m adhigacchati a~n~na.m vaa tato santatara.m, tassa abhijjhaapi citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, byaapaadopi citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, thiinamiddhampi citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, uddhaccakukkuccampi citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, vicikicchaapi citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, aratiipi citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, tandiipi citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati. viveka.m, anuruddhaa, kaamehi viveka.m akusalehi dhammehi piitisukha.m adhigacchati a~n~na.m vaa tato santatara.m.

[03] 168^b^.^eb^ ``kinti vo, anuruddhaa, mayi hoti -- `ye aasavaa sa.mkilesikaa ponobbhavikaa {ponobhavikaa (sii0 pii0)} sadaraa dukkhavipaakaa aayati.m jaatijaraamara.niyaa, appahiinaa te tathaagatassa; tasmaa tathaagato sa"nkhaayeka.m pa.tisevati, sa"nkhaayeka.m adhivaaseti, sa"nkhaayeka.m parivajjeti, sa"nkhaayeka.m vinodetii'''ti? ``na kho ^a^T2.0206^ea^ no, bhante, bhagavati eva.m hoti -- `ye aasavaa sa.mkilesikaa ponobbhavikaa sadaraa dukkhavipaakaa aayati.m jaatijaraamara.niyaa, appahiinaa te tathaagatassa; tasmaa tathaagato sa"nkhaayeka.m pa.tisevati, sa"nkhaayeka.m adhivaaseti, sa"nkhaayeka.m parivajjeti, sa"nkhaayeka.m vinodetii'ti. eva.m kho no, bhante, bhagavati hoti -- `ye aasavaa sa.mkilesikaa ponobbhavikaa ^a^V2.0137^ea^ sadaraa dukkhavipaakaa aayati.m jaatijaraamara.niyaa, pahiinaa te tathaagatassa; tasmaa tathaagato sa"nkhaayeka.m pa.tisevati, sa"nkhaayeka.m adhivaaseti, sa"nkhaayeka.m parivajjeti, sa"nkhaayeka.m vinodetii'''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, anuruddhaa! tathaagatassa, anuruddhaa, ye aasavaa sa.mkilesikaa ponobbhavikaa sadaraa dukkhavipaakaa aayati.m jaatijaraamara.niyaa, pahiinaa te ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. seyyathaapi, anuruddhaa, taalo matthakacchinno abhabbo punaviruu.lhiyaa; evameva kho, anuruddhaa ^a^M2.0128^ea^, tathaagatassa ye aasavaa sa.mkilesikaa ponobbhavikaa sadaraa dukkhavipaakaa aayati.m jaatijaraamara.niyaa, pahiinaa te ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa; tasmaa tathaagato sa"nkhaayeka.m pa.tisevati, sa"nkhaayeka.m adhivaaseti, sa"nkhaayeka.m parivajjeti, sa"nkhaayeka.m vinodeti''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, anuruddhaa, ka.m atthavasa.m sampassamaano tathaagato saavake abbhatiite kaala"nkate upapattiisu byaakaroti -- `asu amutra upapanno; asu amutra upapanno'''ti? ``bhagava.mmuulakaa ^a^P1.0465^ea^ no, bhante, dhammaa bhagava.mnettikaa bhagava.mpa.tisara.naa. saadhu vata, bhante, bhagavanta.myeva pa.tibhaatu etassa bhaasitassa attho. bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti ^a^T2.0207^ea^. ``na kho, anuruddhaa, tathaagato janakuhanattha.m na janalapanattha.m na laabhasakkaarasilokaanisa.msattha.m na `iti ma.m jano jaanaatuu'ti saavake abbhatiite kaala"nkate upapattiisu byaakaroti -- `asu amutra upapanno, asu amutra upapanno'ti. santi ca kho, anuruddhaa, kulaputtaa saddhaa u.laaravedaa u.laarapaamojjaa. te ta.m sutvaa tadatthaaya citta.m upasa.mharanti. tesa.m ta.m, anuruddhaa, hoti diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya''.

[03] 169^b^.^eb^ ``idhaanuruddhaa, bhikkhu su.naati -- `itthannaamo bhikkhu kaala"nkato {kaalakato (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}; so bhagavataa byaakato -- a~n~naaya sa.n.thahii'ti. so kho panassa aayasmaa saama.m di.t.tho vaa hoti anussavassuto vaa -- `eva.msiilo so aayasmaa ahosi itipi, eva.mdhammo so aayasmaa ahosi itipi, eva.mpa~n~no so aayasmaa ahosi itipi, eva.mvihaarii so aayasmaa ahosi itipi, eva.mvimutto so aayasmaa ahosi itipii'ti. so tassa saddha~nca siila~nca suta~nca caaga~nca pa~n~na~nca anussaranto tadatthaaya citta.m upasa.mharati. evampi kho, anuruddhaa, bhikkhuno phaasuvihaaro hoti.

[03] ``idhaanuruddhaa ^a^V2.0138^ea^, bhikkhu su.naati -- `itthannaamo bhikkhu kaala"nkato; so bhagavataa byaakato -- pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatiko tattha parinibbaayii anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa'ti. so ^a^T2.0208^ea^ kho panassa aayasmaa saama.m di.t.tho vaa hoti anussavassuto vaa ^a^M2.0129^ea^ -- `eva.msiilo so aayasmaa ahosi itipi, eva.mdhammo...pe0... eva.mpa~n~no... eva.mvihaarii... eva.mvimutto so aayasmaa ahosi itipii'ti. so tassa saddha~nca siila~nca suta~nca caaga~nca pa~n~na~nca anussaranto tadatthaaya citta.m upasa.mharati. evampi kho, anuruddhaa, bhikkhuno phaasuvihaaro hoti.

[06] na.lakapaanasutta.m ni.t.thita.m a.t.thama.m.

[03] 173^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0214^ea^ ^a^M2.0133^ea^ ^a^V2.0143^ea^ ^a^P1.0469^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena goliyaani {gulissaani (sii0 pii0), golissaani (syaa0 ka.m0)} naama bhikkhu aara~n~niko {aara~n~nako (sabbattha)} padasamaacaaro {padarasamaacaaro (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} sa"nghamajjhe osa.to hoti kenacideva kara.niiyena. tatra kho aayasmaa saariputto goliyaani.m bhikkhu.m aarabbha bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena sabrahmacaariisu sagaaravena bhavitabba.m sappatissena. sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu sa"nghagato sa"nghe viharanto sabrahmacaariisu agaaravo hoti appatisso, tassa bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena, yo ayamaayasmaa sabrahmacaariisu agaaravo hoti appatisso'ti -- tassa {appatissotissa (sii0 pii0)} bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena sabrahmacaariisu sagaaravena bhavitabba.m sappatissena.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena aasanakusalena bhavitabba.m -- `iti there ca bhikkhuu naanupakhajja nisiidissaami nave ca bhikkhuu na aasanena pa.tibaahissaamii'ti. sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko ^a^T2.0215^ea^ bhikkhu sa"nghagato sa"nghe viharanto na aasanakusalo hoti, tassa bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena, yo ayamaayasmaa aasanakusalo na hotii'ti {yo ayamaayasmaa aabhisamaacaarikampi dhamma.m na jaanaatiiti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} -- tassa bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena aasanakusalena bhavitabba.m.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena aabhisamaacaarikopi dhammo jaanitabbo. sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu sa"nghagato sa"nghe viharanto aabhisamaacaarikampi dhamma.m na jaanaati, tassa bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena yo ayamaayasmaa aabhisamaacaarikampi dhamma.m ^a^M2.0134^ea^ na jaanaatii'ti ^a^V2.0144^ea^ -- tassa bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena aabhisamaacaarikopi dhammo jaanitabbo {aya.m aabhisamaacaarikatatiyavaaro sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 potthakesu na dissati}.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena naatikaalena gaamo pavisitabbo naatidivaa {na divaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} pa.tikkamitabba.m. sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu sa"nghagato sa"nghe viharanto atikaalena gaama.m pavisati atidivaa pa.tikkamati, tassa bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena yo ayamaayasmaa atikaalena gaama.m pavisati atidivaa pa.tikkamatii'ti -- tassa bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena naatikaalena gaamo pavisitabbo, naatidivaa pa.tikkamitabba.m.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena na ^a^T2.0216^ea^ purebhatta.m ^a^P1.0470^ea^ pacchaabhatta.m kulesu caaritta.m aapajjitabba.m. sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu sa"nghagato sa"nghe viharanto purebhatta.m pacchaabhatta.m kulesu caaritta.m aapajjati, tassa bhavanti vattaaro. `aya.m nuunimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena viharato vikaalacariyaa bahuliikataa, tamena.m sa"nghagatampi samudaacaratii'ti -- tassa bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena na purebhatta.m pacchaabhatta.m kulesu caaritta.m aapajjitabba.m.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena anuddhatena bhavitabba.m acapalena. sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu sa"nghagato sa"nghe viharanto uddhato hoti capalo, tassa bhavanti vattaaro. `ida.m nuunimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena viharato uddhacca.m caapalya.m bahuliikata.m, tamena.m sa"nghagatampi samudaacaratii'ti -- tassa bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena anuddhatena bhavitabba.m acapalena.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso ^a^M2.0135^ea^, bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena amukharena bhavitabba.m aviki.n.navaacena. sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu sa"nghagato sa"nghe viharanto mukharo hoti ^a^V2.0145^ea^ viki.n.navaaco, tassa bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena yo ayamaayasmaa mukharo viki.n.navaaco'ti -- tassa bhavanti ^a^T2.0217^ea^ vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena amukharena bhavitabba.m aviki.n.navaacena.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena suvacena {subbacena (sii0 ka0)} bhavitabba.m kalyaa.namittena. sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu sa"nghagato sa"nghe viharanto dubbaco hoti paapamitto, tassa bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena yo ayamaayasmaa dubbaco paapamitto'ti -- tassa bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena suvacena bhavitabba.m kalyaa.namittena.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa indriyesu guttadvaarena bhavitabba.m. sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu indriyesu aguttadvaaro hoti, tassa bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena yo ayamaayasmaa ^a^P1.0471^ea^ indriyesu aguttadvaaro'ti -- tassa bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa indriyesu guttadvaarena bhavitabba.m.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa bhojane matta~n~nunaa bhavitabba.m. sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhojane amatta~n~nuu hoti, tassa bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena yo ayamaayasmaa bhojane amatta~n~nuu'ti -- tassa bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa bhojane matta~n~nunaa ^a^T2.0218^ea^ bhavitabba.m.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa jaagariya.m anuyuttena bhavitabba.m. sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu jaagariya.m ananuyutto hoti, tassa ^a^M2.0136^ea^ bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena yo ayamaayasmaa jaagariya.m ananuyutto'ti -- tassa bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa jaagariya.m anuyuttena bhavitabba.m.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso ^a^V2.0146^ea^, bhikkhunaa aaraddhaviiriyena bhavitabba.m. sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu kusiito hoti, tassa bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena yo ayamaayasmaa kusiito'ti -- tassa bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa aaraddhaviiriyena bhavitabba.m.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa upa.t.thitassatinaa bhavitabba.m. sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu mu.t.thassatii hoti, tassa bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena yo ayamaayasmaa mu.t.thassatii'ti -- tassa bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa upa.t.thitassatinaa bhavitabba.m.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa samaahitena bhavitabba.m. sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu asamaahito hoti, tassa bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena ^a^T2.0219^ea^ yo ayamaayasmaa asamaahito'ti -- tassa bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa samaahitena bhavitabba.m.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa pa~n~navataa bhavitabba.m. sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu duppa~n~no hoti, tassa bhavanti vattaaro ^a^P1.0472^ea^. `ki.m panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena yo ayamaayasmaa duppa~n~no'ti -- tassa bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa pa~n~navataa bhavitabba.m.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa abhidhamme abhivinaye yogo kara.niiyo. santaavuso, aara~n~nika.m bhikkhu.m abhidhamme abhivinaye pa~nha.m pucchitaaro. sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu abhidhamme abhivinaye pa~nha.m pu.t.tho na sampaayati, tassa bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena yo ayamaayasmaa abhidhamme abhivinaye pa~nha.m pu.t.tho na sampaayatii'ti -- tassa bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa ^a^M2.0137^ea^ aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa abhidhamme abhivinaye yogo kara.niiyo.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso ^a^V2.0147^ea^, bhikkhunaa ye te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe aaruppaa tattha yogo kara.niiyo. santaavuso, aara~n~nika.m bhikkhu.m ye te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe aaruppaa tattha pa~nha.m pucchitaaro. sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu ye te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe aaruppaa tattha pa~nha.m pu.t.tho na sampaayati, tassa bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena yo ayamaayasmaa ye te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe aaruppaa tattha pa~nha.m pu.t.tho na sampaayatii'ti -- tassa ^a^T2.0220^ea^ bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa ye te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe aaruppaa tattha yogo kara.niiyo.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa uttari manussadhamme yogo kara.niiyo. santaavuso, aara~n~nika.m bhikkhu.m uttari manussadhamme pa~nha.m pucchitaaro. sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu uttari manussadhamme pa~nha.m pu.t.tho na sampaayati, tassa bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena yo ayamaayasmaa yassatthaaya pabbajito tamattha.m na jaanaatii'ti -- tassa bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa uttari manussadhamme yogo kara.niiyo''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano {mahaamoggalaano (ka0)} aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``aara~n~nikeneva nu kho, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhunaa ime dhammaa samaadaaya vattitabbaa udaahu gaamantavihaarinaapii''ti ^a^P1.0473^ea^? ``aara~n~nikenaapi kho, aavuso moggallaana, bhikkhunaa ime dhammaa samaadaaya vattitabbaa pageva gaamantavihaarinaa''ti.
[06] goliyaanisutta.m ni.t.thita.m navama.m.

[03] 174^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0221^ea^ ^a^M2.0138^ea^ ^a^V2.0148^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kaasiisu caarika.m carati mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aha.m kho, bhikkhave, a~n~natreva rattibhojanaa {rattibhojana.m (ka0)} bhu~njaami. a~n~natra kho panaaha.m, bhikkhave, rattibhojanaa bhu~njamaano appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaanaami appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca phaasuvihaara~nca. etha, tumhepi, bhikkhave, a~n~natreva rattibhojanaa bhu~njatha. a~n~natra kho pana, bhikkhave, tumhepi rattibhojanaa bhu~njamaanaa appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaanissatha appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca phaasuvihaara~ncaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. atha kho bhagavaa kaasiisu anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena kii.taagiri naama kaasiina.m nigamo tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa kii.taagirismi.m viharati kaasiina.m nigame.

[03] 175^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena assajipunabbasukaa naama bhikkhuu kii.taagirismi.m aavaasikaa honti. atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena assajipunabbasukaa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa assajipunabbasuke bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``bhagavaa kho, aavuso, a~n~natreva rattibhojanaa bhu~njati bhikkhusa"ngho ca. a~n~natra kho panaavuso, rattibhojanaa bhu~njamaanaa appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaananti appaata"nkata~nca ^a^T2.0222^ea^ lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca phaasuvihaara~nca. etha, tumhepi, aavuso, a~n~natreva rattibhojanaa bhu~njatha. a~n~natra kho panaavuso, tumhepi rattibhojanaa bhu~njamaanaa appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaanissatha appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca phaasuvihaara~ncaa''ti ^a^P1.0474^ea^. eva.m vutte, assajipunabbasukaa bhikkhuu te bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``maya.m kho, aavuso, saaya~nceva bhu~njaama paato ca divaa ca vikaale. te maya.m saaya~nceva bhu~njamaanaa paato ca divaa ca vikaale appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaanaama appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca phaasuvihaara~nca. te maya.m ki.m sandi.t.thika.m hitvaa kaalika.m anudhaavissaama? saaya~nceva maya.m bhu~njissaama paato ca divaa ca vikaale''ti.

[03] yato ^a^V2.0149^ea^ kho te bhikkhuu naasakkhi.msu assajipunabbasuke bhikkhuu sa~n~naapetu.m, atha yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ^a^M2.0139^ea^ ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``idha maya.m, bhante, yena assajipunabbasukaa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkamimha; upasa"nkamitvaa assajipunabbasuke bhikkhuu etadavocumha -- `bhagavaa kho, aavuso, a~n~natreva rattibhojanaa bhu~njati bhikkhusa"ngho ca; a~n~natra kho panaavuso, rattibhojanaa bhu~njamaanaa appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaananti appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca phaasuvihaara~nca. etha, tumhepi, aavuso ^a^T2.0223^ea^, a~n~natreva rattibhojanaa bhu~njatha. a~n~natra kho panaavuso, tumhepi rattibhojanaa bhu~njamaanaa appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaanissatha appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca phaasuvihaara~ncaa'ti. eva.m vutte, bhante, assajipunabbasukaa bhikkhuu amhe etadavocu.m -- `maya.m kho, aavuso, saaya~nceva bhu~njaama paato ca divaa ca vikaale. te maya.m saaya~nceva bhu~njamaanaa paato ca divaa ca vikaale appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaanaama appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca phaasuvihaara~nca. te maya.m ki.m sandi.t.thika.m hitvaa kaalika.m anudhaavissaama? saaya~nceva maya.m bhu~njissaama paato ca divaa ca vikaale'ti. yato kho maya.m, bhante, naasakkhimha assajipunabbasuke bhikkhuu sa~n~naapetu.m, atha maya.m etamattha.m bhagavato aarocemaa''ti.

[03] 176^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, bhikkhu, mama vacanena assajipunabbasuke bhikkhuu aamantehi -- `satthaa aayasmante aamantetii'''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yena assajipunabbasukaa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa assajipunabbasuke bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``satthaa aayasmante aamantetii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho assajipunabbasukaa bhikkhuu tassa bhikkhuno pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinne kho assajipunabbasuke bhikkhuu bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sacca.m kira, bhikkhave, sambahulaa bhikkhuu tumhe upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^T2.0224^ea^ etadavocu.m -- `bhagavaa kho, aavuso, a~n~natreva rattibhojanaa bhu~njati bhikkhusa"ngho ca. a~n~natra kho panaavuso, rattibhojanaa bhu~njamaanaa appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaananti appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca phaasuvihaara~nca. etha, tumhepi, aavuso, a~n~natreva rattibhojanaa bhu~njatha. a~n~natra kho panaavuso, tumhepi rattibhojanaa ^a^V2.0150^ea^ bhu~njamaanaa ^a^P1.0475^ea^ appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaanissatha appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca phaasuvihaara~ncaa'ti. eva.m vutte ^a^M2.0140^ea^ kira {ki.m nu (ka0)}, bhikkhave, tumhe te bhikkhuu eva.m avacuttha -- `maya.m kho panaavuso, saaya~nceva bhu~njaama paato ca divaa ca vikaale. te maya.m saaya~nceva bhu~njamaanaa paato ca divaa ca vikaale appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaanaama appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca phaasuvihaara~nca. te maya.m ki.m sandi.t.thika.m hitvaa kaalika.m anudhaavissaama? saaya~nceva maya.m bhu~njissaama paato ca divaa ca vikaale'''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] 177^b^.^eb^ ``ki.m nu me tumhe, bhikkhave, eva.m dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaatha ya.m ki~ncaaya.m purisapuggalo pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tassa akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``nanu me tumhe, bhikkhave, eva.m dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaatha idhekaccassa ya.m evaruupa.m sukha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, idha panekaccassa evaruupa.m sukha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti ^a^T2.0225^ea^, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, idhekaccassa evaruupa.m dukkha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, idha panekaccassa evaruupa.m dukkha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, idhekaccassa evaruupa.m adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, idha panekaccassa evaruupa.m adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] 178^b^.^eb^ ``saadhu, bhikkhave! mayaa ceta.m, bhikkhave, a~n~naata.m abhavissa adi.t.tha.m avidita.m asacchikata.m aphassita.m pa~n~naaya -- `idhekaccassa evaruupa.m sukha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, evaaha.m ajaananto `evaruupa.m sukha.m vedana.m pajahathaa'ti vadeyya.m; api nu me eta.m, bhikkhave, patiruupa.m abhavissaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``yasmaa ca kho eta.m, bhikkhave, mayaa ~naata.m di.t.tha.m vidita.m sacchikata.m phassita.m pa~n~naaya -- `idhekaccassa evaruupa.m sukha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa ^a^P1.0476^ea^ abhiva.d.dhanti kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, tasmaaha.m `evaruupa.m sukha.m vedana.m pajahathaa'ti vadaami. mayaa ceta.m, bhikkhave, a~n~naata.m abhavissa adi.t.tha.m avidita.m asacchikata.m ^a^M2.0141^ea^ aphassita.m pa~n~naaya -- `idhekaccassa evaruupa.m ^a^V2.0151^ea^ sukha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa ^a^T2.0226^ea^ dhammaa parihaayanti kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, evaaha.m ajaananto `evaruupa.m sukha.m vedana.m upasampajja viharathaa'ti vadeyya.m; api nu me eta.m, bhikkhave, patiruupa.m abhavissaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``yasmaa ca kho eta.m, bhikkhave, mayaa ~naata.m di.t.tha.m vidita.m sacchikata.m phassita.m pa~n~naaya -- `idhekaccassa evaruupa.m sukha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, tasmaaha.m `evaruupa.m sukha.m vedana.m upasampajja viharathaa'ti vadaami.

[03] 179^b^.^eb^ ``mayaa ceta.m, bhikkhave, a~n~naata.m abhavissa adi.t.tha.m avidita.m asacchikata.m aphassita.m pa~n~naaya -- `idhekaccassa evaruupa.m dukkha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, evaaha.m ajaananto `evaruupa.m dukkha.m vedana.m pajahathaa'ti vadeyya.m; api nu me eta.m, bhikkhave, patiruupa.m abhavissaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``yasmaa ca kho eta.m, bhikkhave, mayaa ~naata.m di.t.tha.m vidita.m sacchikata.m phassita.m pa~n~naaya -- `idhekaccassa evaruupa.m dukkha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, tasmaaha.m `evaruupa.m dukkha.m vedana.m pajahathaa'ti vadaami. mayaa ceta.m, bhikkhave, a~n~naata.m abhavissa adi.t.tha.m avidita.m asacchikata.m aphassita.m pa~n~naaya -- `idhekaccassa evaruupa.m dukkha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, evaaha.m ajaananto `evaruupa.m dukkha.m vedana.m upasampajja viharathaa'ti vadeyya.m; api nu me eta.m, bhikkhave, patiruupa.m abhavissaa''ti ^a^T2.0227^ea^? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``yasmaa ca kho eta.m, bhikkhave, mayaa ~naata.m di.t.tha.m vidita.m sacchikata.m phassita.m pa~n~naaya -- `idhekaccassa evaruupa.m dukkha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, tasmaaha.m `evaruupa.m dukkha.m vedana.m upasampajja viharathaa'ti vadaami.

[03] 180^b^.^eb^ ``mayaa ceta.m, bhikkhave, a~n~naata.m abhavissa adi.t.tha.m avidita.m asacchikata.m aphassita.m pa~n~naaya -- `idhekaccassa evaruupa.m adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, evaaha.m ajaananto `evaruupa.m adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m pajahathaa'ti vadeyya.m; api nu me eta.m, bhikkhave, patiruupa.m abhavissaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``yasmaa ca kho eta.m, bhikkhave, mayaa ~naata.m di.t.tha.m vidita.m sacchikata.m phassita.m pa~n~naaya ^a^M2.0142^ea^ -- `idhekaccassa evaruupa.m adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, tasmaaha.m `evaruupa.m adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m pajahathaa'ti vadaami''. mayaa ceta.m, bhikkhave, a~n~naata.m abhavissa adi.t.tha.m avidita.m asacchikata.m aphassita.m pa~n~naaya ^a^V2.0152^ea^ -- `idhekaccassa evaruupa.m adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, evaaha.m ajaananto `evaruupa.m adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m upasampajja viharathaa'ti vadeyya.m; api nu me eta.m, bhikkhave, patiruupa.m abhavissaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``yasmaa ca kho eta.m, bhikkhave, mayaa ~naata.m di.t.tha.m ^a^T2.0228^ea^ vidita.m sacchikata.m phassita.m pa~n~naaya -- `idhekaccassa evaruupa.m adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, tasmaaha.m `evaruupa.m ^a^P1.0477^ea^ adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m upasampajja viharathaa'ti vadaami.

[03] 181^b^.^eb^ ``naaha.m, bhikkhave, sabbesa.myeva bhikkhuuna.m `appamaadena kara.niiya'nti vadaami; na panaaha.m, bhikkhave, sabbesa.myeva bhikkhuuna.m `na appamaadena kara.niiya'nti vadaami. ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu arahanto khii.naasavaa vusitavanto katakara.niiyaa ohitabhaaraa anuppattasadatthaa parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojanaa sammada~n~naa vimuttaa, tathaaruupaanaaha.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m `na appamaadena kara.niiya'nti vadaami. ta.m kissa hetu? kata.m tesa.m appamaadena. abhabbaa te pamajjitu.m. ye ca kho te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu sekkhaa appattamaanasaa anuttara.m yogakkhema.m patthayamaanaa viharanti, tathaaruupaanaaha.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m `appamaadena kara.niiya'ntntti vadaami. ta.m kissa hetu? appeva naamime aayasmanto anulomikaani senaasanaani pa.tisevamaanaa kalyaa.namitte bhajamaanaa indriyaani samannaanayamaanaa -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyyunti! ima.m kho aha.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m bhikkhuuna.m appamaadaphala.m sampassamaano `appamaadena kara.niiya'ntntti vadaami.

[03] 182^b^.^eb^ ``sattime ^a^T2.0229^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame satta? ubhatobhaagavimutto, pa~n~naavimutto, kaayasakkhi, di.t.thippatto, saddhaavimutto, dhammaanusaarii, saddhaanusaarii.

[03] ``katamo ^a^M2.0143^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, puggalo ubhatobhaagavimutto? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ye te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe aaruppaa te kaayena phusitvaa {phassitvaa (sii0 pii0)} viharati pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa ^a^V2.0153^ea^ aasavaa parikkhii.naa honti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo ubhatobhaagavimutto imassa kho aha.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno `na appamaadena kara.niiya'nti vadaami. ta.m kissa hetu? kata.m tassa appamaadena. abhabbo so pamajjitu.m.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo pa~n~naavimutto? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ye te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe aaruppaa te na kaayena phusitvaa viharati, pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa aasavaa parikkhii.naa honti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo ^a^P1.0478^ea^ pa~n~naavimutto. imassapi kho aha.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno `na appamaadena kara.niiya'nti vadaami. ta.m kissa hetu? kata.m tassa appamaadena. abhabbo so pamajjitu.m.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo kaayasakkhi? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ye te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe aaruppaa ^a^T2.0230^ea^ te kaayena phusitvaa viharati, pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa ekacce aasavaa parikkhii.naa honti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo kaayasakkhi. imassa kho aha.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno `appamaadena kara.niiya'nti vadaami. ta.m kissa hetu? appeva naama ayamaayasmaa anulomikaani senaasanaani pa.tisevamaano kalyaa.namitte bhajamaano indriyaani samannaanayamaano -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyyaati! ima.m kho aha.m, bhikkhave, imassa bhikkhuno appamaadaphala.m sampassamaano `appamaadena kara.niiya'ntntti vadaami.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo di.t.thippatto? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ye te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe aaruppaa te na kaayena phusitvaa viharati, pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa ekacce aasavaa parikkhii.naa honti, tathaagatappaveditaa cassa dhammaa pa~n~naaya vodi.t.thaa honti vocaritaa. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo di.t.thippatto. imassapi kho aha.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno `appamaadena kara.niiya'nti vadaami. ta.m kissa ^a^M2.0144^ea^ hetu? appeva naama ayamaayasmaa anulomikaani senaasanaani pa.tisevamaano kalyaa.namitte bhajamaano indriyaani samannaanayamaano -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m ^a^T2.0231^ea^ ^a^V2.0154^ea^ di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyyaati! ima.m kho aha.m, bhikkhave, imassa bhikkhuno appamaadaphala.m sampassamaano `appamaadena kara.niiya'ntntti vadaami.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo saddhaavimutto. idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ye te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe aaruppaa te na kaayena phusitvaa viharati, pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa ekacce aasavaa parikkhii.naa honti, tathaagate cassa saddhaa nivi.t.thaa hoti muulajaataa pati.t.thitaa. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo saddhaavimutto. imassapi kho aha.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno `appamaadena kara.niiya'ntntti vadaami. ta.m kissa hetu? appeva naama ayamaayasmaa anulomikaani senaasanaani ^a^P1.0479^ea^ pa.tisevamaano kalyaa.namitte bhajamaano indriyaani samannaanayamaano -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyyaati! ima.m kho aha.m, bhikkhave, imassa bhikkhuno appamaadaphala.m sampassamaano `appamaadena kara.niiya'ntntti vadaami.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo dhammaanusaarii? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ye te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe aaruppaa te na kaayena phusitvaa viharati, pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa ekacce aasavaa parikkhii.naa {disvaa aasavaa aparikkhii.naa (sii0 pii0)} honti, tathaagatappaveditaa cassa ^a^T2.0232^ea^ dhammaa pa~n~naaya mattaso nijjhaana.m khamanti, api cassa ime dhammaa honti, seyyathida.m -- saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo dhammaanusaarii. imassapi kho aha.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno `appamaadena kara.niiya'nti vadaami. ta.m kissa hetu? appeva naama ayamaayasmaa anulomikaani senaasanaani pa.tisevamaano kalyaa.namitte bhajamaano indriyaani samannaanayamaano -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyyaati ^a^M2.0145^ea^! ima.m kho aha.m, bhikkhave, imassa bhikkhuno appamaadaphala.m sampassamaano `appamaadena kara.niiya'nti vadaami.

[03] ``katamo ^a^V2.0155^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, puggalo saddhaanusaarii? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ye te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe aaruppaa te na kaayena phusitvaa viharati, pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa ekacce aasavaa parikkhii.naa {disvaa aasavaa aparikkhii.naa (sii0 pii0)} honti, tathaagate cassa saddhaamatta.m hoti pemamatta.m, api cassa ime dhammaa honti, seyyathida.m -- saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo saddhaanusaarii. imassapi kho aha.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno `appamaadena kara.niiya'ntntti vadaami. ta.m kissa hetu? appeva naama ayamaayasmaa anulomikaani senaasanaani pa.tisevamaano ^a^T2.0233^ea^ kalyaa.namitte bhajamaano indriyaani samannaanayamaano -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyyaati! ima.m kho aha.m, bhikkhave, imassa bhikkhuno appamaadaphala.m sampassamaano `appamaadena kara.niiya'ntntti vadaami.

[03] 183^b^.^eb^ ``naaha.m, bhikkhave, aadikeneva a~n~naaraadhana.m vadaami; api ca, bhikkhave, anupubbasikkhaa anupubbakiriyaa anupubbapa.tipadaa ^a^P1.0480^ea^ a~n~naaraadhanaa hoti. katha~nca, bhikkhave, anupubbasikkhaa anupubbakiriyaa anupubbapa.tipadaa a~n~naaraadhanaa hoti? idha, bhikkhave, saddhaajaato upasa"nkamati, upasa"nkamanto payirupaasati, payirupaasanto sota.m odahati, ohitasoto dhamma.m su.naati, sutvaa dhamma.m dhaareti, dhataana.m {dhaataana.m (ka0)} dhammaana.m attha.m upaparikkhati, attha.m upaparikkhato dhammaa nijjhaana.m khamanti, dhammanijjhaanakkhantiyaa sati chando jaayati, chandajaato ussahati, ussaahetvaa tuleti, tulayitvaa padahati, pahitatto samaano kaayena ceva paramasacca.m sacchikaroti, pa~n~naaya ca na.m ativijjha passati. saapi naama, bhikkhave, saddhaa naahosi; tampi naama, bhikkhave, upasa"nkamana.m naahosi; saapi naama, bhikkhave, payirupaasanaa naahosi; tampi naama, bhikkhave, sotaavadhaana.m naahosi ^a^M2.0146^ea^; tampi naama, bhikkhave, dhammassavana.m naahosi; saapi naama, bhikkhave, dhammadhaara.naa naahosi; saapi naama, bhikkhave, atthuupaparikkhaa naahosi; saapi naama, bhikkhave, dhammanijjhaanakkhanti ^a^T2.0234^ea^ naahosi; sopi naama, bhikkhave, chando naahosi; sopi naama, bhikkhave, ussaaho naahosi; saapi naama, bhikkhave, tulanaa naahosi; tampi naama, bhikkhave, padhaana.m naahosi. vippa.tipannaattha, bhikkhave, micchaapa.tipannaattha, bhikkhave. kiiva duurevime, bhikkhave, moghapurisaa apakkantaa imamhaa dhammavinayaa.

[03] 184^b^.^eb^ ``atthi ^a^V2.0156^ea^, bhikkhave, catuppada.m veyyaakara.na.m yassuddi.t.thassa vi~n~nuu puriso nacirasseva pa~n~naayattha.m aajaaneyya. uddisissaami vo {uddi.t.thassaapi (ka0)}, bhikkhave, aajaanissatha me ta''nti? ``ke ca maya.m, bhante, ke ca dhammassa a~n~naataaro''ti? yopi so, bhikkhave, satthaa aamisagaru aamisadaayaado aamisehi sa.msa.t.tho viharati tassa paaya.m evaruupii pa.nopa.naviyaa na upeti -- `eva~nca no assa atha na.m kareyyaama, na ca no evamassa na na.m kareyyaamaa'ti, ki.m pana, bhikkhave, ya.m tathaagato sabbaso aamisehi visa.msa.t.tho viharati. saddhassa, bhikkhave, saavakassa satthusaasane pariyogaahiya {pariyogaaya (sii0 pii0 ka0), pariyogayha (syaa0 ka.m0)} vattato ayamanudhammo hoti -- `satthaa bhagavaa, saavakohamasmi; jaanaati bhagavaa, naaha.m jaanaamii'ti. saddhassa, bhikkhave, saavakassa satthusaasane pariyogaahiya vattato ru.lhaniiya.m {rumhaniya.m (sii0 pii0)} satthusaasana.m hoti ojavanta.m. saddhassa, bhikkhave, saavakassa satthusaasane pariyogaahiya ^a^P1.0481^ea^ vattato ayamanudhammo hoti -- `kaama.m taco ca nhaaru ca a.t.thi ca avasissatu, sariire upasussatu {upasussatu sariire (sii0), sariire avasussatu (ka0)} ma.msalohita.m, ya.m ^a^T2.0235^ea^ ta.m purisathaamena purisaviiriyena purisaparakkamena pattabba.m na ta.m apaapu.nitvaa viiriyassa sa.n.thaana.m {santhaana.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} bhavissatii'ti. saddhassa, bhikkhave, saavakassa satthusaasane pariyogaahiya vattato dvinna.m phalaana.m a~n~natara.m phala.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- di.t.theva dhamme a~n~naa, sati vaa upaadisese anaagaamitaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca ^a^M2.0147^ea^ bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] kii.taagirisutta.m ni.t.thita.m dasama.m.
[06] bhikkhuvaggo ni.t.thito dutiyo.

[03] 185^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0236^ea^ ^a^M2.0148^ea^ ^a^V2.0157^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. tena kho pana samayena vacchagotto paribbaajako ekapu.n.dariike paribbaajakaaraame pa.tivasati. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya vesaali.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``atippago kho taava vesaaliya.m pi.n.daaya caritu.m; ya.mnuunaaha.m yena ekapu.n.dariiko paribbaajakaaraamo yena vacchagotto paribbaajako tenupasa"nkameyya''nti. atha kho bhagavaa yena ekapu.n.dariiko paribbaajakaaraamo yena vacchagotto paribbaajako tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho vacchagotto paribbaajako bhagavanta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``etu kho, bhante, bhagavaa. svaagata.m {saagata.m (sii0 pii0)}, bhante, bhagavato. cirassa.m kho, bhante, bhagavaa ima.m pariyaayamakaasi yadida.m idhaagamanaaya. nisiidatu, bhante, bhagavaa idamaasana.m pa~n~natta''nti. nisiidi bhagavaa pa~n~natte aasane. vacchagottopi kho paribbaajako a~n~natara.m ^a^P1.0482^ea^ niica.m aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m ^a^T2.0237^ea^ nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``suta.m meta.m, bhante -- `sama.no gotamo sabba~n~nuu sabbadassaavii, aparise+sa.m ~naa.nadassana.m pa.tijaanaati, carato ca me ti.t.thato ca suttassa ca jaagarassa ca satata.m samita.m ~naa.nadassana.m paccupa.t.thita'nti. ye te, bhante, evamaaha.msu -- `sama.no gotamo sabba~n~nuu sabbadassaavii, aparisesa.m ~naa.nadassana.m pa.tijaanaati, carato ca me ti.t.thato ca suttassa ca jaagarassa ca satata.m samita.m ~naa.nadassana.m paccupa.t.thita'nti, kacci te, bhante, bhagavato vuttavaadino, na ca bhagavanta.m abhuutena abbhaacikkhanti, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakaronti, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado gaarayha.m ^a^V2.0158^ea^ .thaana.m aagacchatii''ti? ``ye te, vaccha, evamaaha.msu -- `sama.no gotamo sabba~n~nuu sabbadassaavii, aparisesa.m ~naa.nadassana.m pa.tijaanaati, carato ca me ti.t.thato ca suttassa ca jaagarassa ca satata.m samita.m ~naa.nadassana.m paccupa.t.thita'nti, na me te vuttavaadino, abbhaacikkhanti ca pana ma.m asataa abhuutenaa''ti.

[03] 186^b^.^eb^ ``katha.m ^a^M2.0149^ea^ byaakaramaanaa pana maya.m, bhante, vuttavaadino ceva bhagavato assaama, na ca bhagavanta.m abhuutena abbhaacikkheyyaama, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakareyyaama, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagaccheyyaa''ti?

[03] ```tevijjo sama.no gotamo'ti kho, vaccha, byaakaramaano vuttavaadii ceva me assa, na ca ma.m ^a^T2.0238^ea^ abhuutena abbhaacikkheyya, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakareyya, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagaccheyya. aha~nhi, vaccha, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussaraami, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussaraami. aha~nhi, vaccha, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passaami cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaami. aha~nhi, vaccha, aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaami.

[03] ```tevijjo sama.no gotamo'ti ^a^P1.0483^ea^ kho, vaccha, byaakaramaano vuttavaadii ceva me assa, na ca ma.m abhuutena abbhaacikkheyya, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakareyya, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagaccheyyaa''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, vacchagotto paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``atthi nu kho, bho gotama, koci gihii gihisa.myojana.m appahaaya kaayassa bhedaa dukkhassantakaro''ti? ``natthi kho, vaccha, koci gihii gihisa.myojana.m appahaaya kaayassa bhedaa dukkhassantakaro''ti.

[03] ``atthi ^a^V2.0159^ea^ pana, bho gotama, koci gihii gihisa.myojana.m appahaaya kaayassa bhedaa sagguupago''ti? ``na kho, vaccha, eka.myeva sata.m na dve sataani na ^a^T2.0239^ea^ tii.ni sataani na cattaari sataani na pa~nca sataani, atha kho bhiyyova ye gihii gihisa.myojana.m appahaaya kaayassa bhedaa sagguupagaa''ti {``atthi kho vaccha koci gihii gihisa.myojana.m appahaaya kaayassa bhedaa sagguupagoti''. (ka0)}.
[03] ``atthi ^a^M2.0150^ea^ nu kho, bho gotama, koci aajiivako {aajiiviko (ka0)} kaayassa bhedaa dukkhassantakaro''ti? ``natthi kho, vaccha, koci aajiivako kaayassa bhedaa dukkhassantakaro''ti.

[03] ``atthi pana, bho gotama, koci aajiivako kaayassa bhedaa sagguupago''ti? ``ito kho so, vaccha, ekanavuto kappo {ito ko vaccha ekanavute kappe (ka0)} yamaha.m anussaraami, naabhijaanaami ka~nci aajiivaka.m sagguupaga.m a~n~natra ekena; sopaasi kammavaadii kiriyavaadii''ti. ``eva.m sante, bho gotama, su~n~na.m adu.m titthaayatana.m antamaso sagguupagenapii''ti? ``eva.m, vaccha, su~n~na.m adu.m titthaayatana.m antamaso sagguupagenapii''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano vacchagotto paribbaajako bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] tevijjavacchasutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 187^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0240^ea^ ^a^V2.0160^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho vacchagotto paribbaajako yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^P1.0484^ea^ bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``ki.m nu kho, bho gotama, `sassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti -- eva.mdi.t.thi {eva.mdi.t.thii (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} bhava.m gotamo''ti? ``na kho aha.m, vaccha, eva.mdi.t.thi -- `sassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'''nti.

[03] ``ki.m pana, bho gotama, `asassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti -- eva.mdi.t.thi bhava.m gotamo''ti? ``na kho aha.m, vaccha, eva.mdi.t.thi -- `asassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'''nti.

[03] ``ki.m ^a^M2.0151^ea^ nu kho, bho gotama, `antavaa loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti -- eva.mdi.t.thi bhava.m gotamo''ti? ``na kho aha.m, vaccha, eva.mdi.t.thi -- `antavaa loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'''nti.

[03] ``ki.m pana, bho gotama, `anantavaa loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti -- eva.mdi.t.thi bhava.m gotamo''ti? ``na kho aha.m, vaccha, eva.mdi.t.thi -- `anantavaa loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'''nti.

[03] ``ki.m pana, bho gotama, `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira.m, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti -- eva.mdi.t.thi bhava.m gotamo''ti? ``na kho aha.m, vaccha, eva.mdi.t.thi -- `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira.m, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'''nti.

[03] ``ki.m nu kho, bho gotama, `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti -- eva.mdi.t.thi bhava.m gotamo''ti? ``na kho aha.m, vaccha, eva.mdi.t.thi -- `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'''nti.
