[03] 188^b^.^eb^ ```ki.m ^a^T2.0242^ea^ nu kho, bho gotama, sassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~nanti -- eva.mdi.t.thi bhava.m gotamo'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano `na ^a^M2.0152^ea^ kho aha.m, vaccha, eva.mdi.t.thi -- sassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti vadesi {moghama~n~nantiiti vadesi (sii0), moghama~n~nanti iti vadesi (?)}. `ki.m pana, bho gotama, asassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~nanti -- eva.mdi.t.thi bhava.m gotamo'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano `na kho aha.m, vaccha ^a^V2.0162^ea^, eva.mdi.t.thi -- asassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti vadesi. `ki.m nu kho, bho gotama, antavaa loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~nanti -- eva.mdi.t.thi bhava.m gotamo'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano `na kho aha.m, vaccha, eva.mdi.t.thi -- antavaa loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti vadesi. `ki.m pana, bho gotama, anantavaa loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~nanti -- eva.mdi.t.thi bhava.m gotamo'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano `na kho aha.m, vaccha, eva.mdi.t.thi -- anantavaa loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti vadesi. `ki.m nu kho, bho gotama, ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira.m, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~nanti -- eva.mdi.t.thi bhava.m gotamo'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano `na kho aha.m, vaccha, eva.mdi.t.thi -- ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira.m, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti vadesi. `ki.m pana, bho gotama, a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira.m, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~nanti -- eva.mdi.t.thi bhava.m gotamo'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano `na kho aha.m, vaccha, eva.mdi.t.thi -- a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira.m, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti vadesi. `ki.m nu kho, bho gotama, hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~nanti -- eva.mdi.t.thi bhava.m gotamo'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano `na kho aha.m, vaccha, eva.mdi.t.thi -- hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti vadesi.

[01] ```ki.m pana, bho gotama, na hoti tathaagato para.m ^a^T2.0243^ea^ mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~nanti -- eva.mdi.t.thi bhava.m gotamo'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano `na kho aha.m, vaccha, eva.mdi.t.thi -- na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti vadesi. `ki.m nu kho, bho gotama, hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~nanti -- eva.mdi.t.thi bhava.m gotamo'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano `na kho aha.m, vaccha, eva.mdi.t.thi -- hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti vadesi. `ki.m pana, bho gotama, neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~nanti -- eva.mdi.t.thi bhava.m gotamo'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano `na kho ^a^M2.0153^ea^ aha.m, vaccha, eva.mdi.t.thi -- neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti vadesi.
[03] ``ki.m pana bho gotamo aadiinava.m sampassamaano eva.m imaani sabbaso di.t.thigataani anupagato''ti?

[03] 189^b^.^eb^ ```sassato loko'ti kho, vaccha, di.t.thigatameta.m di.t.thigahana.m di.t.thikantaaro {di.t.thikantaara.m (sii0 pii0)} di.t.thivisuuka.m di.t.thivipphandita.m di.t.thisa.myojana.m sadukkha.m savighaata.m saupaayaasa.m sapari.laaha.m, na nibbidaaya na ^a^V2.0163^ea^ viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati ^a^T2.0244^ea^. `asassato loko'ti kho, vaccha...pe0... `antavaa loko'ti kho, vaccha...pe0... `anantavaa loko'ti kho, vaccha...pe0... `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti kho, vaccha...pe0... `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti kho, vaccha...pe0... `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti kho, vaccha ^a^P1.0486^ea^ ...pe0... `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti kho, vaccha...pe0... `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti kho, vaccha...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti kho, vaccha, di.t.thigatameta.m di.t.thigahana.m di.t.thikantaaro di.t.thivisuuka.m di.t.thivipphandita.m di.t.thisa.myojana.m sadukkha.m savighaata.m saupaayaasa.m sapari.laaha.m, na nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. ima.m kho aha.m, vaccha, aadiinava.m sampassamaano eva.m imaani sabbaso di.t.thigataani anupagato''ti.

[03] ``atthi pana bhoto gotamassa ki~nci di.t.thigata''nti? ``di.t.thigatanti kho, vaccha, apaniitameta.m tathaagatassa. di.t.tha~nheta.m, vaccha, tathaagatena -- `iti ruupa.m, iti ruupassa samudayo, iti ruupassa attha"ngamo; iti vedanaa, iti vedanaaya samudayo, iti vedanaaya attha"ngamo; iti sa~n~naa, iti sa~n~naaya samudayo, iti sa~n~naaya attha"ngamo; iti sa"nkhaaraa, iti sa"nkhaaraana.m samudayo, iti sa"nkhaaraana.m attha"ngamo; iti vi~n~naa.na.m, iti vi~n~naa.nassa samudayo, iti vi~n~naa.nassa attha"ngamo'ti. tasmaa tathaagato sabbama~n~nitaana.m sabbamathitaana.m sabbaaha.mkaaramama.mkaaramaanaanusayaana.m khayaa viraagaa ^a^T2.0245^ea^ nirodhaa caagaa pa.tinissaggaa anupaadaa vimuttoti vadaamii''ti.

[03] 190^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m ^a^M2.0154^ea^ vimuttacitto pana, bho gotama, bhikkhu kuhi.m upapajjatii''ti? ``upapajjatiiti kho, vaccha, na upeti''. ``tena hi, bho gotama, na upapajjatii''ti? ``na upapajjatiiti kho, vaccha, na upeti''. ``tena hi, bho gotama, upapajjati ca na ca upapajjatii''ti? ``upapajjati ca na ca upapajjatiiti kho, vaccha, na upeti''. ``tena hi, bho gotama, neva upapajjati na na upapajjatii''ti? ``neva upapajjati na na upapajjatiiti kho, vaccha, na upeti''.

[03] ```eva.m ^a^V2.0164^ea^ vimuttacitto pana, bho gotama, bhikkhu kuhi.m upapajjatii'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano `upapajjatiiti kho, vaccha, na upetii'ti vadesi. `tena hi, bho gotama, na upapajjatii'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano `na upapajjatiiti kho, vaccha, na upetii'ti vadesi. `tena hi, bho gotama, upapajjati ca na ca upapajjatii'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano `upapajjati ca na ca upapajjatiiti kho, vaccha, na upetii'ti vadesi. `tena hi, bho gotama, neva upapajjati na na upapajjatii'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano `neva upapajjati na na ^a^P1.0487^ea^ upapajjatiiti kho, vaccha, na upetii'ti vadesi. etthaaha.m, bho gotama, a~n~naa.namaapaadi.m, ettha sammohamaapaadi.m. yaapi me esaa bhoto gotamassa purimena kathaasallaapena ahu pasaadamattaa ^a^T2.0246^ea^ saapi me etarahi antarahitaa''ti. ``ala~nhi te, vaccha, a~n~naa.naaya, ala.m sammohaaya. gambhiiro haaya.m, vaccha, dhammo duddaso duranubodho santo pa.niito atakkaavacaro nipu.no pa.n.ditavedaniiyo. so tayaa dujjaano a~n~nadi.t.thikena a~n~nakhantikena a~n~narucikena a~n~natrayogena {a~n~natraayogena (dii0 ni0 1.420)} a~n~natraacariyakena'' {a~n~natthaacariyakena (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}.

[03] 191^b^.^eb^ ``tena hi, vaccha, ta~n~nevettha pa.tipucchissaami; yathaa te khameyya tathaa na.m byaakareyyaasi. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, vaccha, sace te purato aggi jaleyya, jaaneyyaasi tva.m -- `aya.m me purato aggi jalatii'''ti? ``sace me, bho gotama, purato aggi jaleyya, jaaneyyaaha.m -- `aya.m me purato aggi jalatii'''ti.

[03] ``sace pana ta.m, vaccha, eva.m puccheyya -- `yo te aya.m purato aggi jalati aya.m aggi ki.m pa.ticca jalatii'ti, eva.m pu.t.tho tva.m, vaccha, kinti byaakareyyaasii''ti? ``sace ma.m, bho gotama, eva.m puccheyya -- `yo te aya.m purato aggi jalati aya.m aggi ki.m pa.ticca jalatii'ti, eva.m pu.t.tho aha.m, bho gotama, eva.m byaakareyya.m ^a^M2.0155^ea^ -- `yo me aya.m purato aggi jalati aya.m aggi ti.naka.t.thupaadaana.m pa.ticca jalatii'''ti.

[03] ``sace te, vaccha, purato so aggi nibbaayeyya, jaaneyyaasi tva.m -- `aya.m me purato aggi nibbuto'''ti? ``sace me, bho gotama, purato so aggi nibbaayeyya, jaaneyyaaha.m -- `aya.m me purato aggi nibbuto'''ti.

[03] ``sace ^a^V2.0165^ea^ pana ta.m, vaccha, eva.m puccheyya -- `yo te aya.m purato aggi nibbuto so aggi ito katama.m ^a^T2.0247^ea^ disa.m gato -- puratthima.m vaa dakkhi.na.m vaa pacchima.m vaa uttara.m vaa'ti, eva.m pu.t.tho tva.m, vaccha, kinti byaakareyyaasii''ti? ``na upeti, bho gotama, ya~nhi so, bho gotama, aggi ti.naka.t.thupaadaana.m pa.ticca ajali {jalati (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} tassa ca pariyaadaanaa a~n~nassa ca anupahaaraa anaahaaro nibbuto tveva sa"nkhya.m gacchatii''ti.

[03] 192^b^.^eb^ ``evameva kho, vaccha, yena ruupena tathaagata.m pa~n~naapayamaano pa~n~naapeyya ta.m ruupa.m tathaagatassa pahiina.m ucchinnamuula.m taalaavatthukata.m anabhaava.mkata.m aayati.m anuppaadadhamma.m. ruupasa"nkhayavimutto {ruupasa"nkhaavimutto (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0) eva.m vedanaasa"nkhayaadiisupi} kho, vaccha, tathaagato gambhiiro appameyyo duppariyogaa.lho -- seyyathaapi mahaasamuddo. upapajjatiiti na upeti, na upapajjatiiti na upeti, upapajjati ^a^P1.0488^ea^ ca na ca upapajjatiiti na upeti, neva upapajjati na na upapajjatiiti na upeti.

[03] ``yaaya vedanaaya tathaagata.m pa~n~naapayamaano pa~n~naapeyya saa vedanaa tathaagatassa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. vedanaasa"nkhayavimutto kho, vaccha, tathaagato gambhiiro appameyyo duppariyogaa.lho -- seyyathaapi mahaasamuddo. upapajjatiiti na upeti, na upapajjatiiti na upeti, upapajjati ca na ca upapajjatiiti na upeti, neva upapajjati na na upapajjatiiti na upeti.

[03] ``yaaya sa~n~naaya tathaagata.m pa~n~naapayamaano pa~n~naapeyya saa sa~n~naa tathaagatassa pahiinaa ^a^T2.0248^ea^ ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. sa~n~naasa"nkhayavimutto kho, vaccha, tathaagato gambhiiro appameyyo duppariyogaa.lho -- seyyathaapi mahaasamuddo. upapajjatiiti ^a^M2.0156^ea^ na upeti, na upapajjatiiti na upeti, upapajjati ca na ca upapajjatiiti na upeti, neva upapajjati na na upapajjatiiti na upeti.

[03] ``yehi sa"nkhaarehi tathaagata.m pa~n~naapayamaano pa~n~naapeyya te sa"nkhaaraa tathaagatassa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. sa"nkhaarasa"nkhayavimutto kho, vaccha, tathaagato gambhiiro appameyyo duppariyogaa.lho -- seyyathaapi mahaasamuddo. upapajjatiiti na upeti ^a^V2.0166^ea^, na upapajjatiiti na upeti, upapajjati ca na ca upapajjatiiti na upeti, neva upapajjati na na upapajjatiiti na upeti.

[03] ``yena vi~n~naa.nena tathaagata.m pa~n~naapayamaano pa~n~naapeyya ta.m vi~n~naa.na.m tathaagatassa pahiina.m ucchinnamuula.m taalaavatthukata.m anabhaava.mkata.m aayati.m anuppaadadhamma.m. vi~n~naa.nasa"nkhayavimutto kho, vaccha, tathaagato gambhiiro appameyyo duppariyogaa.lho -- seyyathaapi mahaasamuddo. upapajjatiiti na upeti, na upapajjatiiti na upeti, upapajjati ca na ca upapajjatiiti na upeti, neva upapajjati na na upapajjatiiti na upeti''.

[03] eva.m vutte, vacchagotto paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``seyyathaapi, bho gotama, gaamassa vaa nigamassa vaa aviduure ^a^T2.0249^ea^ mahaasaalarukkho. tassa aniccataa saakhaapalaasaa palujjeyyu.m {saakhaapalaasa.m palujjeyya}, tacapapa.tikaa palujjeyyu.m, phegguu palujjeyyu.m {pheggu palujjeyya (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}; so aparena samayena apagatasaakhaapalaaso apagatatacapapa.tiko apagataphegguko suddho assa, saare pati.t.thito; evameva bhoto gotamassa paavacana.m apagatasaakhaapalaasa.m apagatatacapapa.tika.m apagataphegguka.m suddha.m, saare pati.t.thita.m. abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... ^a^P1.0489^ea^ upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.
[06] aggivacchasutta.m ni.t.thita.m dutiya.m.

[03] 193^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0250^ea^ ^a^V2.0167^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho vacchagotto paribbaajako yena bhagavaa ^a^M2.0157^ea^ tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``diigharattaaha.m bhotaa gotamena sahakathii. saadhu me bhava.m gotamo sa.mkhittena kusalaakusala.m desetuu''ti. ``sa.mkhittenapi kho te aha.m, vaccha, kusalaakusala.m deseyya.m, vitthaarenapi kho te aha.m, vaccha, kusalaakusala.m deseyya.m; api ca te aha.m, vaccha, sa.mkhittena kusalaakusala.m desessaami. ta.m su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho vacchagotto paribbaajako bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 194^b^.^eb^ ``lobho kho, vaccha, akusala.m, alobho kusala.m; doso kho, vaccha, akusala.m, adoso kusala.m; moho kho, vaccha, akusala.m, amoho kusala.m. iti kho, vaccha, ime tayo dhammaa akusalaa, tayo dhammaa kusalaa.

[03] ``paa.naatipaato kho, vaccha, akusala.m, paa.naatipaataa verama.nii kusala.m; adinnaadaana.m kho, vaccha, akusala.m, adinnaadaanaa verama.nii kusala.m; kaamesumicchaacaaro kho, vaccha, akusala.m, kaamesumicchaacaaraa verama.nii kusala.m; musaavaado ^a^T2.0251^ea^ kho, vaccha, akusala.m, musaavaadaa verama.nii kusala.m; pisu.naa vaacaa kho, vaccha, akusala.m ^a^P1.0490^ea^, pisu.naaya vaacaaya verama.nii kusala.m; pharusaa vaacaa kho, vaccha, akusala.m, pharusaaya vaacaaya verama.nii kusala.m; samphappalaapo kho, vaccha, akusala.m, samphappalaapaa verama.nii kusala.m; abhijjhaa kho, vaccha, akusala.m, anabhijjhaa kusala.m; byaapaado kho, vaccha, akusala.m, abyaapaado kusala.m; micchaadi.t.thi kho, vaccha, akusala.m sammaadi.t.thi kusala.m. iti kho, vaccha, ime dasa dhammaa akusalaa, dasa dhammaa kusalaa.

[03] ``yato ^a^V2.0168^ea^ kho, vaccha, bhikkhuno ta.nhaa pahiinaa hoti ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa, so hoti bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naa vimutto''ti.

[03] 195^b^.^eb^ ``ti.t.thatu bhava.m gotamo. atthi pana te bhoto gotamassa ekabhikkhupi saavako yo aasavaana.m khayaa {saavako aasavaana.m khayaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0) evamuparipi} anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m ^a^M2.0158^ea^ di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii''ti? ``na kho, vaccha, eka.myeva sata.m na dve sataani na tii.ni sataani na cattaari sataani na pa~nca sataani, atha kho bhiyyova ye bhikkhuu mama saavakaa aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharantii''ti.

[03] ``ti.t.thatu bhava.m gotamo, ti.t.thantu bhikkhuu. atthi pana bhoto gotamassa ekaa bhikkhuniipi saavikaa yaa aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja ^a^T2.0252^ea^ viharatii''ti? ``na kho, vaccha, eka.myeva sata.m na dve sataani na tii.ni sataani na cattaari sataani na pa~nca sataani, atha kho bhiyyova yaa bhikkhuniyo mama saavikaa aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharantii''ti.

[03] ``ti.t.thatu bhava.m gotamo, ti.t.thantu bhikkhuu, ti.t.thantu bhikkhuniyo. atthi pana bhoto gotamassa ekupaasakopi saavako gihii odaatavasano brahmacaarii yo pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatiko tattha parinibbaayii anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa''ti? ``na kho, vaccha, eka.myeva sata.m na dve sataani na tii.ni sataani na cattaari sataani na pa~nca sataani, atha kho bhiyyova ye upaasakaa mama saavakaa gihii odaatavasanaa brahmacaarino pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa ^a^P1.0491^ea^ opapaatikaa tattha parinibbaayino anaavattidhammaa tasmaa lokaa''ti.

[03] ``ti.t.thatu ^a^V2.0169^ea^ bhava.m gotamo, ti.t.thantu bhikkhuu, ti.t.thantu bhikkhuniyo, ti.t.thantu upaasakaa gihii odaatavasanaa brahmacaarino. atthi pana bhoto gotamassa ekupaasakopi saavako gihii odaatavasano kaamabhogii saasanakaro ovaadappa.tikaro yo ti.n.navicikiccho vigatakatha.mkatho vesaarajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusaasane viharatii''ti? ``na kho, vaccha, eka.myeva sata.m na dve sataani na tii.ni sataani na cattaari sataani na pa~nca sataani ^a^T2.0253^ea^, atha kho bhiyyova ye upaasakaa mama saavakaa gihii odaatavasanaa kaamabhogino saasanakaraa ovaadappa.tikaraa ti.n.navicikicchaa vigatakatha.mkathaa vesaarajjappattaa aparappaccayaa satthusaasane viharantii''ti.

[03] ``ti.t.thatu ^a^M2.0159^ea^ bhava.m gotamo, ti.t.thantu bhikkhuu, ti.t.thantu bhikkhuniyo, ti.t.thantu upaasakaa gihii odaatavasanaa brahmacaarino, ti.t.thantu upaasakaa gihii odaatavasanaa kaamabhogino. atthi pana bhoto gotamassa ekupaasikaapi saavikaa gihinii odaatavasanaa brahmacaarinii yaa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatikaa tattha parinibbaayinii anaavattidhammaa tasmaa lokaa''ti? ``na kho, vaccha, eka.myeva sata.m na dve sataani na tii.ni sataani na cattaari sataani na pa~nca sataani, atha kho bhiyyova yaa upaasikaa mama saavikaa gihiniyo odaatavasanaa brahmacaariniyo pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatikaa tattha parinibbaayiniyo anaavattidhammaa tasmaa lokaa''ti.

[03] ``ti.t.thatu bhava.m gotamo, ti.t.thantu bhikkhuu, ti.t.thantu bhikkhuniyo, ti.t.thantu upaasakaa gihii odaatavasanaa brahmacaarino, ti.t.thantu upaasakaa gihii odaatavasanaa kaamabhogino, ti.t.thantu upaasikaa gihiniyo odaatavasanaa brahmacaariniyo. atthi pana bhoto gotamassa ekupaasikaapi saavikaa gihinii odaatavasanaa kaamabhoginii saasanakaraa ovaadappa.tikaraa yaa ti.n.navicikicchaa vigatakatha.mkathaa vesaarajjappattaa aparappaccayaa satthusaasane viharatii''ti? ``na kho, vaccha, eka.myeva sata.m na dve ^a^T2.0254^ea^ sataani na tii.ni sataani na cattaari sataani na pa~nca sataani, atha kho bhiyyova yaa upaasikaa mama saavikaa gihiniyo odaatavasanaa kaamabhoginiyo saasanakaraa ovaadappa.tikaraa ti.n.navicchikicchaa vigatakatha.mkathaa vesaarajjappattaa aparappaccayaa satthusaasane viharantii''ti.

[03] 196^b^.^eb^ ``sace ^a^V2.0170^ea^ hi, bho gotama, ima.m dhamma.m bhava.myeva gotamo aaraadhako abhavissa, no ca kho bhikkhuu aaraadhakaa abhavissa.msu ^a^P1.0492^ea^; evamida.m brahmacariya.m aparipuura.m abhavissa tena"ngena. yasmaa ca kho, bho gotama, ima.m dhamma.m bhava~nceva gotamo aaraadhako bhikkhuu ca aaraadhakaa; evamida.m brahmacariya.m paripuura.m tena"ngena.

[03] ``sace hi, bho gotama, ima.m dhamma.m bhava~nceva gotamo aaraadhako abhavissa, bhikkhuu ca aaraadhakaa abhavissa.msu, no ca kho bhikkhuniyo aaraadhikaa abhavissa.msu; evamida.m brahmacariya.m aparipuura.m abhavissa tena"ngena. yasmaa ca kho, bho gotama, ima.m dhamma.m bhava~nceva gotamo aaraadhako, bhikkhuu ^a^M2.0160^ea^ ca aaraadhakaa, bhikkhuniyo ca aaraadhikaa; evamida.m brahmacariya.m paripuura.m tena"ngena.

[03] ``sace hi, bho gotama, ima.m dhamma.m bhava~nceva gotamo aaraadhako abhavissa, bhikkhuu ca aaraadhakaa abhavissa.msu, bhikkhuniyo ca aaraadhikaa abhavissa.msu, no ca kho upaasakaa gihii odaatavasanaa brahmacaarino aaraadhakaa abhavissa.msu; evamida.m brahmacariya.m aparipuura.m abhavissa tena"ngena. yasmaa ca kho, bho gotama, ima.m dhamma.m bhava~nceva gotamo aaraadhako, bhikkhuu ca aaraadhakaa, bhikkhuniyo ca aaraadhikaa, upaasakaa ca gihii ^a^T2.0255^ea^ odaatavasanaa brahmacaarino aaraadhakaa; evamida.m brahmacariya.m paripuura.m tena"ngena.

[03] ``sace hi, bho gotama, ima.m dhamma.m bhava~nceva gotamo aaraadhako abhavissa, bhikkhuu ca aaraadhakaa abhavissa.msu, bhikkhuniyo ca aaraadhikaa abhavissa.msu, upaasakaa ca gihii odaatavasanaa brahmacaarino aaraadhakaa abhavissa.msu, no ca kho upaasakaa gihii odaatavasanaa kaamabhogino aaraadhakaa abhavissa.msu; evamida.m brahmacariya.m aparipuura.m abhavissa tena"ngena. yasmaa ca kho, bho gotama, ima.m dhamma.m bhava~nceva gotamo aaraadhako, bhikkhuu ca aaraadhakaa, bhikkhuniyo ca aaraadhikaa, upaasakaa ca gihii odaatavasanaa brahmacaarino aaraadhakaa, upaasakaa ca gihii odaatavasanaa kaamabhogino aaraadhakaa; evamida.m brahmacariya.m paripuura.m tena"ngena.

[03] ``sace ^a^V2.0171^ea^ hi, bho gotama, ima.m dhamma.m bhava~nceva gotamo aaraadhako abhavissa, bhikkhuu ca aaraadhakaa abhavissa.msu, bhikkhuniyo ca aaraadhikaa abhavissa.msu, upaasakaa ca gihii odaatavasanaa brahmacaarino aaraadhakaa abhavissa.msu, upaasakaa ca gihii odaatavasanaa kaamabhogino aaraadhakaa abhavissa.msu, no ca kho upaasikaa gihiniyo odaatavasanaa brahmacaariniyo ^a^P1.0493^ea^ aaraadhikaa abhavissa.msu; evamida.m brahmacariya.m aparipuura.m abhavissa tena"ngena. yasmaa ca kho, bho gotama, ima.m dhamma.m bhava~nceva gotamo aaraadhako, bhikkhuu ca aaraadhakaa, bhikkhuniyo ca aaraadhikaa, upaasakaa ca gihii odaatavasanaa brahmacaarino aaraadhakaa, upaasakaa ca gihii odaatavasanaa kaamabhogino aaraadhakaa ^a^T2.0256^ea^, upaasikaa ca gihiniyo odaatavasanaa ^a^M2.0161^ea^ brahmacaariniyo aaraadhikaa; evamida.m brahmacariya.m paripuura.m tena"ngena.

[03] ``sace hi, bho gotama, ima.m dhamma.m bhava~nceva gotamo aaraadhako abhavissa, bhikkhuu ca aaraadhakaa abhavissa.msu, bhikkhuniyo ca aaraadhikaa abhavissa.msu, upaasakaa ca gihii odaatavasanaa brahmacaarino aaraadhakaa abhavissa.msu, upaasakaa ca gihii odaatavasanaa kaamabhogino aaraadhakaa abhavissa.msu, upaasikaa ca gihiniyo odaatavasanaa brahmacaariniyo aaraadhikaa abhavissa.msu, no ca kho upaasikaa gihiniyo odaatavasanaa kaamabhoginiyo aaraadhikaa abhavissa.msu; evamida.m brahmacariya.m aparipuura.m abhavissa tena"ngena. yasmaa ca kho, bho gotama, ima.m dhamma.m bhava~nceva gotamo aaraadhako, bhikkhuu ca aaraadhakaa, bhikkhuniyo ca aaraadhikaa, upaasakaa ca gihii odaatavasanaa brahmacaarino aaraadhakaa, upaasakaa ca gihii odaatavasanaa kaamabhogino aaraadhakaa, upaasikaa ca gihiniyo odaatavasanaa brahmacaariniyo aaraadhikaa, upaasikaa ca gihiniyo odaatavasanaa kaamabhoginiyo aaraadhikaa; evamida.m brahmacariya.m paripuura.m tena"ngena.

[03] 197^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bho gotama, ga"ngaa nadii samuddaninnaa samuddapo.naa samuddapabbhaaraa samudda.m aahacca ti.t.thati, evamevaaya.m bhoto gotamassa parisaa sagaha.t.thapabbajitaa nibbaananinnaa nibbaanapo.naa nibbaanapabbhaaraa nibbaana.m aahacca ti.t.thati. abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... ^a^T2.0257^ea^ esaaha.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. labheyyaaha.m bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajja.m, labheyya.m upasampada''nti ^a^P1.0494^ea^. ``yo kho, vaccha, a~n~natitthiyapubbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye aaka"nkhati ^a^V2.0172^ea^ pabbajja.m, aaka"nkhati upasampada.m, so cattaaro maase parivasati. catunna.m maasaana.m accayena aaraddhacittaa bhikkhuu pabbaajenti upasampaadenti bhikkhubhaavaaya; api ca mettha puggalavemattataa viditaa''ti. ``sace, bhante, a~n~natitthiyapubbaa imasmi.m dhammavinaye aaka"nkhantaa pabbajja.m, aaka"nkhantaa upasampada.m cattaaro maase parivasanti, catunna.m maasaana.m accayena aaraddhacittaa bhikkhuu pabbaajenti upasampaadenti bhikkhubhaavaaya; aha.m cattaari vassaani parivasissaami. catunna.m vassaana.m accayena aaraddhacittaa bhikkhuu pabbaajentu upasampaadentu bhikkhubhaavaayaa''ti. alattha kho vacchagotto paribbaajako bhagavato santike pabbajja.m alattha upasampada.m.

[03] aciruupasampanno ^a^M2.0162^ea^ kho panaayasmaa vacchagotto addhamaasuupasampanno yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa vacchagotto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``yaavataka.m, bhante, sekhena ~naa.nena sekhaaya ^a^T2.0258^ea^ vijjaaya pattabba.m, anuppatta.m ta.m mayaa; uttari ca me {uttari.m me (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} bhagavaa dhamma.m desetuu''ti. ``tena hi tva.m, vaccha, dve dhamme uttari bhaavehi -- samatha~nca vipassana~nca. ime kho te, vaccha, dve dhammaa uttari bhaavitaa -- samatho ca vipassanaa ca -- anekadhaatupa.tivedhaaya sa.mvattissanti.

[03] 198^b^.^eb^ ``so tva.m, vaccha, yaavadeva {yaavade (pii0)} aaka"nkhissasi -- `anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhaveyya.m -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa assa.m, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko assa.m; aavibhaava.m, tirobhaava.m; tiroku.t.ta.m tiropaakaara.m tiropabbata.m asajjamaano gaccheyya.m, seyyathaapi aakaase; pathaviyaapi ummujjanimujja.m kareyya.m, seyyathaapi udake; udakepi abhijjamaane gaccheyya.m, seyyathaapi pathaviya.m; aakaasepi palla"nkena kameyya.m, seyyathaapi pakkhii saku.no; imepi candimasuuriye eva.mmahiddhike eva.mmahaanubhaave paa.ninaa parimaseyya.m, parimajjeyya.m; yaavabrahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.nissasi, sati satiaayatane.

[03] ``so tva.m, vaccha, yaavadeva aaka"nkhissasi -- `dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa ^a^P1.0495^ea^ visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya ^a^V2.0173^ea^ ubho sadde su.neyya.m -- dibbe ca maanuse ca, ye duure santike caa'ti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.nissasi, sati satiaayatane.

[03] ``so tva.m, vaccha, yaavadeva aaka"nkhissasi -- `parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaaneyya.m -- saraaga.m vaa citta.m saraaga.m ^a^T2.0259^ea^ cittanti pajaaneyya.m, viitaraaga.m vaa citta.m viitaraaga.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m; sadosa.m vaa citta.m sadosa.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, viitadosa.m vaa citta.m viitadosa.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m; samoha.m vaa citta.m samoha.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, viitamoha.m vaa citta.m viitamoha.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m; sa.mkhitta.m vaa citta.m sa.mkhitta.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, vikkhitta.m vaa citta.m vikkhitta.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m; mahaggata.m vaa citta.m mahaggata.m ^a^M2.0163^ea^ cittanti pajaaneyya.m, amahaggata.m vaa citta.m amahaggata.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m; sauttara.m vaa citta.m sauttara.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, anuttara.m vaa citta.m anuttara.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m; samaahita.m vaa citta.m samaahita.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, asamaahita.m vaa citta.m asamaahita.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m; vimutta.m vaa citta.m vimutta.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, avimutta.m vaa citta.m avimutta.m cittanti pajaaneyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.nissasi, sati satiaayatane.

[03] ``so tva.m, vaccha, yaavadeva aaka"nkhissasi -- `anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussareyya.m, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo viisampi jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaaliisampi jaatiyo pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi jaatisahassampi jaatisatasahassampi; anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe -- amutraasi.m ^a^T2.0260^ea^ eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapaadi.m; tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto idhuupapannoti; iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussareyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.nissasi, sati satiaayatane.

[03] ``so ^a^P1.0496^ea^ tva.m, vaccha, yaavadeva aaka"nkhissasi -- `dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passeyya.m cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate ^a^V2.0174^ea^ duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaaneyya.m -- ime vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa vaciiduccaritena samannaagataa manoduccaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m upavaadakaa micchaadi.t.thikaa micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa; ime vaa pana bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa vaciisucaritena samannaagataa manosucaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa sammaadi.t.thikaa sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaati; iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte ^a^M2.0164^ea^ passeyya.m cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate ^a^T2.0261^ea^ yathaakammuupage satte pajaaneyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.nissasi, sati satiaayatane.

[03] ``so tva.m, vaccha, yaavadeva aaka"nkhissasi -- `aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.nissasi, sati satiaayatane''ti.

[03] 199^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa vacchagotto bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho aayasmaa vacchagotto eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro kho panaayasmaa vacchagotto arahata.m ahosi.

[03] 200^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m dassanaaya gacchanti. addasaa kho aayasmaa vacchagotto te bhikkhuu duuratova aagacchante. disvaana yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu etadavoca ^a^P1.0497^ea^ -- ``handa! kaha.m pana tumhe aayasmanto gacchathaa''ti? ``bhagavanta.m kho maya.m, aavuso, dassanaaya gacchaamaa''ti ^a^T2.0262^ea^. ``tenahaayasmanto mama vacanena bhagavato paade sirasaa vandatha, eva~nca vadetha -- `vacchagotto, bhante, bhikkhu bhagavato paade sirasaa vandati, eva~nca vadeti -- parici.n.no me bhagavaa, parici.n.no me sugato'''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti ^a^V2.0175^ea^ kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato vacchagottassa paccassosu.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``aayasmaa, bhante, vacchagotto bhagavato paade sirasaa vandati, eva~nca vadeti -- `parici.n.no me bhagavaa, parici.n.no me sugato'''ti. ``pubbeva me, bhikkhave, vacchagotto bhikkhu cetasaa ceto paricca vidito -- `tevijjo vacchagotto ^a^M2.0165^ea^ bhikkhu mahiddhiko mahaanubhaavo'ti. devataapi me etamattha.m aarocesu.m -- `tevijjo, bhante, vacchagotto bhikkhu mahiddhiko mahaanubhaavo'''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] mahaavacchasutta.m ni.t.thita.m tatiya.m.

[03] 201^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0263^ea^ ^a^V2.0176^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate suukarakhataaya.m. atha kho diighanakho paribbaajako yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho diighanakho paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aha~nhi, bho gotama, eva.mvaadii eva.mdi.t.thi -- `sabba.m me nakkhamatii'''ti. ``yaapi kho te esaa, aggivessana, di.t.thi -- `sabba.m me nakkhamatii'ti, esaapi te di.t.thi nakkhamatii''ti? ``esaa ce {esaapi (ka0)} me, bho gotama, di.t.thi khameyya, ta.mpassa taadisameva, ta.mpassa ^a^P1.0498^ea^ taadisamevaa''ti. ``ato kho te, aggivessana, bahuu hi bahutaraa lokasmi.m ye evamaaha.msu -- `ta.mpassa taadisameva, ta.mpassa taadisamevaa'ti. te ta~nceva di.t.thi.m nappajahanti a~n~na~nca di.t.thi.m upaadiyanti. ato kho te, aggivessana, tanuu hi tanutaraa lokasmi.m ye evamaaha.msu -- `ta.mpassa taadisameva, ta.mpassa taadisamevaa'ti. te ta~nceva di.t.thi.m pajahanti a~n~na~nca di.t.thi.m na upaadiyanti. santaggivessana, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `sabba.m me khamatii'ti; santaggivessana, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `sabba.m me nakkhamatii'ti; santaggivessana ^a^T2.0264^ea^, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `ekacca.m me khamati, ekacca.m me nakkhamatii'ti. tatraggivessana, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `sabba.m me khamatii'ti tesamaya.m di.t.thi saaraagaaya santike, sa~n~nogaaya santike, abhinandanaaya santike ajjhosaanaaya santike ^a^M2.0166^ea^ upaadaanaaya santike; tatraggivessana ye te sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `sabba.m me nakkhamatii'ti tesamaya.m di.t.thi asaaraagaaya santike, asa~n~nogaaya santike, anabhinandanaaya santike, anajjhosaanaaya santike, anupaadaanaaya santike''ti.

[03] 202^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, diighanakho paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ukka.mseti {ukka.msati (sii0 pii0 ka0)} me bhava.m gotamo di.t.thigata.m, samukka.mseti {sampaha.msati (ka0)} me bhava.m gotamo di.t.thigata''nti. ``tatraggivessana, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `ekacca.m me khamati, ekacca.m me nakkhamatii'ti. yaa ^a^V2.0177^ea^ hi tesa.m khamati saaya.m di.t.thi saaraagaaya santike, sa~n~nogaaya santike, abhinandanaaya santike, ajjhosaanaaya santike, upaadaanaaya santike; yaa hi tesa.m nakkhamati saaya.m di.t.thi asaaraagaaya santike, asa~n~nogaaya santike, anabhinandanaaya santike, anajjhosaanaaya santike, anupaadaanaaya santike. tatraggivessana, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `sabba.m me khamatii'ti tattha vi~n~nuu puriso iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati ^a^T2.0265^ea^ -- `yaa kho me aya.m di.t.thi -- sabba.m me khamatiiti, ima~nce aha.m di.t.thi.m thaamasaa paraamaasaa abhinivissa vohareyya.m -- idameva sacca.m moghama~n~nanti; dviihi me assa viggaho -- yo caaya.m sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa eva.mvaadii ^a^P1.0499^ea^ eva.mdi.t.thi -- sabba.m me nakkhamatiiti, yo caaya.m sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa eva.mvaadii eva.mdi.t.thi -- ekacca.m me khamati, ekacca.m me nakkhamatiiti -- imehi assa dviihi viggaho. iti viggahe sati vivaado, vivaade sati vighaato, vighaate sati vihesaa'. iti so viggaha~nca vivaada~nca vighaata~nca vihesa~nca attani sampassamaano ta~nceva di.t.thi.m pajahati a~n~na~nca di.t.thi.m na upaadiyati. evametaasa.m di.t.thiina.m pahaana.m hoti, evametaasa.m di.t.thiina.m pa.tinissaggo hoti.

[03] 203^b^.^eb^ ``tatraggivessana, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `sabba.m me nakkhamatii'ti tattha vi~n~nuu puriso iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yaa kho me aya.m di.t.thi -- sabba.m me nakkhamatii'ti, ima~nce aha.m di.t.thi.m thaamasaa paraamaasaa abhinivissa vohareyya.m -- idameva sacca.m moghama~n~nanti; dviihi me assa viggaho -- yo caaya.m sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa eva.mvaadii eva.mdi.t.thi ^a^M2.0167^ea^ -- sabba.m me khamatiiti, yo caaya.m sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa eva.mvaadii eva.mdi.t.thi -- ekacca.m me khamati ekacca.m me nakkhamatiiti -- imehi assa dviihi viggaho. iti viggahe sati vivaado, vivaade sati vighaato, vighaate sati vihesaa'. iti so viggaha~nca vivaada~nca ^a^T2.0266^ea^ vighaata~nca vihesa~nca attani sampassamaano ta~nceva di.t.thi.m pajahati a~n~na~nca di.t.thi.m na upaadiyati. evametaasa.m di.t.thiina.m pahaana.m hoti, evametaasa.m di.t.thiina.m pa.tinissaggo hoti.

[03] 204^b^.^eb^ ``tatraggivessana, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `ekacca.m me khamati, ekacca.m me nakkhamatii'ti tattha vi~n~nuu puriso iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yaa kho me ^a^V2.0178^ea^ aya.m di.t.thi -- ekacca.m me khamati, ekacca.m me nakkhamatiiti, ima~nce aha.m di.t.thi.m thaamasaa paraamaasaa abhinivissa vohareyya.m -- idameva sacca.m moghama~n~nanti; dviihi me assa viggaho -- yo caaya.m sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa eva.mvaadii eva.mdi.t.thi -- sabba.m me khamatiiti, yo caaya.m sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa eva.mvaadii eva.mdi.t.thi -- sabba.m me nakkhamatiiti -- imehi assa dviihi viggaho. iti viggahe sati vivaado, vivaade sati vighaato, vighaate sati vihesaa'. iti so viggaha~nca vivaada~nca vighaata~nca vihesa~nca attani sampassamaano ta~nceva di.t.thi.m pajahati a~n~na~nca di.t.thi.m na upaadiyati. evametaasa.m di.t.thiina.m pahaana.m hoti, evametaasa.m di.t.thiina.m pa.tinissaggo hoti.

[03] 205^b^.^eb^ ``aya.m ^a^P1.0500^ea^ kho panaggivessana, kaayo ruupii caatumahaabhuutiko {caatummahaabhuutiko (sii0 syaa0)} maataapettikasambhavo odanakummaasupacayo aniccucchaadanaparimaddanabhedanaviddha.msanadhammo, aniccato dukkhato rogato ga.n.dato sallato aghato aabaadhato parato palokato su~n~nato anattato samanupassitabbo ^a^T2.0267^ea^. tassima.m kaaya.m aniccato dukkhato rogato ga.n.dato sallato aghato aabaadhato parato palokato su~n~nato anattato samanupassato yo kaayasmi.m kaayachando kaayasneho kaayanvayataa saa pahiiyati.

[03] ``tisso kho imaa, aggivessana, vedanaa -- sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa. yasmi.m, aggivessana, samaye sukha.m vedana.m vedeti ^a^M2.0168^ea^, neva tasmi.m samaye dukkha.m vedana.m vedeti, na adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m vedeti; sukha.myeva tasmi.m samaye vedana.m vedeti. yasmi.m, aggivessana, samaye dukkha.m vedana.m vedeti, neva tasmi.m samaye sukha.m vedana.m vedeti, na adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m vedeti; dukkha.myeva tasmi.m samaye vedana.m vedeti. yasmi.m, aggivessana, samaye adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m vedeti, neva tasmi.m samaye sukha.m vedana.m vedeti, na dukkha.m vedana.m vedeti; adukkhamasukha.myeva tasmi.m samaye vedana.m vedeti. sukhaapi kho, aggivessana, vedanaa aniccaa sa"nkhataa pa.ticcasamuppannaa khayadhammaa vayadhammaa viraagadhammaa nirodhadhammaa; dukkhaapi kho, aggivessana, vedanaa aniccaa sa"nkhataa pa.ticcasamuppannaa khayadhammaa vayadhammaa viraagadhammaa nirodhadhammaa; adukkhamasukhaapi kho, aggivessana, vedanaa aniccaa sa"nkhataa pa.ticcasamuppannaa khayadhammaa vayadhammaa viraagadhammaa nirodhadhammaa. eva.m passa.m, aggivessana, sutavaa ariyasaavako sukhaayapi vedanaaya nibbindati, dukkhaayapi vedanaaya nibbindati, adukkhamasukhaayapi vedanaaya ^a^V2.0179^ea^ nibbindati ^a^T2.0268^ea^; nibbinda.m virajjati, viraagaa vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m, vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati. e.m vimuttacitto kho, aggivessana, bhikkhu na kenaci sa.mvadati, na kenaci vivadati, ya~nca loke vutta.m tena voharati, aparaamasa''nti.

[03] 206^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa saariputto bhagavato pi.t.thito ^a^P1.0501^ea^ .thito hoti bhagavanta.m biijayamaano {viijayamaano (sii0 pii0)}. atha kho aayasmato saariputtassa etadahosi -- ``tesa.m tesa.m kira no bhagavaa dhammaana.m abhi~n~naa pahaanamaaha, tesa.m tesa.m kira no sugato dhammaana.m abhi~n~naa pa.tinissaggamaahaa''ti. iti hida.m aayasmato saariputtassa pa.tisa~ncikkhato anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimucci. diighanakhassa pana paribbaajakassa viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- ``ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma''nti. atha kho diighanakho paribbaajako di.t.thadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogaa.lhadhammo ti.n.navicikiccho vigatakatha.mkatho vesaarajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusaasane bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama! seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m ^a^M2.0169^ea^ aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti -- evameva kho bhotaa gotamena anekapariyaayena ^a^T2.0269^ea^ dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.
[06] diighanakhasutta.m ni.t.thita.m catuttha.m.

[03] 207^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V2.0180^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kuruusu viharati kammaasadhamma.m naama kuruuna.m nigamo, bhaaradvaajagottassa braahma.nassa agyaagaare ti.nasanthaarake {ti.nasantharake (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya kammaasadhamma.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. kammaasadhamma.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena a~n~nataro vanasa.n.do tenupasa"nkami divaavihaaraaya. ta.m vanasa.n.da.m ajjhogaahetvaa a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisiidi. atha ^a^P1.0502^ea^ kho maaga.n.diyo {maagandiyo (sii0 pii0)} paribbaajako ja"nghaavihaara.m anuca"nkamamaano anuvicaramaano yena bhaaradvaajagottassa braahma.nassa agyaagaara.m tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho maaga.n.diyo paribbaajako bhaaradvaajagottassa braahma.nassa agyaagaare ti.nasanthaaraka.m pa~n~natta.m. disvaana bhaaradvaajagotta.m braahma.na.m etadavoca -- ``kassa nvaya.m bhoto bhaaradvaajassa agyaagaare ti.nasanthaarako pa~n~natto, sama.naseyyaanuruupa.m {sama.naseyyaaruupa.m (sii0 pii0)} ma~n~ne''ti? ``atthi, bho maaga.n.diya, sama.no gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi ^a^T2.0271^ea^ satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. tassesaa bhoto gotamassa seyyaa pa~n~nattaa''ti. ``duddi.t.tha.m vata, bho bhaaradvaaja, addasaama; duddi.t.tha.m vata, bho bhaaradvaaja, addasaama! ye maya.m tassa bhoto gotamassa bhuunahuno {bhuunahanassa (syaa0 ka.m0)} seyya.m addasaamaa''ti. ``rakkhasseta.m, maaga.n.diya, vaaca.m; rakkhasseta.m ^a^M2.0170^ea^, maaga.n.diya, vaaca.m. bahuu hi tassa bhoto gotamassa khattiyapa.n.ditaapi braahma.napa.n.ditaapi gahapatipa.n.ditaapi sama.napa.n.ditaapi abhippasannaa viniitaa ariye ~naaye dhamme kusale''ti. ``sammukhaa cepi maya.m, bho bhaaradvaaja, ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m passeyyaama, sammukhaapi na.m vadeyyaama -- `bhuunahu {bhuunahano (syaa0 ka.m0)} sama.no gotamo'ti. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nhi no sutte ocaratii''ti. ``sace ta.m bhoto maaga.n.diyassa agaru aaroceyyaami ta.m {aaroceyyameta.m (sii0 pii0), aarocessaami tassa (syaa0 ka.m0)} sama.nassa gotamassaa''ti. ``appossukko bhava.m bhaaradvaajo vuttova na.m vadeyyaa''ti.

[03] 208^b^.^eb^ assosi kho bhagavaa dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya bhaaradvaajagottassa ^a^V2.0181^ea^ braahma.nassa maaga.n.diyena paribbaajakena saddhi.m ima.m kathaasallaapa.m. atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena bhaaradvaajagottassa braahma.nassa agyaagaara.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa nisiidi bhagavaa pa~n~natte ti.nasanthaarake. atha kho bhaaradvaajagotto braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ^a^T2.0272^ea^ ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho bhaaradvaajagotta.m braahma.na.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``ahu pana te, bhaaradvaaja, maaga.n.diyena paribbaajakena saddhi.m ^a^P1.0503^ea^ ima.myeva ti.nasanthaaraka.m aarabbha kocideva kathaasallaapo''ti? eva.m vutte, bhaaradvaajagotto braahma.no sa.mviggo lomaha.t.thajaato bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``etadeva kho pana maya.m bhoto gotamassa aarocetukaamaa. atha ca pana bhava.m gotamo anakkhaata.myeva akkhaasii''ti. aya~nca hi {aya~nca hida.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} bhagavato bhaaradvaajagottena braahma.nena saddhi.m antaraakathaa vippakataa hoti. atha kho maaga.n.diyo paribbaajako ja"nghaavihaara.m anuca"nkamamaano anuvicaramaano yena bhaaradvaajagottassa braahma.nassa agyaagaara.m yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho maaga.n.diya.m paribbaajaka.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 209^b^.^eb^ ``cakkhu.m ^a^M2.0171^ea^ kho, maaga.n.diya, ruupaaraama.m ruuparata.m ruupasammudita.m. ta.m tathaagatassa danta.m gutta.m rakkhita.m sa.mvuta.m, tassa ca sa.mvaraaya dhamma.m deseti. ida.m nu te eta.m, maaga.n.diya, sandhaaya bhaasita.m -- `bhuunahu sama.no gotamo'''ti? ``etadeva kho pana me, bho gotama, sandhaaya bhaasita.m -- `bhuunahu sama.no gotamo'ti. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nhi no sutte ocaratii''ti. ``sota.m kho, maaga.n.diya, saddaaraama.m...pe0... ghaana.m ^a^T..0273^ea^ kho, maaga.n.diya gandhaaraama.m... jivhaa kho, maaga.n.diya, rasaaraamaa rasarataa rasasammuditaa. saa tathaagatassa dantaa guttaa rakkhitaa sa.mvutaa, tassaa ca sa.mvaraaya dhamma.m deseti. ida.m nu te eta.m, maaga.n.diya, sandhaaya bhaasita.m -- `bhuunahu sama.no gotamo'''ti? ``etadeva kho pana me, bho gotama, sandhaaya bhaasita.m -- `bhuunahu sama.no gotamo'ti. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nhi no sutte ocaratii''ti. ``kaayo kho, maaga.n.diya, pho.t.thabbaaraamo pho.t.thabbarato...pe0... mano kho, maaga.n.diya, dhammaaraamo dhammarato dhammasammudito. so tathaagatassa danto gutto rakkhito sa.mvuto, tassa ca sa.mvaraaya dhamma.m deseti. ida.m nu te eta.m, maaga.n.diya, sandhaaya bhaasita.m -- `bhuunahu sama.no gotamo'''ti? ``etadeva kho pana me, bho ^a^V2.0182^ea^ gotama, sandhaaya bhaasita.m -- `bhuunahu sama.no gotamo'ti. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nhi no sutte ocaratii''ti.

[03] 210^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, maaga.n.diya -- `idhekacco cakkhuvi~n~neyyehi ^a^P1.0504^ea^ ruupehi paricaaritapubbo assa i.t.thehi kantehi manaapehi piyaruupehi kaamuupasa.mhitehi rajaniiyehi, so aparena samayena ruupaana.myeva samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m viditvaa ruupata.nha.m pahaaya ruupapari.laaha.m pa.tivinodetvaa vigatapipaaso ajjhatta.m vuupasantacitto vihareyya. imassa pana te, maaga.n.diya, kimassa vacaniiya'''nti? ``na ki~nci, bho gotama''. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, maaga.n.diya -- `idhekacco sotavi~n~neyyehi saddehi...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyehi ^a^T2.0274^ea^ gandhehi... jivhaavi~n~neyyehi rasehi... kaayavi~n~neyyehi pho.t.thabbehi paricaaritapubbo assa i.t.thehi kantehi manaapehi piyaruupehi kaamuupasa.mhitehi rajaniiyehi, so aparena samayena pho.t.thabbaana.myeva samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m viditvaa pho.t.thabbata.nha.m pahaaya pho.t.thabbapari.laaha.m pa.tivinodetvaa vigatapipaaso ajjhatta.m vuupasantacitto vihareyya. imassa pana te, maaga.n.diya, kimassa vacaniiya'''nti? ``na ki~nci, bho gotama''.

[03] 211^b^.^eb^ ``aha.m ^a^M2.0172^ea^ kho pana, maaga.n.diya, pubbe agaariyabhuuto samaano pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappito sama"ngiibhuuto paricaaresi.m cakkhuvi~n~neyyehi ruupehi i.t.thehi kantehi manaapehi piyaruupehi kaamuupasa.mhitehi rajaniiyehi, sotavi~n~neyyehi saddehi...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyehi gandhehi... jivhaavi~n~neyyehi rasehi... kaayavi~n~neyyehi pho.t.thabbehi i.t.thehi kantehi manaapehi piyaruupehi kaamuupasa.mhitehi rajaniiyehi. tassa mayha.m, maaga.n.diya, tayo paasaadaa ahesu.m -- eko vassiko, eko hemantiko, eko gimhiko. so kho aha.m, maaga.n.diya, vassike paasaade vassike cattaaro {vassike paasaade cattaaro (syaa0 ka.m0)} maase nippurisehi tuuriyehi {turiyehi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} paricaarayamaano {paricaariyamaano (sabbattha)} na he.t.thaapaasaada.m orohaami. so aparena samayena kaamaana.myeva samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m viditvaa kaamata.nha.m pahaaya kaamapari.laaha.m pa.tivinodetvaa vigatapipaaso ^a^T2.0275^ea^ ajjhatta.m vuupasantacitto viharaami. so a~n~ne satte passaami kaamesu aviitaraage kaamata.nhaahi khajjamaane kaamapari.laahena pari.dayhamaane kaame pa.tisevante. so tesa.m na pihemi, na tattha abhiramaami ^a^V2.0183^ea^. ta.m kissa hetu? yaahaya.m, maaga.n.diya, rati, a~n~natreva kaamehi a~n~natra akusalehi dhammehi -- api dibba.m sukha.m ^a^P1.0505^ea^ samadhigayha ti.t.thati -- taaya ratiyaa ramamaano hiinassa na pihemi, na tattha abhiramaami.

[03] 212^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, maaga.n.diya, gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa a.d.dho mahaddhano mahaabhogo pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappito sama"ngiibhuuto paricaareyya cakkhuvi~n~neyyehi ruupehi...pe0... pho.t.thabbehi i.t.thehi kantehi manaapehi piyaruupehi kaamuupasa.mhitehi rajaniiyehi. so kaayena sucarita.m caritvaa vaacaaya sucarita.m caritvaa manasaa sucarita.m caritvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjeyya devaana.m taavati.msaana.m sahabyata.m. so tattha nandane vane accharaasa"nghaparivuto dibbehi pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappito sama"ngiibhuuto paricaareyya. so passeyya gahapati.m vaa gahapatiputta.m vaa pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappita.m sama"ngiibhuuta.m paricaarayamaana.m.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^M2.0173^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, maaga.n.diya, api nu so devaputto nandane vane accharaasa"nghaparivuto dibbehi pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi ^a^T2.0276^ea^ samappito sama"ngiibhuuto paricaarayamaano amussa gahapatissa vaa gahapatiputtassa vaa piheyya, maanusakaana.m vaa pa~ncanna.m kaamagu.naana.m maanusakehi vaa kaamehi aava.t.teyyaa''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''. ta.m kissa hetu? maanusakehi, bho gotama, kaamehi dibbakaamaa abhikkantataraa ca pa.niitataraa caa''ti. ``evameva kho aha.m, maaga.n.diya, pubbe agaariyabhuuto samaano pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappito sama"ngiibhuuto paricaaresi.m cakkhuvi~n~neyyehi ruupehi i.t.thehi kantehi manaapehi piyaruupehi kaamuupasa.mhitehi rajaniiyehi, sotavi~n~neyyehi saddehi...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyehi gandhehi... jivhaavi~n~neyyehi rasehi... kaayavi~n~neyyehi pho.t.thabbehi i.t.thehi kantehi manaapehi piyaruupehi kaamuupasa.mhitehi rajaniiyehi. so aparena samayena kaamaana.myeva samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m viditvaa kaamata.nha.m pahaaya kaamapari.laaha.m pa.tivinodetvaa vigatapipaaso ajjhatta.m vuupasantacitto viharaami. so a~n~ne satte passaami kaamesu aviitaraage kaamata.nhaahi khajjamaane kaamapari.laahena pari.dayhamaane ^a^P1.0506^ea^ kaame pa.tisevante, so tesa.m na pihemi, na tattha abhiramaami. ta.m kissa hetu? yaahaya.m, maaga.n.diya, rati a~n~natreva kaamehi a~n~natra akusalehi ^a^V2.0184^ea^ dhammehi -- api dibba.m sukha.m samadhigayha ti.t.thati -- taaya ratiyaa ramamaano hiinassa na pihemi, na tattha abhiramaami.

[03] 213^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^T2.0277^ea^, maaga.n.diya, ku.t.thii puriso arugatto pakkagatto kimiihi khajjamaano nakhehi va.namukhaani vippatacchamaano a"ngaarakaasuyaa kaaya.m paritaapeyya. tassa mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa bhisakka.m sallakatta.m upa.t.thaapeyyu.m. tassa so bhisakko sallakatto bhesajja.m kareyya. so ta.m bhesajja.m aagamma ku.t.thehi parimucceyya, arogo assa sukhii serii saya.mvasii yena kaama.m gamo. so a~n~na.m ku.t.thi.m purisa.m passeyya arugatta.m pakkagatta.m kimiihi khajjamaana.m nakhehi va.namukhaani vippatacchamaana.m a"ngaarakaasuyaa kaaya.m paritaapenta.m.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, maaga.n.diya, api nu so puriso amussa ku.t.thissa purisassa piheyya a"ngaarakaasuyaa vaa bhesajja.m pa.tisevanaaya vaa''ti? ``no ^a^M2.0174^ea^ hida.m, bho gotama. ta.m kissa hetu? roge hi, bho gotama, sati bhesajjena kara.niiya.m hoti, roge asati na bhesajjena kara.niiya.m hotii''ti. ``evameva kho aha.m, maaga.n.diya, pubbe agaariyabhuuto samaano pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappito sama"ngiibhuuto paricaaresi.m, cakkhuvi~n~neyyehi ruupehi i.t.thehi kantehi manaapehi piyaruupehi kaamuupasa.mhitehi rajaniiyehi, sotavi~n~neyyehi saddehi...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyehi gandhehi... jivhaavi~n~neyyehi rasehi... kaayavi~n~neyyehi pho.t.thabbehi i.t.thehi kantehi manaapehi piyaruupehi kaamuupasa.mhitehi rajaniiyehi. so aparena samayena kaamaana.myeva samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m viditvaa kaamata.nha.m pahaaya kaamapari.laaha.m ^a^T2.0278^ea^ pa.tivinodetvaa vigatapipaaso ajjhatta.m vuupasantacitto viharaami. so a~n~ne satte passaami kaamesu aviitaraage kaamata.nhaahi khajjamaane kaamapari.laahena pari.dayhamaane kaame pa.tisevante. so tesa.m na pihemi, na tattha abhiramaami. ta.m kissa hetu? yaahaya.m, maaga.n.diya, rati, a~n~natreva kaamehi a~n~natra akusalehi dhammehi -- api dibba.m sukha.m samadhigayha ti.t.thati -- taaya ratiyaa ramamaano hiinassa na pihemi, na tattha abhiramaami.

[03] 214^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^P1.0507^ea^, maaga.n.diya, ku.t.thii puriso arugatto pakkagatto kimiihi khajjamaano nakhehi va.namukhaani vippatacchamaano a"ngaarakaasuyaa kaaya.m paritaapeyya. tassa mittaamaccaa ^a^V2.0185^ea^ ~naatisaalohitaa bhisakka.m sallakatta.m upa.t.thaapeyyu.m. tassa so bhisakko sallakatto bhesajja.m kareyya. so ta.m bhesajja.m aagamma ku.t.thehi parimucceyya, arogo assa sukhii serii saya.mvasii yena kaama.m gamo. tamena.m dve balavanto purisaa naanaabaahaasu gahetvaa a"ngaarakaasu.m upaka.d.dheyyu.m.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, maaga.n.diya, api nu so puriso iti citiceva kaaya.m sannaameyyaa''ti? ``eva.m, bho gotama''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``asu hi, bho gotama, aggi dukkhasamphasso ceva mahaabhitaapo ca mahaapari.laaho caa''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, maaga.n.diya, idaaneva nu kho so aggi dukkhasamphasso ceva mahaabhitaapo ca mahaapari.laaho ca udaahu pubbepi so aggi dukkhasamphasso ceva mahaabhitaapo ca mahaapari.laaho caa''ti ^a^T2.0279^ea^? ``idaani ceva, bho gotama, so aggi dukkhasamphasso ceva mahaabhitaapo ^a^M2.0175^ea^ ca mahaapari.laaho ca, pubbepi so aggi dukkhasamphasso ceva mahaabhitaapo ca mahaapari.laaho ca. asu ca {asu hi ca (sii0 pii0)}, bho gotama, ku.t.thii puriso arugatto pakkagatto kimiihi khajjamaano nakhehi va.namukhaani vippatacchamaano upahatindriyo dukkhasamphasseyeva aggismi.m sukhamiti vipariitasa~n~na.m paccalatthaa''ti. ``evameva kho, maaga.n.diya, atiitampi addhaana.m kaamaa dukkhasamphassaa ceva mahaabhitaapaa ca mahaapari.laahaa ca, anaagatampi addhaana.m kaamaa dukkhasamphassaa ceva mahaabhitaapaa ca mahaapari.laahaa ca, etarahipi paccuppanna.m addhaana.m kaamaa dukkhasamphassaa ceva mahaabhitaapaa ca mahaapari.laahaa ca. ime ca, maaga.n.diya, sattaa kaamesu aviitaraagaa kaamata.nhaahi khajjamaanaa kaamapari.laahena pari.dayhamaanaa upahatindriyaa dukkhasamphassesuyeva kaamesu sukhamiti vipariitasa~n~na.m paccalatthu.m.

[03] 215^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, maaga.n.diya, ku.t.thii puriso arugatto pakkagatto kimiihi khajjamaano nakhehi va.namukhaani vippatacchamaano a"ngaarakaasuyaa kaaya.m paritaapeti. yathaa yathaa kho, maaga.n.diya, asu ku.t.thii puriso arugatto pakkagatto kimiihi khajjamaano nakhehi va.namukhaani vippatacchamaano a"ngaarakaasuyaa kaaya.m paritaapeti tathaa tathaa'ssa {tathaa tathaa tasseva (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} taani va.namukhaani asucitaraani ^a^P1.0508^ea^ ceva honti duggandhataraani ca puutikataraani ca ^a^T2.0280^ea^, hoti ceva kaaci saatamattaa assaadamattaa -- yadida.m va.namukhaana.m ka.n.duuvanahetu; evameva kho, maaga.n.diya, sattaa kaamesu aviitaraagaa ^a^V2.0186^ea^ kaamata.nhaahi khajjamaanaa kaamapari.laahena ca pari.dayhamaanaa kaame pa.tisevanti. yathaa yathaa kho, maaga.n.diya, sattaa kaamesu aviitaraagaa kaamata.nhaahi khajjamaanaa kaamapari.laahena ca pari.dayhamaanaa kaame pa.tisevanti tathaa tathaa tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m kaamata.nhaa ceva pava.d.dhati, kaamapari.laahena ca pari.dayhanti, hoti ceva saatamattaa assaadamattaa -- yadida.m pa~ncakaamagu.ne pa.ticca.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, maaga.n.diya, api nu te di.t.tho vaa suto vaa raajaa vaa raajamahaamatto vaa pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappito sama"ngiibhuuto paricaarayamaano kaamata.nha.m appahaaya kaamapari.laaha.m appa.tivinodetvaa vigatapipaaso ajjhatta.m vuupasantacitto vihaasi vaa viharati vaa viharissati vaa''ti ^a^M2.0176^ea^? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''. ``saadhu, maaga.n.diya! mayaapi kho eta.m, maaga.n.diya, neva di.t.tha.m na suta.m raajaa vaa raajamahaamatto vaa pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappito sama"ngiibhuuto paricaarayamaano kaamata.nha.m appahaaya kaamapari.laaha.m appa.tivinodetvaa vigatapipaaso ajjhatta.m vuupasantacitto vihaasi vaa viharati vaa viharissati vaa. atha kho, maaga.n.diya, ye hi keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa vigatapipaasaa ajjhatta.m vuupasantacittaa vihaasu.m vaa viharanti vaa viharissanti vaa sabbe te kaamaana.myeva samudaya~nca ^a^T2.0281^ea^ attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m viditvaa kaamata.nha.m pahaaya kaamapari.laaha.m pa.tivinodetvaa vigatapipaasaa ajjhatta.m vuupasantacittaa vihaasu.m vaa viharanti vaa viharissanti vaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``aarogyaparamaa laabhaa, nibbaana.m parama.m sukha.m.
[22] a.t.tha"ngiko ca maggaana.m, khema.m amatagaamina''nti..

[03] 216^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, maaga.n.diyo paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``acchariya.m, bho gotama, abbhuta.m, bho gotama! yaava subhaasita.m cida.m bhotaa gotamena -- `aarogyaparamaa ^a^P1.0509^ea^ laabhaa, nibbaana.m parama.m sukha'nti. mayaapi kho eta.m, bho gotama, suta.m pubbakaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m bhaasamaanaana.m -- `aarogyaparamaa laabhaa, nibbaana.m parama.m sukha'nti; tayida.m, bho gotama, sametii''ti. ``ya.m pana te eta.m, maaga.n.diya, suta.m pubbakaana.m paribbaajakaana.m ^a^V2.0187^ea^ aacariyapaacariyaana.m bhaasamaanaana.m -- `aarogyaparamaa laabhaa, nibbaana.m parama.m sukha'nti, katama.m ta.m aarogya.m, katama.m ta.m nibbaana''nti? eva.m vutte, maaga.n.diyo paribbaajako sakaaneva suda.m gattaani paa.ninaa anomajjati -- ``idanta.m, bho gotama, aarogya.m, idanta.m nibbaana.m. aha~nhi, bho gotama, etarahi arogo sukhii, na ma.m ki~nci aabaadhatii''ti.

[03] 217^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, maaga.n.diya, jaccandho puriso; so na passeyya ^a^T2.0282^ea^ ka.nhasukkaani ruupaani, na passeyya niilakaani ruupaani, na passeyya piitakaani ruupaani, na passeyya lohitakaani ruupaani, na passeyya ma~nji.t.thakaani {ma~nje.t.thikaani (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), ma~nje.t.thakaani (ka0)} ruupaani, na passeyya samavisama.m, na passeyya taarakaruupaani, na passeyya candimasuuriye. so su.neyya cakkhumato bhaasamaanassa -- `cheka.m vata, bho ^a^M2.0177^ea^, odaata.m vattha.m abhiruupa.m nimmala.m sucii'ti! so odaatapariyesana.m careyya. tamena.m a~n~nataro puriso telamalikatena saahu.liciirena {telamasikatena saahu.laciivarena (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} va~nceyya -- `ida.m te, ambho purisa, odaata.m vattha.m abhiruupa.m nimmala.m sucii'ti. so ta.m pa.tigga.nheyya, pa.tiggahetvaa paarupeyya, paarupetvaa attamano attamanavaaca.m nicchaareyya -- `cheka.m vata, bho, odaata.m vattha.m abhiruupa.m nimmala.m sucii'ti!

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, maaga.n.diya, api nu so jaccandho puriso jaananto passanto amu.m telamalikata.m saahu.liciira.m pa.tigga.nheyya, pa.tiggahetvaa paarupeyya, paarupetvaa attamano attamanavaaca.m nicchaareyya -- `cheka.m vata, bho, odaata.m vattha.m abhiruupa.m nimmala.m sucii'ti udaahu cakkhumato saddhaayaa''ti? ``ajaananto hi, bho gotama, apassanto so jaccandho puriso amu.m telamalikata.m saahu.liciira.m pa.tigga.nheyya, pa.tiggahetvaa paarupeyya, paarupetvaa attamano attamanavaaca.m nicchaareyya -- `cheka.m ^a^P1.0510^ea^ vata, bho, odaata.m vattha.m abhiruupa.m nimmala.m sucii'ti, cakkhumato saddhaayaa''ti. ``evameva kho, maaga.n.diya, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa andhaa acakkhukaa ajaanantaa aarogya.m, apassantaa nibbaana.m ^a^T2.0283^ea^, atha ca panima.m gaatha.m bhaasanti -- `aarogyaparamaa laabhaa, nibbaana.m parama.m sukha'nti. pubbakehesaa, maaga.n.diya, arahantehi sammaasambuddhehi gaathaa bhaasitaa --
[21] `aarogyaparamaa ^a^V2.0188^ea^ laabhaa, nibbaana.m parama.m sukha.m.
[22] a.t.tha"ngiko ca maggaana.m, khema.m amatagaamina'nti..

[03] 218^b^.^eb^ ``saa etarahi anupubbena puthujjanagaathaa {puthujjanagataa (sii0 pii0)}. aya.m kho pana, maaga.n.diya, kaayo rogabhuuto ga.n.dabhuuto sallabhuuto aghabhuuto aabaadhabhuuto, so tva.m ima.m kaaya.m rogabhuuta.m ga.n.dabhuuta.m sallabhuuta.m aghabhuuta.m aabaadhabhuuta.m -- `idanta.m, bho gotama, aarogya.m, idanta.m nibbaana'nti vadesi. ta~nhi te, maaga.n.diya, ariya.m cakkhu.m natthi yena tva.m ariyena cakkhunaa aarogya.m jaaneyyaasi, nibbaana.m passeyyaasii''ti. ``eva.m pasanno aha.m bhoto gotamassa! pahoti me bhava.m gotamo tathaa dhamma.m desetu.m yathaaha.m aarogya.m jaaneyya.m, nibbaana.m passeyya''nti.

[03] 219^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^M2.0178^ea^, maaga.n.diya, jaccandho puriso; so na passeyya ka.nhasukkaani ruupaani, na passeyya niilakaani ruupaani, na passeyya piitakaani ruupaani, na passeyya lohitakaani ruupaani, na passeyya ma~nji.t.thakaani ruupaani, na passeyya samavisama.m, na passeyya taarakaruupaani, na passeyya candimasuuriye. tassa mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa bhisakka.m sallakatta.m upa.t.thaapeyyu.m. tassa so bhisakko sallakatto bhesajja.m kareyya. so ta.m bhesajja.m aagamma na cakkhuuni uppaadeyya, na ^a^T2.0284^ea^ cakkhuuni visodheyya. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, maaga.n.diya, nanu so vejjo yaavadeva kilamathassa vighaatassa bhaagii assaa''ti? ``eva.m, bho gotama''. ``evameva kho, maaga.n.diya, aha~nce te dhamma.m deseyya.m -- `idanta.m aarogya.m, idanta.m nibbaana'nti, so tva.m aarogya.m na jaaneyyaasi, nibbaana.m na passeyyaasi. so mamassa kilamatho, saa mamassa vihesaa''ti. ``eva.m ^a^P1.0511^ea^ pasanno aha.m bhoto gotamassa. pahoti me bhava.m gotamo tathaa dhamma.m desetu.m yathaaha.m aarogya.m jaaneyya.m, nibbaana.m passeyya''nti.

[03] 220^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, maaga.n.diya, jaccandho puriso; so na passeyya ka.nhasukkaani ruupaani, na passeyya niilakaani ruupaani, na passeyya piitakaani ruupaani, na passeyya lohitakaani ruupaani, na passeyya ma~nji.t.thakaani ruupaani, na passeyya samavisama.m, na passeyya taarakaruupaani, na passeyya candimasuuriye. so su.neyya cakkhumato bhaasamaanassa -- `cheka.m vata, bho, odaata.m vattha.m abhiruupa.m nimmala.m sucii'ti! so odaatapariyesana.m careyya. tamena.m a~n~nataro ^a^V2.0189^ea^ puriso telamalikatena saahu.liciirena va~nceyya -- `ida.m te, ambho purisa, odaata.m vattha.m abhiruupa.m nimmala.m sucii'ti. so ta.m pa.tigga.nheyya, pa.tiggahetvaa paarupeyya. tassa mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa bhisakka.m sallakatta.m upa.t.thaapeyyu.m. tassa so bhisakko sallakatto bhesajja.m kareyya -- uddha.mvirecana.m adhovirecana.m a~njana.m pacca~njana.m natthukamma.m. so ta.m bhesajja.m ^a^T2.0285^ea^ aagamma cakkhuuni uppaadeyya, cakkhuuni visodheyya. tassa saha cakkhuppaadaa yo amusmi.m telamalikate saahu.liciire chandaraago so pahiiyetha. ta~nca na.m purisa.m amittatopi daheyya, paccatthikatopi daheyya, api ca jiivitaa voropetabba.m ma~n~neyya -- `diigharatta.m vata, bho, aha.m iminaa purisena telamalikatena saahu.liciirena nikato va~ncito paluddho -- ida.m te, ambho purisa, odaata.m vattha.m ^a^M2.0179^ea^ abhiruupa.m nimmala.m sucii'ti. evameva kho, maaga.n.diya, aha~nce te dhamma.m deseyya.m -- `idanta.m aarogya.m, idanta.m nibbaana'nti. so tva.m aarogya.m jaaneyyaasi, nibbaana.m passeyyaasi. tassa te saha cakkhuppaadaa yo pa~ncasupaadaanakkhandhesu chandaraago so pahiiyetha; api ca te evamassa -- `diigharatta.m vata, bho, aha.m iminaa cittena nikato va~ncito paluddho {paladdho (sii0 pii0)}. aha~nhi ruupa.myeva upaadiyamaano upaadiyi.m, vedana.myeva upaadiyamaano upaadiyi.m, sa~n~na.myeva upaadiyamaano upaadiyi.m, sa"nkhaareyeva upaadiyamaano upaadiyi.m, vi~n~naa.na.myeva upaadiyamaano upaadiyi.m. tassa me upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo, bhavapaccayaa jaati, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa ^a^P1.0512^ea^ sambhavanti; evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotii'''ti. ``eva.m pasanno aha.m bhoto gotamassa! pahoti me bhava.m gotamo tathaa dhamma.m desetu.m yathaaha.m imamhaa aasanaa anandho vu.t.thaheyya''nti.

[03] 221^b^.^eb^ ``tena hi tva.m, maaga.n.diya, sappurise bhajeyyaasi. yato kho ^a^T2.0286^ea^ tva.m, maaga.n.diya, sappurise bhajissasi tato tva.m, maaga.n.diya, saddhamma.m sossasi; yato kho tva.m, maaga.n.diya, saddhamma.m sossasi tato tva.m, maaga.n.diya, dhammaanudhamma.m pa.tipajjissasi; yato kho tva.m, maaga.n.diya, dhammaanudhamma.m pa.tipajjissasi tato tva.m, maaga.n.diya, saama.myeva ~nassasi, saama.m dakkhissasi -- ime rogaa ga.n.daa sallaa; idha rogaa ga.n.daa sallaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti. tassa me upaadaananirodhaa bhavanirodho, bhavanirodhaa jaatinirodho, jaatinirodhaa jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa nirujjhanti; evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotii''ti.

[03] 222^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V2.0190^ea^ vutte, maaga.n.diyo paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama! seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti; evameva.m bhotaa gotamena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca ^a^M2.0180^ea^. labheyyaaha.m bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajja.m, labheyya.m upasampada''nti. ``yo kho, maaga.n.diya, a~n~natitthiyapubbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye aaka"nkhati pabbajja.m, aaka"nkhati upasampada.m, so cattaaro maase parivasati; catunna.m maasaana.m accayena aaraddhacittaa bhikkhuu pabbaajenti ^a^T2.0287^ea^, upasampaadenti bhikkhubhaavaaya. api ca mettha puggalavemattataa viditaa''ti. ``sace, bhante, a~n~natitthiyapubbaa imasmi.m dhammavinaye aaka"nkhantaa pabbajja.m, aaka"nkhantaa upasampada.m cattaaro maase parivasanti, catunna.m maasaana.m accayena aaraddhacittaa bhikkhuu pabbaajenti upasampaadenti bhikkhubhaavaaya; aha.m cattaari vassaani parivasissaami, catunna.m vassaana.m accayena aaraddhacittaa bhikkhuu pabbaajentu, upasampaadentu bhikkhubhaavaayaa''ti ^a^P1.0513^ea^. alattha kho maaga.n.diyo paribbaajako bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, alattha upasampada.m. aciruupasampanno kho panaayasmaa maaga.n.diyo eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro kho panaayasmaa maaga.n.diyo arahata.m ahosiiti.
[06] maaga.n.diyasutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa~ncama.m.

[03] 223^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0288^ea^ ^a^V2.0191^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosambiya.m viharati ghositaaraame. tena kho pana samayena sandako paribbaajako pilakkhaguhaaya.m pa.tivasati mahatiyaa paribbaajakaparisaaya saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi paribbaajakasatehi. atha kho aayasmaa aanando saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aayaamaavuso, yena devakatasobbho tenupasa"nkamissaama guhaadassanaayaa''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato aanandassa paccassosu.m. atha kho aayasmaa aanando sambahulehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m yena devakatasobbho tenupasa"nkami. tena kho pana samayena sandako paribbaajako mahatiyaa ^a^M2.0181^ea^ paribbaajakaparisaaya saddhi.m nisinno hoti unnaadiniyaa uccaasaddamahaasaddaaya anekavihita.m tiracchaanakatha.m kathentiyaa, seyyathida.m -- raajakatha.m corakatha.m mahaamattakatha.m senaakatha.m bhayakatha.m yuddhakatha.m annakatha.m paanakatha.m vatthakatha.m sayanakatha.m maalaakatha.m gandhakatha.m ~naatikatha.m yaanakatha.m gaamakatha.m nigamakatha.m nagarakatha.m janapadakatha.m itthikatha.m suurakatha.m visikhaakatha.m kumbha.t.thaanakatha.m pubbapetakatha.m naanattakatha.m lokakkhaayika.m samuddakkhaayika.m ^a^P1.0514^ea^ itibhavaabhavakatha.m iti vaa. addasaa kho sandako paribbaajako aayasmanta.m aananda.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana saka.m parisa.m sa.n.thaapesi ^a^T2.0289^ea^ -- ``appasaddaa bhonto hontu, maa bhonto saddamakattha; aya.m sama.nassa gotamassa saavako aagacchati sama.no aanando. yaavataa kho pana sama.nassa gotamassa saavakaa kosambiya.m pa.tivasanti, aya.m tesa.m a~n~nataro sama.no aanando. appasaddakaamaa kho pana te aayasmanto appasaddaviniitaa appasaddassa va.n.navaadino; appeva naama appasadda.m parisa.m viditvaa upasa"nkamitabba.m ma~n~neyyaa''ti. atha kho te paribbaajakaa tu.nhii ahesu.m.

[03] 224^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena sandako paribbaajako tenupasa"nkami. atha kho sandako paribbaajako aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``etu kho bhava.m aanando, svaagata.m bhoto aanandassa. cirassa.m kho bhava.m aanando ima.m pariyaayamakaasi yadida.m idhaagamanaaya. nisiidatu bhava.m aanando, idamaasana.m pa~n~natta''nti. nisiidi kho aayasmaa aanando ^a^V2.0192^ea^ pa~n~natte aasane. sandakopi kho paribbaajako a~n~natara.m niica.m aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho sandaka.m paribbaajaka.m aayasmaa aanando etadavoca -- ``kaayanuttha, sandaka, etarahi kathaaya sannisinnaa, kaa ca pana vo antaraakathaa vippakataa''ti? ``ti.t.thatesaa, bho aananda, kathaa yaaya maya.m etarahi kathaaya sannisinnaa. nesaa bhoto aanandassa kathaa dullabhaa bhavissati pacchaapi savanaaya. saadhu vata bhavanta.myeva aananda.m pa.tibhaatu sake aacariyake dhammiikathaa''ti. ``tena hi, sandaka, su.naahi ^a^T2.0290^ea^, saadhuka.m manasi karohi, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m bho''ti kho sandako paribbaajako aayasmato aanandassa paccassosi. aayasmaa aanando etadavoca -- ``cattaarome ^a^M2.0182^ea^, sandaka, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena abrahmacariyavaasaa akkhaataa cattaari ca anassaasikaani brahmacariyaani akkhaataani, yattha vi~n~nuu puriso sasakka.m brahmacariya.m na vaseyya, vasanto ca {vasanto vaa (sii0 pii0) evamuparipi anaaraadhanapakkhe} naaraadheyya ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala''nti. ``katame pana te, bho aananda, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena cattaaro abrahmacariyavaasaa akkhaataa, yattha vi~n~nuu ^a^P1.0515^ea^ puriso sasakka.m brahmacariya.m na vaseyya, vasanto ca naaraadheyya ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala''nti?

[03] 225^b^.^eb^ ``idha, sandaka, ekacco satthaa eva.mvaadii hoti eva.mdi.t.thi -- `natthi dinna.m, natthi yi.t.tha.m, natthi huta.m, natthi sukatadukka.taana.m kammaana.m phala.m vipaako, natthi aya.m loko, natthi paroloko, natthi maataa, natthi pitaa, natthi sattaa opapaatikaa, natthi loke sama.nabraahma.naa sammaggataa sammaapa.tipannaa ye ima~nca loka.m para~nca loka.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedenti. caatumahaabhuutiko aya.m puriso yadaa kaala"nkaroti, pathavii pathaviikaaya.m anupeti anupagacchati, aapo aapokaaya.m anupeti anupagacchati, tejo tejokaaya.m anupeti anupagacchati, vaayo vaayokaaya.m anupeti anupagacchati ^a^T2.0291^ea^, aakaasa.m indriyaani sa"nkamanti. aasandipa~ncamaa purisaa mata.m aadaaya gacchanti, yaavaa.laahanaa padaani pa~n~naayanti. kaapotakaani a.t.thiini bhavanti. bhassantaa aahutiyo; dattupa~n~natta.m yadida.m daana.m. tesa.m tucchaa musaa vilaapo ye keci atthikavaada.m vadanti. baale ca pa.n.dite ca kaayassa bhedaa ucchijjanti vinassanti na honti para.m mara.naa'ti.

[03] ``tatra ^a^V2.0193^ea^, sandaka, vi~n~nuu puriso iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aya.m kho bhava.m satthaa eva.mvaadii eva.mdi.t.thi -- natthi dinna.m, natthi yi.t.tha.m, natthi huta.m, natthi sukatadukka.taana.m kammaana.m phala.m vipaako, natthi aya.m loko, natthi paroloko, natthi maataa, natthi pitaa, natthi sattaa opapaatikaa, natthi loke sama.nabraahma.naa sammaggataa sammaapa.tipannaa ye ima~nca loka.m para~nca loka.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedenti. caatumahaabhuutiko aya.m puriso yadaa kaala"nkaroti, pathavii pathaviikaaya.m anupeti anupagacchati, aapo aapokaaya.m ^a^M2.0183^ea^ anupeti anupagacchati, tejo tejokaaya.m anupeti anupagacchati, vaayo vaayokaaya.m anupeti anupagacchati, aakaasa.m indriyaani sa"nkamanti. aasandipa~ncamaa purisaa mata.m aadaaya gacchanti, yaavaa.laahanaa padaani pa~n~naayanti. kaapotakaani a.t.thiini bhavanti. bhassantaa aahutiyo; dattupa~n~natta.m yadida.m daana.m. tesa.m tucchaa musaa vilaapo ye keci atthikavaada.m vadanti. baale ca pa.n.dite ca kaayassa bhedaa ucchijjanti ^a^T2.0292^ea^ vinassanti na honti para.m mara.naa'ti. sace imassa bhoto satthuno sacca.m vacana.m, akatena me ettha kata.m, avusitena me ettha vusita.m. ubhopi maya.m ettha samasamaa saama~n~na.m pattaa, yo caaha.m na vadaami `ubho kaayassa bhedaa ucchijjissaama, vinassissaama, na bhavissaama para.m mara.naa'ti. atireka.m kho panimassa bhoto satthuno naggiya.m mu.n.diya.m ukku.tikappadhaana.m kesamassulocana.m yoha.m puttasambaadhasayana.m {puttasambaadhavasana.m (sii0)} ajjhaavasanto kaasikacandana.m paccanubhonto maalaagandhavilepana.m dhaarento jaataruuparajata.m saadiyanto iminaa bhotaa satthaaraa samasamagatiko bhavissaami. abhisamparaaya.m soha.m ki.m jaananto ki.m passanto imasmi.m satthari brahmacariya.m carissaami? `so abrahmacariyavaaso aya'nti -- iti viditvaa tasmaa brahmacariyaa nibbijja pakkamati {nibbijjaapakkamati (sii0)}. aya.m kho, sandaka, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena pa.thamo abrahmacariyavaaso akkhaato yattha vi~n~nuu puriso sasakka.m brahmacariya.m ^a^P1.0516^ea^ na vaseyya, vasanto ca naaraadheyya ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m.

[03] 226^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, sandaka, idhekacco satthaa eva.mvaadii hoti eva.mdi.t.thi -- `karoto kaarayato chindato chedaapayato pacato paacaapayato socayato socaapayato kilamato kilamaapayato phandato phandaapayato paa.namatipaatayato adinna.m aadiyato sandhi.m chindato nillopa.m harato ekaagaarika.m karoto paripanthe ti.t.thato paradaara.m gacchato musaa bha.nato ^a^T2.0293^ea^ karoto na ^a^V2.0194^ea^ kariiyati paapa.m. khurapariyantena cepi cakkena yo imissaa pathaviyaa paa.ne eka.m ma.msakhala.m eka.m ma.msapu~nja.m kareyya, natthi tatonidaana.m paapa.m, natthi paapassa aagamo. dakkhi.na~ncepi ga"ngaaya tiira.m gaccheyya hananto ghaatento chindanto chedaapento pacanto pacaapento, natthi tatonidaana.m paapa.m, natthi ^a^M2.0184^ea^ paapassa aagamo. uttara~ncepi ga"ngaaya tiira.m gaccheyya dadanto daapento yajanto yajaapento, natthi tatonidaana.m pu~n~na.m, natthi pu~n~nassa aagamo. daanena damena sa.myamena saccavajjena natthi pu~n~na.m, natthi pu~n~nassa aagamo'ti.

[03] ``tatra, sandaka, vi~n~nuu puriso iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aya.m kho bhava.m satthaa eva.mvaadii eva.mdi.t.thi -- karoto kaarayato chindato chedaapayato pacato paacaapayato socato socaapayato kilamato kilamaapayato phandato phandaapayato paa.namatipaatayato adinna.m aadiyato sandhi.m chindato nillopa.m harato ekaagaarika.m karoto paripanthe ti.t.thato paradaara.m gacchato musaa bha.nato karoto na kariiyati paapa.m khurapariyantena cepi cakkena yo imissaa pathaviyaa paa.ne eka.m ma.msakhala.m eka.m ma.msapu~nja.m kareyya, natthi tatonidaana.m paapa.m, natthi paapassa aagamo. dakkhi.na~ncepi ga"ngaaya tiira.m gaccheyya hananto ghaatento chindanto chedaapento pacanto pacaapento, natthi tatonidaana.m paapa.m, natthi paapassa aagamo. uttara~ncepi ga"ngaaya tiira.m ^a^T2.0294^ea^ gaccheyya dadanto daapento yajanto yajaapento, natthi tatonidaana.m pu~n~na.m, natthi pu~n~nassa aagamo. daanena damena sa.myamena saccavajjena natthi pu~n~na.m, natthi pu~n~nassa aagamo'ti. sace imassa bhoto satthuno sacca.m vacana.m, akatena me ettha kata.m, avusitena me ettha vusita.m. ubhopi maya.m ettha samasamaa saama~n~na.m pattaa, yo caaha.m na vadaami `ubhinna.m kuruta.m na kariiyati paapa'nti. atireka.m kho panimassa bhoto satthuno naggiya.m mu.n.diya.m ukku.tikappadhaana.m kesamassulocana.m yoha.m puttasambaadhasayana.m ajjhaavasanto kaasikacandana.m paccanubhonto maalaagandhavilepana.m dhaarento jaataruuparajata.m saadiyanto iminaa bhotaa satthaaraa samasamagatiko bhavissaami. abhisamparaaya.m soha.m ki.m jaananto ki.m passanto imasmi.m satthari brahmacariya.m carissaami? `so abrahmacariyavaaso aya'nti iti viditvaa tasmaa brahmacariyaa nibbijja pakkamati. aya.m kho, sandaka, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena dutiyo abrahmacariyavaaso akkhaato yattha vi~n~nuu puriso sasakka.m brahmacariya.m na vaseyya, vasanto ca naaraadheyya ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m.

[03] 227^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, sandaka, idhekacco satthaa eva.mvaadii hoti eva.mdi.t.thi -- `natthi hetu, natthi paccayo sattaana.m sa.mkilesaaya; ahetuu appaccayaa sattaa ^a^M2.0185^ea^ sa.mkilissanti; natthi hetu, natthi paccayo ^a^V2.0195^ea^ sattaana.m visuddhiyaa; ahetuu appaccayaa sattaa visujjhanti; natthi bala.m, natthi ^a^T2.0295^ea^ viiriya.m, natthi purisathaamo ^a^P1.0517^ea^, natthi purisaparakkamo; sabbe sattaa sabbe paa.naa sabbe bhuutaa sabbe jiivaa avasaa abalaa aviiriyaa niyatisa"ngatibhaavapari.nataa chasvevaabhijaatiisu sukhadukkha.m pa.tisa.mvedentii'ti.

[03] 228^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, sandaka, idhekacco satthaa eva.mvaadii hoti eva.mdi.t.thi -- `sattime kaayaa aka.taa aka.tavidhaa animmitaa animmaataa va~njhaa kuu.ta.t.thaa esika.t.thaayi.t.thitaa, te na i~njanti na vipari.namanti na a~n~nama~n~na.m byaabaadhenti naala.m a~n~nama~n~nassa sukhaaya vaa dukkhaaya vaa sukhadukkhaaya vaa. katame satta? pathaviikaayo aapokaayo tejokaayo vaayokaayo sukhe dukkhe jiive sattame -- ime sattakaayaa aka.taa aka.tavidhaa animmitaa ^a^M2.0186^ea^ animmaataa ^a^V2.0196^ea^ va~njhaa kuu.ta.t.thaa esika.t.thaayi.t.thitaa. te na i~njanti na vipari.namanti na a~n~nama~n~na.m byaabaadhenti. naala.m a~n~nama~n~nassa sukhaaya vaa dukkhaaya vaa sukhadukkhaaya vaa. tattha natthi hantaa vaa ghaatetaa vaa sotaa vaa saavetaa vaa vi~n~naataa vaa vi~n~naapetaa vaa. yopi ti.nhena satthena siisa.m chindati, na koci ka~nci {ki~nci (ka0)} jiivitaa voropeti. sattanna.mtveva kaayaanamantarena sattha.m vivaramanupatati. cuddasa kho panimaani yonipamukhasatasahassaani sa.t.thi ca sataani cha ca sataani pa~nca ca kammuno sataani pa~nca ca kammaani tii.ni ^a^T2.0297^ea^ ca kammaani, kamme ca a.d.dhakamme ca, dva.t.thipa.tipadaa, dva.t.thantarakappaa, cha.laabhijaatiyo, a.t.tha purisabhuumiyo, ekuunapa~n~naasa aajiivakasate, ekuunapa~n~naasa paribbaajakasate, ekuunapa~n~naasa ^a^P1.0518^ea^ naagaavaasasate, viise indriyasate, ti.mse nirayasate, chatti.msa rajodhaatuyo, satta sa~n~niigabbhaa, satta asa~n~niigabbhaa, satta niga.n.thigabbhaa, satta devaa, satta maanusaa, satta pesaacaa, satta saraa, satta pavu.taa, satta papaataa, satta papaatasataani, satta supinaa, satta supinasataani, cullaasiiti {cuu.laasiiti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} mahaakappino {mahaakappuno (sii0 pii0)} satasahassaani, yaani baale ca pa.n.dite ca sandhaavitvaa sa.msaritvaa dukkhassanta.m karissanti. tattha natthi iminaaha.m siilena vaa vatena vaa tapena vaa brahmacariyena vaa aparipakka.m vaa kamma.m paripaacessaami, paripakka.m vaa kamma.m phussa phussa byanti.m karissaamiiti. heva.m natthi do.namite sukhadukkhe pariyantakate sa.msaare, natthi haayanava.d.dhane, natthi ukka.msaavaka.mse. seyyathaapi naama suttagu.le khitte nibbe.thiyamaanameva paleti, evameva baale ca pa.n.dite ca sandhaavitvaa sa.msaritvaa dukkhassanta.m karissantii'ti.

naaraadheyya ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m.

[03] ``ime ^a^M2.0188^ea^ kho te, sandaka, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena cattaaro abrahmacariyavaasaa ^a^T2.0300^ea^ akkhaataa yattha ^a^P1.0519^ea^ vi~n~nuu puriso sasakka.m brahmacariya.m na vaseyya, vasanto ca naaraadheyya ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala''nti.

[03] ``acchariya.m ^a^V2.0198^ea^, bho aananda, abbhuta.m, bho aananda! yaava~ncida.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena cattaaro abrahmacariyavaasaava samaanaa `abrahmacariyavaasaa'ti akkhaataa yattha vi~n~nuu puriso sasakka.m brahmacariya.m na vaseyya, vasanto ca naaraadheyya ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusalanti. katamaani pana taani, bho aananda, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena cattaari anassaasikaani brahmacariyaani akkhaataani yattha vi~n~nuu puriso sasakka.m brahmacariya.m na vaseyya, vasanto ca naaraadheyya ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala''nti?

[03] 229^b^.^eb^ ``idha, sandaka, ekacco satthaa sabba~n~nuu sabbadassaavii aparisesa.m ~naa.nadassana.m pa.tijaanaati -- `carato ca me ti.t.thato ca suttassa ca jaagarassa ca satata.m samita.m ~naa.nadassana.m paccupa.t.thita'nti. so su~n~nampi agaara.m pavisati, pi.n.dampi na labhati, kukkuropi .da.msati, ca.n.denapi hatthinaa samaagacchati, ca.n.denapi assena samaagacchati, ca.n.denapi go.nena samaagacchati, itthiyaapi purisassapi naamampi gottampi pucchati, gaamassapi nigamassapi naamampi maggampi pucchati. so `kimida'nti pu.t.tho samaano `su~n~na.m me agaara.m pavisitabba.m ahosi', tena paavisi.m; `pi.n.dampi aladdhabba.m ahosi', tena naalattha.m ^a^T2.0301^ea^; `kukkurena .da.msitabba.m ahosi', tenamhi {tena (ka0), tenaasi.m (?)} da.t.tho; `ca.n.dena hatthinaa samaagantabba.m ahosi', tena samaagami.m; `ca.n.dena assena samaagantabba.m ahosi', tena samaagami.m; `ca.n.dena go.nena samaagantabba.m ahosi', tena samaagami.m; `itthiyaapi purisassapi naamampi gottampi pucchitabba.m ahosi', tena pucchi.m; `gaamassapi nigamassapi naamampi maggampi pucchitabba.m ahosi', tena pucchinti. tatra, sandaka, vi~n~nuu puriso iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aya.m kho bhava.m satthaa sabba~n~nuu sabbadassaavii aparisesa.m ~naa.nadassana.m pa.tijaanaati...pe0... ^a^T2.0302^ea^ `gaamassapi nigamassapi naamampi maggampi pucchitabba.m ahosi, tena pucchi'nti ^a^M2.0189^ea^. so `anassaasika.m ida.m brahmacariya'nti -- iti viditvaa tasmaa brahmacariyaa nibbijja pakkamati. ida.m kho, sandaka, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena pa.thama.m anassaasika.m brahmacariya.m akkhaata.m ^a^P1.0520^ea^ yattha vi~n~nuu puriso sasakka.m brahmacariya.m na vaseyya, vasanto ca naaraadheyya ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m.
