[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi -- nanu eva.m sante, tassa purisassa appaa.tihiirakata.m bhaasita.m sampajjatii''ti? ``addhaa kho, bhante, eva.m sante tassa purisassa appaa.tihiirakata.m bhaasita.m sampajjatii''ti.
[03] ``evameva kho tva.m, udaayi, `yasmaa, bhante, va.n.naa a~n~no va.n.no uttaritaro vaa pa.niitataro vaa natthi so paramo va.n.no'ti vadesi, ta~nca va.n.na.m na pa~n~napesii''ti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhante, ma.ni ve.luriyo subho jaatimaa a.t.tha.mso suparikammakato pa.n.dukambale ^a^V2.0235^ea^ nikkhitto bhaasate ca tapate ca virocati ca, eva.m va.n.no attaa hoti arogo para.m mara.naa''ti.

[03] 273^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ^a^M2.0225^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi, yo vaa ma.ni ve.luriyo subho ^a^T2.0358^ea^ jaatimaa a.t.tha.mso suparikammakato pa.n.dukambale nikkhitto bhaasate ^a^P2.0034^ea^ ca tapate ca virocati ca, yo vaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya kimi khajjopanako -- imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m katamo va.n.no abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti? ``yvaaya.m, bhante, rattandhakaaratimisaaya kimi khajjopanako -- aya.m imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi, yo vaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya kimi khajjopanako, yo vaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya telappadiipo -- imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m katamo va.n.no abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti? ``yvaaya.m, bhante, rattandhakaaratimisaaya telappadiipo -- aya.m imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi, yo vaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya telappadiipo, yo vaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya mahaaaggikkhandho -- imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m katamo va.n.no abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti? ``yvaaya.m, bhante, rattandhakaaratimisaaya mahaaaggikkhandho -- aya.m imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi, yo vaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya mahaaaggikkhandho, yaa vaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m viddhe vigatavalaahake deve osadhitaarakaa -- imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m katamo va.n.no abhikkantataro ^a^T2.0359^ea^ ca pa.niitataro caa''ti? ``yvaaya.m, bhante, rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m viddhe vigatavalaahake deve osadhitaarakaa -- aya.m imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi, yaa vaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m viddhe vigatavalaahake deve osadhitaarakaa, yo vaa tadahuposathe pannarase viddhe vigatavalaahake deve abhido {abhide (ka0 sii0), abhidosa.m (ka0) abhidoti abhisaddena samaanatthanipaatapada.m (chakka"nguttara.tiikaa mahaavagga a.t.thamasuttava.n.nanaa)} a.d.dharattasamaya.m cando ^a^V2.0236^ea^ -- imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m katamo va.n.no abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti? ``yvaaya.m, bhante, tadahuposathe pannarase viddhe vigatavalaahake deve abhido ^a^M2.0226^ea^ a.d.dharattasamaya.m cando -- aya.m imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^P2.0035^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi, yo vaa tadahuposathe pannarase viddhe vigatavalaahake deve abhido a.d.dharattasamaya.m cando, yo vaa vassaana.m pacchime maase saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalaahake deve abhido majjhanhikasamaya.m suuriyo -- imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m katamo va.n.no abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti? ``yvaaya.m, bhante, vassaana.m pacchime maase saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalaahake deve abhido majjhanhikasamaya.m suuriyo -- aya.m imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti.

[03] ``ato kho te, udaayi, bahuu hi bahutaraa devaa ye imesa.m candimasuuriyaana.m aabhaa naanubhonti, tyaaha.m ^a^T2.0360^ea^ pajaanaami. atha ca panaaha.m na vadaami -- `yasmaa va.n.naa a~n~no va.n.no uttaritaro vaa pa.niitataro vaa natthii'ti. atha ca pana tva.m, udaayi, `yvaaya.m va.n.no kiminaa khajjopanakena nihiinataro {hiinataro (sii0 pii0)} ca patiki.t.thataro ca so paramo va.n.no'ti vadesi, ta~nca va.n.na.m na pa~n~napesii''ti. ``acchida.m {acchira (ka0), acchida (?)} bhagavaa katha.m, acchida.m sugato katha''nti!

[03] ``ki.m pana tva.m, udaayi, eva.m vadesi -- `acchida.m bhagavaa katha.m, acchida.m sugato katha.m'''ti? ``amhaaka.m, bhante, sake aacariyake eva.m hoti -- `aya.m paramo va.n.no, aya.m paramo va.n.no'ti. te maya.m, bhante, bhagavataa sake aacariyake samanuyu~njiyamaanaa samanuggaahiyamaanaa samanubhaasiyamaanaa rittaa tucchaa aparaddhaa''ti.

[03] 274^b^.^eb^ ``ki.m panudaayi, atthi ekantasukho loko, atthi aakaaravatii pa.tipadaa ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti? ``amhaaka.m, bhante, sake aacariyake eva.m hoti -- `atthi ekantasukho loko, atthi aakaaravatii pa.tipadaa ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyaayaa'''ti.

[03] ``katamaa ^a^V2.0237^ea^ pana saa, udaayi, aakaaravatii pa.tipadaa ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti? ``idha, bhante, ekacco paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, adinnaadaana.m pahaaya adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato ^a^M2.0227^ea^ hoti, kaamesumicchaacaara.m pahaaya kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato ^a^P2.0036^ea^ hoti, musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, a~n~natara.m vaa pana tapogu.na.m samaadaaya vattati. aya.m kho saa, bhante, aakaaravatii ^a^T2.0361^ea^ pa.tipadaa ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi, yasmi.m samaye paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, ekantasukhii vaa tasmi.m samaye attaa hoti sukhadukkhii vaa''ti? ``sukhadukkhii, bhante''.
[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi, yasmi.m samaye adinnaadaana.m pahaaya adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, ekantasukhii vaa tasmi.m samaye attaa hoti sukhadukkhii vaa''ti? ``sukhadukkhii, bhante''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi, yasmi.m samaye kaamesumicchaacaara.m pahaaya kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato hoti, ekantasukhii vaa tasmi.m samaye attaa hoti sukhadukkhii vaa''ti? ``sukhadukkhii, bhante''.
[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi, yasmi.m samaye musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, ekantasukhii vaa tasmi.m samaye attaa hoti sukhadukkhii vaa''ti? ``sukhadukkhii, bhante''.
[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi, yasmi.m samaye a~n~natara.m tapogu.na.m samaadaaya vattati, ekantasukhii vaa tasmi.m samaye attaa hoti sukhadukkhii vaa''ti? ``sukhadukkhii, bhante''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi, api nu kho voki.n.nasukhadukkha.m pa.tipada.m aagamma ekantasukhassa ^a^V2.0238^ea^ lokassa sacchikiriyaa hotii''ti {sacchikiriyaayaati (ka0)}? ``acchida.m bhagavaa katha.m, acchida.m sugato katha''nti!

[03] ``ki.m pana tva.m, udaayi, vadesi -- `acchida.m bhagavaa katha.m, acchida.m sugato katha.m'''ti? ``amhaaka.m, bhante, sake aacariyake eva.m hoti -- `atthi ekantasukho loko, atthi aakaaravatii pa.tipadaa ekantasukhassa lokassa ^a^T2.0362^ea^ sacchikiriyaayaa'ti. te maya.m, bhante, bhagavataa sake aacariyake samanuyu~njiyamaanaa samanuggaahiyamaanaa samanubhaasiyamaanaa rittaa tucchaa aparaddhaa''ti {aparaddhaa (sii0), aparaddhaapi (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}.

[03] 275^b^.^eb^ ``ki.m ^a^M2.0228^ea^ pana, bhante, atthi ekantasukho loko, atthi aakaaravatii pa.tipadaa ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti? ``atthi ^a^P2.0037^ea^ kho, udaayi, ekantasukho loko, atthi aakaaravatii pa.tipadaa ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti.

[03] ``katamaa pana saa, bhante, aakaaravatii pa.tipadaa ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti? ``idhudaayi, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati; vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa... dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati; piitiyaa ca viraagaa... tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati -- aya.m kho saa, udaayi, aakaaravatii pa.tipadaa ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti.

[03] ``na {ki.m nu (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} kho saa, bhante, aakaaravatii pa.tipadaa ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyaaya, sacchikato hissa, bhante, ettaavataa ekantasukho loko hotii''ti. ``na khvaassa, udaayi, ettaavataa ekantasukho loko sacchikato hoti; aakaaravatiitveva saa pa.tipadaa ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti.

[03] eva.m ^a^V2.0239^ea^ vutte, sakuludaayissa paribbaajakassa parisaa unnaadinii uccaasaddamahaasaddaa ahosi -- ``ettha maya.m anassaama saacariyakaa, ettha maya.m anassaama {panassaama (sii0)} saacariyakaa! na maya.m ito bhiyyo uttaritara.m pajaanaamaa''ti.

[03] atha kho sakuludaayii paribbaajako te paribbaajake appasadde ^a^T2.0363^ea^ katvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kittaavataa panaassa, bhante, ekantasukho loko sacchikato hotii''ti? ``idhudaayi, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m... upasampajja viharati. yaa taa devataa ekantasukha.m loka.m upapannaa taahi devataahi saddhi.m santi.t.thati sallapati saakaccha.m samaapajjati. ettaavataa khvaassa, udaayi, ekantasukho loko sacchikato hotii''ti.

[03] 276^b^.^eb^ ``etassa nuuna, bhante, ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu bhagavati brahmacariya.m carantii''ti? ``na kho, udaayi, ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu mayi brahmacariya.m caranti. atthi kho, udaayi ^a^M2.0229^ea^, a~n~neva dhammaa uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa ca yesa.m sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu mayi brahmacariya.m carantii''ti.

[03] ``katame ^a^P2.0038^ea^ pana te, bhante, dhammaa uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa ca yesa.m sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu bhagavati brahmacariya.m carantii''ti? ``idhudaayi, tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa...pe0... so ime pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ayampi kho, udaayi, dhammo uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ca yassa sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu mayi brahmacariya.m caranti''.

[03] ``puna capara.m, udaayi, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m ^a^T2.0364^ea^ vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m... tatiya.m jhaana.m... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ayampi kho, udaayi, dhammo uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ca yassa sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu mayi brahmacariya.m caranti.

[03] ``so ^a^V2.0240^ea^ eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. ayampi kho, udaayi, dhammo uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ca yassa sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu mayi brahmacariya.m caranti.

[03] ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte sattaana.m cutuupapaata~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati. ayampi kho, udaayi, dhammo uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ca yassa sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu mayi brahmacariya.m caranti.

[03] ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte aasavaana.m khaya~naa.naaya ^a^M2.0230^ea^ citta.m abhininnaameti ^a^T2.0365^ea^. so `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti... `ime aasavaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavasamudayo'ti... ^a^P2.0039^ea^ `aya.m aasavanirodho'ti... `aya.m aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tassa eva.m jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, avijjaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati. ayampi kho, udaayi, dhammo uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ca yassa sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu mayi brahmacariya.m caranti. ime kho, udaayi, dhammaa uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa ca yesa.m sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu mayi brahmacariya.m carantii''ti.

[03] 277^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, sakuludaayii paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante ^a^V2.0241^ea^, abhikkanta.m, bhante! seyyathaapi, bhante, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- `cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii'ti; evameva.m bhagavataa anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. labheyyaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, labheyya.m upasampada''nti.

[03] eva.m ^a^T2.0366^ea^ vutte, sakuludaayissa paribbaajakassa parisaa sakuludaayi.m paribbaajaka.m etadavocu.m -- ``maa bhava.m, udaayi, sama.ne gotame brahmacariya.m cari; maa bhava.m, udaayi, aacariyo hutvaa antevaasiivaasa.m vasi. seyyathaapi naama udakama.niko {ma.niko (sii0 pii0 ka0)} hutvaa uda~ncaniko {uddekaniko (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} assa, eva.m sampadamida.m {eva.m sampadameta.m (sii0 pii0)} bhoto udaayissa bhavissati. maa bhava.m, udaayi, sama.ne gotame brahmacariya.m cari; maa bhava.m, udaayi, aacariyo hutvaa antevaasiivaasa.m vasii''ti. iti hida.m sakuludaayissa paribbaajakassa parisaa sakuludaayi.m paribbaajaka.m antaraayamakaasi bhagavati brahmacariyeti.
[06] cuu.lasakuludaayisutta.m ni.t.thita.m navama.m.

[03] 278^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0367^ea^ ^a^M2.0231^ea^ ^a^V2.0242^ea^ ^a^P2.0040^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho vekhanaso {vekhanasso (sii0 pii0)} paribbaajako yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho vekhanaso paribbaajako bhagavato santike udaana.m udaanesi -- ``aya.m paramo va.n.no, aya.m paramo va.n.no''ti.
[03] ``ki.m pana tva.m, kaccaana, eva.m vadesi -- `aya.m paramo va.n.no, aya.m paramo va.n.no'ti? katamo, kaccaana, so paramo va.n.no''ti?
[03] ``yasmaa, bho gotama, va.n.naa a~n~no va.n.no uttaritaro vaa pa.niitataro vaa natthi so paramo va.n.no''ti.
[03] ``katamo pana so, kaccaana, va.n.no yasmaa va.n.naa a~n~no va.n.no uttaritaro vaa pa.niitataro vaa natthii''ti?
[03] ``yasmaa, bho gotama, va.n.naa a~n~no va.n.no uttaritaro vaa pa.niitataro vaa natthi so paramo va.n.no''ti.

[03] ``diighaapi kho te esaa, kaccaana, phareyya -- `yasmaa, bho gotama, va.n.naa a~n~no va.n.no uttaritaro vaa pa.niitataro vaa natthi so paramo va.n.no'ti vadesi, ta~nca va.n.na.m na pa~n~napesi. seyyathaapi, kaccaana, puriso eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m yaa imasmi.m janapade ^a^T2.0368^ea^ janapadakalyaa.nii, ta.m icchaami ta.m kaamemii'ti. tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ambho purisa, ya.m tva.m janapadakalyaa.ni.m icchasi kaamesi, jaanaasi ta.m janapadakalyaa.ni.m -- khattiyii vaa braahma.nii vaa vessii ^a^V2.0243^ea^ vaa suddii vaa'ti? iti pu.t.tho `no'ti vadeyya. tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ambho purisa, ya.m tva.m janapadakalyaa.ni.m icchasi kaamesi, jaanaasi ta.m janapadakalyaa.ni.m `eva.mnaamaa eva.mgottaati vaati...pe0... diighaa vaa rassaa vaa majjhimaa vaa kaa.lii vaa saamaa vaa ma"nguracchavii vaati... amukasmi.m gaame vaa nigame vaa nagare vaa'ti? iti pu.t.tho `no'ti vadeyya. tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ambho purisa, ya.m tva.m na jaanaasi na passasi, ta.m tva.m icchasi kaamesii'''ti? iti pu.t.tho `aamaa'ti vadeyya.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ^a^P2.0041^ea^ ma~n~nasi, kaccaana, nanu eva.m sante tassa purisassa appaa.tihiirakata.m bhaasita.m sampajjatii''ti? ``addhaa kho, bho gotama, eva.m sante tassa purisassa appaa.tihiirakata.m ^a^M2.0232^ea^ bhaasita.m sampajjatii''ti. ``evameva kho tva.m, kaccaana, `yasmaa, bho gotama, va.n.naa a~n~no va.n.no uttaritaro vaa pa.niitataro vaa natthi so paramo va.n.no'ti vadesi; ta~nca va.n.na.m na pa~n~napesii''ti. ``seyyathaapi, bho gotama, ma.ni ve.luriyo subho jaatimaa a.t.tha.mso suparikammakato pa.n.dukambale nikkhitto bhaasate ca tapate ca virocati ca, eva.m va.n.no attaa hoti arogo para.m mara.naa''ti.

[03] 279^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, kaccaana, yo vaa ma.ni ve.luriyo subho ^a^T2.0369^ea^ jaatimaa a.t.tha.mso suparikammakato pa.n.dukambale nikkhitto bhaasate ca tapate ca virocati ca, yo vaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya kimi khajjopanako imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m katamo va.n.no abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti? ``yvaaya.m, bho gotama, rattandhakaaratimisaaya kimi khajjopanako, aya.m imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, kaccaana, yo vaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya kimi khajjopanako, yo vaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya telappadiipo, imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m katamo va.n.no abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti? ``yvaaya.m, bho gotama, rattandhakaaratimisaaya telappadiipo, aya.m imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, kaccaana, yo vaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya telappadiipo, yo vaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya ^a^V2.0244^ea^ mahaaaggikkhandho, imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m katamo va.n.no abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti? ``yvaaya.m, bho gotama, rattandhakaaratimisaaya mahaaaggikkhandho, aya.m imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, kaccaana, yo vaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya mahaaaggikkhandho, yaa vaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m viddhe ^a^P2.0042^ea^ vigatavalaahake deve osadhitaarakaa, imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m katamo va.n.no abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti? ``yvaaya.m, bho gotama, rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m ^a^T2.0370^ea^ viddhe vigatavalaahake deve osadhitaarakaa, aya.m imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, kaccaana, yaa vaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m viddhe vigatavalaahake deve osadhitaarakaa, yo vaa tadahuposathe pannarase viddhe vigatavalaahake ^a^M2.0233^ea^ deve abhido a.d.dharattasamaya.m cando, imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m katamo va.n.no abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti? ``yvaaya.m, bho gotama, tadahuposathe pannarase viddhe vigatavalaahake deve abhido a.d.dharattasamaya.m cando, aya.m imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, kaccaana, yo vaa tadahuposathe pannarase viddhe vigatavalaahake deve abhido a.d.dharattasamaya.m cando, yo vaa vassaana.m pacchime maase saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalaahake deve abhido majjhanhikasamaya.m suuriyo, imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m katamo va.n.no abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti? ``yvaaya.m, bho gotama, vassaana.m pacchime maase saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalaahake deve abhido majjhanhikasamaya.m suuriyo -- aya.m imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti. ``ato kho te, kaccaana, bahuu hi bahutaraa devaa ye imesa.m candimasuuriyaana.m aabhaa naanubhonti, tyaaha.m pajaanaami. atha ca panaaha.m na vadaami -- `yasmaa va.n.naa a~n~no va.n.no uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ^a^T2.0371^ea^ ca natthii'ti. atha ca pana tva.m, kaccaana, `yvaaya.m va.n.no kiminaa khajjopanakena nihiinataro ca patiki.t.thataro ca so paramo va.n.no'ti vadesi; ta~nca va.n.na.m na pa~n~napesi''.

[03] 280^b^.^eb^ ``pa~nca kho ime, kaccaana, kaamagu.naa. katame pa~nca? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa, sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa gandhaa... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa i.t.thaa ^a^P2.0043^ea^ kantaa manaapaa ^a^V2.0245^ea^ piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa -- ime kho, kaccaana, pa~nca kaamagu.naa. ya.m kho, kaccaana, ime pa~nca kaamagu.ne pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m ida.m vuccati kaamasukha.m. iti kaamehi kaamasukha.m, kaamasukhaa kaamaggasukha.m tattha aggamakkhaayatii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, vekhanaso paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``acchariya.m, bho gotama, abbhuta.m, bho gotama! yaava subhaasita.m cida.m bhotaa gotamena -- `kaamehi kaamasukha.m, kaamasukhaa kaamaggasukha.m tattha aggamakkhaayatii'ti. (`kaamehi, bho gotama, kaamasukha.m, kaamasukhaa kaamaggasukha.m, tattha aggamakkhaayatii'ti) {( ) sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 potthakesu natthi} -- ``dujjaana.m kho eta.m, kaccaana, tayaa ^a^M2.0234^ea^ a~n~nadi.t.thikena a~n~nakhantikena a~n~narucikena a~n~natrayogena a~n~natraacariyakena -- kaamaa {kaama.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaa kaamasukha.m vaa kaamaggasukha.m vaa. ye kho te, kaccaana, bhikkhuu arahanto khii.naasavaa vusitavanto katakara.niiyaa ohitabhaaraa anuppattasadatthaa parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojanaa sammada~n~naa vimuttaa te kho ^a^T2.0372^ea^ eta.m jaaneyyu.m -- kaamaa vaa kaamasukha.m vaa kaamaggasukha.m vaa''ti.

[03] 281^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, vekhanaso paribbaajako kupito anattamano bhagavanta.myeva khu.msento bhagavanta.myeva vambhento bhagavanta.myeva vadamaano ``sama.no {sama.no ca (sii0 pii0)} gotamo paapito bhavissatii''ti bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``evameva panidhekacce {panidheke (sii0 pii0), panimeke (uparisubhasutte)} sama.nabraahma.naa ajaanantaa pubbanta.m, apassantaa aparanta.m atha ca pana `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaati -- pajaanaamaa'ti -- pa.tijaananti {itthattaayaati pa.tijaananti (pii0)}. tesamida.m bhaasita.m hassaka.myeva sampajjati, naamaka.myeva sampajjati, rittaka.myeva sampajjati, tucchaka.myeva sampajjatii''ti. ``ye kho te, kaccaana, sama.nabraahma.naa ajaanantaa pubbanta.m ^a^P2.0044^ea^, apassantaa aparanta.m, `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaati -- pajaanaamaa'ti -- pa.tijaananti; tesa.m soyeva {tesa.m tesaaya.m (sii0), tesa.myeva so (?)} sahadhammiko niggaho hoti. api ca, kaccaana, ti.t.thatu pubbanto, ti.t.thatu aparanto. etu vi~n~nuu puriso asa.tho amaayaavii ujujaatiko, ahamanusaasaami aha.m dhamma.m desemi. yathaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa pa.tipajjamaano {yathaanusi.t.tha.m pa.tipajjamaano (?)} nacirasseva saama~n~neva ~nassati saama.m dakkhiti -- eva.m kira sammaa {eva.m kiraayasmaa (syaa0 ka0)} bandhanaa vippamokkho hoti, yadida.m avijjaa bandhanaa. seyyathaapi, kaccaana, daharo kumaaro mando uttaanaseyyako ka.n.thapa~ncamehi bandhanehi baddho assa suttabandhanehi; tassa vuddhimanvaaya indriyaana.m paripaakamanvaaya ^a^T2.0373^ea^ taani bandhanaani mucceyyu.m; so mokkhomhiiti kho jaaneyya no ca bandhana.m ^a^V2.0246^ea^. evameva kho, kaccaana, etu vi~n~nuu puriso asa.tho amaayaavii ujujaatiko, ahamanusaasaami, aha.m dhamma.m desemi; yathaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa pa.tipajjamaano nacirasseva saama~n~ne ~nassati ^a^M2.0235^ea^, saama.m dakkhiti -- `eva.m kira sammaa bandhanaa vippamokkho hoti, yadida.m avijjaa bandhanaa'''ti.
[03] eva.m vutte, vekhanaso paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.
[06] vekhanasasutta.m ni.t.thita.m dasama.m.
[06] paribbaajakavaggo ni.t.thito tatiyo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] pu.n.darii-aggisaha-kathinaamo, diighanakho puna bhaaradvaajagotto.
[22] sandakaudaayimu.n.dikaputto, ma.niko tathaakaccaano varavaggo..

[03] 282^b^.^eb^ ^a^M2.0236^ea^ eva.m ^a^T2.0374^ea^ ^a^V2.0247^ea^ ^a^P2.0045^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu caarika.m carati mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m. atha kho bhagavaa maggaa okkamma a~n~natarasmi.m padese sita.m paatvaakaasi. atha kho aayasmato aanandassa etadahosi -- ``ko nu kho hetu, ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa paatukammaaya? na akaara.nena {na akaara.ne (sii0)} tathaagataa sita.m paatukarontii''ti. atha kho aayasmaa aanando eka.msa.m ciivara.m {uttaraasa"nga (syaa0 ka.m0)} katvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa paatukammaaya? na akaara.nena tathaagataa sita.m paatukarontii''ti. ``bhuutapubba.m, aananda, imasmi.m padese vega.li"nga.m {vehali"nga.m (sii0), vebhaliga.m (syaa0 ka.m0), vebhali"nga.m (pii0)} naama gaamanigamo ahosi iddho ceva phiito ca bahujano aaki.n.namanusso. vega.li"nga.m kho, aananda, gaamanigama.m kassapo bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho upanissaaya vihaasi. idha suda.m, aananda, kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa aaraamo ahosi. idha suda.m, aananda, kassapo bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho nisinnako bhikkhusa"ngha.m ovadatii''ti. atha ^a^T2.0375^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando catuggu.na.m sa"nghaa.ti.m pa~n~napetvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``tena hi, bhante, bhagavaa nisiidatu ettha. aya.m bhuumipadeso dviihi arahantehi sammaasambuddhehi paribhutto bhavissatii''ti. nisiidi bhagavaa pa~n~natte aasane. nisajja kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi --

[03] ``bhuutapubba.m, aananda, imasmi.m padese vega.li"nga.m naama gaamanigamo ahosi iddho ceva phiito ca bahujano aaki.n.namanusso. vega.li"nga.m kho, aananda, gaamanigama.m kassapo bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho upanissaaya vihaasi. idha suda.m, aananda, kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa ^a^V2.0248^ea^ aaraamo ahosi. idha suda.m, aananda, kassapo bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho nisinnako bhikkhusa"ngha.m ^a^P2.0046^ea^ ovadati.

[03] 283^b^.^eb^ ``vega.li"nge kho, aananda, gaamanigame gha.tikaaro {gha.tiikaaro (sii0 pii0)} naama kumbhakaaro kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa upa.t.thaako ahosi ^a^M2.0237^ea^ aggupa.t.thaako. gha.tikaarassa kho, aananda, kumbhakaarassa jotipaalo naama maa.navo sahaayo ahosi piyasahaayo. atha kho, aananda, gha.tikaaro kumbhakaaro jotipaala.m maa.nava.m aamantesi -- `aayaama, samma jotipaala, kassapa.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissaama. saadhusammata~nhi me tassa bhagavato dassana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassaa'ti. eva.m vutte, aananda, jotipaalo maa.navo gha.tikaara.m kumbhakaara.m etadavoca -- `ala.m, samma gha.tikaara. ki.m pana tena mu.n.dakena sama.nakena ^a^T2.0376^ea^ di.t.thenaa'ti? dutiyampi kho, aananda...pe0... tatiyampi kho, aananda, gha.tikaaro kumbhakaaro jotipaala.m maa.nava.m etadavoca -- `aayaama, samma jotipaala, kassapa.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissaama. saadhusammata~nhi me tassa bhagavato dassana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassaa'ti. tatiyampi kho, aananda, jotipaalo maa.navo gha.tikaara.m kumbhakaara.m etadavoca -- `ala.m, samma gha.tikaara. ki.m pana tena mu.n.dakena sama.nakena di.t.thenaa'ti? `tena hi, samma jotipaala, sottisinaani.m {sotti.m sinaani.m (sii0 pii0), sottisinaana.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} aadaaya {aahara (ka0)} nadi.m gamissaama sinaayitu'nti. `eva.m sammaa'ti kho, aananda, jotipaalo maa.navo gha.tikaarassa kumbhakaarassa paccassosi. atha kho, aananda, gha.tikaaro ca kumbhakaaro jotipaalo ca maa.navo sottisinaani.m aadaaya nadi.m agama.msu sinaayitu.m'.

[03] 284^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, aananda, gha.tikaaro kumbhakaaro jotipaala.m maa.nava.m aamantesi -- `aya.m, samma jotipaala, kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa aviduure aaraamo. aayaama, samma jotipaala, kassapa.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissaama. saadhusammata~nhi me tassa bhagavato dassana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassaa'ti. eva.m vutte, aananda, jotipaalo maa.navo gha.tikaara.m kumbhakaara.m etadavoca -- `ala.m, samma gha.tikaara. ki.m pana tena ^a^P2.0047^ea^ mu.n.dakena sama.nakena ^a^T2.0377^ea^ di.t.thenaa'ti? dutiyampi kho, aananda...pe0... tatiyampi kho, aananda, gha.tikaaro kumbhakaaro jotipaala.m maa.nava.m etadavoca -- `aya.m, samma jotipaala, kassapassa bhagavato ^a^V2.0249^ea^ arahato sammaasambuddhassa aviduure aaraamo. aayaama, samma jotipaala, kassapa.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m dassanaaya ^a^M2.0238^ea^ upasa"nkamissaama. saadhusammata~nhi me tassa bhagavato dassana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassaa'ti. tatiyampi kho, aananda, jotipaalo maa.navo gha.tikaara.m kumbhakaara.m etadavoca -- `ala.m, samma gha.tikaara. ki.m pana tena mu.n.dakena sama.nakena di.t.thenaa'ti? atha kho, aananda, gha.tikaaro kumbhakaaro jotipaala.m maa.nava.m ova.t.tikaaya.m paraamasitvaa etadavoca -- `aya.m, samma jotipaala, kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa aviduure aaraamo. aayaama, samma jotipaala, kassapa.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissaama. saadhusammata~nhi me tassa bhagavato dassana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassaa'ti. atha kho, aananda, jotipaalo maa.navo ova.t.tika.m viniva.t.tetvaa {vinive.thetvaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} gha.tikaara.m kumbhakaara.m etadavoca -- `ala.m, samma gha.tikaara. ki.m pana tena mu.n.dakena sama.nakena di.t.thenaa'ti? atha kho, aananda, gha.tikaaro kumbhakaaro jotipaala.m maa.nava.m siisa.mnhaata.m {sasiisa.m nahaata.m (sii0), siisanhaata.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} kesesu paraamasitvaa etadavoca -- `aya.m, samma jotipaala, kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa aviduure aaraamo. aayaama, samma jotipaala, kassapa.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissaama ^a^T2.0378^ea^. saadhusammata~nhi me tassa bhagavato dassana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassaa'ti. atha kho, aananda, jotipaalassa maa.navassa etadahosi -- `acchariya.m vata, bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho! yatra hi naamaaya.m gha.tikaaro kumbhakaaro ittarajacco samaano amhaaka.m siisa.mnhaataana.m kesesu paraamasitabba.m ma~n~nissati; na vatida.m kira oraka.m ma~n~ne bhavissatii'ti; gha.tikaara.m kumbhakaara.m etadavoca -- `yaavataadohipi {yaavetadohipi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, samma gha.tikaaraa'ti? `yaavataadohipi, samma jotipaala. tathaa hi pana me ^a^P2.0048^ea^ saadhusammata.m tassa bhagavato dassana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassaa'ti. `tena hi, samma gha.tikaara, mu~nca; gamissaamaa'ti.

[03] 285^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, aananda, gha.tikaaro ca kumbhakaaro jotipaalo ca maa.navo yena kassapo bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa gha.tikaaro kumbhakaaro kassapa.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. jotipaalo pana maa.navo kassapena ^a^M2.0239^ea^ bhagavataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho, aananda, gha.tikaaro kumbhakaaro kassapa.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m etadavoca -- `aya.m me, bhante, jotipaalo maa.navo sahaayo piyasahaayo. imassa bhagavaa dhamma.m desetuu'ti. atha kho, aananda, kassapo bhagavaa ^a^V2.0250^ea^ araha.m sammaasambuddho gha.tikaara~nca ^a^T2.0379^ea^ kumbhakaara.m jotipaala~nca maa.nava.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho, aananda, gha.tikaaro ca kumbhakaaro jotipaalo ca maa.navo kassapena bhagavataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassitaa samaadapitaa samuttejitaa sampaha.msitaa kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa kassapa.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkami.msu.

[03] 286^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, aananda, jotipaalo maa.navo gha.tikaara.m kumbhakaara.m etadavoca -- `ima.m nu tva.m, samma gha.tikaara, dhamma.m su.nanto atha ca pana agaarasmaa anagaariya.m na pabbajissasii'ti? `nanu ma.m, samma jotipaala, jaanaasi, andhe ji.n.ne maataapitaro posemii'ti? `tena hi, samma gha.tikaara, aha.m agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissaamii'ti. atha kho, aananda, gha.tikaaro ca kumbhakaaro jotipaalo ca maa.navo yena kassapo bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho tenupasa"nkami.msu ^a^P2.0049^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa kassapa.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinno kho, aananda, gha.tikaaro kumbhakaaro kassapa.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m etadavoca -- `aya.m me, bhante, jotipaalo maa.navo sahaayo piyasahaayo. ima.m bhagavaa pabbaajetuu'ti. alattha kho, aananda, jotipaalo maa.navo ^a^T2.0380^ea^ kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa santike pabbajja.m, alattha upasampada.m.

[03] 287^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, aananda, kassapo bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho aciruupasampanne jotipaale maa.nave a.d.dhamaasupasampanne vega.li"nge yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena baaraa.nasii tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena baaraa.nasii tadavasari. tatra suda.m, aananda, kassapo bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho baaraa.nasiya.m viharati isipatane migadaaye ^a^M2.0240^ea^. assosi kho, aananda, kikii kaasiraajaa -- `kassapo kira bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho baaraa.nasi.m anuppatto baaraa.nasiya.m viharati isipatane migadaaye'ti. atha kho, aananda, kikii kaasiraajaa bhadraani bhadraani yaanaani yojaapetvaa bhadra.m {bhadra.m bhadra.m (ka0)} yaana.m abhiruhitvaa bhadrehi bhadrehi yaanehi baaraa.nasiyaa niyyaasi mahaccaraajaanubhaavena {mahaccaa raajaanubhaavena (sii0), mahataa raajaanubhaavena (pii0)} kassapa.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m dassanaaya. yaavatikaa yaanassa bhuumi yaanena gantvaa yaanaa paccorohitvaa pattikova ^a^V2.0251^ea^ yena kassapo bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa kassapa.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho, aananda, kiki.m kaasiraajaana.m kassapo bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho, aananda, kikii kaasiraajaa ^a^T2.0381^ea^ kassapena bhagavataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito kassapa.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m etadavoca -- `adhivaasetu ^a^P2.0050^ea^ me, bhante, bhagavaa svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa'ti. adhivaasesi kho, aananda, kassapo bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho, aananda, kikii kaasiraajaa kassapassa bhagavato sammaasambuddhassa adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa kassapa.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho, aananda, kikii kaasiraajaa tassaa rattiyaa accayena sake nivesane pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa pa.n.dupu.takassa {pa.n.dumu.tiikassa (sii0 pii0), pa.n.dumudikassa (syaa0 ka.m0)} saalino vigatakaa.laka.m anekasuupa.m anekabya~njana.m, kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa kaala.m aarocaapesi -- `kaalo, bhante, ni.t.thita.m bhatta'nti.

[03] 288^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, aananda, kassapo bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena kikissa kaasira~n~no nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena. atha kho, aananda, kikii kaasiraajaa buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappesi sampavaaresi. atha ^a^M2.0241^ea^ kho, aananda, kikii kaasiraajaa kassapa.m bhagavanta.m ^a^T2.0382^ea^ arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m a~n~natara.m niica.m aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho, aananda, kikii kaasiraajaa kassapa.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m etadavoca -- `adhivaasetu me, bhante, bhagavaa baaraa.nasiya.m vassaavaasa.m; evaruupa.m sa"nghassa upa.t.thaana.m bhavissatii'ti. `ala.m, mahaaraaja. adhivuttho me vassaavaaso'ti. dutiyampi kho, aananda... tatiyampi kho, aananda, kikii kaasiraajaa kassapa.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m etadavoca -- `adhivaasetu me, bhante, bhagavaa baaraa.nasiya.m vassaavaasa.m; evaruupa.m sa"nghassa upa.t.thaana.m bhavissatii'ti. `ala.m, mahaaraaja. adhivuttho me vassaavaaso'ti. atha kho, aananda, kikissa kaasira~n~no `na me kassapo bhagavaa araha.m ^a^P2.0051^ea^ sammaasambuddho adhivaaseti baaraa.nasiya.m vassaavaasa'nti ahudeva a~n~nathatta.m ^a^V2.0252^ea^, ahu domanassa.m. atha kho, aananda, kikii kaasiraajaa kassapa.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m etadavoca -- `atthi nu kho, bhante, a~n~no koci mayaa upa.t.thaakataro'ti?

[03] ```atthi, mahaaraaja, vega.li"nga.m naama gaamanigamo. tattha gha.tikaaro naama kumbhakaaro; so me upa.t.thaako aggupa.t.thaako. tuyha.m kho pana, mahaaraaja, na me kassapo bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho adhivaaseti baaraa.nasiya.m vassaavaasanti attheva {atthi (sii0 pii0)} a~n~nathatta.m, atthi domanassa.m. tayida.m gha.tikaarassa kumbhakaarassa {gha.tikaare kumbhakaare (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} natthi ca na ca bhavissati. gha.tikaaro kho, mahaaraaja, kumbhakaaro buddha.m sara.na.m gato, dhamma.m sara.na.m ^a^T2.0383^ea^ gato, sa"ngha.m sara.na.m gato. gha.tikaaro kho, mahaaraaja, kumbhakaaro paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato, kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato, musaavaadaa pa.tivirato, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato. gha.tikaaro kho, mahaaraaja, kumbhakaaro buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato, dhamme aveccappasaadena samannaagato, sa"nghe aveccappasaadena samannaagato, ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagato. gha.tikaaro kho, mahaaraaja, kumbhakaaro dukkhe nikka"nkho, dukkhasamudaye nikka"nkho, dukkhanirodhe nikka"nkho, dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya nikka"nkho. gha.tikaaro kho, mahaaraaja, kumbhakaaro ekabhattiko brahmacaarii siilavaa kalyaa.nadhammo. gha.tikaaro kho, mahaaraaja, kumbhakaaro nikkhittama.nisuva.n.no apetajaataruuparajato ^a^M2.0242^ea^. gha.tikaaro kho, mahaaraaja, kumbhakaaro pannamusalo na sahatthaa pathavi.m kha.nati {kumbhakaaro na musalena na sahatthaa pa.thavi.m kha.nati (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), kumbhakaaro na musalena sahatthaa pathavi~nca kha.nati (ka0)}. ya.m hoti kuulapalugga.m vaa muusikukkaro {muusikukkuro (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaa ta.m kaajena aaharitvaa bhaajana.m karitvaa evamaaha -- ``ettha yo icchati ta.n.dulapa.tibhastaani {ta.n.dula pabhivattaani (sii0 pii0)} vaa muggapa.tibhastaani vaa ka.laayapa.tibhastaani vaa nikkhipitvaa ya.m icchati ta.m haratuu''ti. gha.tikaaro kho, mahaaraaja, kumbhakaaro andhe ji.n.ne ^a^P2.0052^ea^ maataapitaro poseti. gha.tikaaro kho, mahaaraaja, kumbhakaaro pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatiko tattha parinibbaayii anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa.

[03] 289^b^.^eb^ ```ekamidaaha.m ^a^T2.0384^ea^, mahaaraaja, samaya.m vega.li"nge naama gaamanigame viharaami. atha khvaaha.m, mahaaraaja, pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena gha.tikaarassa kumbhakaarassa maataapitaro tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa gha.tikaarassa kumbhakaarassa maataapitaro etadavoca.m -- ``handa, ko nu kho aya.m bhaggavo gato''ti? ``nikkhanto kho te, bhante, upa.t.thaako antokumbhiyaa odana.m gahetvaa pariyogaa suupa.m gahetvaa paribhu~njaa''ti. atha khvaaha.m, mahaaraaja, kumbhiyaa ^a^V2.0253^ea^ odana.m gahetvaa pariyogaa suupa.m gahetvaa paribhu~njitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkami.m {pakkaami.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. atha kho, mahaaraaja, gha.tikaaro kumbhakaaro yena maataapitaro tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa maataapitaro etadavoca -- ``ko kumbhiyaa odana.m gahetvaa pariyogaa suupa.m gahetvaa paribhu~njitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkanto''ti? ``kassapo, taata, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho kumbhiyaa odana.m gahetvaa pariyogaa suupa.m gahetvaa paribhu~njitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkanto''ti? atha kho, mahaaraaja, gha.tikaarassa kumbhakaarassa etadahosi -- ``laabhaa vata me, suladdha.m vata me, yassa me kassapo bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho eva.m abhivissattho''ti. atha kho, mahaaraaja, gha.tikaara.m kumbhakaara.m a.d.dhamaasa.m piitisukha.m na vijahati {na vijahi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, sattaaha.m maataapituuna.m.

[03] 290^b^.^eb^ ```ekamidaaha.m, mahaaraaja, samaya.m tattheva vega.li"nge naama gaamanigame viharaami. atha khvaaha.m, mahaaraaja, pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya ^a^T2.0385^ea^ yena ^a^M2.0243^ea^ gha.tikaarassa kumbhakaarassa maataapitaro tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa gha.tikaarassa kumbhakaarassa maataapitaro etadavoca.m -- ``handa, ko nu kho aya.m bhaggavo gato''ti? ``nikkhanto kho te, bhante, upa.t.thaako anto ka.lopiyaa kummaasa.m gahetvaa pariyogaa suupa.m gahetvaa paribhu~njaa''ti. atha khvaaha.m, mahaaraaja, ka.lopiyaa kummaasa.m gahetvaa pariyogaa suupa.m ^a^P2.0053^ea^ gahetvaa paribhu~njitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkami.m. atha kho, mahaaraaja, gha.tikaaro kumbhakaaro yena maataapitaro tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa maataapitaro etadavoca -- ``ko ka.lopiyaa kummaasa.m gahetvaa pariyogaa suupa.m gahetvaa paribhu~njitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkanto''ti? ``kassapo, taata, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho ka.lopiyaa kummaasa.m gahetvaa pariyogaa suupa.m gahetvaa paribhu~njitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkanto''ti. atha kho, mahaaraaja, gha.tikaarassa kumbhakaarassa etadahosi -- ``laabhaa vata me, suladdha.m vata me, yassa me kassapo bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho eva.m abhivissattho''ti. atha kho, mahaaraaja, gha.tikaara.m kumbhakaara.m a.d.dhamaasa.m piitisukha.m na vijahati, sattaaha.m maataapituuna.m.

[03] 291^b^.^eb^ ```ekamidaaha.m, mahaaraaja, samaya.m tattheva vega.li"nge naama gaamanigame viharaami. tena kho pana samayena ku.ti {gandhaku.ti (sii0)} ovassati. atha khvaaha.m, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu aamantesi.m -- ``gacchatha, bhikkhave, gha.tikaarassa kumbhakaarassa nivesane ti.na.m jaanaathaa''ti. eva.m vutte, mahaaraaja, te ^a^T2.0386^ea^ bhikkhuu ma.m etadavocu.m -- ``natthi kho, bhante, gha.tikaarassa kumbhakaarassa nivesane ti.na.m, atthi ca khvaassa aavesane ^a^V2.0254^ea^ {aavesana.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} ti.nacchadana'' {navacchadana.m (sii0)} nti. ``gacchatha, bhikkhave, gha.tikaarassa kumbhakaarassa aavesana.m utti.na.m karothaa''ti. atha kho te, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu gha.tikaarassa kumbhakaarassa aavesana.m utti.namaka.msu. atha kho, mahaaraaja, gha.tikaarassa kumbhakaarassa maataapitaro te bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``ke aavesana.m utti.na.m karontii''ti? ``bhikkhuu, bhagini, kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa ku.ti ovassatii''ti. ``haratha, bhante, haratha, bhadramukhaa''ti. atha kho, mahaaraaja, gha.tikaaro kumbhakaaro yena maataapitaro tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa maataapitaro etadavoca -- ``ke aavesana.m utti.namaka.msuu''ti? ``bhikkhuu, taata, kassapassa kira bhagavato ^a^M2.0244^ea^ arahato sammaasambuddhassa ku.ti ovassatii''ti. atha kho, mahaaraaja, gha.tikaarassa kumbhakaarassa etadahosi -- ``laabhaa vata me, suladdha.m vata me, yassa me kassapo bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho eva.m abhivissattho''ti. atha kho, mahaaraaja gha.tikaara.m kumbhakaara.m ^a^P2.0054^ea^ a.d.dhamaasa.m piitisukha.m na vijahati, sattaaha.m maataapituuna.m. atha kho, mahaaraaja, aavesana.m sabbanta.m temaasa.m aakaasacchadana.m a.t.thaasi, na devotivassi {na caativassi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. evaruupo ca, mahaaraaja, gha.tikaaro kumbhakaaro'ti. `laabhaa, bhante, gha.tikaarassa kumbhakaarassa, suladdhaa, bhante, gha.tikaarassa kumbhakaarassa yassa bhagavaa eva.m abhivissattho'''ti.

[03] 292^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^T2.0387^ea^ kho, aananda, kikii kaasiraajaa gha.tikaarassa kumbhakaarassa pa~ncamattaani ta.n.dulavaahasataani paahesi pa.n.dupu.takassa saalino tadupiya~nca suupeyya.m. atha kho te, aananda, raajapurisaa gha.tikaara.m kumbhakaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa etadavocu.m -- `imaani kho, bhante, pa~ncamattaani ta.n.dulavaahasataani kikinaa kaasiraajena pahitaani pa.n.dupu.takassa saalino tadupiya~nca suupeyya.m. taani, bhante, pa.tigga.nhathaa'ti {patigga.nhaatuuti (sii0 pii0), pa.tigga.nhaatuuti (syaa0 ka.m0)}. `raajaa kho bahukicco bahukara.niiyo. ala.m me! ra~n~nova hotuu'ti. siyaa kho pana te, aananda, evamassa -- `a~n~no nuuna tena samayena jotipaalo maa.navo ahosii'ti. na kho paneta.m, aananda, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. aha.m tena samayena jotipaalo maa.navo ahosi''nti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa aanando bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] gha.tikaarasutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 293^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0388^ea^ ^a^V2.0255^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kuruusu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m yena thullako.t.thika.m {thuulako.t.thika.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} naama kuruuna.m nigamo tadavasari. assosu.m kho thullako.t.thikaa {thuulako.t.thitakaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} braahma.nagahapatikaa -- ``sama.no ^a^M2.0245^ea^ khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito kuruusu caarika.m ^a^P2.0055^ea^ caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m thullako.t.thika.m anuppatto. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. saadhu kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m dassana.m hotii''ti. atha kho thullako.t.thikaa braahma.nagahapatikaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa appekacce bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu; appekacce bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi.msu, sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu; appekacce yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu; appekacce ^a^T2.0389^ea^ bhagavato santike naamagotta.m saavetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu; appekacce tu.nhiibhuutaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinne kho thullako.t.thike braahma.nagahapatike bhagavaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi.

[03] 294^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena ra.t.thapaalo naama kulaputto tasmi.myeva thullako.t.thike aggakulassa {aggakulikassa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} putto tissa.m parisaaya.m nisinno hoti. atha kho ra.t.thapaalassa kulaputtassa etadahosi -- ``yathaa yathaa khvaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami {yathaa yathaa kho bhagavaa dhamma.m deseti (sii0)}, nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajeyya''nti. atha kho thullako.t.thikaa braahma.nagahapatikaa bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassitaa samaadapitaa samuttejitaa sampaha.msitaa ^a^V2.0256^ea^ bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa ^a^P2.0056^ea^ bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkami.msu. atha kho ra.t.thapaalo kulaputto acirapakkantesu thullako.t.thikesu ^a^M2.0246^ea^ braahma.nagahapatikesu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho ra.t.thapaalo kulaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``yathaa yathaaha.m, bhante, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m ^a^T2.0390^ea^ brahmacariya.m caritu.m. icchaamaha.m, bhante, kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitu.m. labheyyaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, labheyya.m upasampada.m. pabbaajetu ma.m bhagavaa''ti {ettha ``labheyyaaha.m...pe0... upasampada.m''ti vaakyadvaya.m sabbesupi muulapotthakesu dissati, paaraajikapaa.liya.m pana sudinnabhaa.navaare eta.m natthi. ``pabbaajetu ma.m bhagavaa''ti ida.m pana vaakya.m marammapotthake yeva dissati, paaraajikapaa.liya~nca tadeva atthi}. ``anu~n~naatosi pana tva.m, ra.t.thapaala, maataapituuhi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti? ``na khoha.m, bhante, anu~n~naato maataapituuhi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti. ``na kho, ra.t.thapaala, tathaagataa ananu~n~naata.m maataapituuhi putta.m pabbaajentii''ti. ``svaaha.m, bhante, tathaa karissaami yathaa ma.m maataapitaro anujaanissanti agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti.

[03] 295^b^.^eb^ atha kho ra.t.thapaalo kulaputto u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yena maataapitaro tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa maataapitaro etadavoca -- ``ammataataa, yathaa yathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m. icchaamaha.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitu.m. anujaanaatha ma.m agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti. eva.m vutte, ra.t.thapaalassa kulaputtassa maataapitaro ra.t.thapaala.m kulaputta.m etadavocu.m -- ``tva.m khosi, taata ra.t.thapaala, amhaaka.m ekaputtako piyo manaapo sukhedhito sukhaparibhato {sukhaparihato (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0) (ehi tva.m taata ra.t.thapaala bhu~nja ca piva ca paricaare hi ca, bhu~njanto pivanto paricaarento kaame paribhu~njanto pu~n~naani karonto abhiramassu, na ta.m maya.m anujaanaama agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaaya,) sabbattha dissati, sudinnaka.n.de pana natthi, a.t.thakathaasupi na dassita.m}. na tva.m, taata ra.t.thapaala ^a^T2.0391^ea^, kassaci dukkhassa jaanaasi. mara.nenapi ^a^P2.0057^ea^ te maya.m akaamakaa vinaa bhavissaama. ki.m pana maya.m ^a^M2.0247^ea^ ta.m jiivanta.m anujaanissaama agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti? dutiyampi kho ra.t.thapaalo kulaputto...pe0... tatiyampi kho ra.t.thapaalo kulaputto maataapitaro etadavoca -- ``ammataataa, yathaa yathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m. icchaamaha.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitu.m. anujaanaatha ma.m agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti. tatiyampi kho ^a^V2.0257^ea^ ra.t.thapaalassa kulaputtassa maataapitaro ra.t.thapaala.m kulaputta.m etadavocu.m -- ``tva.m khosi, taata ra.t.thapaala, amhaaka.m ekaputtako piyo manaapo sukhedhito sukhaparibhato. na tva.m, taata ra.t.thapaala, kassaci dukkhassa jaanaasi. mara.nenapi te maya.m akaamakaa vinaa bhavissaama. ki.m pana maya.m ta.m jiivanta.m anujaanissaama ^a^T2.0392^ea^ agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti?

[03] 296^b^.^eb^ atha kho ra.t.thapaalo kulaputto -- ``na ma.m maataapitaro anujaananti agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti tattheva anantarahitaaya bhuumiyaa nipajji -- ``idheva me mara.na.m bhavissati pabbajjaa vaa''ti. atha kho ra.t.thapaalo kulaputto ekampi bhatta.m na bhu~nji, dvepi bhattaani na bhu~nji, tii.nipi bhattaani na bhu~nji, cattaaripi bhattaani na bhu~nji, pa~ncapi bhattaani na bhu~nji, chapi bhattaani na bhu~nji, sattapi bhattaani na bhu~nji. atha ^a^P2.0058^ea^ kho ra.t.thapaalassa kulaputtassa maataapitaro ra.t.thapaala.m kulaputta.m etadavocu.m -- ``tva.m khosi, taata ra.t.thapaala, amhaaka.m ekaputtako piyo manaapo sukhedhito sukhaparibhato. na tva.m, taata ra.t.thapaala, kassaci, dukkhassa jaanaasi {``mara.nenapi te...pe0... pabbajjaayaa''ti vaakyadvaya.m sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 potthakesu dutiya.t.thaane yeva dissati, paaraajikapaa.liya.m pana pa.thama.t.thaane yeva dissati. tasmaa idha dutiya.t.thaane punaagata.m adhika.m viya dissati}. mara.nenapi te maya.m akaamakaa vinaa bhavissaama. ki.m pana maya.m ta.m jiivanta.m anujaanissaama agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaaya. u.t.thehi, taata ra.t.thapaala, bhu~nja ca piva ca paricaarehi ca; bhu~njanto pivanto paricaarento kaame paribhu~njanto pu~n~naani karonto abhiramassu. na ta.m maya.m anujaanaama agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaaya {``mara.nenapi te...pe0... pabbajaayaa''ti vaakyadvaya.m sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 potthakesu dutiya.t.thaane yeva dissati, paaraajikapaa.liya.m pana pa.thama.t.thaane yeva dissati. tasmaa idha dutiya.t.thaane punaagata.m adhika.m viya dissati}. mara.nenapi te maya.m akaamakaa vinaa bhavissaama. ki.m pana maya.m ta.m jiivanta.m anujaanissaama agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti? eva.m vutte, ra.t.thapaalo kulaputto tu.nhii ahosi. dutiyampi kho ra.t.thapaalassa kulaputtassa maataapitaro ^a^M2.0248^ea^ ra.t.thapaala.m ^a^T2.0393^ea^ kulaputta.m etadavocu.m...pe0... dutiyampi kho ra.t.thapaalo kulaputto tu.nhii ahosi. tatiyampi kho ra.t.thapaalassa kulaputtassa maataapitaro ra.t.thapaala.m kulaputta.m etadavocu.m -- ``tva.m khosi, taata ra.t.thapaala, amhaaka.m ekaputtako piyo manaapo sukhedhito sukhaparibhato. na tva.m, taata ra.t.thapaala, kassaci dukkhassa jaanaasi. mara.nenapi te maya.m akaamakaa vinaa bhavissaama, ki.m pana maya.m ta.m jiivanta.m anujaanissaama agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaaya. u.t.thehi, taata ra.t.thapaala, bhu~nja ca piva ca paricaarehi ca; bhu~njanto pivanto paricaarento kaame paribhu~njanto pu~n~naani karonto abhiramassu. na ta.m maya.m anujaanaama agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaaya. mara.nenapi te maya.m akaamakaa vinaa bhavissaama ^a^V2.0258^ea^. ki.m pana maya.m ta.m jiivanta.m anujaanissaama agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti? tatiyampi kho ra.t.thapaalo kulaputto tu.nhii ahosi.

[03] 297^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P2.0059^ea^ kho ra.t.thapaalassa kulaputtassa sahaayakaa yena ra.t.thapaalo kulaputto tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa ra.t.thapaala.m kulaputta.m etadavocu.m -- ``tva.m khosi {tva.m kho (sii0 pii0)}, samma ra.t.thapaala, maataapituuna.m ekaputtako piyo manaapo sukhedhito sukhaparibhato. na tva.m, samma ra.t.thapaala, kassaci dukkhassa jaanaasi. mara.nenapi te maataapitaro akaamakaa vinaa bhavissanti. ki.m pana te ta.m jiivanta.m anujaanissanti agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaaya. u.t.thehi, samma ra.t.thapaala, bhu~nja ca piva ca paricaarehi ca; bhu~njanto pivanto paricaarento kaame paribhu~njanto pu~n~naani karonto abhiramassu. na ta.m maataapitaro anujaanissanti {anujaananti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaaya. mara.nenapi te maataapitaro akaamakaa vinaa bhavissanti. ki.m pana te ta.m jiivanta.m anujaanissanti ^a^T2.0394^ea^ agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti? eva.m vutte, ra.t.thapaalo kulaputto tu.nhii ahosi. dutiyampi kho... tatiyampi kho ra.t.thapaalassa kulaputtassa sahaayakaa ra.t.thapaala.m kulaputta.m etadavocu.m -- ``tva.m khosi, samma ra.t.thapaala, maataapituuna.m ekaputtako piyo manaapo sukhedhito sukhaparibhato, na tva.m, samma ra.t.thapaala, kassaci dukkhassa jaanaasi, mara.nenapi te maataapitaro akaamakaa vinaa bhavissanti. ki.m pana te ta.m jiivanta.m anujaanissanti agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaaya? u.t.thehi, samma ra.t.thapaala, bhu~nja ca piva ca paricaarehi ca, bhu~njanto pivanto paricaarento kaame paribhu~njanto pu~n~naani ^a^M2.0249^ea^ karonto abhiramassu. na ta.m maataapitaro anujaanissanti agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaaya, mara.nenapi te maataapitaro akaamakaa vinaa bhavissanti. ki.m pana te ta.m jiivanta.m anujaanissanti agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti? tatiyampi kho ra.t.thapaalo kulaputto tu.nhii ahosi.

[03] 298^b^.^eb^ atha kho ra.t.thapaalassa kulaputtassa sahaayakaa yena ra.t.thapaalassa kulaputtassa maataapitaro tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa ra.t.thapaalassa kulaputtassa maataapitaro etadavocu.m -- ``ammataataa, eso ra.t.thapaalo kulaputto tattheva anantarahitaaya bhuumiyaa nipanno -- `idheva me mara.na.m bhavissati ^a^P2.0060^ea^ pabbajjaa vaa'ti. sace tumhe ra.t.thapaala.m kulaputta.m naanujaanissatha agaarasmaa anagaariya.m ^a^V2.0259^ea^ pabbajjaaya, tattheva {tatthevassa (sii0)} mara.na.m aagamissati. sace pana tumhe ra.t.thapaala.m kulaputta.m anujaanissatha agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaaya, pabbajitampi na.m dakkhissatha. sace ra.t.thapaalo kulaputto naabhiramissati agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaaya, kaa tassa {kaa cassa (sii0)} a~n~naa gati bhavissati? idheva ^a^T2.0395^ea^ paccaagamissati. anujaanaatha ra.t.thapaala.m kulaputta.m agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti. ``anujaanaama, taataa, ra.t.thapaala.m kulaputta.m agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaaya. pabbajitena ca pana {pana te (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} maataapitaro uddassetabbaa''ti. atha kho ra.t.thapaalassa kulaputtassa sahaayakaa yena ra.t.thapaalo kulaputto tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa ra.t.thapaala.m kulaputta.m etadavocu.m -- ``u.t.thehi, samma ra.t.thapaala {``tva.m khosi samma ra.t.thapaala maataapituuna.m ekaputtako piyo manaapo sukhedhito sukhaparihato, na tva.m samma ra.t.thapaala kassaci dukkhassa jaanaasi, u.t.thehi samma ra.t.thapaala bhu~nja ca piva ca paricaarehi ca, bhu~njanto pivanto paricaarento kaame paribhu~njanto pu~n~naani karonto abhiramassu, (sii0 pii0 ka0)}, anu~n~naatosi maataapituuhi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaaya. pabbajitena ca pana te maataapitaro uddassetabbaa''ti.

[03] 299^b^.^eb^ atha kho ra.t.thapaalo kulaputto u.t.thahitvaa bala.m gaahetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho ra.t.thapaalo kulaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``anu~n~naato aha.m, bhante, maataapituuhi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaaya. pabbaajetu ma.m bhagavaa''ti. alattha kho ra.t.thapaalo kulaputto bhagavato ^a^M2.0250^ea^ santike pabbajja.m, alattha upasampada.m. atha kho bhagavaa aciruupasampanne aayasmante ra.t.thapaale a.d.dhamaasuupasampanne thullako.t.thike yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena saavatthi tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena saavatthi tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa ^a^P2.0061^ea^ saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho aayasmaa ra.t.thapaalo eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya ^a^T2.0396^ea^ kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro kho panaayasmaa ra.t.thapaalo arahata.m ahosi.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa ra.t.thapaalo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa ra.t.thapaalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``icchaamaha.m, bhante, maataapitaro uddassetu.m, sace ma.m bhagavaa anujaanaatii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmato ra.t.thapaalassa cetasaa ceto paricca {cetoparivitakka.m (sii0 pii0)} manasaakaasi. yathaa {yadaa (sii0 pii0)} bhagavaa a~n~naasi ^a^V2.0260^ea^ -- ``abhabbo kho ra.t.thapaalo kulaputto sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattitu''nti, atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m ra.t.thapaala.m etadavoca -- ``yassadaani tva.m, ra.t.thapaala, kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti. atha kho aayasmaa ra.t.thapaalo u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa senaasana.m sa.msaametvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena thullako.t.thika.m tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena thullako.t.thiko tadavasari. tatra suda.m aayasmaa ra.t.thapaalo thullako.t.thike viharati ra~n~no korabyassa migaciire. atha kho aayasmaa ra.t.thapaalo pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya thullako.t.thika.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. thullako.t.thike sapadaana.m pi.n.daaya caramaano yena sakapitu nivesana.m ^a^T2.0397^ea^ tenupasa"nkami. tena kho pana samayena aayasmato ra.t.thapaalassa pitaa majjhimaaya dvaarasaalaaya ullikhaapeti. addasaa kho aayasmato ra.t.thapaalassa pitaa aayasmanta.m ra.t.thapaala.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana etadavoca -- ``imehi mu.n.dakehi sama.nakehi amhaaka.m ekaputtako piyo manaapo pabbaajito''ti ^a^P2.0062^ea^. atha kho aayasmaa ra.t.thapaalo ^a^M2.0251^ea^ sakapitu nivesane neva daana.m alattha na paccakkhaana.m; a~n~nadatthu akkosameva alattha. tena kho pana samayena aayasmato ra.t.thapaalassa ~naatidaasii aabhidosika.m kummaasa.m cha.d.detukaamaa hoti. atha kho aayasmaa ra.t.thapaalo ta.m ~naatidaasi.m etadavoca -- ``saceta.m, bhagini, cha.d.daniiyadhamma.m, idha me patte aakiraa''ti. atha kho aayasmato ra.t.thapaalassa ~naatidaasii ta.m aabhidosika.m kummaasa.m aayasmato ra.t.thapaalassa patte aakirantii hatthaana~nca paadaana~nca sarassa ca nimitta.m aggahesi.

[03] 300^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmato ra.t.thapaalassa ~naatidaasii yenaayasmato ra.t.thapaalassa maataa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmato ra.t.thapaalassa maatara.m etadavoca -- ``yaggheyye, jaaneyyaasi -- `ayyaputto ra.t.thapaalo anuppatto'''ti. ``sace, je, sacca.m bha.nasi, adaasi.m ta.m karomii''ti {sacca.m vadasi, adaasii bhavasiiti (sii0 pii0), sacca.m vadasi, adaasii bhavissasi (ka0)}. atha kho aayasmato ra.t.thapaalassa maataa yenaayasmato ra.t.thapaalassa pitaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmato ^a^T2.0398^ea^ ra.t.thapaalassa pitara.m etadavoca -- ``yagghe, gahapati, jaaneyyaasi -- `ra.t.thapaalo kira kulaputto anuppatto'''ti? tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa ra.t.thapaalo ta.m aabhidosika.m kummaasa.m a~n~natara.m ku.t.tamuula.m {ku.d.da.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} nissaaya paribhu~njati. atha kho aayasmato ra.t.thapaalassa pitaa yenaayasmaa ra.t.thapaalo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m ra.t.thapaala.m etadavoca -- ``atthi naama, taata ra.t.thapaala, aabhidosika.m kummaasa.m paribhu~njissasi? nanu, taata ra.t.thapaala, saka.m geha.m gantabba''nti? ``kuto no, gahapati, amhaaka.m geha.m agaarasmaa ^a^V2.0261^ea^ anagaariya.m pabbajitaana.m? anagaaraa maya.m, gahapati. agamamha kho ^a^P2.0063^ea^ te, gahapati, geha.m, tattha neva daana.m alatthamha na paccakkhaana.m; a~n~nadatthu akkosameva alatthamhaa''ti. ``ehi, taata ra.t.thapaala, ghara.m gamissaamaa''ti. ``ala.m, gahapati, kata.m me ajja bhattakicca.m''. ``tena hi, taata ra.t.thapaala, adhivaasehi svaatanaaya bhatta''nti. adhivaasesi kho aayasmaa ra.t.thapaalo tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho aayasmato ra.t.thapaalassa pitaa aayasmato ra.t.thapaalassa adhivaasana.m viditvaa yena saka.m nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa mahanta.m hira~n~nasuva.n.nassa ^a^T2.0399^ea^ pu~nja.m kaaraapetvaa kila~njehi ^a^M2.0252^ea^ pa.ticchaadetvaa aayasmato ra.t.thapaalassa puraa.nadutiyikaa aamantesi -- ``etha tumhe, vadhuyo, yena ala"nkaarena ala"nkataa pubbe ra.t.thapaalassa kulaputtassa piyaa hotha manaapaa tena ala"nkaarena ala"nkarothaa''ti.

[03] 301^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmato ra.t.thapaalassa pitaa tassaa rattiyaa accayena sake nivesane pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa aayasmato ra.t.thapaalassa kaala.m aarocesi -- ``kaalo, taata ra.t.thapaala, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. atha kho aayasmaa ra.t.thapaalo pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena sakapitu nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho aayasmato ra.t.thapaalassa pitaa ta.m hira~n~nasuva.n.nassa pu~nja.m vivaraapetvaa aayasmanta.m ra.t.thapaala.m etadavoca -- ``ida.m te, taata ra.t.thapaala, maatu mattika.m dhana.m, a~n~na.m pettika.m, a~n~na.m pitaamaha.m. sakkaa, taata ra.t.thapaala, bhoge ca bhu~njitu.m pu~n~naani ca kaatu.m. ehi tva.m, taata ra.t.thapaala {ra.t.thapaala sikkha.m paccakkhaaya (sabbattha)} ^a^P2.0064^ea^, hiinaayaavattitvaa bhoge ca bhu~njassu pu~n~naani ca karohii''ti. ``sace me tva.m, gahapati, vacana.m kareyyaasi, ima.m hira~n~nasuva.n.nassa pu~nja.m saka.te aaropetvaa nibbaahaapetvaa ^a^T2.0400^ea^ majjhega"ngaaya nadiyaa sote opilaapeyyaasi. ta.m kissa hetu? ye uppajjissanti hi te, gahapati, tatonidaana.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa''ti. atha kho aayasmato ra.t.thapaalassa puraa.nadutiyikaa pacceka.m paadesu gahetvaa aayasmanta.m ra.t.thapaala.m etadavocu.m -- ``kiidisaa naama taa, ayyaputta, accharaayo yaasa.m tva.m hetu brahmacariya.m carasii''ti? ``na kho maya.m, bhaginii, accharaana.m hetu brahmacariya.m caraamaa''ti. ``bhaginivaadena no ayyaputto ra.t.thapaalo samudaacaratii''ti taa tattheva mucchitaa papati.msu. atha kho aayasmaa ra.t.thapaalo pitara.m etadavoca -- ``sace, gahapati, bhojana.m daatabba.m, detha; maa no vihe.thethaa''ti. ``bhu~nja, taata ra.t.thapaala, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. atha kho aayasmato ra.t.thapaalassa ^a^V2.0262^ea^ pitaa aayasmanta.m ra.t.thapaala.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappesi sampavaaresi.
[03] 302^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa ra.t.thapaalo bhuttaavii oniitapattapaa.nii .thitakova imaa gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``passa ^a^M2.0253^ea^ cittiikata.m bimba.m, arukaaya.m samussita.m.
[22] aatura.m bahusa"nkappa.m, yassa natthi dhuva.m .thiti..
[21] ``passa cittiikata.m ruupa.m, ma.ninaa ku.n.dalena ca.
[22] a.t.thi tacena onaddha.m, saha vatthebhi sobhati..
[21] ``alattakakataa paadaa, mukha.m cu.n.nakamakkhita.m.
[22] ala.m ^a^T2.0401^ea^ baalassa mohaaya, no ca paaragavesino..
[21] ``a.t.thaapadakataa ^a^P2.0065^ea^ kesaa, nettaa a~njanamakkhitaa.
[22] ala.m baalassa mohaaya, no ca paaragavesino..
[21] ``a~njaniiva navaa {a~njaniiva.n.navaa (ka0)} cittaa, puutikaayo ala"nkato.
[22] ala.m baalassa mohaaya, no ca paaragavesino..
[21] ``odahi migavo paasa.m, naasadaa vaakara.m migo.
[22] bhutvaa nivaapa.m gacchaama {gacchaami (syaa0 ka0)}, kandante migabandhake''ti..
[03] atha kho aayasmaa ra.t.thapaalo .thitakova imaa gaathaa bhaasitvaa yena ra~n~no korabyassa migaciira.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisiidi.

[03] 303^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V2.0263^ea^ kho raajaa korabyo migava.m aamantesi -- ``sodhehi, samma migava, migaciira.m uyyaanabhuumi.m; gacchaama subhuumi.m dassanaayaa''ti. ``eva.m, devaa''ti kho migavo ra~n~no korabyassa pa.tissutvaa migaciira.m sodhento addasa aayasmanta.m ra.t.thapaala.m a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisinna.m. disvaana yena raajaa korabyo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa raajaana.m korabya.m etadavoca -- ``suddha.m kho te, deva, migaciira.m. atthi cettha ra.t.thapaalo naama kulaputto imasmi.myeva thullako.t.thike aggakulassa putto yassa tva.m abhi.nha.m kittayamaano ahosi, so a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisinno''ti. ``tena hi, samma migava, ala.m daanajja uyyaanabhuumiyaa. tameva daani maya.m bhavanta.m ra.t.thapaala.m payirupaasissaamaa''ti. atha ^a^T2.0402^ea^ kho raajaa korabyo ``ya.m tattha khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyatta.m ta.m sabba.m vissajjethaa''ti vatvaa bhadraani bhadraani yaanaani yojaapetvaa bhadra.m yaana.m abhiruhitvaa bhadrehi bhadrehi yaanehi thullako.t.thikamhaa niyyaasi ^a^M2.0254^ea^ mahaccaraajaanubhaavena {mahaccaa raajaanubhaavena (sii0)} aayasmanta.m ra.t.thapaala.m dassanaaya. yaavatikaa yaanassa bhuumi yaanena gantvaa yaanaa paccorohitvaa pattikova ussa.taaya ussa.taaya parisaaya yenaayasmaa ra.t.thapaalo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa ra.t.thapaalena ^a^P2.0066^ea^ saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho raajaa korabyo aayasmanta.m ra.t.thapaala.m etadavoca -- ``idha bhava.m ra.t.thapaala hatthatthare {ka.t.thatthare (syaa0 ka.m0)} nisiidatuu''ti. ``ala.m, mahaaraaja, nisiida tva.m; nisinno aha.m sake aasane''ti. nisiidi raajaa korabyo pa~n~natte aasane. nisajja kho raajaa korabyo aayasmanta.m ra.t.thapaala.m etadavoca --

[03] 304^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani, bho ra.t.thapaala, paariju~n~naani yehi paariju~n~nehi samannaagataa idhekacce kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti. katamaani cattaari? jaraapaariju~n~na.m, byaadhipaariju~n~na.m, bhogapaariju~n~na.m, ~naatipaariju~n~na.m. katama~nca, bho ra.t.thapaala, jaraapaariju~n~na.m? idha, bho ra.t.thapaala ^a^T2.0403^ea^, ekacco ji.n.no hoti vu.d.dho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m khomhi etarahi ji.n.no vu.d.dho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto. na kho pana mayaa sukara.m anadhigata.m vaa bhoga.m adhigantu.m adhigata.m vaa bhoga.m phaati.m kaatu.m {phaatikattu.m (sii0)}. ya.mnuunaaha.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajeyya'nti. so tena jaraapaariju~n~nena samannaagato kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m ^a^V2.0264^ea^ pabbajati. ida.m vuccati, bho ra.t.thapaala, jaraapaariju~n~na.m. bhava.m kho pana ra.t.thapaalo etarahi daharo yuvaa susukaa.lakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannaagato pa.thamena vayasaa. ta.m bhoto ra.t.thapaalassa jaraapaariju~n~na.m natthi. ki.m bhava.m ra.t.thapaalo ~natvaa vaa disvaa vaa sutvaa vaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito?

[03] ``katama~nca, bho ra.t.thapaala, byaadhipaariju~n~na.m? idha, bho ra.t.thapaala, ekacco aabaadhiko hoti dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati ^a^M2.0255^ea^ -- `aha.m khomhi etarahi aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. na kho pana mayaa sukara.m anadhigata.m vaa bhoga.m adhigantu.m adhigata.m vaa bhoga.m phaati.m kaatu.m ^a^P2.0067^ea^. ya.mnuunaaha.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajeyya'nti. so ^a^T2.0404^ea^ tena byaadhipaariju~n~nena samannaagato kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati. ida.m vuccati, bho ra.t.thapaala, byaadhipaariju~n~na.m. bhava.m kho pana ra.t.thapaalo etarahi appaabaadho appaata"nko samavepaakiniyaa gaha.niyaa samannaagato naatisiitaaya naaccu.nhaaya. ta.m bhoto ra.t.thapaalassa byaadhipaariju~n~na.m natthi. ki.m bhava.m ra.t.thapaalo ~natvaa vaa disvaa vaa sutvaa vaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito?

[03] ``katama~nca ^a^V2.0265^ea^, bho ra.t.thapaala, bhogapaariju~n~na.m? idha, bho ra.t.thapaala, ekacco a.d.dho hoti mahaddhano mahaabhogo. tassa te bhogaa anupubbena parikkhaya.m gacchanti. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m kho pubbe a.d.dho ahosi.m mahaddhano mahaabhogo. tassa me te bhogaa anupubbena parikkhaya.m gataa. na kho pana mayaa sukara.m anadhigata.m vaa bhoga.m adhigantu.m adhigata.m vaa bhoga.m phaati.m kaatu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajeyya'nti. so tena bhogapaariju~n~nena samannaagato kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati. ida.m vuccati, bho ra.t.thapaala, bhogapaariju~n~na.m. bhava.m kho pana ra.t.thapaalo imasmi.myeva thullako.t.thike aggakulassa putto. ta.m bhoto ra.t.thapaalassa bhogapaariju~n~na.m natthi. ki.m bhava.m ra.t.thapaalo ~natvaa vaa disvaa vaa sutvaa vaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito?

[03] ``katama~nca ^a^T2.0405^ea^, bho ra.t.thapaala, ~naatipaariju~n~na.m? idha, bho ra.t.thapaala, ekaccassa bahuu honti mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa. tassa te ~naatakaa anupubbena parikkhaya.m gacchanti. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `mama.m kho pubbe bahuu ahesu.m mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa. tassa me te anupubbena parikkhaya.m gataa. na kho pana mayaa sukara.m anadhigata.m vaa bhoga.m adhigantu.m adhigata.m vaa bhoga.m phaati.m kaatu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m kesamassu.m ^a^P2.0068^ea^ ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajeyya'nti. so ^a^M2.0256^ea^ tena ~naatipaariju~n~nena samannaagato kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati. ida.m vuccati, bho ra.t.thapaala, ~naatipaariju~n~na.m. bhoto kho pana ra.t.thapaalassa imasmi.myeva thullako.t.thike bahuu mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa. ta.m bhoto ra.t.thapaalassa ~naatipaariju~n~na.m natthi. ki.m bhava.m ra.t.thapaalo ~natvaa vaa disvaa vaa sutvaa vaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito?

[03] ``imaani kho, bho ra.t.thapaala, cattaari paariju~n~naani, yehi paariju~n~nehi samannaagataa idhekacce kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti. taani bhoto ra.t.thapaalassa natthi. ki.m bhava.m ra.t.thapaalo ~natvaa vaa disvaa vaa sutvaa vaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito''ti?

[03] 305^b^.^eb^ ``atthi kho, mahaaraaja, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa ^a^T2.0406^ea^ sammaasambuddhena cattaaro dhammuddesaa uddi.t.thaa, ye aha.m {yamaha.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} ~natvaa ca disvaa ca sutvaa ca agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito. katame cattaaro? `upaniyyati loko addhuvo'ti kho, mahaaraaja, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena pa.thamo dhammuddeso uddi.t.tho, yamaha.m ~natvaa ca disvaa sutvaa ca agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito. `ataa.no loko anabhissaro'ti kho, mahaaraaja, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena dutiyo dhammuddeso uddi.t.tho, yamaha.m ~natvaa ca disvaa sutvaa ca agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito. `assako loko, sabba.m pahaaya gamaniiya'nti kho, mahaaraaja, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena tatiyo dhammuddeso uddi.t.tho, yamaha.m ~natvaa ca disvaa sutvaa ca agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito. `uuno loko atitto ta.nhaadaaso'ti kho, mahaaraaja, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena catuttho dhammuddeso uddi.t.tho, yamaha.m ~natvaa ca disvaa sutvaa ^a^V2.0266^ea^ ca agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito. ime kho, mahaaraaja, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena ^a^P2.0069^ea^ cattaaro dhammuddesaa uddi.t.thaa, ye aha.m ~natvaa ca disvaa sutvaa ca agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito''ti.

[03] 306^b^.^eb^ ```upaniyyati ^a^M2.0257^ea^ loko addhuvo'ti -- bhava.m ra.t.thapaalo aaha. imassa ^a^T2.0407^ea^, bho ra.t.thapaala, bhaasitassa katha.m attho da.t.thabbo''ti? ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, tva.m viisativassuddesikopi pa.n.naviisativassuddesikopi hatthismimpi kataavii assasmimpi kataavii rathasmimpi kataavii dhanusmimpi kataavii tharusmimpi kataavii uurubalii baahubalii alamatto sa"ngaamaavacaro''ti? ``ahosi.m aha.m, bho ra.t.thapaala, viisativassuddesikopi pa.n.naviisativassuddesikopi hatthismimpi kataavii assasmimpi kataavii rathasmimpi kataavii dhanusmimpi kataavii tharusmimpi kataavii uurubalii baahubalii alamatto sa"ngaamaavacaro. appekadaaha.m, bho ra.t.thapaala, iddhimaava ma~n~ne na {iddhimaa ma~n~ne na (syaa0 ka.m0), iddhimaa ca ma~n~ne (sii0), na viya ma~n~ne (ka0)} attano balena samasama.m samanupassaamii''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, evameva tva.m etarahi uurubalii baahubalii alamatto sa"ngaamaavacaro''ti? ``no hida.m, bho ra.t.thapaala. etarahi ji.n.no vu.d.dho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto aasiitiko me vayo vattati. appekadaaha.m, bho ra.t.thapaala, `idha paada.m karissaamii'ti a~n~neneva paada.m karomii''ti. ``ida.m kho ta.m, mahaaraaja, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena sandhaaya bhaasita.m -- `upaniyyati loko addhuvo'ti, yamaha.m ~natvaa ca disvaa sutvaa ca agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito''ti. ``acchariya.m, bho ra.t.thapaala, abbhuta.m, bho ra.t.thapaala! yaava subhaasita.m cida.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena -- `upaniyyati loko addhuvo'ti. upaniyyati hi ^a^T2.0408^ea^, bho ra.t.thapaala, loko addhuvo.

[03] ``sa.mvijjante kho, bho ra.t.thapaala, imasmi.m raajakule hatthikaayaapi assakaayaapi rathakaayaapi pattikaayaapi, amhaaka.m aapadaasu pariyodhaaya ^a^P2.0070^ea^ vattissanti. `ataa.no loko anabhissaro'ti -- bhava.m ra.t.thapaalo aaha. imassa pana, bho ra.t.thapaala, bhaasitassa katha.m attho da.t.thabbo''ti? ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, atthi te koci anusaayiko aabaadho''ti? ``atthi me, bho ra.t.thapaala, anusaayiko aabaadho. appekadaa ma.m, bho ra.t.thapaala, mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa ^a^V2.0267^ea^ parivaaretvaa .thitaa honti -- `idaani raajaa korabyo kaala.m karissati, idaani raajaa korabyo kaala.m karissatii'''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, labhasi tva.m ^a^M2.0258^ea^ te mittaamacce ~naatisaalohite -- `aayantu me bhonto mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa, sabbeva santaa ima.m vedana.m sa.mvibhajatha, yathaaha.m lahukatarika.m vedana.m vediyeyya'nti -- udaahu tva.myeva ta.m vedana.m vediyasii''ti? ``naaha.m, bho ra.t.thapaala, labhaami te mittaamacce ~naatisaalohite -- `aayantu me bhonto mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa, sabbeva santaa ima.m vedana.m sa.mvibhajatha, yathaaha.m lahukatarika.m vedana.m vediyeyya'nti. atha kho ahameva ta.m vedana.m vediyaamii''ti. ``ida.m kho ta.m, mahaaraaja, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena sandhaaya bhaasita.m -- `ataa.no loko anabhissaro'ti, yamaha.m ~natvaa ca disvaa sutvaa ca agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito''ti. ``acchariya.m, bho ra.t.thapaala, abbhuta.m, bho ra.t.thapaala! yaava subhaasita.m cida.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa ^a^T2.0409^ea^ passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena -- `ataa.no loko anabhissaro'ti. ataa.no hi, bho ra.t.thapaala, loko anabhissaro.

[01] ``sa.mvijjati kho, bho ra.t.thapaala, imasmi.m raajakule pahuuta.m hira~n~nasuva.n.na.m bhuumigata~nca vehaasagata~nca. `assako loko, sabba.m pahaaya gamaniiya'nti -- bhava.m ra.t.thapaalo aaha. imassa pana, bho ra.t.thapaala, bhaasitassa katha.m attho da.t.thabbo''ti? ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, yathaa tva.m etarahi pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi ^a^P2.0071^ea^ samappito sama"ngiibhuuto paricaaresi, lacchasi tva.m paratthaapi -- `evamevaaha.m imeheva pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappito sama"ngiibhuuto paricaaremii'ti, udaahu a~n~ne ima.m bhoga.m pa.tipajjissanti, tva.m pana yathaakamma.m gamissasii''ti? ``yathaaha.m, bho ra.t.thapaala, etarahi pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappito sama"ngiibhuuto paricaaremi, naaha.m lacchaami paratthaapi -- `evameva imeheva pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappito sama"ngiibhuuto paricaaremii'ti. atha kho a~n~ne ima.m bhoga.m pa.tipajjissanti; aha.m pana yathaakamma.m gamissaamii''ti. ``ida.m kho ta.m, mahaaraaja, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena sandhaaya bhaasita.m -- `assako loko, sabba.m pahaaya gamaniiya'nti, yamaha.m ~natvaa ca disvaa ca sutvaa ca agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito''ti. ``acchariya.m, bho ra.t.thapaala, abbhuta.m, bho ra.t.thapaala! yaava subhaasita.m cida.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa ^a^V2.0268^ea^ sammaasambuddhena -- `assako loko ^a^T2.0410^ea^, sabba.m pahaaya gamaniiya'nti ^a^M2.0259^ea^. assako hi, bho ra.t.thapaala, loko sabba.m pahaaya gamaniiya.m.

[01] ```uuno loko atitto ta.nhaadaaso'ti -- bhava.m ra.t.thapaalo aaha. imassa, bho ra.t.thapaala, bhaasitassa katha.m attho da.t.thabbo''ti? ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, phiita.m kuru.m ajjhaavasasii''ti? ``eva.m, bho ra.t.thapaala, phiita.m kuru.m ajjhaavasaamii''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, idha puriso aagaccheyya puratthimaaya disaaya saddhaayiko paccayiko. so ta.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `yagghe, mahaaraaja, jaaneyyaasi, aha.m aagacchaami puratthimaaya disaaya? tatthaddasa.m mahanta.m janapada.m iddha~nceva phiita~nca bahujana.m aaki.n.namanussa.m. bahuu tattha hatthikaayaa assakaayaa rathakaayaa pattikaayaa; bahu tattha dhanadha~n~na.m {dantaajina.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}; bahu tattha hira~n~nasuva.n.na.m akata~nceva kata~nca; bahu tattha itthipariggaho. sakkaa ca taavatakeneva balamattena {balatthena (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), bahalatthena (ka0)} abhivijinitu.m. abhivijina, mahaaraajaa'ti, kinti na.m kareyyaasii''ti? ``tampi ^a^P2.0072^ea^ maya.m, bho ra.t.thapaala, abhivijiya ajjhaavaseyyaamaa''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, idha puriso aagaccheyya pacchimaaya disaaya... uttaraaya disaaya... dakkhi.naaya disaaya... parasamuddato saddhaayiko paccayiko. so ta.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `yagghe, mahaaraaja, jaaneyyaasi, aha.m aagacchaami parasamuddato? tatthaddasa.m mahanta.m janapada.m iddha~nceva phiita~nca bahujana.m aaki.n.namanussa.m. bahuu tattha hatthikaayaa assakaayaa rathakaayaa ^a^T2.0411^ea^ pattikaayaa; bahu tattha dhanadha~n~na.m; bahu tattha hira~n~nasuva.n.na.m akata~nceva kata~nca; bahu tattha itthipariggaho. sakkaa ca taavatakeneva balamattena abhivijinitu.m. abhivijina, mahaaraajaa'ti, kinti na.m kareyyaasii''ti? ``tampi maya.m, bho ra.t.thapaala, abhivijiya ajjhaavaseyyaamaa''ti. ``ida.m kho ta.m, mahaaraaja, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena sandhaaya bhaasita.m -- `uuno loko atitto ta.nhaadaaso'ti, yamaha.m ~natvaa ca disvaa sutvaa ca agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito''ti. ``acchariya.m, bho ra.t.thapaala, abbhuta.m, bho ra.t.thapaala! yaava subhaasita.m cida.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena -- `uuno loko atitto ta.nhaadaaso'ti. uuno hi, bho ra.t.thapaala, loko atitto ta.nhaadaaso''ti.
[03] idamavoca ^a^M2.0260^ea^ ^a^V2.0269^ea^ aayasmaa ra.t.thapaalo. ida.m vatvaa athaapara.m etadavoca --
[03] 307^b^.^eb^ ``passaami loke sadhane manusse,
[27] laddhaana vitta.m na dadanti mohaa.
[26] luddhaa dhana.m {laddhaa dhana.m (ka0)} sannicaya.m karonti,
[22] bhiyyova kaame abhipatthayanti..
[21] ``raajaa pasayhaa pathavi.m vijitvaa,
[27] sasaagaranta.m mahimaavasanto {mahiyaa vasanto (sii0 ka0)}.
[26] ora.m samuddassa atittaruupo,
[22] paara.m ^a^T2.0412^ea^ samuddassapi patthayetha..
[21] ``raajaa ^a^P2.0073^ea^ ca a~n~ne ca bahuu manussaa,
[27] aviitata.nhaa {atittata.nhaa (ka0)} mara.na.m upenti.
[26] uunaava hutvaana jahanti deha.m,
[22] kaamehi lokamhi na hatthi titti..
[21] ``kandanti na.m ~naatii pakiriya kese,
[27] ahovataa no amaraati caahu.
[26] vatthena na.m paaruta.m niiharitvaa,
[22] cita.m samaadaaya {samaadhaaya (sii0)} tato.dahanti..
[21] ``so .dayhati suulehi tujjamaano,
