[03] 362^b^.^eb^ ``acchariya.m ^a^M2.0319^ea^, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yaava subhaasita.m cida.m {subhaasitamida.m (sii0)}, bhante, aayasmataa aanandena. iminaa ca maya.m, bhante, aayasmato aanandassa subhaasitena attamanaabhiraddhaa. eva.m attamanaabhiraddhaa ca maya.m ^a^T2.0504^ea^, bhante, aayasmato aanandassa subhaasitena. sace, bhante, aayasmato aanandassa hatthiratana.m kappeyya, hatthiratanampi maya.m aayasmato aanandassa dadeyyaama. sace, bhante, aayasmato aanandassa assaratana.m kappeyya, assaratanampi maya.m aayasmato aanandassa dadeyyaama. sace, bhante, aayasmato aanandassa gaamavara.m kappeyya, gaamavarampi maya.m aayasmato aanandassa dadeyyaama. api ca, bhante, mayampeta.m {mayameva ta.m (sii0), mayampaneta.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} jaanaama -- `neta.m aayasmato aanandassa kappatii'ti. aya.m me, bhante, baahitikaa ra~n~naa maagadhena ajaatasattunaa vedehiputtena vatthanaa.liyaa {chattanaa.liyaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pakkhipitvaa pahitaa so.lasasamaa aayaamena, a.t.thasamaa vitthaarena ^a^V2.0327^ea^. ta.m, bhante, aayasmaa aanando pa.tigga.nhaatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti. ``ala.m, mahaaraaja, paripu.n.na.m me ticiivara''nti.

[03] ``aya.m ^a^P2.0117^ea^, bhante, aciravatii nadii di.t.thaa aayasmataa ceva aanandena amhehi ca. yadaa uparipabbate mahaamegho abhippavu.t.tho hoti, athaaya.m aciravatii nadii ubhato kuulaani sa.mvissandantii gacchati; evameva kho, bhante, aayasmaa aanando imaaya baahitikaaya attano ticiivara.m karissati. ya.m panaayasmato aanandassa puraa.na.m ticiivara.m ta.m sabrahmacaariihi sa.mvibhajissati. evaaya.m amhaaka.m dakkhi.naa sa.mvissandantii ma~n~ne gamissati. pa.tigga.nhaatu, bhante, aayasmaa aanando baahitika''nti. pa.tiggahesi kho aayasmaa aanando ^a^T2.0505^ea^ baahitika.m.

[03] atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``handa ca daani maya.m, bhante aananda, gacchaama; bahukiccaa maya.m bahukara.niiyaa''ti. ``yassadaani tva.m, mahaaraaja, kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo aayasmato aanandassa bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] 363^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M2.0320^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando acirapakkantassa ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando yaavatako ahosi ra~n~naa pasenadinaa kosalena saddhi.m kathaasallaapo ta.m sabba.m bhagavato aarocesi. ta~nca baahitika.m bhagavato paadaasi. atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``laabhaa, bhikkhave, ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa, suladdhalaabhaa, bhikkhave, ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa; ya.m raajaa pasenadi kosalo labhati aananda.m dassanaaya, labhati payirupaasanaayaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] baahitikasutta.m ni.t.thita.m a.t.thama.m.

[03] 364^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0506^ea^ ^a^V2.0328^ea^ ^a^P2.0118^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati medaa.lupa.m {meta.luupa.m (sii0), meda.lumpa.m (pii0)} naama sakyaana.m nigamo. tena kho pana samayena raajaa pasenadi kosalo nagaraka.m anuppatto hoti kenacideva kara.niiyena. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo diigha.m kaaraayana.m aamantesi -- ``yojehi, samma kaaraayana, bhadraani bhadraani yaanaani, uyyaanabhuumi.m gacchaama subhuumi.m dassanaayaa''ti {subhuumidassanaayaati (dii0 ni0 2.43)}. ``eva.m, devaa''ti kho diigho kaaraayano ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa pa.tissutvaa bhadraani bhadraani yaanaani yojaapetvaa ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa pa.tivedesi -- ``yuttaani kho te, deva, bhadraani bhadraani yaanaani. yassadaani kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo bhadra.m yaana.m abhiruhitvaa bhadrehi bhadrehi yaanehi nagarakamhaa niyyaasi mahaccaa raajaanubhaavena. yena aaraamo tena paayaasi. yaavatikaa yaanassa bhuumi yaanena gantvaa yaanaa paccorohitvaa pattikova aaraama.m paavisi. addasaa kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo aaraame ja"nghaavihaara.m anuca"nkamamaano anuvicaramaano ^a^M2.0321^ea^ rukkhamuulaani paasaadikaani pasaadaniiyaani appasaddaani appanigghosaani vijanavaataani manussaraahasseyyakaani {manussaraahaseyyakaani (sii0 pii0)} pa.tisallaanasaaruppaani. disvaana bhagavanta.myeva aarabbha sati udapaadi -- ``imaani kho taani rukkhamuulaani paasaadikaani pasaadaniiyaani appasaddaani ^a^T2.0507^ea^ appanigghosaani vijanavaataani manussaraahasseyyakaani pa.tisallaanasaaruppaani, yattha suda.m maya.m ta.m bhagavanta.m payirupaasaama arahanta.m sammaasambuddha''nti.

[03] 365^b^.^eb^ atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo diigha.m kaaraayana.m aamantesi -- ``imaani kho, samma kaaraayana, taani rukkhamuulaani paasaadikaani pasaadaniiyaani appasaddaani appanigghosaani vijanavaataani manussaraahasseyyakaani pa.tisallaanasaaruppaani, yattha suda.m maya.m ta.m bhagavanta.m payirupaasaama arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m. kaha.m nu kho, samma kaaraayana, etarahi so bhagavaa ^a^P2.0119^ea^ viharati araha.m sammaasambuddho''ti? ``atthi, mahaaraaja, medaa.lupa.m naama sakyaana.m nigamo. tattha so bhagavaa etarahi viharati araha.m sammaasambuddho''ti. ``kiivaduure {kiivaduuro (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pana, samma kaaraayana ^a^V2.0329^ea^, nagarakamhaa medaa.lupa.m naama sakyaana.m nigamo hotii''ti? ``na duure, mahaaraaja; tii.ni yojanaani; sakkaa divasaavasesena gantu''nti. ``tena hi, samma kaaraayana, yojehi bhadraani bhadraani yaanaani, gamissaama maya.m ta.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya arahanta.m sammaasambuddha''nti. ``eva.m, devaa''ti kho diigho kaaraayano ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa pa.tissutvaa bhadraani bhadraani yaanaani yojaapetvaa ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa pa.tivedesi -- ``yuttaani kho te, deva, bhadraani bhadraani yaanaani. yassadaani kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo bhadra.m yaana.m abhiruhitvaa bhadrehi bhadrehi yaanehi nagarakamhaa yena medaa.lupa.m naama sakyaana.m ^a^T2.0508^ea^ nigamo tena paayaasi. teneva divasaavasesena medaa.lupa.m naama sakyaana.m nigama.m sampaapu.ni. yena aaraamo tena paayaasi. yaavatikaa yaanassa bhuumi yaanena gantvaa yaanaa paccorohitvaa pattikova aaraama.m paavisi.

[03] 366^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu abbhokaase ca"nkamanti. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``kaha.m nu kho, bhante, etarahi ^a^M2.0322^ea^ so bhagavaa viharati araha.m sammaasambuddho? dassanakaamaa hi maya.m ta.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha''nti. ``eso, mahaaraaja, vihaaro sa.mvutadvaaro. tena appasaddo upasa"nkamitvaa ataramaano aa.linda.m pavisitvaa ukkaasitvaa agga.la.m aako.tehi. vivarissati bhagavaa te dvaara''nti. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo tattheva khagga~nca u.nhiisa~nca diighassa kaaraayanassa paadaasi. atha kho diighassa kaaraayanassa etadahosi -- ``rahaayati kho daani raajaa {mahaaraajaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, idheva {tenidheva (sii0)} daani mayaa .thaatabba''nti. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo yena so vihaaro sa.mvutadvaaro tena appasaddo upasa"nkamitvaa ataramaano aa.linda.m pavisitvaa ukkaasitvaa agga.la.m aako.tesi. vivari bhagavaa dvaara.m. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo vihaara.m ^a^P2.0120^ea^ pavisitvaa bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavato paadaani mukhena ca paricumbati, paa.niihi ca parisambaahati, naama~nca saaveti -- ``raajaaha.m, bhante, pasenadi kosalo; raajaaha.m, bhante, pasenadi ^a^T2.0509^ea^ kosalo''ti.

[03] 367^b^.^eb^ ``ki.m pana tva.m, mahaaraaja, atthavasa.m sampassamaano imasmi.m sariire evaruupa.m paramanipaccakaara.m karosi, mittuupahaara.m {cittuupahaara.m (sii0)} upada.msesii''ti? ``atthi kho me, bhante, bhagavati dhammanvayo ^a^V2.0330^ea^ -- `hoti sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'ti. idhaaha.m, bhante, passaami eke sama.nabraahma.ne pariyantakata.m brahmacariya.m carante dasapi vassaani, viisampi vassaani, ti.msampi vassaani, cattaariisampi vassaani. te aparena samayena sunhaataa suvilittaa kappitakesamassuu pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappitaa sama"ngiibhuutaa paricaarenti. idha panaaha.m, bhante, bhikkhuu passaami yaavajiiva.m aapaa.nako.tika.m paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m carante. na kho panaaha.m, bhante, ito bahiddhaa a~n~na.m eva.m paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m samanupassaami. ayampi kho me, bhante, bhagavati dhammanvayo hoti -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho''ti.

[03] 368^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhante, raajaanopi raajuuhi vivadanti, khattiyaapi khattiyehi vivadanti, braahma.naapi braahma.nehi vivadanti, gahapatayopi gahapatiihi ^a^M2.0323^ea^ vivadanti, maataapi puttena vivadati, puttopi maataraa vivadati, pitaapi puttena vivadati, puttopi pitaraa vivadati, bhaataapi bhaginiyaa vivadati ^a^T2.0510^ea^, bhaginiipi bhaataraa vivadati, sahaayopi sahaayena vivadati. idha panaaha.m, bhante, bhikkhuu passaami samagge sammodamaane avivadamaane khiirodakiibhuute a~n~nama~n~na.m ^a^P2.0121^ea^ piyacakkhuuhi sampassante viharante. na kho panaaha.m, bhante, ito bahiddhaa a~n~na.m eva.m samagga.m parisa.m samanupassaami. ayampi kho me, bhante, bhagavati dhammanvayo hoti -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'ti.

[03] 369^b^.^eb^ ``puna caparaaha.m, bhante, aaraamena aaraama.m, uyyaanena uyyaana.m anuca"nkamaami anuvicaraami. soha.m tattha passaami eke sama.nabraahma.ne kise luukhe dubba.n.ne uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaate dhamanisanthatagatte, na viya ma~n~ne cakkhu.m bandhante janassa dassanaaya. tassa mayha.m, bhante, etadahosi -- `addhaa ime aayasmanto anabhirataa vaa brahmacariya.m caranti, atthi vaa tesa.m ki~nci paapa.m kamma.m kata.m pa.ticchanna.m; tathaa hi ime aayasmanto kisaa luukhaa dubba.n.naa uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaataa dhamanisanthatagattaa, na viya ma~n~ne cakkhu.m bandhanti janassa dassanaayaa'ti. tyaaha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadaami -- `ki.m nu kho tumhe aayasmanto kisaa luukhaa dubba.n.naa uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaataa dhamanisanthatagattaa, na viya ma~n~ne cakkhu.m bandhatha janassa dassanaayaa'ti? te evamaaha.msu -- `bandhukarogo no {pa.n.dukarogino (ka0)}, mahaaraajaa'ti. idha panaaha.m, bhante, bhikkhuu ^a^T2.0511^ea^ passaami ^a^V2.0331^ea^ ha.t.thapaha.t.the udaggudagge abhirataruupe pii.nindriye {pii.nitindriye (sii0 pii0)} appossukke pannalome paradattavutte migabhuutena cetasaa viharante. tassa mayha.m, bhante, etadahosi -- `addhaa ime aayasmanto tassa bhagavato saasane u.laara.m pubbenaapara.m visesa.m jaananti; tathaa hi ime aayasmanto ha.t.thapaha.t.thaa udaggudaggaa abhirataruupaa pii.nindriyaa appossukkaa pannalomaa paradattavuttaa migabhuutena cetasaa viharantii'ti. ayampi kho me, bhante, bhagavati dhammanvayo hoti -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'ti.

[03] 370^b^.^eb^ ``puna caparaaha.m, bhante, raajaa khattiyo muddhaavasitto; pahomi ^a^P2.0122^ea^ ghaatetaaya.m vaa ghaatetu.m, jaapetaaya.m vaa jaapetu.m, pabbaajetaaya.m vaa pabbaajetu.m ^a^M2.0324^ea^. tassa mayha.m, bhante, a.d.dakara.ne nisinnassa antarantaraa katha.m opaatenti. soha.m na labhaami -- `maa me bhonto a.d.dakara.ne nisinnassa antarantaraa katha.m opaatetha {opaatentu (sii0) upariselasutte pana ``opaatethaa''tiyeva dissati}, kathaapariyosaana.m me bhonto aagamentuu'ti. tassa mayha.m, bhante, antarantaraa katha.m opaatenti. idha panaaha.m, bhante, bhikkhuu passaami; yasmi.m samaye bhagavaa anekasataaya parisaaya dhamma.m deseti, neva tasmi.m samaye bhagavato saavakaana.m khipitasaddo vaa hoti ukkaasitasaddo vaa. bhuutapubba.m, bhante, bhagavaa anekasataaya parisaaya dhamma.m deseti. tatra~n~nataro bhagavato saavako ukkaasi. tamena.m a~n~nataro sabrahmacaarii ^a^T2.0512^ea^ ja.n.nukena gha.t.tesi -- `appasaddo aayasmaa hotu, maayasmaa saddamakaasi; satthaa no bhagavaa dhamma.m desetii'ti. tassa mayha.m, bhante, etadahosi -- `acchariya.m vata, bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho! ada.n.dena vata kira, bho, asatthena eva.m suviniitaa parisaa bhavissatii'ti! na kho panaaha.m, bhante, ito bahiddhaa a~n~na.m eva.m suviniita.m parisa.m samanupassaami. ayampi kho me, bhante, bhagavati dhammanvayo hoti -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'ti.

[03] 371^b^.^eb^ ``puna caparaaha.m, bhante, passaami idhekacce khattiyapa.n.dite nipu.ne kataparappavaade vaalavedhiruupe. te bhindantaa {vobhindantaa (sii0)} ma~n~ne caranti pa~n~naagatena di.t.thigataani. te su.nanti -- `sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo amuka.m naama gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa osarissatii'ti. te pa~nha.m abhisa"nkharonti -- `ima.m maya.m pa~nha.m sama.na.m gotama.m upasa"nkamitvaa pucchissaama. eva.m ce no pu.t.tho eva.m byaakarissati, evamassa maya.m vaada.m aaropessaama; eva.m cepi no pu.t.tho eva.m byaakarissati, evampissa maya.m vaada.m ^a^V2.0332^ea^ aaropessaamaa'ti. te su.nanti -- `sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo amuka.m naama gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa osa.to'ti. te yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkamanti. te bhagavaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandasseti samaadapeti samuttejeti sampaha.mseti ^a^P2.0123^ea^. te bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassitaa samaadapitaa samuttejitaa sampaha.msitaa na ceva bhagavanta.m pa~nha.m ^a^T2.0513^ea^ pucchanti, kuto vaada.m aaropessanti? a~n~nadatthu bhagavato saavakaa sampajjanti. ayampi kho me, bhante, bhagavati dhammanvayo hoti -- `sammaasambuddho ^a^M2.0325^ea^ bhagavaa, svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'ti.

[03] 372^b^.^eb^ ``puna caparaaha.m, bhante, passaami idhekacce braahma.napa.n.dite...pe0... gahapatipa.n.dite...pe0... sama.napa.n.dite nipu.ne kataparappavaade vaalavedhiruupe. te bhindantaa ma~n~ne caranti pa~n~naagatena di.t.thigataani. te su.nanti -- `sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo amuka.m naama gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa osarissatii'ti. te pa~nha.m abhisa"nkharonti -- `ima.m maya.m pa~nha.m sama.na.m gotama.m upasa"nkamitvaa pucchissaama. eva.m ce no pu.t.tho eva.m byaakarissati, evamassa maya.m vaada.m aaropessaama; eva.m cepi no pu.t.tho eva.m byaakarissati, evampissa maya.m vaada.m aaropessaamaa'ti. te su.nanti -- `sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo amuka.m naama gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa osa.to'ti. te yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkamanti. te bhagavaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandasseti samaadapeti samuttejeti sampaha.mseti. te bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassitaa samaadapitaa samuttejitaa sampaha.msitaa na ceva bhagavanta.m pa~nha.m pucchanti, kuto vaada.m aaropessanti? a~n~nadatthu bhagavanta.myeva okaasa.m yaacanti agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaaya. te bhagavaa pabbaajeti. te tathaapabbajitaa ^a^T2.0514^ea^ samaanaa ekaa vuupaka.t.thaa appamattaa aataapino pahitattaa viharantaa nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharanti. te evamaaha.msu -- `mana.m vata, bho, anassaama; mana.m vata, bho, panassaama'. maya~nhi pubbe assama.naava samaanaa sama.naamhaati pa.tijaanimhaa, abraahma.naava samaanaa braahma.naamhaati pa.tijaanimhaa, anarahantova samaanaa arahantaamhaati pa.tijaanimhaa. `idaani khomha sama.naa, idaani khomha braahma.naa, idaani khomha arahanto'ti. ayampi kho me, bhante, bhagavati dhammanvayo hoti -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'ti.

[03] 373^b^.^eb^ ``puna ^a^V2.0333^ea^ caparaaha.m, bhante, ime isidattapuraa.naa thapatayo mamabhattaa mamayaanaa, aha.m nesa.m jiivikaaya {jiivitassa (sii0), jiivika.m (sii0 a.t.tha0), jiivita.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} daataa, yasassa aahattaa; atha ^a^M2.0326^ea^ ca pana no tathaa mayi nipaccakaara.m ^a^P2.0124^ea^ karonti yathaa bhagavati. bhuutapubbaaha.m, bhante, sena.m abbhuyyaato samaano ime ca isidattapuraa.naa thapatayo viima.msamaano a~n~natarasmi.m sambaadhe aavasathe vaasa.m upagacchi.m. atha kho, bhante, ime isidattapuraa.naa thapatayo bahudeva ratti.m dhammiyaa kathaaya viitinaametvaa, yato ahosi bhagavaa ^a^T2.0515^ea^ {assosu.m kho bhagavanta.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} tato siisa.m katvaa ma.m paadato karitvaa nipajji.msu. tassa mayha.m, bhante, etadahosi -- `acchariya.m vata, bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho! ime isidattapuraa.naa thapatayo mamabhattaa mamayaanaa, aha.m nesa.m jiivikaaya daataa, yasassa aahattaa; atha ca pana no tathaa mayi nipaccakaara.m karonti yathaa bhagavati. addhaa ime aayasmanto tassa bhagavato saasane u.laara.m pubbenaapara.m visesa.m jaanantii'ti. ayampi kho me, bhante, bhagavati dhammanvayo hoti -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'ti.

[03] 374^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhante, bhagavaapi khattiyo, ahampi khattiyo; bhagavaapi kosalo, ahampi kosalo; bhagavaapi aasiitiko, ahampi aasiitiko. yampi, bhante, bhagavaapi khattiyo ahampi khattiyo, bhagavaapi kosalo ahampi kosalo, bhagavaapi aasiitiko ahampi aasiitiko; iminaavaarahaamevaaha.m {iminaapaaha.m (ka0)}, bhante, bhagavati paramanipaccakaara.m kaatu.m, mittuupahaara.m upada.msetu.m. handa, ca daani maya.m, bhante, gacchaama; bahukiccaa maya.m bahukara.niiyaa''ti. ``yassadaani tva.m, mahaaraaja, kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho bhagavaa acirapakkantassa ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``eso, bhikkhave, raajaa pasenadi kosalo dhammacetiyaani ^a^T2.0516^ea^ bhaasitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkanto. ugga.nhatha, bhikkhave, dhammacetiyaani; pariyaapu.naatha, bhikkhave ^a^P2.0125^ea^, dhammacetiyaani; dhaaretha, bhikkhave, dhammacetiyaani. atthasa.mhitaani, bhikkhave, dhammacetiyaani aadibrahmacariyakaanii''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] dhammacetiyasutta.m ni.t.thita.m navama.m.

[03] 375^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0517^ea^ ^a^M2.0327^ea^ ^a^V2.0334^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa uru~n~naaya.m {uju~n~naaya.m (sii0 pii0), uda~n~naaya.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} viharati ka.n.nakatthale migadaaye. tena kho pana samayena raajaa pasenadi kosalo uru~n~na.m anuppatto hoti kenacideva kara.niiyena. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo a~n~natara.m purisa.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, ambho purisa, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena bhagavato paade sirasaa vandaahi, appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m puccha -- `raajaa, bhante, pasenadi kosalo bhagavato paade sirasaa vandati, appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m pucchatii'ti. eva~nca vadehi -- `ajja kira, bhante, raajaa pasenadi kosalo pacchaabhatta.m bhuttapaataraaso bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissatii'''ti. ``eva.m, devaa''ti kho so puriso ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so puriso bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``raajaa, bhante, pasenadi kosalo bhagavato paade sirasaa vandati, appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m pucchati; eva~nca vadeti -- `ajja kira bhante, raajaa pasenadi kosalo pacchaabhatta.m bhuttapaataraaso bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissatii'''ti. assosu.m ^a^T2.0518^ea^ kho somaa ca bhaginii sakulaa ca bhaginii -- ``ajja kira ^a^P2.0126^ea^ raajaa pasenadi kosalo pacchaabhatta.m bhuttapaataraaso bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissatii''ti. atha kho somaa ca bhaginii sakulaa ca bhaginii raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m bhattaabhihaare upasa"nkamitvaa etadavocu.m -- ``tena hi, mahaaraaja, amhaakampi vacanena bhagavato paade sirasaa vandaahi, appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m puccha -- `somaa ca, bhante, bhaginii sakulaa ca bhaginii bhagavato paade sirasaa vandati, appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m pucchatii'''ti.

[03] 376^b^.^eb^ atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo pacchaabhatta.m bhuttapaataraaso yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho raajaa ^a^V2.0335^ea^ pasenadi kosalo ^a^M2.0328^ea^ bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``somaa ca, bhante, bhaginii sakulaa ca bhaginii bhagavato paade sirasaa vandati {vandanti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m pucchatii''ti {pucchantiiti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. ``ki.m pana, mahaaraaja, somaa ca bhaginii sakulaa ca bhaginii a~n~na.m duuta.m naalatthu''nti? ``assosu.m kho, bhante, somaa ca bhaginii sakulaa ca bhaginii -- `ajja kira raajaa pasenadi kosalo pacchaabhatta.m bhuttapaataraaso bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissatii'ti. atha kho, bhante, somaa ca bhaginii sakulaa ca bhaginii ma.m bhattaabhihaare upasa"nkamitvaa etadavocu.m -- `tena hi, mahaaraaja, amhaakampi vacanena bhagavato paade sirasaa vandaahi, appaabaadha.m ^a^T2.0519^ea^ appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m puccha -- somaa ca bhaginii sakulaa ca bhaginii bhagavato paade sirasaa vandati, appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m pucchatii'''ti. ``sukhiniyo hontu taa, mahaaraaja, somaa ca bhaginii sakulaa ca bhaginii''ti.

[03] 377^b^.^eb^ atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``suta.m meta.m, bhante, sama.no gotamo evamaaha -- `natthi so sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa yo sabba~n~nuu sabbadassaavii aparisesa.m ~naa.nadassana.m pa.tijaanissati, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti. ye te, bhante, evamaaha.msu -- `sama.no gotamo evamaaha ^a^P2.0127^ea^ -- natthi so sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa yo sabba~n~nuu sabbadassaavii aparisesa.m ~naa.nadassana.m pa.tijaanissati, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti; kacci te, bhante, bhagavato vuttavaadino, na ca bhagavanta.m abhuutena abbhaacikkhanti, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakaronti, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagacchatii''ti? ``ye te, mahaaraaja, evamaaha.msu -- `sama.no gotamo evamaaha -- natthi so sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa yo sabba~n~nuu sabbadassaavii aparisesa.m ~naa.nadassana.m pa.tijaanissati, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti; na me te vuttavaadino, abbhaacikkhanti ca pana ma.m te asataa abhuutenaa''ti.

[03] 378^b^.^eb^ atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo vi.ta.tuubha.m senaapati.m aamantesi -- ``ko nu kho, senaapati, ima.m kathaavatthu.m raajantepure abbhudaahaasii''ti? ``sa~njayo, mahaaraaja, braahma.no aakaasagotto''ti. atha ^a^T2.0520^ea^ kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo a~n~natara.m purisa.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m ^a^M2.0329^ea^, ambho purisa, mama vacanena sa~njaya.m braahma.na.m aakaasagotta.m aamantehi -- `raajaa ta.m, bhante, pasenadi kosalo aamantetii'''ti. ``eva.m, devaa''ti kho so puriso ra~n~no pasenadissa ^a^V2.0336^ea^ kosalassa pa.tissutvaa yena sa~njayo braahma.no aakaasagotto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa sa~njaya.m braahma.na.m aakaasagotta.m etadavoca -- ``raajaa ta.m, bhante, pasenadi kosalo aamantetii''ti. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``siyaa nu kho, bhante, bhagavataa a~n~nadeva ki~nci sandhaaya bhaasita.m, ta~nca jano a~n~nathaapi paccaagaccheyya {paccaagaccheyyaati, abhijaanaami mahaaraaja vaaca.m bhaasitaati (sii0)}. yathaa katha.m pana, bhante, bhagavaa abhijaanaati vaaca.m bhaasitaa''ti? ``eva.m kho aha.m, mahaaraaja, abhijaanaami vaaca.m bhaasitaa -- `natthi so sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa yo sakideva sabba.m ~nassati, sabba.m dakkhiti, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'''ti. ``heturuupa.m, bhante, bhagavaa aaha; saheturuupa.m, bhante, bhagavaa aaha -- `natthi so sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa yo ^a^P2.0128^ea^ sakideva sabba.m ~nassati, sabba.m dakkhiti, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'''ti. ``cattaarome, bhante, va.n.naa -- khattiyaa, braahma.naa, vessaa, suddaa. imesa.m nu kho, bhante, catunna.m va.n.naana.m siyaa viseso siyaa naanaakara.na''nti? ``cattaarome, mahaaraaja, va.n.naa -- khattiyaa, braahma.naa, vessaa, suddaa. imesa.m kho, mahaaraaja, catunna.m va.n.naana.m dve va.n.naa ^a^T2.0521^ea^ aggamakkhaayanti -- khattiyaa ca braahma.naa ca -- yadida.m abhivaadanapaccu.t.thaanaa~njalikammasaamiicikammaanii''ti {saamicikammaananti (sii0)}. ``naaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m di.t.thadhammika.m pucchaami; samparaayikaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m pucchaami. cattaarome, bhante, va.n.naa -- khattiyaa, braahma.naa, vessaa, suddaa. imesa.m nu kho, bhante, catunna.m va.n.naana.m siyaa viseso siyaa naanaakara.na''nti?

[03] 379^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, mahaaraaja, padhaaniya"ngaani. katamaani pa~nca? idha, mahaaraaja, bhikkhu saddho hoti, saddahati tathaagatassa bodhi.m -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti; appaabaadho hoti appaata"nko samavepaakiniyaa gaha.niyaa samannaagato naatisiitaaya naaccu.nhaaya majjhimaaya padhaanakkhamaaya; asa.tho hoti amaayaavii yathaabhuuta.m attaana.m aavikattaa satthari vaa vi~n~nuusu vaa sabrahmacaariisu; aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m ^a^M2.0330^ea^ pahaanaaya, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu; pa~n~navaa hoti udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaadukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa -- imaani kho, mahaaraaja, pa~nca padhaaniya"ngaani. cattaarome, mahaaraaja, va.n.naa -- khattiyaa, braahma.naa, vessaa, suddaa. te cassu imehi pa~ncahi padhaaniya"ngehi samannaagataa ^a^V2.0337^ea^; ettha pana nesa.m assa ^a^T2.0522^ea^ diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti. ``cattaarome, bhante, va.n.naa -- khattiyaa, braahma.naa, vessaa, suddaa ^a^P2.0129^ea^. te cassu imehi pa~ncahi padhaaniya"ngehi samannaagataa; ettha pana nesa.m, bhante, siyaa viseso siyaa naanaakara.na''nti? ``ettha kho nesaaha.m, mahaaraaja, padhaanavemattata.m vadaami. seyyathaapissu, mahaaraaja, dve hatthidammaa vaa assadammaa vaa godammaa vaa sudantaa suviniitaa, dve hatthidammaa vaa assadammaa vaa godammaa vaa adantaa aviniitaa. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, ye te dve hatthidammaa vaa assadammaa vaa godammaa vaa sudantaa suviniitaa, api nu te dantaava dantakaara.na.m gaccheyyu.m, dantaava dantabhuumi.m sampaapu.neyyu''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``ye pana te dve hatthidammaa vaa assadammaa vaa godammaa vaa adantaa aviniitaa, api nu te adantaava dantakaara.na.m gaccheyyu.m, adantaava dantabhuumi.m sampaapu.neyyu.m, seyyathaapi te dve hatthidammaa vaa assadammaa vaa godammaa vaa sudantaa suviniitaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ya.m ta.m saddhena pattabba.m appaabaadhena asa.thena amaayaavinaa aaraddhaviiriyena pa~n~navataa ta.m vata {ta.m tathaa so (ka0)} assaddho bahvaabaadho sa.tho maayaavii kusiito duppa~n~no paapu.nissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii''ti.

[03] 380^b^.^eb^ ``heturuupa.m, bhante, bhagavaa aaha; saheturuupa.m, bhante, bhagavaa aaha. cattaarome, bhante, va.n.naa -- khattiyaa, braahma.naa, vessaa ^a^T2.0523^ea^, suddaa. te cassu imehi pa~ncahi padhaaniya"ngehi samannaagataa te cassu sammappadhaanaa; ettha pana nesa.m, bhante, siyaa viseso siyaa naanaakara.na''nti? ``ettha kho {ettha kho pana (sii0)} nesaaha.m, mahaaraaja, na ki~nci naanaakara.na.m vadaami -- yadida.m vimuttiyaa vimutti.m. seyyathaapi, mahaaraaja, puriso sukkha.m saakaka.t.tha.m aadaaya aggi.m abhinibbatteyya, tejo paatukareyya ^a^M2.0331^ea^; athaaparo puriso sukkha.m saalaka.t.tha.m aadaaya ^a^P2.0130^ea^ aggi.m abhinibbatteyya, tejo paatukareyya; athaaparo puriso sukkha.m ambaka.t.tha.m aadaaya aggi.m abhinibbatteyya, tejo paatukareyya; athaaparo puriso sukkha.m udumbaraka.t.tha.m aadaaya aggi.m abhinibbatteyya, tejo paatukareyya. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, siyaa nu kho tesa.m aggiina.m naanaadaaruto abhinibbattaana.m ki~nci naanaakara.na.m acciyaa vaa acci.m, va.n.nena vaa va.n.na.m, aabhaaya vaa aabha''nti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ya.m ta.m teja.m viiriyaa nimmathita.m padhaanaabhinibbatta.m {viriya.m nippharati, ta.m pacchaabhinibbatta.m (sii0)}, naaha.m tattha ki~nci naanaakara.na.m vadaami -- yadida.m vimuttiyaa vimutti''nti. ``heturuupa.m, bhante, bhagavaa aaha; saheturuupa.m, bhante, bhagavaa aaha. ki.m ^a^V2.0338^ea^ pana, bhante, atthi devaa''ti? ``ki.m pana tva.m, mahaaraaja, eva.m vadesi -- `ki.m pana, bhante, atthi devaa'''ti? ``yadi vaa te, bhante, devaa aagantaaro itthatta.m yadi vaa anaagantaaro itthatta.m''? ``ye te, mahaaraaja, devaa sabyaabajjhaa te devaa aagantaaro itthatta.m, ye te devaa abyaabajjhaa te devaa anaagantaaro itthatta''nti.

[03] 381^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0524^ea^ vutte, vi.t.tuubho senaapati bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ye te, bhante, devaa sabyaabajjhaa aagantaaro itthatta.m te devaa, ye te devaa abyaabajjhaa anaagantaaro itthatta.m te deve tamhaa .thaanaa caavessanti vaa pabbaajessanti vaa''ti?

[03] atha kho aayasmato aanandassa etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho vi.ta.tuubho senaapati ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa putto; aha.m bhagavato putto. aya.m kho kaalo ya.m putto puttena manteyyaa''ti. atha kho aayasmaa aanando vi.ta.tuubha.m senaapati.m aamantesi -- ``tena hi, senaapati, ta.m yevettha pa.tipucchissaami; yathaa te khameyya tathaa na.m byaakareyyaasi. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, senaapati, yaavataa ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa vijita.m yattha ca raajaa pasenadi kosalo issariyaadhipacca.m ^a^P2.0131^ea^ rajja.m kaareti, pahoti tattha raajaa pasenadi kosalo sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa pu~n~navanta.m vaa apu~n~navanta.m vaa brahmacariyavanta.m vaa abrahmacariyavanta.m vaa tamhaa .thaanaa caavetu.m vaa pabbaajetu.m vaa''ti? ``yaavataa, bho, ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa vijita.m yattha ca raajaa pasenadi ^a^T2.0525^ea^ kosalo issariyaadhipacca.m rajja.m kaareti, pahoti tattha raajaa pasenadi kosalo ^a^M2.0332^ea^ sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa pu~n~navanta.m vaa apu~n~navanta.m vaa brahmacariyavanta.m vaa abrahmacariyavanta.m vaa tamhaa .thaanaa caavetu.m vaa pabbaajetu.m vaa''ti.

[01] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, senaapati, yaavataa ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa avijita.m yattha ca raajaa pasenadi kosalo na issariyaadhipacca.m rajja.m kaareti, tattha pahoti raajaa pasenadi kosalo sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa pu~n~navanta.m vaa apu~n~navanta.m vaa brahmacariyavanta.m vaa abrahmacariyavanta.m vaa tamhaa .thaanaa caavetu.m vaa pabbaajetu.m vaa''ti? ``yaavataa, bho, ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa avijita.m yattha ca raajaa pasenadi kosalo na issariyaadhipacca.m rajja.m kaareti, na tattha pahoti raajaa ^a^V2.0339^ea^ pasenadi kosalo sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa pu~n~navanta.m vaa apu~n~navanta.m vaa brahmacariyavanta.m vaa abrahmacariyavanta.m vaa tamhaa .thaanaa caavetu.m vaa pabbaajetu.m vaa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, senaapati, sutaa te devaa taavati.msaa''ti? ``eva.m, bho. sutaa me devaa taavati.msaa. idhaapi bhotaa ra~n~naa pasenadinaa kosalena sutaa devaa taavati.msaa''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, senaapati, pahoti raajaa pasenadi kosalo deve taavati.mse tamhaa .thaanaa caavetu.m vaa pabbaajetu.m vaa''ti? ``dassanampi, bho, raajaa pasenadi kosalo deve taavati.mse nappahoti, kuto pana tamhaa .thaanaa caavessati vaa pabbaajessati vaa''ti? ``evameva kho, senaapati, ye te devaa sabyaabajjhaa aagantaaro itthatta.m te devaa, ye te devaa abyaabajjhaa anaagantaaro itthatta.m te deve dassanaayapi nappahonti; kuto pana tamhaa .thaanaa caavessanti vaa pabbaajessanti vaa''ti?

[03] 382^b^.^eb^ atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``konaamo aya.m, bhante, bhikkhuu''ti? ``aanando ^a^T2.0526^ea^ naama, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``aanando vata, bho, aanandaruupo vata, bho! heturuupa.m, bhante ^a^P2.0132^ea^, aayasmaa aanando aaha; saheturuupa.m, bhante, aayasmaa aanando aaha. ki.m pana, bhante, atthi brahmaa''ti? ``ki.m pana tva.m, mahaaraaja, eva.m vadesi -- `ki.m pana, bhante, atthi brahmaa'''ti? ``yadi vaa so, bhante, brahmaa aagantaa itthatta.m, yadi vaa anaagantaa itthatta''nti? ``yo so, mahaaraaja, brahmaa sabyaabajjho so brahmaa aagantaa itthatta.m, yo so brahmaa abyaabajjho so brahmaa anaagantaa itthatta''nti. atha kho a~n~nataro puriso raajaana.m pasenadi.m ^a^M2.0333^ea^ kosala.m etadavoca -- ``sa~njayo, mahaaraaja, braahma.no aakaasagotto aagato''ti. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo sa~njaya.m braahma.na.m aakaasagotta.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, braahma.na, ima.m kathaavatthu.m raajantepure abbhudaahaasii''ti? ``vi.ta.tuubho, mahaaraaja, senaapatii''ti. vi.ta.tuubho senaapati evamaaha -- ``sa~njayo, mahaaraaja, braahma.no aakaasagotto''ti. atha kho a~n~nataro puriso raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m etadavoca -- ``yaanakaalo, mahaaraajaa''ti.

[03] atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``sabba~n~nuta.m maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m ^a^V2.0340^ea^ apucchimhaa, sabba~n~nuta.m bhagavaa byaakaasi; ta~nca panamhaaka.m ruccati ceva khamati ca, tena camhaa attamanaa. caatuva.n.nisuddhi.m maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m apucchimhaa, caatuva.n.nisuddhi.m ^a^T2.0527^ea^ bhagavaa byaakaasi; ta~nca panamhaaka.m ruccati ceva khamati ca, tena camhaa attamanaa. adhideve maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m apucchimhaa, adhideve bhagavaa byaakaasi; ta~nca panamhaaka.m ruccati ceva khamati ca, tena camhaa attamanaa. adhibrahmaana.m maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m apucchimhaa, adhibrahmaana.m bhagavaa byaakaasi; ta~nca panamhaaka.m ruccati ceva khamati ca, tena camhaa attamanaa. ya.m yadeva ca maya.m bhagavanta.m apucchimhaa ta.m tadeva bhagavaa byaakaasi; ta~nca panamhaaka.m ruccati ceva khamati ca, tena camhaa attamanaa. handa, ca ^a^P2.0133^ea^ daani maya.m, bhante, gacchaama; bahukiccaa maya.m bahukara.niiyaa''ti. ``yassadaani tva.m, mahaaraaja, kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaamiiti.
[06] ka.n.nakatthalasutta.m ni.t.thita.m dasama.m.
[06] raajavaggo ni.t.thito catuttho.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] gha.tikaaro ra.t.thapaalo, maghadevo madhuriya.m.
[27] bodhi a"ngulimaalo ca, piyajaata.m baahitika.m.
[22] dhammacetiyasutta~nca, dasama.m ka.n.nakatthala.m..

[03] 383^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0528^ea^ ^a^M2.0334^ea^ ^a^V2.0341^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa videhesu caarika.m carati mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi. tena kho pana samayena brahmaayu braahma.no mithilaaya.m pa.tivasati ji.n.no vu.d.dho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto, viisavassasatiko jaatiyaa, ti.n.na.m vedaana.m {bedaana.m (ka0)} paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m saakkharappabhedaana.m itihaasapa~ncamaana.m, padako, veyyaakara.no, lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu anavayo. assosi kho brahmaayu braahma.no -- ``sama.no khalu bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito videhesu caarika.m carati mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. saadhu ^a^T2.0529^ea^ kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m dassana.m hotii'''ti.

[03] 384^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P2.0134^ea^ kho pana samayena brahmaayussa braahma.nassa uttaro naama maa.navo antevaasii hoti ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m saakkharappabhedaana.m itihaasapa~ncamaana.m, padako, veyyaakara.no, lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu anavayo. atha kho brahmaayu braahma.no uttara.m maa.nava.m aamantesi -- ``aya.m, taata uttara, sama.no gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito videhesu ^a^V2.0342^ea^ caarika.m carati mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho...pe0... saadhu kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m dassana.m ^a^M2.0335^ea^ hotii'ti. ehi tva.m, taata uttara, yena sama.no gotamo tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa sama.na.m gotama.m jaanaahi yadi vaa ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m tathaa santa.myeva saddo abbhuggato, yadi vaa no tathaa; yadi vaa so bhava.m gotamo taadiso, yadi vaa na taadiso. tathaa maya.m ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m vedissaamaa''ti. ``yathaa katha.m panaaha.m, bho, ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m jaanissaami yadi vaa ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m tathaa santa.myeva saddo abbhuggato, yadi vaa no tathaa; yadi vaa so bhava.m gotamo taadiso, yadi vaa na taadiso''ti. ``aagataani kho, taata uttara, amhaaka.m mantesu dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani, yehi samannaagatassa mahaapurisassa dveyeva gatiyo bhavanti ana~n~naa ^a^T2.0530^ea^. sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa caaturanto vijitaavii janapadatthaavariyappatto sattaratanasamannaagato. tassimaani satta ratanaani bhavanti, seyyathida.m -- cakkaratana.m, hatthiratana.m, assaratana.m, ma.niratana.m, itthiratana.m, gahapatiratana.m, pari.naayakaratanameva sattama.m. parosahassa.m kho panassa puttaa bhavanti suuraa viira"ngaruupaa parasenappamaddanaa. so ima.m pathavi.m saagarapariyanta.m ada.n.dena asatthena dhammena {dhammena samena (ka0)} abhivijiya ajjhaavasati. sace kho pana agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati, araha.m hoti sammaasambuddho loke viva.t.tacchado. aha.m kho pana, taata uttara, mantaana.m daataa; tva.m mantaana.m pa.tiggahetaa''ti.

[03] 385^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m, bho''ti kho uttaro maa.navo brahmaayussa braahma.nassa pa.tissutvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa brahmaayu.m braahma.na.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa videhesu yena bhagavaa tena caarika.m ^a^P2.0135^ea^ pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho uttaro maa.navo bhagavato kaaye dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani samannesi. addasaa ^a^V2.0343^ea^ kho uttaro maa.navo bhagavato kaaye dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani, yebhuyyena thapetvaa dve. dviisu mahaapurisalakkha.nesu ka"nkhati ^a^T2.0531^ea^ vicikicchati naadhimuccati na sampasiidati -- kosohite ca vatthaguyhe, pahuutajivhataaya ca. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``passati kho me aya.m uttaro maa.navo dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani ^a^M2.0336^ea^, yebhuyyena thapetvaa dve. dviisu mahaapurisalakkha.nesu ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na sampasiidati -- kosohite ca vatthaguyhe, pahuutajivhataaya caa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa tathaaruupa.m iddhaabhisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkhaasi yathaa addasa uttaro maa.navo bhagavato kosohita.m vatthaguyha.m. atha kho bhagavaa jivha.m ninnaametvaa ubhopi ka.n.nasotaani anumasi pa.timasi {parimasi (sii0 ka0)}; ubhopi naasikasotaani {naasikaasotaani (sii0)} anumasi pa.timasi; kevalampi nalaa.tama.n.dala.m jivhaaya chaadesi. atha kho uttarassa maa.navassa etadahosi -- ``samannaagato kho sama.no gotamo dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.nehi. ya.mnuunaaha.m sama.na.m gotama.m anubandheyya.m, iriyaapathamassa passeyya''nti. atha kho uttaro maa.navo sattamaasaani bhagavanta.m anubandhi chaayaava anapaayinii {anupaayinii (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}.

[03] 386^b^.^eb^ atha kho uttaro maa.navo sattanna.m maasaana.m accayena videhesu yena mithilaa tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena mithilaa yena brahmaayu braahma.no tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa brahmaayu.m braahma.na.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m ^a^T2.0532^ea^ nisinna.m kho uttara.m maa.nava.m brahmaayu braahma.no etadavoca -- ``kacci, taata uttara, ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m tathaa santa.myeva saddo abbhuggato ^a^P2.0136^ea^, no a~n~nathaa? kacci pana so bhava.m gotamo taadiso, no a~n~naadiso''ti? ``tathaa santa.myeva, bho, ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m saddo abbhuggato, no a~n~nathaa; taadisova {taadisova bho (sii0 pii0), taadiso ca kho (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} so bhava.m gotamo, no a~n~naadiso. samannaagato ca {samannaagato ca bho (sabbattha)} so bhava.m gotamo dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.nehi.

[03] ``kosohitavatthaguyho kho pana so bhava.m gotamo...
[03] ``suva.n.nava.n.no kho pana so bhava.m gotamo ka~ncanasannibhattaco...

[03] 387^b^.^eb^ ``gacchanto kho pana so bhava.m gotamo dakkhi.neneva paadena ^a^T2.0534^ea^ pa.thama.m pakkamati. so naatiduure paada.m uddharati, naaccaasanne paada.m nikkhipati; so naatisiigha.m gacchati, naatisa.nika.m gacchati; na ca adduvena adduva.m sa"ngha.t.tento gacchati, na ca gopphakena gopphaka.m sa"ngha.t.tento gacchati. so gacchanto na satthi.m unnaameti, na satthi.m onaameti; na satthi.m sannaameti, na satthi.m vinaameti. gacchato kho pana tassa bhoto gotamassa adharakaayova {a.d.dhakaayova (ka0), aaraddhakaayova (syaa0 ka.m0)} i~njati, na ca kaayabalena gacchati. apalokento kho pana so bhava.m gotamo sabbakaayeneva apaloketi; so na uddha.m ulloketi, na adho oloketi; na ca vipekkhamaano gacchati, yugamatta~nca pekkhati; tato cassa uttari anaava.ta.m ~naa.nadassana.m bhavati. so antaraghara.m pavisanto na kaaya.m unnaameti ^a^M2.0339^ea^, na kaaya.m onaameti; na kaaya.m sannaameti, na ^a^P2.0138^ea^ kaaya.m vinaameti. so naatiduure naaccaasanne aasanassa parivattati, na ca paa.ninaa aalambitvaa aasane nisiidati, na ca aasanasmi.m kaaya.m pakkhipati. so antaraghare nisinno samaano na hatthakukkucca.m aapajjati, na paadakukkucca.m aapajjati; na adduvena adduva.m aaropetvaa nisiidati; na ca gopphakena gopphaka.m aaropetvaa nisiidati; na ca paa.ninaa hanuka.m upadahitvaa {upaadiyitvaa (sii0 pii0)} nisiidati. so antaraghare nisinno samaano na chambhati na kampati na vedhati na paritassati. so achambhii akampii avedhii aparitassii vigatalomaha.mso. vivekavatto ca so bhava.m gotamo antaraghare nisinno hoti. so pattodaka.m pa.tigga.nhanto ^a^T2.0535^ea^ na patta.m unnaameti, na patta.m onaameti; na patta.m sannaameti, na patta.m vinaameti. so pattodaka.m pa.tigga.nhaati naatithoka.m naatibahu.m. so na khulukhulukaaraka.m {bulubulukaaraka.m (sii0)} patta.m dhovati, na samparivattaka.m patta.m dhovati, na ^a^V2.0347^ea^ patta.m bhuumiya.m nikkhipitvaa hatthe dhovati; hatthesu dhotesu patto dhoto hoti, patte dhote hatthaa dhotaa honti. so pattodaka.m cha.d.deti naatiduure naaccaasanne, na ca viccha.d.dayamaano. so odana.m pa.tigga.nhanto na patta.m unnaameti, na patta.m onaameti; na patta.m sannaameti, na patta.m vinaameti. so odana.m pa.tigga.nhaati naatithoka.m naatibahu.m. bya~njana.m kho pana bhava.m gotamo bya~njanamattaaya aahaareti, na ca bya~njanena aalopa.m atinaameti. dvattikkhattu.m kho bhava.m gotamo mukhe aalopa.m samparivattetvaa ajjhoharati; na cassa kaaci odanami~njaa asambhinnaa kaaya.m pavisati, na cassa kaaci odanami~njaa mukhe avasi.t.thaa hoti; athaapara.m aalopa.m upanaameti. rasapa.tisa.mvedii kho pana so bhava.m gotamo aahaara.m aahaareti, no ca rasaraagapa.tisa.mvedii.

[03] ``a.t.tha"ngasamannaagata.m {a.t.tha"ngasamannaagato (ka0)} kho pana so bhava.m gotamo aahaara.m aahaareti -- neva davaaya, na madaaya na ma.n.danaaya na vibhuusanaaya, yaavadeva imassa kaayassa .thitiyaa yaapanaaya, vihi.msuuparatiyaa brahmacariyaanuggahaaya -- `iti puraa.na~nc ^a^P2.0139^ea^ vedana.m pa.tiha"nkhaami nava~nca vedana.m na uppaadessaami, yaatraa ca me ^a^T2.0536^ea^ bhavissati anavajjataa ca phaasuvihaaro caa'ti ^a^M2.0340^ea^. so bhuttaavii pattodaka.m pa.tigga.nhanto na patta.m unnaameti, na patta.m onaameti; na patta.m sannaameti, na patta.m vinaameti. so pattodaka.m pa.tigga.nhaati naatithoka.m naatibahu.m. so na khulukhulukaaraka.m patta.m dhovati, na samparivattaka.m patta.m dhovati, na patta.m bhuumiya.m nikkhipitvaa hatthe dhovati; hatthesu dhotesu patto dhoto hoti, patte dhote hatthaa dhotaa honti. so pattodaka.m cha.d.deti naatiduure naaccaasanne, na ca viccha.d.dayamaano. so bhuttaavii na patta.m bhuumiya.m nikkhipati naatiduure naaccaasanne, na ca anatthiko pattena hoti, na ca ativelaanurakkhii pattasmi.m. so bhuttaavii muhutta.m tu.nhii nisiidati, na ca anumodanassa kaalamatinaameti. so bhuttaavii anumodati, na ta.m bhatta.m garahati, na a~n~na.m bhatta.m pa.tika"nkhati; a~n~nadatthu dhammiyaa kathaaya ta.m parisa.m sandasseti samaadapeti samuttejeti sampaha.mseti. so ta.m parisa.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkamati. so naatisiigha.m gacchati, naatisa.nika.m gacchati, na ca muccitukaamo gacchati; na ca tassa bhoto gotamassa kaaye ciivara.m accukka.t.tha.m hoti na ca accokka.t.tha.m, na ca kaayasmi.m alliina.m na ca kaayasmaa apaka.t.tha.m; na ca tassa bhoto gotamassa kaayamhaa vaato ciivara.m apavahati; na ca tassa bhoto ^a^V2.0348^ea^ gotamassa kaaye rajojalla.m upalimpati ^a^T2.0537^ea^. so aaraamagato nisiidati pa~n~natte aasane. nisajja paade pakkhaaleti; na ca so bhava.m gotamo paadama.n.danaanuyogamanuyutto viharati. so paade pakkhaaletvaa nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so neva attabyaabaadhaaya ceteti, na parabyaabaadhaaya ceteti, na ubhayabyaabaadhaaya ceteti; attahitaparahitaubhayahitasabbalokahitameva ^a^P2.0140^ea^ so bhava.m gotamo cintento nisinno hoti. so aaraamagato parisati dhamma.m deseti, na ta.m parisa.m ussaadeti, na ta.m parisa.m apasaadeti; a~n~nadatthu dhammiyaa kathaaya ta.m parisa.m sandasseti samaadapeti samuttejeti sampaha.mseti.

[03] ``a.t.tha"ngasamannaagato kho panassa bhoto gotamassa mukhato ghoso niccharati -- vissa.t.tho ca, vi~n~neyyo ca, ma~nju ca, savaniiyo ca, bindu ca, avisaarii ca, gambhiiro ca, ninnaadii ca. yathaaparisa.m kho pana so bhava.m ^a^M2.0341^ea^ gotamo sarena vi~n~naapeti, na cassa bahiddhaa parisaaya ghoso niccharati. te tena bhotaa gotamena dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassitaa samaadapitaa samuttejitaa sampaha.msitaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkamanti avalokayamaanaayeva {apalokayamaanaayeva (sii0 ka0)} avijahitattaa {avijahantaabhaavena (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. addasaama kho maya.m, bho, ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m gacchanta.m, addasaama .thita.m, addasaama antaraghara.m pavisanta.m, addasaama antaraghare nisinna.m tu.nhiibhuuta.m, addasaama antaraghare bhu~njanta.m, addasaama bhuttaavi.m nisinna.m tu.nhiibhuuta.m, addasaama bhuttaavi.m anumodanta.m, addasaama aaraama.m ^a^T2.0538^ea^ gacchanta.m, addasaama aaraamagata.m nisinna.m tu.nhiibhuuta.m, addasaama aaraamagata.m parisati dhamma.m desenta.m. ediso ca ediso ca so bhava.m gotamo, tato ca bhiyyo''ti.
[03] 388^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, brahmaayu braahma.no u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa tikkhattu.m udaana.m udaaneti --
[03] ``namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa.
[03] ``namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa.
[03] ``namo ^a^V2.0349^ea^ tassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassaa''ti.

[03] 389^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa videhesu anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena mithilaa tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa mithilaaya.m viharati maghadevambavane. assosu.m kho mithileyyakaa {methileyyakaa (sii0 pii0)} braahma.nagahapatikaa -- ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo ^a^P2.0141^ea^ sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito videhesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi mithila.m anuppatto, mithilaaya.m viharati maghadevambavane. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m ^a^M2.0342^ea^ paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti ^a^T2.0539^ea^. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. saadhu kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m dassana.m hotii'''ti.

[03] atha kho mithileyyakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa appekacce bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu; appekacce bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi.msu, sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu; appekacce yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu; appekacce bhagavato santike naamagotta.m saavetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu; appekacce tu.nhiibhuutaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu.

[03] 390^b^.^eb^ assosi kho brahmaayu braahma.no -- ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito mithila.m anuppatto, mithilaaya.m viharati maghadevambavane''ti. atha kho brahmaayu braahma.no sambahulehi saavakehi saddhi.m yena maghadevambavana.m tenupasa"nkami. atha kho brahmaayuno braahma.nassa aviduure ambavanassa etadahosi -- ``na kho meta.m patiruupa.m yoha.m pubbe appa.tisa.mvidito ^a^V2.0350^ea^ sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkameyya''nti. atha kho brahmaayu braahma.no a~n~natara.m maa.navaka.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, maa.navaka, yena sama.no gotamo tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena sama.na.m gotama.m appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m puccha -- `brahmaayu, bho gotama, braahma.no bhavanta.m gotama.m appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m pucchatii'ti. eva~nca vadehi -- `brahmaayu, bho ^a^T2.0540^ea^ gotama, braahma.no ji.n.no vu.d.dho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto, viisavassasatiko jaatiyaa, ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m saakkharappabhedaana.m itihaasapa~ncamaana.m, padako, veyyaakara.no, lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu anavayo. yaavataa, bho, braahma.nagahapatikaa mithilaaya.m pa.tivasanti, brahmaayu tesa.m braahma.no aggamakkhaayati -- yadida.m bhogehi; brahmaayu tesa.m braahma.no aggamakkhaayati -- yadida.m mantehi; brahmaayu ^a^P2.0142^ea^ tesa.m braahma.no aggamakkhaayati -- yadida.m aayunaa ceva yasasaa ca. so bhoto gotamassa dassanakaamo'''ti.

[03] ``eva.m ^a^M2.0343^ea^, bho''ti kho so maa.navako brahmaayussa braahma.nassa pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho so maa.navako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``brahmaayu, bho gotama, braahma.no bhavanta.m gotama.m appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m pucchati; eva~nca vadeti -- `brahmaayu, bho gotama, braahma.no ji.n.no vu.d.dho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto, viisavassasatiko jaatiyaa, ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m saakkharappabhedaana.m itihaasapa~ncamaana.m, padako, veyyaakara.no, lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu ^a^T2.0541^ea^ anavayo. yaavataa, bho, braahma.nagahapatikaa mithilaaya.m pa.tivasanti, brahmaayu tesa.m braahma.no aggamakkhaayati -- yadida.m bhogehi; brahmaayu tesa.m braahma.no aggamakkhaayati -- yadida.m mantehi; brahmaayu tesa.m braahma.no aggamakkhaayati -- yadida.m aayunaa ceva yasasaa ca. so bhoto gotamassa dassanakaamo'''ti. ``yassadaani, maa.nava, brahmaayu braahma.no kaala.m ma~n~natii''ti. atha kho so maa.navako yena brahmaayu braahma.no tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa brahmaayu.m braahma.na.m etadavoca -- ``kataavakaaso khomhi bhavataa sama.nena gotamena. yassadaani bhava.m kaala.m ma~n~natii''ti.

[03] 391^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V2.0351^ea^ kho brahmaayu braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho saa parisaa brahmaayu.m braahma.na.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana oramiya {oramattha (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), oramatha, oramati (ka0), atha na.m (sii0), oramiyaati pana tvaapaccayantatathasa.mva.n.nanaanuruupa.m visodhitapada.m} okaasamakaasi yathaa ta.m ~naatassa yasassino. atha kho brahmaayu braahma.no ta.m parisa.m etadavoca -- ``ala.m, bho! nisiidatha tumhe sake aasane. idhaaha.m sama.nassa gotamassa santike nisiidissaamii''ti.

[03] atha kho brahmaayu braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho brahmaayu braahma.no bhagavato ^a^M2.0344^ea^ kaaye ^a^P2.0143^ea^ dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani samannesi. addasaa kho brahmaayu braahma.no bhagavato ^a^T2.0542^ea^ kaaye dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani, yebhuyyena .thapetvaa dve. dviisu mahaapurisalakkha.nesu ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na sampasiidati -- kosohite ca vatthaguyhe, pahuutajivhataaya ca. atha kho brahmaayu braahma.no bhagavanta.m gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``ye me dvatti.msaati sutaa, mahaapurisalakkha.naa.
[22] duve tesa.m na passaami, bhoto kaayasmi.m gotama..
[21] ``kacci kosohita.m bhoto, vatthaguyha.m naruttama.
[22] naariisamaanasavhayaa, kacci jivhaa na dassakaa {naariisahanaama savhayaa, kacci jivhaa narassikaa. (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}..
[21] ``kacci pahuutajivhosi, yathaa ta.m jaaniyaamase.
[22] ninnaamayeta.m pahuuta.m, ka"nkha.m vinaya no ise..
[21] ``di.t.thadhammahitatthaaya, samparaayasukhaaya ca.
[22] kataavakaasaa pucchaama, ya.m ki~nci abhipatthita''nti..

[03] 392^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``passati kho me aya.m brahmaayu braahma.no dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani, yebhuyyena .thapetvaa dve. dviisu mahaapurisalakkha.nesu ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na sampasiidati -- kosohite ca vatthaguyhe, pahuutajivhataaya caa''ti ^a^V2.0352^ea^. atha kho bhagavaa tathaaruupa.m iddhaabhisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkhaasi yathaa addasa brahmaayu braahma.no bhagavato kosohita.m vatthaguyha.m. atha kho bhagavaa jivha.m ninnaametvaa ubhopi ka.n.nasotaani anumasi pa.timasi; ubhopi naasikasotaani ^a^T2.0543^ea^ anumasi pa.timasi; kevalampi nalaa.tama.n.dala.m jivhaaya chaadesi. atha kho bhagavaa brahmaayu.m braahma.na.m gaathaahi paccabhaasi --
[21] ``ye te dvatti.msaati sutaa, mahaapurisalakkha.naa.
[22] sabbe te mama kaayasmi.m, maa te {maa vo (ka0)} ka"nkhaahu braahma.na..
[21] ``abhi~n~neyya.m abhi~n~naata.m, bhaavetabba~nca bhaavita.m.
[22] pahaatabba.m pahiina.m me, tasmaa buddhosmi braahma.na..
[21] ``di.t.thadhammahitatthaaya ^a^M2.0345^ea^ ^a^P2.0144^ea^, samparaayasukhaaya ca.
[22] kataavakaaso pucchassu, ya.m ki~nci abhipatthita''nti..

[03] 393^b^.^eb^ atha kho brahmaayussa braahma.nassa etadahosi -- ``kataavakaaso khomhi sama.nena gotamena. ki.m nu kho aha.m sama.na.m gotama.m puccheyya.m -- `di.t.thadhammika.m vaa attha.m samparaayika.m vaa'''ti. atha kho brahmaayussa braahma.nassa etadahosi -- ``kusalo kho aha.m di.t.thadhammikaana.m atthaana.m. a~n~nepi ma.m di.t.thadhammika.m attha.m pucchanti. ya.mnuunaaha.m sama.na.m gotama.m samparaayika.myeva attha.m puccheyya''nti. atha kho brahmaayu braahma.no bhagavanta.m gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``katha.m kho braahma.no hoti, katha.m bhavati vedaguu.
[22] tevijjo bho katha.m hoti, sotthiyo kinti vuccati..
[21] ``araha.m bho katha.m hoti, katha.m bhavati kevalii.
[22] muni ca bho katha.m hoti, buddho kinti pavuccatii''ti..
[03] 394^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T2.0544^ea^ kho bhagavaa brahmaayu.m braahma.na.m gaathaahi paccabhaasi --
[21] ``pubbenivaasa.m ^a^V2.0353^ea^ yo vedi, saggaapaaya~nca passati.
[22] atho jaatikkhaya.m patto, abhi~n~naa vosito muni..
[21] ``citta.m visuddha.m jaanaati, mutta.m raagehi sabbaso.
[27] pahiinajaatimara.no, brahmacariyassa kevalii.
[22] paaraguu sabbadhammaana.m, buddho taadii pavuccatii''ti..

[03] eva.m vutte, brahmaayu braahma.no u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavato paadaani mukhena ca paricumbati, paa.niihi ca parisambaahati, naama~nca saaveti -- ``brahmaayu aha.m, bho gotama, braahma.no; brahmaayu aha.m, bho gotama, braahma.no''ti. atha kho saa parisaa acchariyabbhutacittajaataa ahosi -- ``acchariya.m vata, bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho! yatra hi naamaaya.m brahmaayu braahma.no ~naato yasassii evaruupa.m paramanipaccakaara.m karissatii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa brahmaayu.m braahma.na.m etadavoca ^a^P2.0145^ea^ -- ``ala.m, braahma.na, u.t.thaha nisiida tva.m sake aasane yato te mayi citta.m pasanna''nti. atha kho brahmaayu braahma.no u.t.thahitvaa sake aasane nisiidi.

[03] 395^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M2.0346^ea^ kho bhagavaa brahmaayussa braahma.nassa anupubbi.m katha.m kathesi, seyyathida.m -- daanakatha.m, siilakatha.m, saggakatha.m; kaamaana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m pakaasesi. yadaa bhagavaa ^a^T2.0545^ea^ a~n~naasi brahmaayu.m braahma.na.m kallacitta.m muducitta.m viniivara.nacitta.m udaggacitta.m pasannacitta.m, atha yaa buddhaana.m saamukka.msikaa dhammadesanaa ta.m pakaasesi -- dukkha.m, samudaya.m, nirodha.m, magga.m. seyyathaapi naama suddha.m vattha.m apagatakaa.laka.m sammadeva rajana.m pa.tigga.nheyya, evameva brahmaayussa braahma.nassa tasmi.myeva aasane viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- ``ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma''nti. atha kho brahmaayu braahma.no di.t.thadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogaa.lhadhammo ti.n.navicikiccho vigatakatha.mkatho vesaarajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusaasane bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama! seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti -- evameva.m bhotaa ^a^V2.0354^ea^ gotamena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata.m. adhivaasetu ca me bhava.m gotamo svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho brahmaayu braahma.no bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami ^a^T2.0546^ea^. atha kho brahmaayu braahma.no tassaa rattiyaa accayena sake nivesane pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa bhagavato kaala.m aarocaapesi -- ``kaalo, bho gotama, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti.

[03] atha ^a^P2.0146^ea^ kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena brahmaayussa braahma.nassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena. atha kho brahmaayu braahma.no sattaaha.m buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappesi sampavaaresi. atha kho bhagavaa tassa sattaahassa accayena videhesu caarika.m pakkaami. atha kho brahmaayu braahma.no acirapakkantassa bhagavato kaalamakaasi. atha kho sambahulaa ^a^M2.0347^ea^ bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``brahmaayu, bhante, braahma.no kaala"nkato. tassa kaa gati, ko abhisamparaayo''ti? ``pa.n.dito, bhikkhave, brahmaayu braahma.no paccapaadi dhammassaanudhamma.m, na ca ma.m dhammaadhikara.na.m vihesesi. brahmaayu, bhikkhave, braahma.no pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatiko hoti, tattha parinibbaayii, anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca ^a^T2.0547^ea^ bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] brahmaayusutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 396^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V2.0355^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa a"nguttaraapesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m a.d.dhate.lasehi bhikkhusatehi yena aapa.na.m naama a"nguttaraapaana.m nigamo tadavasari. assosi kho ke.niyo ja.tilo -- ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito a"nguttaraapesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m a.d.dhate.lasehi bhikkhusatehi aapa.na.m anuppatto. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. saadhu kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m dassana.m hotii'''ti.

[03] atha kho ke.niyo ja.tilo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ^a^M2.0348^ea^ ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho ke.niya.m ja.tila.m bhagavaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi ^a^T2.0549^ea^. atha kho ke.niyo ja.tilo bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``adhivaasetu me bhava.m gotamo svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. eva.m vutte, bhagavaa ke.niya.m ja.tila.m etadavoca -- ``mahaa kho, ke.niya, bhikkhusa"ngho a.d.dhate.lasaani bhikkhusataani, tva~nca braahma.nesu abhippasanno''ti. dutiyampi kho ke.niyo ja.tilo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ki~ncaapi kho, bho gotama, mahaa bhikkhusa"ngho a.d.dhate.lasaani bhikkhusataani, aha~nca braahma.nesu abhippasanno; adhivaasetu me bhava.m gotamo svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa ke.niya.m ja.tila.m etadavoca -- ``mahaa kho, ke.niya, bhikkhusa"ngho a.d.dhate.lasaani bhikkhusataani, tva~nca braahma.nesu abhippasanno''ti. tatiyampi kho ke.niyo ja.tilo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ki~ncaapi kho, bho gotama, mahaa bhikkhusa"ngho a.d.dhate.lasaani bhikkhusataani, aha~nca braahma.nesu abhippasanno; adhivaasetu me bhava.m gotamo svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti ^a^V2.0356^ea^. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho ke.niyo ja.tilo bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa yena sako assamo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa mittaamacce ~naatisaalohite aamantesi -- ``su.nantu me bhonto, mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa; sama.no me gotamo nimantito svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena. yena me kaayaveyyaava.tika.m {kaayaveyaava.t.tika.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0), kaayaveyyaavatika.m (ka0)} kareyyaathaa''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho ^a^T2.0550^ea^ ke.niyassa ja.tilassa mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa ke.niyassa ja.tilassa pa.tissutvaa appekacce uddhanaani kha.nanti, appekacce ka.t.thaani phaalenti, appekacce bhaajanaani dhovanti, appekacce udakama.nika.m pati.t.thaapenti, appekacce aasanaani pa~n~napenti. ke.niyo pana ja.tilo saama.myeva ma.n.dalamaala.m pa.tiyaadeti.

[03] 397^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena selo braahma.no aapa.ne pa.tivasati ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m saakkharappabhedaana.m itihaasapa~ncamaana.m ^a^M2.0349^ea^, padako, veyyaakara.no, lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu anavayo, tii.ni ca maa.navakasataani mante vaaceti. tena kho pana samayena ke.niyo ja.tilo sele braahma.ne abhippasanno hoti. atha kho selo braahma.no tiihi maa.navakasatehi parivuto ja"nghaavihaara.m anuca"nkamamaano anuvicaramaano yena ke.niyassa ja.tilassa assamo tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho selo braahma.no ke.niyassa ja.tilassa assame appekacce uddhanaani kha.nante, appekacce ka.t.thaani phaalente, appekacce bhaajanaani dhovante, appekacce udakama.nika.m pati.t.thaapente, appekacce aasanaani pa~n~napente, ke.niya.m pana ja.tila.m saama.myeva ma.n.dalamaala.m pa.tiyaadenta.m. disvaana ke.niya.m ja.tila.m etadavoca -- ``ki.m nu bhoto ke.niyassa aavaaho vaa bhavissati vivaaho vaa bhavissati mahaaya~n~no vaa paccupa.t.thito, raajaa vaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro nimantito svaatanaaya saddhi.m balakaayenaa''ti? ``na me, bho sela, aavaaho ^a^T2.0551^ea^ bhavissati napi vivaaho bhavissati napi raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro nimantito svaatanaaya saddhi.m balakaayena; api ca kho me mahaaya~n~no paccupa.t.thito. atthi, bho, sama.no gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito a"nguttaraapesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m a.d.dhate.lasehi bhikkhusatehi aapa.na.m anuppatto. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. so me nimantito svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti.
[03] ``buddhoti ^a^V2.0357^ea^ -- bho ke.niya, vadesi''?
[03] ``buddhoti -- bho sela, vadaami''.
[03] ``buddhoti -- bho ke.niya, vadesi''?
[03] ``buddhoti -- bho sela, vadaamii''ti.

[03] 398^b^.^eb^ atha kho selassa braahma.nassa etadahosi -- ``ghosopi kho eso dullabho lokasmi.m -- yadida.m `buddho'ti {yadida.m buddho buddhoti (ka0)}. aagataani kho panamhaaka.m mantesu dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani, yehi samannaagatassa mahaapurisassa ^a^M2.0350^ea^ dveyeva gatiyo bhavanti ana~n~naa. sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa caaturanto vijitaavii janapadatthaavariyappatto sattaratanasamannaagato. tassimaani satta ratanaani bhavanti, seyyathida.m -- cakkaratana.m, hatthiratana.m, assaratana.m, ma.niratana.m, itthiratana.m, gahapatiratana.m, pari.naayakaratanameva sattama.m. parosahassa.m kho panassa puttaa bhavanti suuraa viira"ngaruupaa parasenappamaddanaa. so ^a^T2.0552^ea^ ima.m pathavi.m saagarapariyanta.m ada.n.dena asatthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhaavasati. sace pana agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati, araha.m hoti sammaasambuddho loke viva.t.tacchado''.

[03] ``kaha.m pana, bho ke.niya, etarahi so bhava.m gotamo viharati araha.m sammaasambuddho''ti? eva.m vutte, ke.niyo ja.tilo dakkhi.na.m baahu.m paggahetvaa sela.m braahma.na.m etadavoca -- ``yenesaa, bho sela, niilavanaraajii''ti. atha kho selo braahma.no tiihi maa.navakasatehi saddhi.m yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami. atha kho selo braahma.no te maa.navake aamantesi -- ``appasaddaa bhonto aagacchantu pade pada.m {paade paada.m (sii0)} nikkhipantaa; duraasadaa {duurasaddaa (ka0)} hi te bhagavanto siihaava ekacaraa. yadaa caaha.m, bho, sama.nena gotamena saddhi.m manteyya.m, maa me bhonto antarantaraa katha.m opaatetha. kathaapariyosaana.m me bhavanto aagamentuu''ti. atha kho selo braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho selo braahma.no bhagavato kaaye dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani samannesi.

[03] addasaa kho selo braahma.no bhagavato kaaye dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani, yebhuyyena .thapetvaa dve. dviisu mahaapurisalakkha.nesu ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na sampasiidati -- kosohite ^a^V2.0358^ea^ ca vatthaguyhe, pahuutajivhataaya ca. atha ^a^T2.0553^ea^ kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``passati kho me aya.m selo braahma.no dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani, yebhuyyena .thapetvaa dve. dviisu mahaapurisalakkha.nesu ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na sampasiidati -- kosohite ^a^M2.0351^ea^ ca vatthaguyhe, pahuutajivhataaya caa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa tathaaruupa.m iddhaabhisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkhaasi, yathaa addasa selo braahma.no bhagavato kosohita.m vatthaguyha.m. atha kho bhagavaa jivha.m ninnaametvaa ubhopi ka.n.nasotaani anumasi pa.timasi; ubhopi naasikasotaani anumasi pa.timasi; kevalampi nalaa.tama.n.dala.m jivhaaya chaadesi. atha kho selassa braahma.nassa etadahosi -- ``samannaagato kho sama.no gotamo dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.nehi paripu.n.nehi, no aparipu.n.nehi; no ca kho na.m jaanaami buddho vaa no vaa. suta.m kho pana meta.m braahma.naana.m vuddhaana.m mahallakaana.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m bhaasamaanaana.m -- `ye te bhavanti arahanto sammaasambuddhaa te sake va.n.ne bha~n~namaane attaana.m paatukarontii'ti. ya.mnuunaaha.m sama.na.m gotama.m sammukhaa saaruppaahi gaathaahi abhitthaveyya''nti.
[03] 399^b^.^eb^ atha kho selo braahma.no bhagavanta.m sammukhaa saaruppaahi gaathaahi abhitthavi --
[21] ``paripu.n.nakaayo suruci, sujaato caarudassano.
[22] suva.n.nava.n.nosi bhagavaa, susukkadaa.thosi viiriyavaa {viriyavaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}..
[21] ``narassa hi sujaatassa, ye bhavanti viya~njanaa.
[22] sabbe te tava kaayasmi.m, mahaapurisalakkha.naa..
[21] ``pasannanetto ^a^T2.0554^ea^ sumukho, brahaa {brahmaa (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} uju pataapavaa.
[22] majjhe sama.nasa"nghassa, aadiccova virocasi..
[21] ``kalyaa.nadassano bhikkhu, ka~ncanasannibhattaco.
[22] ki.m te sama.nabhaavena, eva.m uttamava.n.nino..
[21] ``raajaa arahasi bhavitu.m, cakkavattii rathesabho.
[22] caaturanto vijitaavii, jambusa.n.dassa {jambuma.n.dassa (ka0)} issaro..
[21] ``khattiyaa ^a^V2.0359^ea^ bhogiraajaano, anuyantaa {anuyuttaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} bhavantu te.
[22] raajaabhiraajaa manujindo, rajja.m kaarehi gotama''..
[21] ``raajaahamasmi ^a^M2.0352^ea^ selaati, dhammaraajaa anuttaro.
[22] dhammena cakka.m vattemi, cakka.m appa.tivattiya.m''..
[21] ``sambuddho pa.tijaanaasi, dhammaraajaa anuttaro.
[22] `dhammena cakka.m vattemi', iti bhaasasi gotama..
[21] ``ko nu senaapati bhoto, saavako satthuranvayo.
[22] ko te tamanuvatteti, dhammacakka.m pavattita.m''..
[21] ``mayaa pavattita.m cakka.m, (selaati bhagavaa dhammacakka.m anuttara.m.
[22] saariputto anuvatteti, anujaato tathaagata.m..
[21] ``abhi~n~neyya.m abhi~n~naata.m, bhaavetabba~nca bhaavita.m.
[22] pahaatabba.m pahiina.m me, tasmaa buddhosmi braahma.na..
[21] ``vinayassu mayi ka"nkha.m, adhimuccassu braahma.na.
[22] dullabha.m dassana.m hoti, sambuddhaana.m abhi.nhaso..
[21] ``yesa.m ^a^T2.0555^ea^ ve dullabho loke, paatubhaavo abhi.nhaso.
[22] soha.m braahma.na sambuddho, sallakatto anuttaro..
[21] ``brahmabhuuto atitulo, maarasenappamaddano.
[22] sabbaamitte vasii katvaa, modaami akutobhayo''..
[21] ``ima.m bhonto nisaametha, yathaa bhaasati cakkhumaa.
[22] sallakatto mahaaviiro, siihova nadatii vane..
[21] ``brahmabhuuta.m ^a^V2.0360^ea^ atitula.m, maarasenappamaddana.m.
[22] ko disvaa nappasiideyya, api ka.nhaabhijaatiko..
[21] ``yo ma.m icchati anvetu, yo vaa nicchati gacchatu.
[22] idhaaha.m pabbajissaami, varapa~n~nassa santike''..
[21] ``eta~nce {eva~nce (syaa0 ka.m0)} ruccati bhoto, sammaasambuddhasaasana.m {sammaasambuddhasaasane (katthaci suttanipaate)}.
[22] mayampi pabbajissaama, varapa~n~nassa santike''..
[21] ``braahma.naa tisataa ime, yaacanti pa~njaliikataa.
[22] brahmacariya.m carissaama, bhagavaa tava santike''..
[21] ``svaakkhaata.m ^a^M2.0353^ea^ brahmacariya.m, (selaati bhagavaa sandi.t.thikamakaalika.m.
[22] yattha amoghaa pabbajjaa, appamattassa sikkhato''ti..
[03] alattha kho selo braahma.no sapariso bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, alattha upasampada.m.

[03] 400^b^.^eb^ atha kho ke.niyo ja.tilo tassaa rattiyaa accayena sake assame pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa bhagavato kaala.m ^a^T2.0556^ea^ aarocaapesi -- ``kaalo, bho gotama, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena ke.niyassa ja.tilassa assamo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena. atha kho ke.niyo ja.tilo buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappesi, sampavaaresi. atha kho ke.niyo ja.tilo bhagavanta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m a~n~natara.m niica.m aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho ke.niya.m ja.tila.m bhagavaa imaahi gaathaahi anumodi --
[21] ``aggihuttamukhaa ya~n~naa, saavittii chandaso mukha.m.
[22] raajaa mukha.m manussaana.m, nadiina.m saagaro mukha.m..
[21] ``nakkhattaana.m ^a^V2.0361^ea^ mukha.m cando, aadicco tapata.m mukha.m.
[22] pu~n~na.m aaka"nkhamaanaana.m, sa"ngho ve yajata.m mukha''nti..
[03] atha kho bhagavaa ke.niya.m ja.tila.m imaahi gaathaahi anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa selo sapariso eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro kho panaayasmaa selo ^a^T2.0557^ea^ sapariso arahata.m ahosi. atha kho aayasmaa selo sapariso yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m ciivara.m katvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``ya.m ^a^M2.0354^ea^ ta.m sara.namaagamma, ito a.t.thami cakkhumaa.
[22] sattarattena {anuttarena (ka0)} bhagavaa, dantamha tava saasane..
[21] ``tuva.m buddho tuva.m satthaa, tuva.m maaraabhibhuu muni.
[22] tuva.m anusaye chetvaa, ti.n.no taaresima.m paja.m..
[21] ``upadhii te samatikkantaa, aasavaa te padaalitaa.
[22] siihova anupaadaano, pahiinabhayabheravo..
[21] ``bhikkhavo tisataa ime, ti.t.thanti pa~njaliikataa.
[22] paade viira pasaarehi, naagaa vandantu satthuno''ti..
[06] selasutta.m ni.t.thita.m dutiya.m.

[03] 401^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0558^ea^ ^a^V2.0362^ea^ ^a^P2.0147^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena naanaaverajjakaana.m braahma.naana.m pa~ncamattaani braahma.nasataani saavatthiya.m pa.tivasanti kenacideva kara.niiyena. atha kho tesa.m braahma.naana.m etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho sama.no gotamo caatuva.n.ni.m suddhi.m pa~n~napeti. ko nu kho pahoti sama.nena gotamena saddhi.m asmi.m vacane pa.timantetu''nti? tena kho pana samayena assalaayano naama maa.navo saavatthiya.m pa.tivasati daharo, vuttasiro, so.lasavassuddesiko jaatiyaa, ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m saakkharappabhedaana.m itihaasapa~ncamaana.m, padako, veyyaakara.no, lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu anavayo. atha kho tesa.m braahma.naana.m etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho assalaayano maa.navo saavatthiya.m pa.tivasati daharo, vuttasiro, so.lasavassuddesiko jaatiyaa, ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu...pe0... anavayo. so kho pahoti sama.nena gotamena saddhi.m asmi.m vacane pa.timantetu''nti.

[03] atha kho te braahma.naa yena assalaayano maa.navo tenupa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa assalaayana.m maa.nava.m etadavocu.m -- ``aya.m, bho assalaayana ^a^M2.0355^ea^, sama.no gotamo caatuva.n.ni.m suddhi.m pa~n~napeti. etu bhava.m assalaayano sama.nena gotamena saddhi.m asmi.m vacane pa.timantetuu''ti {pa.timantetunti (pii0 ka0)}.

[03] eva.m vutte, assalaayano maa.navo te braahma.ne etadavoca ^a^T2.0559^ea^ -- ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo dhammavaadii; dhammavaadino ca pana duppa.timantiyaa bhavanti. naaha.m sakkomi sama.nena gotamena saddhi.m asmi.m vacane pa.timantetu''nti. dutiyampi kho te braahma.naa assalaayana.m maa.nava.m etadavocu.m -- ``aya.m, bho assalaayana, sama.no gotamo caatuva.n.ni.m suddhi.m pa~n~napeti. etu bhava.m assalaayano sama.nena gotamena ^a^P2.0148^ea^ saddhi.m asmi.m vacane pa.timantetu {pa.timantetu.m (sii0 pii0 ka0)}. carita.m kho pana bhotaa assalaayanena paribbaajaka''nti. dutiyampi kho assalaayano maa.navo te braahma.ne etadavoca -- ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo dhammavaadii; dhammavaadino ca pana duppa.timantiyaa bhavanti ^a^V2.0363^ea^. naaha.m sakkomi sama.nena gotamena saddhi.m asmi.m vacane pa.timantetu''nti. tatiyampi kho te braahma.naa assalaayana.m maa.nava.m etadavocu.m -- ``aya.m, bho assalaayana, sama.no gotamo caatuva.n.ni.m suddhi.m pa~n~napeti. etu bhava.m assalaayano sama.nena gotamena saddhi.m asmi.m vacane pa.timantetu {pa.timantetu.m (sii0 pii0 ka0)}. carita.m kho pana bhotaa assalaayanena paribbaajaka.m. maa bhava.m assalaayano ayuddhaparaajita.m paraajayii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, assalaayano maa.navo te braahma.ne etadavoca -- ``addhaa kho aha.m bhavanto na labhaami. sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo dhammavaadii; dhammavaadino ca pana duppa.timantiyaa bhavanti. naaha.m sakkomi sama.nena gotamena saddhi.m asmi.m vacane pa.timantetunti. api caaha.m bhavantaana.m vacanena gamissaamii''ti.

[03] 402^b^.^eb^ atha kho assalaayano maa.navo mahataa braahma.naga.nena saddhi.m ^a^T2.0560^ea^ yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho assalaayano maa.navo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``braahma.naa, bho gotama, evamaaha.msu -- `braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no, hiino a~n~no va.n.no; braahma.nova sukko va.n.no, ka.nho a~n~no va.n.no; braahma.nova sujjhanti, no abraahma.naa; braahma.naava brahmuno puttaa ^a^M2.0356^ea^ orasaa mukhato jaataa brahmajaa brahmanimmitaa brahmadaayaadaa'ti. idha bhava.m gotamo kimaahaa''ti? ``dissanti {dissante (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} kho pana, assalaayana, braahma.naana.m braahma.niyo utuniyopi gabbhiniyopi vijaayamaanaapi paayamaanaapi. te ca braahma.niyonijaava samaanaa evamaaha.msu -- `braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no, hiino a~n~no va.n.no; braahma.nova sukko va.n.no, ka.nho a~n~no va.n.no; braahma.naava sujjhanti, no abraahma.naa; braahma.naava brahmuno puttaa orasaa mukhato jaataa brahmajaa brahmanimmitaa brahmadaayaadaa'''ti. ``ki~ncaapi ^a^P2.0149^ea^ bhava.m gotamo evamaaha, atha khvettha braahma.naa evameta.m ma~n~nanti -- `braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no, hiino a~n~no va.n.no...pe0... brahmadaayaadaa'''ti.

[03] 403^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, assalaayana, suta.m te -- `yonakambojesu a~n~nesu ca paccantimesu janapadesu dveva va.n.naa -- ayyo ceva daaso ca; ayyo hutvaa daaso hoti, daaso ^a^V2.0364^ea^ hutvaa ayyo hotii'''ti ^a^T2.0561^ea^? ``eva.m, bho, suta.m ta.m me -- `yonakambojesu a~n~nesu ca paccantimesu janapadesu dveva va.n.naa -- ayyo ceva daaso ca; ayyo hutvaa daaso hoti, daaso hutvaa ayyo hotii'''ti. ``ettha, assalaayana, braahma.naana.m ki.m bala.m, ko assaaso yadettha braahma.naa evamaaha.msu -- `braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no, hiino a~n~no va.n.no...pe0... brahmadaayaadaa'''ti? ``ki~ncaapi bhava.m gotamo evamaaha, atha khvettha braahma.naa evameta.m ma~n~nanti -- `braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no, hiino a~n~no va.n.no...pe0... brahmadaayaadaa'''ti.

[03] 404^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, assalaayana, khattiyova nu kho paa.naatipaatii adinnaadaayii kaamesumicchaacaarii musaavaadii pisu.navaaco pharusavaaco samphappalaapii abhijjhaalu byaapannacitto micchaadi.t.thi kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyya, no braahma.no? vessova nu kho...pe0... suddova nu kho paa.naatipaatii adinnaadaayii kaamesumicchaacaarii musaavaadii pisu.navaaco pharusavaaco samphappalaapii abhijjhaalu byaapannacitto micchaadi.t.thi kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyya, no braahma.no''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama. khattiyopi hi, bho ^a^M2.0357^ea^ gotama, paa.naatipaatii adinnaadaayii kaamesumicchaacaarii musaavaadii pisu.navaaco pharusavaaco samphappalaapii abhijjhaalu byaapannacitto micchaadi.t.thi ^a^T2.0562^ea^ kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyya. braahma.nopi hi, bho gotama...pe0... vessopi hi, bho gotama...pe0... suddopi hi, bho gotama...pe0... sabbepi hi, bho gotama, cattaaro va.n.naa paa.naatipaatino adinnaadaayino ^a^P2.0150^ea^ kaamesumicchaacaarino musaavaadino pisu.navaacaa pharusavaacaa samphappalaapino abhijjhaaluu byaapannacittaa micchaadi.t.thii kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyyu''nti. ``ettha, assalaayana, braahma.naana.m ki.m bala.m, ko assaaso yadettha braahma.naa evamaaha.msu -- `braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no, hiino a~n~no va.n.no...pe0... brahmadaayaadaa'''ti? ``ki~ncaapi bhava.m gotamo evamaaha, atha khvettha braahma.naa evameta.m ma~n~nanti -- `braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no, hiino a~n~no va.n.no...pe0... brahmadaayaadaa'''ti.
