[03] 443^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, braahma.na, braahma.nova nu kho pahoti sottisinaani.m aadaaya nadi.m gantvaa rajojalla.m pavaahetu.m, no khattiyo no vesso no suddo''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama ^a^V2.0400^ea^. khattiyopi hi, bho gotama, pahoti sottisinaani.m aadaaya nadi.m gantvaa rajojalla.m pavaahetu.m; braahma.nopi hi, bho gotama... vessopi hi, bho gotama ^a^P2.0183^ea^... suddopi hi, bho gotama... sabbepi hi, bho gotama, cattaaro va.n.naa pahonti sottisinaani.m aadaaya nadi.m gantvaa rajojalla.m pavaahetu''nti. ``evameva kho, braahma.na, khattiyakulaa cepi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti, so ca tathaagatappavedita.m dhammavinaya.m aagamma paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti...pe0... sammaadi.t.thi hoti, aaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m.

[03] ``braahma.nakulaa cepi, braahma.na... vessakulaa cepi, braahma.na... suddakulaa cepi ^a^T2.0620^ea^, braahma.na, agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti, so ca tathaagatappavedita.m dhammavinaya.m aagamma paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti...pe0... sammaadi.t.thi hoti, aaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m.

[03] 444^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ^a^M2.0394^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, braahma.na, idha raajaa khattiyo muddhaavasitto naanaajaccaana.m purisaana.m purisasata.m sannipaateyya -- `aayantu bhonto ye tattha khattiyakulaa braahma.nakulaa raaja~n~nakulaa uppannaa saakassa vaa saalassa vaa sala.lassa vaa candanassa vaa padumakassa vaa uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya aggi.m abhinibbattentu, tejo paatukarontu; aayantu pana bhonto ye tattha ca.n.daalakulaa nesaadakulaa venakulaa rathakaarakulaa pukkusakulaa uppannaa saapaanado.niyaa vaa suukarado.niyaa vaa rajakado.niyaa vaa era.n.daka.t.thassa vaa uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya aggi.m abhinibbattentu, tejo paatukarontuu'''ti?

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, braahma.na, yo eva.m nu kho so khattiyakulaa braahma.nakulaa raaja~n~nakulaa uppannehi saakassa vaa saalassa vaa sala.lassa vaa candanassa vaa padumakassa vaa uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya aggi abhinibbatto tejo paatukato so eva nu khvaassa aggi accimaa ceva va.n.navaa ca pabhassaro ca tena ca sakkaa agginaa aggikara.niiya.m ^a^T2.0621^ea^ kaatu.m; yo pana so ca.n.daalakulaa nesaadakulaa venakulaa rathakaarakulaa pukkusakulaa uppannehi saapaanado.niyaa vaa suukarado.niyaa vaa rajakado.niyaa vaa era.n.daka.t.thassa vaa uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya aggi abhinibbatto tejo paatukato svaassa aggi na ceva accimaa na ca va.n.navaa na ca ^a^V2.0401^ea^ pabhassaro na ca tena sakkaa agginaa aggikara.niiya.m kaatu''nti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama. yopi hi so, bho gotama, khattiyakulaa braahma.nakulaa raaja~n~nakulaa uppannehi saakassa vaa saalassa ^a^P2.0184^ea^ vaa sala.lassa vaa candanassa vaa padumakassa vaa uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya aggi abhinibbatto tejo paatukato svaassa aggi accimaa ceva va.n.navaa ca pabhassaro ca tena ca sakkaa agginaa aggikara.niiya.m kaatu.m; yopi so ca.n.daalakulaa nesaadakulaa venakulaa rathakaarakulaa pukkusakulaa uppannehi saapaanado.niyaa vaa suukarado.niyaa vaa rajakado.niyaa vaa era.n.daka.t.thassa vaa uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya aggi abhinibbatto tejo paatukato svaassa aggi accimaa ceva va.n.navaa ca pabhassaro ca tena ca sakkaa agginaa aggikara.niiya.m kaatu.m. sabbopi hi, bho gotama, aggi accimaa ceva va.n.navaa ca pabhassaro ca sabbenapi sakkaa agginaa aggikara.niiya.m kaatu''nti.

[01] ``evameva ^a^M2.0395^ea^ kho, braahma.na, khattiyakulaa cepi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti, so ca tathaagatappavedita.m dhammavinaya.m aagamma ^a^T2.0622^ea^ paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti...pe0... sammaadi.t.thi hoti, aaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m. braahma.nakulaa cepi, braahma.na... vessakulaa cepi, braahma.na... suddakulaa cepi, braahma.na, agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti, so ca tathaagatappavedita.m dhammavinaya.m aagamma paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, abrahmacariyaa pa.tivirato hoti, musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti, anabhijjhaalu hoti, abyaapannacitto hoti, sammaadi.t.thi hoti, aaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala''nti.

[01] eva.m vutte, esukaarii braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.
[06] esukaariisutta.m ni.t.thita.m cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 445^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0623^ea^ ^a^V2.0402^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa saariputto dakkhi.naagirismi.m caarika.m carati mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m. atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu ^a^P2.0185^ea^ raajagahe vassa.mvu.t.tho {vassa.mvuttho (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} yena dakkhi.naagiri yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa saariputtena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho ta.m bhikkhu.m aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca -- ``kaccaavuso, bhagavaa arogo ca balavaa caa''ti? ``arogo caavuso, bhagavaa balavaa caa''ti. ``kacci panaavuso, bhikkhusa"ngho arogo ca balavaa caa''ti? ``bhikkhusa"nghopi kho, aavuso, arogo ca balavaa caa''ti. ``ettha, aavuso, ta.n.dulapaalidvaaraaya dhana~njaani {dhaana~njaani (sii0 pii0)} naama braahma.no atthi. kaccaavuso ^a^M2.0396^ea^, dhana~njaani braahma.no arogo ca balavaa caa''ti? ``dhana~njaanipi kho, aavuso, braahma.no arogo ca balavaa caa''ti. ``kacci panaavuso, dhana~njaani braahma.no appamatto''ti? ``kuto panaavuso, dhana~njaanissa braahma.nassa appamaado? dhana~njaani, aavuso, braahma.no raajaana.m nissaaya braahma.nagahapatike vilumpati, braahma.nagahapatike nissaaya raajaana.m vilumpati ^a^T2.0624^ea^. yaapissa bhariyaa saddhaa saddhakulaa aaniitaa saapi kaala"nkataa; a~n~naassa bhariyaa assaddhaa assaddhakulaa aaniitaa''. ``dussuta.m vataavuso, assumha, dussuta.m vataavuso, assumha; ye maya.m dhana~njaani.m braahma.na.m pamatta.m assumha. appeva ca naama maya.m kadaaci karahaci dhana~njaaninaa braahma.nena saddhi.m samaagaccheyyaama, appeva naama siyaa kocideva kathaasallaapo''ti?

[03] 446^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa saariputto dakkhi.naagirismi.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena raajagaha.m tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena raajagaha.m tadavasari. tatra suda.m aayasmaa saariputto raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya paavisi ^a^P2.0186^ea^. tena kho pana samayena dhana~njaani braahma.no bahinagare gaavo go.t.the duhaapeti. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto ^a^V2.0403^ea^ raajagahe pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena dhana~njaani braahma.no tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho dhana~njaani braahma.no aayasmanta.m saariputta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``ito, bho saariputta, payo, piiyata.m taava bhattassa kaalo bhavissatii''ti. ``ala.m, braahma.na. kata.m me ajja bhattakicca.m. amukasmi.m me rukkhamuule divaavihaaro bhavissati. tattha aagaccheyyaasii''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho dhana~njaani ^a^T2.0625^ea^ braahma.no aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosi. atha kho dhana~njaani braahma.no pacchaabhatta.m bhuttapaataraaso yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa saariputtena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho dhana~njaani.m braahma.na.m aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca -- ``kaccaasi, dhana~njaani, appamatto''ti? ``kuto, bho saariputta, amhaaka.m appamaado yesa.m no maataapitaro ^a^M2.0397^ea^ posetabbaa, puttadaaro posetabbo, daasakammakaraa posetabbaa, mittaamaccaana.m mittaamaccakara.niiya.m kaatabba.m, ~naatisaalohitaana.m ~naatisaalohitakara.niiya.m kaatabba.m, atithiina.m atithikara.niiya.m kaatabba.m, pubbapetaana.m pubbapetakara.niiya.m kaatabba.m, devataana.m devataakara.niiya.m kaatabba.m, ra~n~no raajakara.niiya.m kaatabba.m, ayampi kaayo pii.netabbo bruuhetabbo''ti?

[03] 447^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, idhekacco maataapituuna.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, tamena.m adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahetu niraya.m nirayapaalaa upaka.d.dheyyu.m. labheyya nu kho so `aha.m kho maataapituuna.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii ahosi.m, maa ma.m niraya.m nirayapaalaa'ti ^a^P2.0187^ea^, maataapitaro vaa panassa labheyyu.m `eso kho amhaaka.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii ahosi, maa na.m niraya.m nirayapaalaa'''ti? ``no hida.m, bho saariputta. atha kho na.m vikkandanta.myeva niraye ^a^T2.0626^ea^ nirayapaalaa pakkhipeyyu.m''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, idhekacco puttadaarassa hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, tamena.m adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahetu niraya.m nirayapaalaa upaka.d.dheyyu.m. labheyya nu kho so `aha.m kho puttadaarassa hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii ahosi.m, maa ma.m niraya.m nirayapaalaa'ti, puttadaaro vaa panassa labheyya `eso kho amhaaka.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii ^a^V2.0404^ea^ ahosi maa na.m niraya.m nirayapaalaa'''ti? ``no hida.m, bho saariputta. atha kho na.m vikkandanta.myeva niraye nirayapaalaa pakkhipeyyu.m''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, idhekacco daasakammakaraporisassa hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, tamena.m adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahetu niraya.m nirayapaalaa upaka.d.dheyyu.m. labheyya nu kho so `aha.m kho daasakammakaraporisassa hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii ahosi.m, maa ma.m niraya.m nirayapaalaa'ti, daasakammakaraporisaa vaa panassa labheyyu.m `eso kho amhaaka.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii ahosi, maa na.m niraya.m nirayapaalaa'''ti? ``no hida.m, bho saariputta. atha kho na.m vikkandanta.myeva niraye nirayapaalaa pakkhipeyyu.m''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, idhekacco mittaamaccaana.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, tamena.m adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahetu niraya.m ^a^M2.0398^ea^ nirayapaalaa upaka.d.dheyyu.m. labheyya nu kho so `aha.m kho mittaamaccaana.m ^a^T2.0627^ea^ hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii ahosi.m, maa ma.m niraya.m nirayapaalaa'ti, mittaamaccaa vaa panassa labheyyu.m `eso kho amhaaka.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii ahosi, maa na.m niraya.m nirayapaalaa'''ti? ``no hida.m, bho saariputta. atha kho na.m vikkandanta.myeva niraye nirayapaalaa pakkhipeyyu.m''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, idhekacco ~naatisaalohitaana.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, tamena.m adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahetu niraya.m nirayapaalaa upaka.d.dheyyu.m. labheyya nu kho so `aha.m kho ~naatisaalohitaana.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii ahosi.m, maa ma.m niraya.m nirayapaalaa'ti, ~naatisaalohitaa vaa panassa labheyyu.m `eso kho amhaaka.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii ahosi, maa na.m niraya.m nirayapaalaa'''ti? ``no hida.m, bho saariputta. atha kho na.m vikkandanta.myeva niraye nirayapaalaa pakkhipeyyu.m''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, idhekacco atithiina.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, tamena.m adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahetu niraya.m nirayapaalaa upaka.d.dheyyu.m. labheyya nu kho so `aha.m kho atithiina.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii ahosi.m, maa ma.m niraya.m nirayapaalaa'ti, atithii vaa panassa labheyyu.m `eso kho amhaaka.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii ahosi, maa na.m niraya.m nirayapaalaa'''ti? ``no hida.m, bho saariputta. atha kho na.m vikkandanta.myeva niraye nirayapaalaa pakkhipeyyu.m''.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^T2.0628^ea^ ^a^V2.0405^ea^ ^a^P2.0188^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, idhekacco pubbapetaana.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, tamena.m adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahetu niraya.m nirayapaalaa upaka.d.dheyyu.m. labheyya nu kho so `aha.m kho pubbapetaana.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii ahosi.m, maa ma.m niraya.m nirayapaalaa'ti, pubbapetaa vaa panassa labheyyu.m `eso kho amhaaka.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii ahosi, maa na.m niraya.m nirayapaalaa'''ti? ``no hida.m, bho saariputta. atha kho na.m vikkandanta.myeva niraye nirayapaalaa pakkhipeyyu.m''.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^M2.0399^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, idhekacco devataana.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, tamena.m adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahetu niraya.m nirayapaalaa upaka.d.dheyyu.m. labheyya nu kho so `aha.m kho devataana.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii ahosi.m, maa ma.m niraya.m nirayapaalaa'ti, devataa vaa panassa labheyyu.m `eso kho amhaaka.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii ahosi, maa na.m niraya.m nirayapaalaa'''ti? ``no hida.m, bho saariputta. atha kho na.m vikkandanta.myeva niraye nirayapaalaa pakkhipeyyu.m''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, idhekacco ra~n~no hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, tamena.m adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahetu niraya.m nirayapaalaa upaka.d.dheyyu.m. labheyya nu kho so `aha.m kho ra~n~no hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii ahosi.m, maa ma.m niraya.m nirayapaalaa'ti, raajaa ^a^T2.0629^ea^ vaa panassa labheyya `eso kho amhaaka.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii ahosi, maa na.m niraya.m nirayapaalaa'''ti? ``no hida.m, bho saariputta. atha kho na.m vikkandanta.myeva niraye nirayapaalaa pakkhipeyyu.m''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, idhekacco kaayassa pii.nanaahetu bruuhanaahetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, tamena.m adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahetu niraya.m nirayapaalaa upaka.d.dheyyu.m. labheyya nu kho so `aha.m kho kaayassa pii.nanaahetu bruuhanaahetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii ahosi.m, maa ma.m niraya.m nirayapaalaa'ti, pare vaa panassa labheyyu.m `eso kho kaayassa pii.nanaahetu bruuhanaahetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii ahosi, maa na.m niraya.m nirayapaalaa'''ti? ``no hida.m, bho saariputta. atha kho na.m vikkandanta.myeva niraye nirayapaalaa pakkhipeyyu.m''.

[03] 448^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ^a^V2.0406^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, yo vaa maataapituuna.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, yo vaa maataapituuna.m hetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa; katama.m seyyo''ti? ``yo hi, bho saariputta, maataapituuna.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, na ta.m seyyo; yo ca kho, bho saariputta, maataapituuna.m hetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa, tadevettha seyyo. adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahi, bho saariputta, dhammacariyaasamacariyaa seyyo''ti. ``atthi kho, dhana~njaani, a~n~nesa.m hetukaa dhammikaa ^a^M2.0400^ea^ kammantaa, yehi sakkaa maataapitaro ceva posetu.m, na ca paapakamma.m kaatu.m, pu~n~na~nca pa.tipada.m pa.tipajjitu.m.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^T2.0630^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, yo vaa puttadaarassa hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, yo vaa puttadaarassa hetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa; katama.m seyyo''ti? ``yo ^a^P2.0189^ea^ hi, bho saariputta, puttadaarassa hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, na ta.m seyyo; yo ca kho, bho saariputta, puttadaarassa hetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa, tadevettha seyyo. adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahi, bho saariputta, dhammacariyaasamacariyaa seyyo''ti. ``atthi kho, dhana~njaani, a~n~nesa.m hetukaa dhammikaa kammantaa yehi sakkaa puttadaara~nceva posetu.m, na ca paapakamma.m kaatu.m, pu~n~na~nca pa.tipada.m pa.tipajjitu.m.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, yo vaa daasakammakaraporisassa hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, yo vaa daasakammakaraporisassa hetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa; katama.m seyyo''ti? ``yo hi, bho saariputta, daasakammakaraporisassa hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, na ta.m seyyo; yo ca kho, bho saariputta, daasakammakaraporisassa hetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa, tadevettha seyyo. adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahi, bho saariputta, dhammacariyaasamacariyaa seyyo''ti. ``atthi kho, dhana~njaani, a~n~nesa.m hetukaa dhammikaa kammantaa, yehi sakkaa daasakammakaraporise ceva posetu.m, na ca paapakamma.m kaatu.m, pu~n~na~nca pa.tipada.m pa.tipajjitu.m.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, yo vaa mittaamaccaana.m hetu ^a^T2.0631^ea^ adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, yo vaa mittaamaccaana.m hetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa; katama.m seyyo''ti? ``yo hi ^a^V2.0407^ea^, bho saariputta, mittaamaccaana.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, na ta.m seyyo; yo ca kho, bho saariputta, mittaamaccaana.m hetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa, tadevettha seyyo. adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahi, bho saariputta, dhammacariyaasamacariyaa seyyo''ti. ``atthi kho, dhana~njaani, a~n~nesa.m hetukaa dhammikaa kammantaa, yehi sakkaa mittaamaccaana~nceva mittaamaccakara.niiya.m kaatu.m, na ca paapakamma.m kaatu.m, pu~n~na~nca pa.tipada.m pa.tipajjitu.m.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^M2.0401^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, yo vaa ~naatisaalohitaana.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, yo vaa ~naatisaalohitaana.m hetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa; katama.m seyyo''ti? ``yo ^a^P2.0190^ea^ hi, bho saariputta, ~naatisaalohitaana.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, na ta.m seyyo; yo ca kho, bho saariputta, ~naatisaalohitaana.m hetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa, tadevettha seyyo. adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahi, bho saariputta, dhammacariyaasamacariyaa seyyo''ti. ``atthi kho, dhana~njaani, a~n~nesa.m hetukaa dhammikaa kammantaa, yehi sakkaa ~naatisaalohitaana~nceva ~naatisaalohitakara.niiya.m kaatu.m, na ca paapakamma.m kaatu.m, pu~n~na~nca pa.tipada.m pa.tipajjitu.m.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, yo vaa atithiina.m hetu adhammacaarii ^a^T2.0632^ea^ visamacaarii assa, yo vaa atithiina.m hetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa; katama.m seyyo''ti? ``yo hi, bho saariputta, atithiina.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, na ta.m seyyo; yo ca kho, bho saariputta, atithiina.m hetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa, tadevettha seyyo. adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahi, bho saariputta, dhammacariyaasamacariyaa seyyo''ti. ``atthi kho, dhana~njaani, a~n~nesa.m hetukaa dhammikaa kammantaa, yehi sakkaa atithiina~nceva atithikara.niiya.m kaatu.m, na ca paapakamma.m kaatu.m, pu~n~na~nca pa.tipada.m pa.tipajjitu.m.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, yo vaa pubbapetaana.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, yo vaa pubbapetaana.m hetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa; katama.m seyyo''ti? ``yo hi, bho saariputta, pubbapetaana.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, na ta.m seyyo; yo ca kho, bho saariputta, pubbapetaana.m hetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa, tadevettha seyyo. adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahi ^a^V2.0408^ea^, bho saariputta, dhammacariyaasamacariyaa seyyo''ti. ``atthi kho, dhana~njaani, a~n~nesa.m hetukaa dhammikaa kammantaa, yehi sakkaa pubbapetaana~nceva pubbapetakara.niiya.m kaatu.m, na ca paapakamma.m kaatu.m, pu~n~na~nca pa.tipada.m pa.tipajjitu.m.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, yo vaa devataana.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, yo vaa devataana.m hetu dhammacaarii samacaarii ^a^T2.0633^ea^ assa; katama.m ^a^M2.0402^ea^ seyyo''ti? ``yo hi, bho saariputta, devataana.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, na ta.m seyyo; yo ca kho, bho saariputta, devataana.m hetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa, tadevettha seyyo ^a^P2.0191^ea^. adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahi, bho saariputta, dhammacariyaasamacariyaa seyyo''ti. ``atthi kho, dhana~njaani, a~n~nesa.m hetukaa dhammikaa kammantaa, yehi sakkaa devataana~nceva devataakara.niiya.m kaatu.m, na ca paapakamma.m kaatu.m, pu~n~na~nca pa.tipada.m pa.tipajjitu.m.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, yo vaa ra~n~no hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, yo vaa ra~n~no hetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa; katama.m seyyo''ti? ``yo hi, bho saariputta, ra~n~no hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, na ta.m seyyo; yo ca kho, bho saariputta, ra~n~no hetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa, tadevettha seyyo. adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahi, bho saariputta, dhammacariyaasamacariyaa seyyo''ti. ``atthi kho, dhana~njaani, a~n~nesa.m hetukaa dhammikaa kammantaa, yehi sakkaa ra~n~no ceva raajakara.niiya.m kaatu.m, na ca paapakamma.m kaatu.m, pu~n~na~nca pa.tipada.m pa.tipajjitu.m.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, yo vaa kaayassa pii.nanaahetu bruuhanaahetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, yo vaa kaayassa pii.nanaahetu bruuhanaahetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa; katama.m seyyo''ti? ``yo hi, bho saariputta, kaayassa pii.nanaahetu bruuhanaahetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii ^a^T2.0634^ea^ assa, na ta.m seyyo; yo ca kho, bho saariputta, kaayassa pii.nanaahetu bruuhanaahetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa, tadevettha seyyo. adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahi, bho saariputta, dhammacariyaasamacariyaa seyyo''ti. ``atthi kho, dhana~njaani, a~n~nesa.m hetukaa dhammikaa kammantaa ^a^V2.0409^ea^, yehi sakkaa kaaya~nceva pii.netu.m bruuhetu.m, na ca paapakamma.m kaatu.m, pu~n~na~nca pa.tipada.m pa.tipajjitu''nti.

[03] 449^b^.^eb^ atha kho dhana~njaani braahma.no aayasmato saariputtassa bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. atha kho dhana~njaani braahma.no aparena samayena aabaadhiko ahosi dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. atha kho dhana~njaani braahma.no a~n~natara.m purisa.m aamantesi ^a^M2.0403^ea^ -- ``ehi tva.m, ambho purisa ^a^P2.0192^ea^, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena bhagavato paade sirasaa vandaahi -- `dhana~njaani, bhante, braahma.no aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. so bhagavato paade sirasaa vandatii'ti. yena caayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena aayasmato saariputtassa paade sirasaa vandaahi -- `dhana~njaani, bhante, braahma.no aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. so aayasmato saariputtassa paade sirasaa vandatii'ti. eva~nca vadehi -- `saadhu kira, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto yena dhana~njaanissa braahma.nassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa'''ti. ``eva.m ^a^T2.0635^ea^, bhante''ti kho so puriso dhana~njaanissa braahma.nassa pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so puriso bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``dhana~njaani, bhante, braahma.no aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. so bhagavato paade sirasaa vandatii''ti. yena caayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so puriso aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``dhana~njaani, bhante, braahma.no aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. so aayasmato saariputtassa paade sirasaa vandati, eva~nca vadeti -- `saadhu kira, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto yena dhana~njaanissa braahma.nassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa'''ti. adhivaasesi kho aayasmaa saariputto tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] 450^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa saariputto nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena dhana~njaanissa braahma.nassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho aayasmaa saariputto dhana~njaani.m braahma.na.m etadavoca -- ``kacci te, dhana~njaani, khamaniiya.m, kacci yaapaniiya.m? kacci dukkhaa vedanaa pa.tikkamanti, no abhikkamanti? pa.tikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati ^a^V2.0410^ea^, no abhikkamo''ti? ``na me, bho saariputta, khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti. abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo. seyyathaapi, bho saariputta ^a^P2.0193^ea^, balavaa puriso ti.nhena sikharena muddhani {muddhaana.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} abhimattheyya; evameva kho ^a^M2.0404^ea^, bho saariputta, adhimattaa vaataa muddhani ca uuhananti. na me, bho saariputta, khamaniiya.m, na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me ^a^T2.0636^ea^ dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti. abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo. seyyathaapi, bho saariputta, balavaa puriso da.lhena varattakkha.n.dena {varattabandhanena (sii0 pii0)} siise siisave.tha.m dadeyya; evameva kho, bho saariputta, adhimattaa siise siisavedanaa. na me, bho saariputta, khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti. abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo. seyyathaapi, bho saariputta, dakkho goghaatako vaa goghaatakantevaasii vaa ti.nhena govikantanena kucchi.m parikanteyya; evameva kho, bho saariputta, adhimattaa vaataa kucchi.m parikantanti. na me, bho saariputta, khamaniiya.m, na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti. abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo. seyyathaapi, bho saariputta, dve balavanto purisaa dubbalatara.m purisa.m naanaabaahaasu gahetvaa a"ngaarakaasuyaa santaapeyyu.m samparitaapeyyu.m; evameva kho, bho saariputta, adhimatto kaayasmi.m .daaho. na me, bho saariputta, khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti. abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati ^a^T2.0637^ea^, no pa.tikkamo''ti.

[03] 451^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, katama.m seyyo -- nirayo vaa tiracchaanayoni vaa''ti? ``nirayaa, bho saariputta, tiracchaanayoni seyyo''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, katama.m seyyo -- tiracchaanayoni vaa pettivisayo vaa''ti? ``tiracchaanayoniyaa, bho saariputta, pettivisayo seyyo''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, katama.m seyyo -- pettivisayo vaa manussaa vaa''ti? ``pettivisayaa, bho saariputta, manussaa seyyo''ti. ``ta.m ^a^P2.0194^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani ^a^V2.0411^ea^, katama.m seyyo -- manussaa vaa caatumahaaraajikaa {caatummahaaraajikaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaa devaa''ti? ``manussehi ^a^M2.0405^ea^, bho saariputta, caatumahaaraajikaa devaa seyyo''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, katama.m seyyo -- caatumahaaraajikaa vaa devaa taavati.msaa vaa devaa''ti? ``caatumahaaraajikehi, bho saariputta, devehi taavati.msaa devaa seyyo''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, katama.m seyyo -- taavati.msaa vaa devaa yaamaa vaa devaa''ti? ``taavati.msehi, bho saariputta, devehi yaamaa devaa seyyo''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, katama.m seyyo -- yaamaa vaa devaa tusitaa vaa devaa''ti? ``yaamehi, bho saariputta, devehi tusitaa devaa seyyo''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, katama.m seyyo -- tusitaa vaa devaa nimmaanaratii vaa devaa''ti? ``tusitehi, bho saariputta, devehi nimmaanaratii devaa seyyo''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, katama.m seyyo -- nimmaanaratii vaa devaa paranimmitavasavattii vaa devaa''ti? ``nimmaanaratiihi ^a^T2.0638^ea^, bho saariputta, devehi paranimmitavasavattii devaa seyyo''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, katama.m seyyo paranimmitavasavattii vaa devaa brahmaloko vaa''ti? ```brahmaloko'ti {bhava.m saariputto aahaati, katama.m saariputto aaha brahmalokoti. (ka0)} -- bhava.m saariputto aaha; `brahmaloko'ti -- bhava.m saariputto aahaa''ti {bhava.m saariputto aahaati, katama.m saariputto aaha brahmalokoti. (ka0)}.

[03] atha kho aayasmato saariputtassa etadahosi -- ``ime kho braahma.naa brahmalokaadhimuttaa. ya.mnuunaaha.m dhana~njaanissa braahma.nassa brahmaana.m sahabyataaya magga.m deseyya''nti. ``brahmaana.m te, dhana~njaani, sahabyataaya magga.m desessaami; ta.m su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho dhana~njaani braahma.no aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosi. aayasmaa ^a^P2.0195^ea^ saariputto etadavoca -- ``katamo ca, dhana~njaani, brahmaana.m sahabyataaya maggo? idha, dhana~njaani, bhikkhu mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m; iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa viharati. aya.m kho, dhana~njaani, brahmaana.m sahabyataaya maggo''.

[03] 452^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, dhana~njaani, bhikkhu karu.naasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... muditaasahagatena cetasaa... upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m; iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m ^a^T2.0639^ea^ upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa viharati. aya.m kho, dhana~njaani, brahmaana.m sahabyataaya maggo''ti. tena hi, bho saariputta, mama vacanena bhagavato paade sirasaa vandaahi -- `dhana~njaani ^a^M2.0406^ea^, bhante, braahma.no aabaadhiko ^a^V2.0412^ea^ dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. so bhagavato paade sirasaa vandatii'ti. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto dhana~njaani.m braahma.na.m sati uttarikara.niiye hiine brahmaloke pati.t.thaapetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. atha kho dhana~njaani braahma.no acirapakkante aayasmante saariputte kaalamakaasi, brahmaloka~nca upapajji.

[03] 453^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``eso, bhikkhave, saariputto dhana~njaani.m braahma.na.m sati uttarikara.niiye hiine brahmaloke pati.t.thaapetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkanto''ti. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi, ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``dhana~njaani, bhante, braahma.no aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano, so bhagavato paade sirasaa vandatii''ti. ``ki.m pana tva.m saariputta dhana~njaani.m braahma.na.m sati ^a^P2.0196^ea^ uttarikara.niiye hiine brahmaloke pati.t.thaapetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkanto''ti? ``mayha.m kho, bhante, eva.m ahosi -- `ime kho braahma.naa brahmalokaadhimuttaa, ya.mnuunaaha.m dhana~njaanissa braahma.nassa ^a^T2.0640^ea^ brahmaana.m sahabyataaya magga.m deseyya'nti. ``kaala"nkatoca {kaala"nkatova (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}, saariputta, dhana~njaani braahma.no, brahmaloka~nca upapanno''ti.
[06] dhana~njaanisutta.m ni.t.thita.m sattama.m.

[03] 454^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0641^ea^ ^a^V2.0413^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa icchaana"ngale {icchaana"nkale (sii0 pii0)} viharati icchaana"ngalavanasa.n.de. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa braahma.namahaasaalaa icchaana"ngale pa.tivasanti, seyyathida.m -- ca"nkii braahma.no, taarukkho braahma.no, pokkharasaati braahma.no, jaa.nusso.ni {jaa.nusso.nii (pii0), jaa.nuso.nii (ka0)} braahma.no, todeyyo braahma.no, a~n~ne ca abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa braahma.namahaasaalaa. atha kho vaase.t.thabhaaradvaajaana.m maa.navaana.m ja"nghaavihaara.m anuca"nkamantaana.m anuvicarantaana.m {anuca"nkamamaanaana.m anuvicaramaanaana.m (sii0 pii0)} ayamantaraakathaa ^a^M2.0407^ea^ udapaadi -- ``katha.m, bho, braahma.no hotii''ti? bhaaradvaajo maa.navo evamaaha -- ``yato kho, bho, ubhato sujaato maatito ca pitito ca sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena -- ettaavataa kho, bho, braahma.no hotii''ti. vaase.t.tho maa.navo evamaaha -- ``yato kho, bho, siilavaa ca hoti vattasampanno {vatasampanno (pii0)} ca -- ettaavataa kho, bho, braahma.no hotii''ti. neva kho asakkhi bhaaradvaajo maa.navo vaase.t.tha.m maa.nava.m sa~n~naapetu.m, na pana asakkhi vaase.t.tho maa.navo bhaaradvaaja.m maa.nava.m sa~n~naapetu.m. atha kho vaase.t.tho maa.navo bhaaradvaaja.m maa.nava.m aamantesi -- ``aya.m kho, bho bhaaradvaaja, sama.no gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa ^a^T2.0642^ea^ pabbajito icchaana"ngale viharati icchaana"ngalavanasa.n.de. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. aayaama, bho bhaaradvaaja, yena sama.no gotamo tenupasa"nkamissaama; upasa"nkamitvaa sama.na.m gotama.m etamattha.m pucchissaama. yathaa no sama.no gotamo byaakarissati tathaa na.m dhaaressaamaa''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho bhaaradvaajo maa.navo vaase.t.thassa maa.navassa paccassosi.

[03] 455^b^.^eb^ atha kho vaase.t.thabhaaradvaajaa maa.navaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi.msu. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinno kho vaase.t.tho maa.navo bhagavanta.m gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``anu~n~naatapa.ti~n~naataa, tevijjaa mayamasmubho.
[22] aha.m pokkharasaatissa, taarukkhassaaya.m maa.navo..
